- eltalaba hayestakshfo 7araka elgoze2yat khlal elghesma 3an terik elenteshar.
- eltalaba hayestakshfo ta'theer el tadrej elterkezi 3ala moed elenteshar.
w-ba3deen, eltalaba hay3mlo elly gay:- hayest5admo masbar eltawseel 3ashan yefhamo mawade3 elenteshar.
- hayetworo fahmhom le ta'theer terkiz elma7lool 3ala moed elenteshar khlal ghesma monafez enteqay.
momken te7eb takhally eltalaba ye3mlo taqreer ma3mel b2estekhdam ti-nspire ba3d nafad elma3mel dah.

men el mohem en el mazare3een mayeshnosh le7ad ma yeb2a 3andohom na2s fee el teben fee el shita 3ashan yedawaro 3aleh.
2ayem e7teya6atek men el teben fee el wa2t el monaseb 3ashan te2dar tegeb teben zeyada, aw te2allal 3add el ba2ar law lazem el amr.
tare2a "wa7da el ba2ara" de tare2a sree3a letqyeem el e7teya6at men el teben.
7ot fee e3tibarakak 7awaly 25 ela 30 ratl men el teben lekol wa7da ba2ara (30 kways, 3ashan by3mel 7esab shwaya lel teben elly momken yetrami).
e3tbar kol 1000 ratl men el ba2ar wa7da, aw e3tbar kol ba2ara wa7da, wel 3agel 7awaly nesf wa7da, wel thowr wa7deteen.
2addar 3add el ayam elly hat7taj feehom teben (men 100 ela 120 yom howa el 6abee3y).
edrab 3add wa7dat el ba2ar fe ratl el teben lekol wa7da ba2ara, wedrab el nata2 fe 3add el ayam elly hatestakhdem feehom el teben.
ba3d keda 2a2aren e7teya6atak men el teben bel kamenya elly 3andak fe el makhzan.
meshal: 50 ba2ara x 30 ratl teben lekol ba2ara x 100 yom = 150,000 ratl.
law balat el teben bet3atak wezna 1000 ratl, yeb2a 150,000 ratl รท 1000 = 150 bala 3ashan tekfy el shita.
el mazare3een elly me7tageen yeshteroo teben lazzem yeshteroh delwa2ty.
- fe 2 anwa3 r2yseyyen mn elbaktiria di, el-mrsa w el-mssa.
el-mrsa a2wa mn el-mssa 3shan bet2awem el-adwiya el-2adyia, w 3shan keda bet7tag 2adwiya akter t2ol w a2wa 3shan te2telha.
- el-2a3rad el-2asasyia lel-baktiria di betkon 3la shakl 7abba7 7amra aw 7abba7at 7amra 3la el-jeld, w momken teb2a mo2lima aw mo2lima awy w momken tesa7ebha 7ara2a w 7orara.
momken kaman yekoon fe 7oma w 7ara2a 3nd el-tanaffos w 7arara fel-dam.
- 5 tarayeq asasyia lemano3 enteshar el-baktiria di: 1) gass el-edian be-mosta7'el 2) estekhdam odaat 7amia monfrasa 3) ta3qim el-marad 4) el-3azl el-s7y 5) ta3qim el-mawad w el-2adwat.

- 3awamel el-5atar lel-mrsa w el-mssa betshmel el-nas elly 3endhom jero7 aw 2esab wara7eya, elly byet3alajo fel-mostashfa aw mawared el-3enaya el-se7ia, w el-nas elly 3endhom man3a7 bel-mana3a el-day3a.

- 5 e7'eteyat lazem tet3'amal ma3 marad moshaba bel-mrsa: 1) 3azl el-marad fel-mostashfa 2) estekhdam odaat 7amia monfrasa 3) ta3qim el-marad 4) estekhdam adwiya monasba 5) motaba3a el-marad bardo ba3d el-5oroj mn el-mostashfa.

3arefeen ba2a leeh el-mawdoo3 kan mohem?
3ashan kanaw 3ayzeen yet2amno 3ala mawdoo3 na2l el-safara el-amrekeya men tel-abib lel-qods.
ya3ny law 7asal keda faga2a, momken el-zeyarat el-3arabeya le-amerika tebouz, wel-3ala2at ma been amerika w el-dawal el-3arabeya tet2asar.
homma 3ayzeen yetfado ay lekma fel-mawdoo3 dah, khososan ennohom 3ayzeen 3ala2at a7san ma3 amerika men elly kanet fe 3ahd obama.
w ba3deen yaser rizk 2al enn el-bayan elly tal3 fee el-2a5er men el-2ema el-3arabeya raqm 28 mafehosh ay 7aga gededa aw mosheera, ya3ny mafeesh drama.

bas aham 7aga enn el-dawal el-3arabeya 2alet ennaha most3eda le-mofawadat gedya ma been 2esra2eel w felesteen, w dah kollo 3ashan fe el-2a5er te2om el-dawla el-felesteenyah, w teb2a fee 7al el-dawleteyn.
ana ba2a 3ayza a2ool enn el-mawdoo3 dah kollo esti7lak lel-wa2t, ya3ny ay 7aga 3ashan yeb2a feeh kalam keteer, w fe el-2a5er mafeesh khodar, a2sedy mafeesh natiga.
rabena yesterna 3alena w 3ala el-2omma el-3arabeya kolha.
ya gama3a, elnaharda elahad 26 december 2021, welrayyes abdelfattah el-sisi talab men el-e3'lam 7aga mohema gedan.
how 3ayez el-e3'lam yowadha7 lennas khareetet el-mashro3at elly eldawla betanfezha, wdi 7aga hayla 3ashan na3raf ezzay el-mashro3at di betet3'amel w leeh ba3dha et2a5ar.
ya3ny mathalan mashro3 toshka leeh metamalesh abl keda, w lazem el-e3'lam yoshra7 lennas kaman ezzay eldawla beteta3amal ma3a el-taghayyarat el-manakhya men khilal el-mashro3at elly bet3melha.

elrayyes el-sisi kalam kaman en el-mar7ala el-awela men mashro3 el-delta kalafet eldawla 85 meleya gineih, w mashro3 zer3a 500 alf feddan fe sina2 kalafna 100 meleya gineih, w 3ashan na3mel meelyon feddan ma7tageen 7awaly 200 meleya gineih.
ya3ny eldawla betestethmar floss ketir fe el-mashro3at di 3ashan tanmeyet elbalad.
w beyetkallem elrayyes 3an manti2a wadi el-natroun, elly kant mot7'a men 20 w 25 sana, bas leeh metamareztesh?
3ashan goz2 men el-ard etzar3 3ala maya el-2abar bas, w lama eldawla kararret tekbar mas7'a el-zer3a w testaghel elmaya beshkel a7san, la2et en el-program da mokallef gedan.
ya3ny mathalan meen yegdar yegool lmostathmer ta3ala a3mel ma7etta m3alaga betaklifa 20 meleya gineih aw shabka masaref, di 7agat eldawla heya elly bet3melha.
besara7a, ana fakhour belrayyes el-sisi w ehtemamoh betawdeeh el-mashro3at di lennas, w da bey5aleena kmasreyyeen nefham aktar ezzay baladna betetatawwar w beteta3amel ma3a el-tahadeyat.
rabena yewaf2 baladna w yekter men el-mashro3at elly zy keda, w yeb3ad 3anna kol shar.

a3da2 elgame3a el3omoomiya beybtado ytwafdo 3ala maqar el7ezb fel dawky 3ashan ysharko fel entekhabat re2asa el7ezb.
el entekhabat di been elmostashar baha2 eldin abu shoka, rayes el7ezb wwakeel awel magles elshyou5, weldoktor 3abd elsond yamama, 3odw elhey2a el3olya.
eltasweet beybtadi men elsa3a 9 elsob7 weyekmel le7ad elsa3a 5 el3asr, wekol da ta7t eshraaf kaza2y kamil.
elleyga elkazeya elmoshrafa 3ala elentekhabat et2akadt en kol el2ejra2at metzabta, welqodat homa elly heyfarzo elsanday2 ta7t eshraaf 3 men mostashary hey2a elneyaaba el2edarya.
elleyga elmoshrafa 3ala elentekhabat a3'lnet en bataygat el7odour etwazedt 3ala ro2sa2 elleygat el3amma fel mohafzat 3ashan tro7 le3odw elgame3a el3omoomiya.
eltasweet haykoon belbataka elshakhsya wbataka el7odour elly etwazedt.
elleyga kamen betnashid a3da2 7ezb elwafd enohm yeltezmo bel'2ejra2at ela7trazeya weyelbeso elkamamat elly bettwazed magana abl dokhol elmaqarr.

elleyga elmoshrafa 3ala elentekhabat di feha nas keteer mohema fel 7ezb zy fo2ad badrawy, sekretyr 3am el7ezb, we3eed hikal, na2eb rayes el7ezb, wmohamed madina, na2eb rayes el7ezb, we3abbas 7azeen, sekretyr mosad el7ezb, wkazem fadel, sekretyr mosad el7ezb, weldoctor wagdy zein eldin, 3odw elhey2a el3olya wra2es tahrir jarida elwafd, wayman mohamed sayed, elmadir elmaley lel7ezb.

ana kmowaten masry webe7kom ehtemamy belshan el3am, ween kan ehtemamy belseyaasa mesh kbeer, b7eb ataba3 elentekhabat di 3ashan di forsa kwayesa en el7ezb yekhtar rayes gedid momken yeghayyer wetatawor fel 7ezb.
ana b7taram 7ezb elwafd kteer wbet3abero men el'7ezab elly leha tar5 3areeq fel masr, wbetmennay en elentekhabat di tekoun nazeha wshefafa 3ashan masla7a el7ezb welbalad.

elnaharda el khamees 23 yoolyo 2015, el sa3a 3adet 10 el sob7 beshwaya, w ana ga3ed fe sh2ty fe 2esm damanhour, 2areet 5abar fe el gornal bey2ool en el doctor mamdooh el damaty, wazeer el athaar, hay2om beefteta7 meshroo3 enarat ma3bad el ramseum w talat maqaber fe wadi el molook youm el sabt el gayy, 25 yoolyo.
el 5abar bey2ool en el meshroo3 dah gez2 men khetet kbeera le 7ameyet men2et el bar el gharby fe el 2aksar, w hayrkooboo cameraat morakaba thaabeta w mot7araka.

el doctor el damaty akad en el meshroo3 dah mohim gedan w haysahem fe tansheet el saye7a w tashge3 el zawar enhom yezoro el men2a bel layl, w mawa3eed el zeyara hatetmed le7ad el sa3a 11 bel layl fe el seif w le7ad el sa3a 9 bel layl fe el shita.

mahmoud 3afify, ra2ees qeta3 el athaar el masreya, 2al en meshroo3 el enara el 7aditha dah eshtamal 3ala tageer nezam el eza2a el 2adeem w estebdalo be nezam gedeed w motatwer zey elly beytestakhal fe el 3alam kollo.

w adaf kaman en el meshroo3 dah momawal be 2ard men espanya makhsoos le mashroo3at ta2meen w enara el men2at el athareya fe el 2aksar, w kan akher meshroo3 momathes howa enara w ta2meen ma3bad el 2aksar elly etfate7 fe mars elly fat.

el mohandes wa3d allah mohamed, ra2ees qeta3 el mashroo3at, 2al en el meshroo3 dah etnafath ta7t eshraaf el qeta3 mubashara, w enhom khallasoo el banya el asaseya le ta2meen w enara men2et el bar el gharby kolha, elly feha ma3bad hatshepsut fe el deir el bahary, ma3bad el ramseum, men2et wadi el molook, w ma3bad madina habu.
w keda el men2a kolha hatkoon gayza lel efteta7 fe khalal shohoor kameya gayya.

el doctor el damaty hay3mel gawla tafakodeya youm el sabt el sob7 fe mawaqe3 athareya fe el 2aksar, zey mat7af el 2aksar w mat7af el tahnit w men2et el bar el gharby, 3ashan yetaba3 seer el 3amal w el 7ala el amneya fe el amaken de.

aragw harp lljabal wba3deen enadam le3saba b2yada francisko "bancho" vella; lma vella dah et2atel, aragw 5ad esmoh w3sabetoh.
fe 1910 vella elgdeed wrgaleh andamw llthawra 5odam eldictator elmexicanii borfirio diaz.

patton.)ta3atf vella ma3 elfallahin wmo3arakatoh el2wla 5odam nezam diaz elfasid 5alet meno shakhs sha3by 3nd f2ra elmexik, wmgamrato kant bettntshr kteer fe amreeka w7waly el3alam.

el mawdoo3 da beyfekerny bektab "leh johnny mesh 3aref yegra" ally ketbo fleesh fe 1955, laken fe el 7a2ee2a, el ketab ally be7'd elly shar7 wagt'ha fleesh be3'eer 3elmy w manti2y kan ketab "el fawda fe el 2era2a wel 3ela2" ally ketbo terman w walcott fe 1958.
el ketab da 7allal wagt'ha fleesh ally kanet mogra bas 3ala nazaryet el gestalt ally bet2ool en el tifl beyta3lam men el kol lel ajza2, w khososan fe el 2era2a.
el ketab khallas le nata2'a en fe etehad ghyr manti2y ben el nazarya de w derasa 7arakat el 3een.
w 2alo en da ady le 2asas nazary ghalat le tare2a el 2era2a ally betdamar nezam el ta3leem beta3na.
w da le2no homa taghallo 7a2e2a asaseya en el kalemaat el matbo3a heya ramouz lel aswat.
w law me7tageen delil akter, fa 2alo en cronbach fe ketabo "3elm el nafs el ta3leemy" 2al en el 2are2 el kways beyshof el kalema kolha aw el gomla kolha fe nazra wa7da w bey3rafha men sha5lha.
fleesh fe 1955 2al en kol el atfal fe 2engeltera beteta3lemo el phonics, laken da 6ala3 mesh 7a2e2y.
dyak w daniels fe 1953 7azaro men el 5alet ally bey7'sol besabab tare2 el tadres el mokhtelta, laken rad fe3l el modarees kan ghadab gedan (lloyd-jones, 2013).
w da 5alla morris fe 1953 yekhtare3 kalema "phonics-phobia" 3ashan yeshra7 rad el fe3l el ghyr manti2y le ay zekr lel phonics k tare2a tadres.
aqwa delil 3ala en el tadres el mokhtelt lel 2era2a fe el sanawat el awela ba2a gez2 asasy men el ta3leem fe 2engeltera howa taqreer bloden (blackstone, 1967).

el taqreer da 3amal derasa shamila le nezam el ta3leem el ebteday fe 2engeltera w khallas le nata2'a en el atfal beyesa3edhom fe el 2era2a enhom ye7'zammo sha5l el kalemaat, ghalban ma3a el sowar, aw bel taw2o3 men el sayaq, aw bel phonics, bas fe el bedaya.
w beyshage3o el atfal enhom yegarbo kol el tare2 men el motawafra w may3temedosh 3ala tare2a wa7da bas.
elly wa7'ed mesh bas el 3etmad 3ala el tare2 el mokhtelta fe el tadres, laken kaman en el phonics howa el malja2 el akher, w da bas lel aswat el awleya.

2engeltera mesh ganet el phonics.
w mesh a7san men amreeka fe 7aga.
3ala el a2al, amreeka kan 3andha el mo2tamar el watany lel ba7'os fe el logha el englzeeyya ally fe 1959, fe wa2t kan feeh el jadel fe ashad 7alatoh, 3amal lejna khasa lel ba7'os fe el 2era2a.
jean chall (1967), 3odwa fe el lejna, 2ataret en t7'leel naqdy le kol el ab7'as el motawafra hayesa3ed fe ay tajroba te2ter7'aha el lejna.
2e7'tearha et2abel w etmawl men mo2assasat carnegie w bedat el derasa fe 1962 w khalasat fe 1965.

chall (1967) 7allalet kol el ab7'as el tare5eya el motawafra 3an tare2a "enteq w 2era2" moqaranet be tare2a el phonics fe ta3leem el 2era2a fe el sanawat el awela, w derasat mad'a f3aliyetha fe el fahm w el mofradat w el sora.

fe kol el 7alat ella wa7da (derasa gates fe 1927), el nata2'g asharat en fe el sanawat el awela tare2a "enteq w 2era2" btdy nata2'g a3la, laken el mazyada de bet5'tfy w betet2aleb ma3a taqdom el talaba fe el sanawat el a3'la.
chall khalasat le nata2'a en el phonics mesh bas mofeed fe el ta3ref 3ala el kalemaat, laken kaman fe el fahm.
w shar7et en ta3leem el phonics leeh ta2'er 2akmy mohem fe entag el mazyada de ba3d keda.
chall (1967) kaman 7allalet el derasat ally bet2aren ben ta3leem el phonics el monazam w el phonics el 3ashwa2y ally kan gates (1927) bey7ebo w fleesh (1955) beykarho.
el nata2'g kanet wa7'eda.
fe el ta3ref 3ala el kalemaat w el tah'ezza w el mofradat w el fahm, el atfal ally beyeta3lemo bel phonics el monazam kan awla men elly beyeta3lemo bel phonics el 3ashwa2y.
bas fe sora el 2era2a, el atfal ally beyeta3lemo bel phonics el 3ashwa2y kan awla, laken el mazyada de bet2al w betet2aleb fe el sana el raba3a.
estenteghat derasa chall kanet wa7'eda:mo3'zam el atfal fe amreeka beyeta3lemo el 2era2a be tare2a el terkiz 3ala el ma3na.

laken el ab7'as men 1912 le 1965 bet2ool en tare2a el terkiz 3ala el code, ya3ny el tare2a ally betshof el 2era2a el awleya mokhtelafa 3an el 2era2a el motakadema w beted3am ta3lem el code el matbo3 lel logha el montoqa, btdy nata2'g a7san.

taqreer el-lajna el-estesharya el-wataneya le-72u2o2 el-ensan fe yom 8 october 2009, awset el-lajna el-estesharya el-wataneya le-72u2o2 el-ensan el-7okoma el-ostralya be-esdar 2a2on le-72u2o2 el-ensan fe ostralya.
gaya da estejaba le-7amlat tawela 7wal el-mawdoo3, wbe-fadl el-3edad el-qeyasy men el-ostralyeen elly sharako fe akbar esteshara 3amma fe el-balad 7wal 72u2o2 el-ensan.
akthar men 87% men 35,000 mosharaka ferdya w6,000 mosharak fe gelesat el-neqash el-3amma afado b2anno homa yredoon en tekoun 72u2o2hom el-ensanya mekrassa fe el-tashre3at el-wataneya.

awset el-lajna b2anno tensher el-7okoma 2a2on etehady le-72u2o2 el-ensan ma3a 2a2ema mafhooma lel-72u2o2 wel-mas2oleyat el-ostralya ben2a 3ala el-eltizametna men el-mo3ahadat el-dawleya el-sab3 le-72u2o2 el-ensan elly w23na 3aleehom.
wshamel da el-72u2o2 el-madanya wel-syeasya wel-eqtesadya wel-thaqafya wel-ejtem3ya.
wma3a keda, lessa monezmeyet el-3afw el-dawleya te7es bel-qal2 men en el-taqreer yefare2 ben mo3alaja el-72u2o2 el-eqtesadya wel-thaqafya wel-ejtem3ya wmo3alaja el-72u2o2 el-madanya wel-syeasya.
a7na ben2a3ed en kol 72u2o2 el-ensan ghyr 2ablat lel-taqseem wmotarate6a wlazem tet3amel 3ala 2adam el-mosawa.
2t2ademt tawseeyat gedda bel-ta7eeya b2elnesba lel-ta3leem, fe el-lajna 2a2aret be-ehmeyat el-ta3leem fe tahsen wta3zeez 72u2o2 el-ensan fe ostralya.
kaman awset el-lajna be-ta3zeez el-7emaya el-mokhassa le-72u2o2 sakane gezel stryts w2a2aret be-72o2hom fe el-sytra el-fa3ala 3ala 2omoorhom.

7yetkon el-7amlat el-mostammera darorya le-da2an en el-7okoma el-ostralya testama3 le-mo2tare7at el-lajna wtenfed 2a2on shamel le-72u2o2 el-ensan be7mey el-ostralyeen wby3kes el-eltizametna el-dawleya be-7a2e2y.

wafadat monezmeyet el7efaz 3ala el7ayah elbarieh el3alamiya (wwf) en elsaoula (pseudoryx nghetinhensis), elly howa no3 men elthadeyat elnader fe elhend elseeneyah, 3endoh amal motajaded fe elba2a 3ala 2a2y fe 7ayatoh ma3 ensha2 me7meia tabi3ia mokhasasa lel.

w2al tran minh hien, elmadir el2otri le monezmeyet el7efaz 3ala el7ayah elbarieh el3alamiya fe vietnam, en ensha2 elme7meia bywade7 "eltazaman gawy men el7okooma elvietnameya wmo7afzet kwang nam fe el7efaz 3ala haza elno3 elmahali elmehded belenda7ar shaddan".
w2afad: "hatsawwel elme7meia elgededa mamar liltanawo3 elbe2y lel7yawan elly byewasol shar2 vietnam bel7odoood elgharbieya lel7adeyka elwa6anyah fe laos".

w2ad kaman en elsaoula, elly byetwasaf enoh 3odw badayey men 3a2let elthadeyat elly betshamel el2abqar wel2ghanam welthibaat, et2akes fe 3am 1992 men 7esey meshterek ben monezmeyet el7efaz 3ala el7ayah elbarieh el3alamiya w2edaret elghabaat elvietnameya.
wkan dah howa elno3 elthamany elgeded men elthadeyat elly et2akes fe el2asr elghabary fe ghabat wast vietnam.
wbeyet2akel en 3adad elsaoula el7ali la yet3adda be3d meyat 3ala el2aktar, wbeyet3ared leltahedid be3d elsaad elghayr shary3 bel2asaleeb welkelab lel7osol 3ala 2arnoh.
wma7adesh men haza elno3 3ayesh fe el2aser.
welme7meia w2e3det fe manti2a beyet3ali feha 2a3la no2ta feha 1298 meter, wbetetmayez bewadey darrah wshalalat bet5ale2 mawteen momatez lelsaoula.

wzed beyan monezmeyet el7efaz 3ala el7ayah elbarieh el3alamiya en ensha2 elme7meia haye3azez el7efaz 3ala elnezam elbe2y lelghabaat elestewaya elmonkhafeda fe gabal truong son, elly bet7awy 3ala 3adeyd men el2anwa3 elmehded belenda7ar 3alamy.

w2al dang dinh nguyen, madir magles edaret manti2et elsaoula elme7meyah fe kwang nam, en elme7meia mesh hatse3ed bas fe tahseen foras bo2 elsaoula, laken kaman haykoon leha 2e9mat tawela el2ajal fe tataweer welhifaz 3ala eltanawo3 elbe2y felmanti2a.

- akteshaf w tekhfeef hagmat el7erman men el5edma aw hagmat el7erman men el5edma elmwaz3a- hagmat el7erman men el5edma (dos) w hagmat el7erman men el5edma elmwaz3a (ddos) hy waseela lelsaytra 3ala mahattat kompyooter aw mawared elshabka leta3teel etsalat mosta5dem elkompyooter ma3 etsal belinternet.

7ata ma3a el gezaz dah, te2dar te2ees kaweyet 5'arg el radio, 3ashan el kaweyet elly beygee 3'aleeh el radio men el masna3 momken tekoon mesh mazbootah.
ya3ny 3an teery2 tathbeet el hwayy, b2est5'dam gezaz swr meter, te2dar kamen tet2aked en el radio sh'ghaal sa7.

y3'ann en 4 mn el-sagageed el-3ashra elly ssm'ha rafa2eel lknset systeen fe el-fateekan hatet3'rad fe sebtember 2023.
dee el-sagageed el-asleeya mn el-selselat el-wa7eeda elly ssm'ha rafa2eel w elly lsa mawgooda, w heya bt3tbr mn raw3' 3'an 3asr el-nahda el-3ali zy saqf knezet systeen elly rasmoh maikel anjelo.
el-sagageed hatet3'rad gnb el-tasmemat el-asleeya leha elly rasmha rafa2eel, w elly m3'roza fe met7'af viktorya w albert mn sana 1865.
dee hatkon awel mara tet3'rad feha el-tasmemat w el-sagageed ma3a ba3d, 7aga rafa2eel nafso mknsh shafha.

el-sagageed elly btowda7 3'mal el-2adees botros w el-2adees bolos, w el-mo3'zat el-samkeya, w awamer el-mas7' le botros, w shfa2 el-ragel el-3'areeg, w el-tad7eya fe lestera, et3'mlt le knezet systeen mn 7'ales 500 sana.
el-baba leo el-3ashr kalf rafa2eel btasmem el-sagageed de, w elly etnasagt fe broksel, markaz awrooba el-ra2eesi le nasg el-sagageed, w ba3deen etba3't le roma 3shan tet3'rad hnak.
bma en el-tasmemat el-asleeya faddalt fe broksel, rafa2eel nafso mknsh shaf el-tasmemat gnb el-sagageed elly etnasagt mnha.
3'da molook awrobyeen, bma fihom henry el-thamen, ba3d keda talaboo nusk mn el-sagageed de w elly et3'mlt mn el-tasmemat el-asleeya fe broksel.

fe sana 1623, el-malek charles el-awal, lma kan ameer wyelz, gab el-tasmemat el-asleeya le 2ngltera 3shan yensag nusketoh el-5asa fe wors nasg el-sagageed fe mortleek, w mnhsa w el-tasmemat mawgooda fe 2ngltera.
met7'af el-fateekan betmlk el-sagageed elly kant fe knezet systeen.
el-tasmemat el-asleeya t3'a rafa2eel mlk el-maleka, bs m3ara le met7'af viktorya w albert mn sana 1865.
el-tasmemat hash'a gedan ldarja enha mt2drsh t5'rog mn mabna el-met7'af, fa heya 3'm'ha ma kh'rget mn el-met7'af.
el-sagageed el-arba3'a hatet3'rad fe ma3'rad rafa2eel fe met7'af viktorya w albert gnb el-tasmemat el-sab3'a.
tasmem kol tasmem bytabe2 el-sagada elly et3'mlt 3'alyha fe kol 7aga, bs bel3'ks.
el-nassageen 2ata3'oo tasmemat rafa2eel le shara2et w naskhooha beda2a, w nasag'o kol sagada mn 2a5'rha.
el-sora el-2amameya lel-sagada kant 3'ks tasmemha.
el-shara2et el-matleea etles2et bba3d keda, w b2et t3tbr 3'mal faneeya fe 7'od zata.
ma3'rad el-sagageed haykon 3la mdar set asabe3 3shan ytzam'n ma3 el-zeeyara el-tar5eya lel-baba bendekt el-sades 3'ashr le 2ngltera w 2skotlanda.
mark jones, m'deer met7'af viktorya w albert, 2al: de far2'a ra2e3'a nshof feha raw3' 3asr el-nahda el-3'amed magtma3'a lawl mara mn 7'ales 500 sana.
2hna sa3'eed gedan enna hn3'rad el-a3'mal de fe ma3'rad rafa2eel beta3'na.
estibdal el-gors yanafis el-endemaag el-fakariemlyetayn jar7eyetn by3mlo nafs el-netayeg l-mard tadahor el-gors.

l-shre7a mn el-nas 3ndhom mard tadahor fe el-fkaraat el-qotneya, estibdal el-gors el-sena3y bykoon afdal mn el-endemaag el-fakary fe 7agaat kteera, 7sb derasa estamret 5 sneen qarant byn el-emlyeteyn.

mard tadahor el-gors, elly howa sabb shaay3 le-olm asfal el-dahr, bey7sal lamma wa7ed aw aktar mn el-agras - elly hya zy el-wasadat el-mlyana geel byn 3zam el-3amood el-fakary (el-fkaraat) - bettmzar2 aw bettadahor.
3ks el-amrad "el-tadahorya" el-tanya, el-a3rad elly btegy mn mashaakel el-agras bet7asn fe kam osbo3 ma3 3elaag baset.
bas nseba sgeera mn el-nas 3ndhom a3rad mostamra momken te7tag jar7a.
el-endemaag el-fakary - el-me3yar el-zahabyestibdal el-gors el-sena3y - kheyar tanyestibdal el-gors el-sena3y howa bedayel jar7y lel-endemaag.
wbeyshmel ezala el-gors el-mta7'er w-estebdalo be-zra3 sana3y.
fekra estibdal el-gors mawgooda mn el-khamseenat, lamma tm estekhaam esment el-methakreelit fe faragh el-gors byn el-fkaraat, 7sb kalam el-doktor zeygler.

masbar nasa "messenger" hayswar aktar mn 1200 sora yom el-etneen w howa bay3ady gamb kawkab mirkoory fe ra7ltoh elly toolha 7.9 billion km, w dee hatkoon awel khotwa fe ra7ltoh elly hatda5loh fe madar el-kawkab ba3d 30 shahr mn delwa2ty.
el3olamaa betmanna en el-sowar dee takshef aktar 3an terkeb kawkab mirkoory, w hatshmel sowar le manate2 3ala sa7' el-kawkab lessa matsworsh abl keda.

dee hatkoon tany mara mn talat marrat hay3ady feehom el-masbar gamb el-kawkab, asghar kawkab fe el-nezam el-shamsy (ba3d ma pluto b2a msh kawkab) w a2rab kawkab lel-shams, w da 3amel mn el-3awamel elly 5alet derasato sa3ba mn 3ala el-ard.
el-qeyasat elly et3'amet bel-gihaz el-maghnateesy fe el-masbar fe shahr yanayer bet2ool en el-magal el-maghnateesy le mirkoory momken ykoon nat'eg 3an nawa7ad 7adeed manshara kbeera.
el-sowar btwad7 en sohol mirkoory nat'ega 3an thowarat barakanyah, w en el-kawkab enkamash aktar mma kan el-3olamaa motawa23een.

louise proctor, wa7da mn el-3olamaa el-mas2oleen 3an gihaz el-tasweer el-mzdwaj fe el-masbar, 2alet fe bayaan sa7afy: "el-moroor el-tany dah haywreena mnte2a gdedda tamamman 3ala sa7' mirkoory, 3ala el-na7ya el-tanya mn el-kawkab elly shofnah fe el-moroor el-awal." el-moroor dah msh mgrood tasweer bs, messenger kaman hatest5dem gathbya mirkoory 3ashan takhod wad3ha le2nha ted5ol fe madar el-kawkab fe mars 2011, w dee hatkoon awel mara masbar yalf fe madar kawkab mirkoory.
messenger hy5tesar le "mirkoory surface, space environment, geochemistry & ranging".
rahltha le mirkoory betestfeed mn el-gathbya btlatt kawakeb, w betetda5'ol aktar mn 15 dawra 7walyen el-shams.
ba3d etl2'ha fe awgoost 2003, messenger 3'adt gamb el-ard fe awgoost 2005, w gamb venus fe october 2006 w june 2007.
(sora le mortafa3at w 7ofr 3ala kawkab mirkoory/nasa/ma3'lab el-fezeeya el-tatbe2ya fe game3a johns hopkins/mo2assasat carnegie fe washington)

el talaaba katie stromsland, talaaba fe el sana el nehayya fe gam3et el 2e7ya men gillespie, illinois, w whitney gray, talaaba fe el sana el talta fe gam3et el 2e7ya men greenville, illinois, byedresou ta'theer ekhtelaf el estejaba el monaa'ya w 3awamel tanya zy el 3omor 3ala defaa el sel7af lel2anwa3 el mokhtalafa men el 6afeleyat.

galet stromsland: "e7na benderes jihazhom el mona3y w benderes 7agat mokhtalafa." w 2adat: "ana bederes agsamhom el modadda el 6abeya w el agsam el modadda elly bettaf3el ma3 el 6afeleyat."gray betederes bekhosoos el agsam el modadda lel salmonella w betederes law kanet 6abeya aw takafeya.

el talaaba erica forbes, talaaba fe el sana el talta fe gam3et el 2e7ya men bourbonnais, illinois, beteshte3'al 3ala el tahakkok men 2e7'et mqayees mona3ya gededa lel estekhlaas fe sel7afa el tala2, w elly heya akthar el sel7af el 2asleya enteshaar fe amreka el shamalya.

galet forbes: "ana b7'atesh law kanet khaleya el dam el 7amra lel sel7afa hat2tel khaleya saratan el sadr." w 2adat: "e7na benakhod damhom w ne7'et khaleya el dam el 7amra beta3etohom 3ala khaleya el saratan 3ashan nshof law kan fe ay mawt lel khaleya."brooke smith, talaaba fe el sana el talta fe gam3et el 2e7ya men franklin grove, illinois, betakhod ba7tha fe etegah mokhtalef 3an tegeeh derasa el sel7af fe manti2a ratba 3ashan tshof ezay el manti2a el ratba nafsaha beteshtaghel.

el doctoura laura zimmerman, ostatha mos3eda fe gam3et el 2e7ya, beteshte3'al ma3 el talaab tool el saif.

galet stromsland: "besoob kol elly et3alemto katalaaba fe barnamaj laity, ana 2adret ataba3 tadreeby el khass." w 2adat: "e7na kolena benderes el teb bas ba7'ethna 2a'em 3ala el monaa'a, w da moshaweq en e7na nerbet etemamatna el tanya ma3 etemamatna bel teb."kol saif, barnamaj mon7a laity lel 3oloum fe gam3et millikin beyewafar forsa lel talaab fe el 3oloum el tabeya 3ashan yeshte3'alou 3ala masharee' ba7'eya 3ala mostawa el derasa el 3olya.

el 7ob fe zaman el kolerafe rowayet el 7ob fe zaman el kolera llkateb gabriel garcia marquez, fe el rowaya de ramouz ketira btamthal el 7ob 7arfyan fe zaman el kolera.
marquez estakhdem el masatelah de 3ashan ywasaf ta2theer el 7ob wel kolera fe el rowaya, kol el ramouz de fe el akher btamthal aw btenba2 bel ma3ana wel kawaresh elly momken el kolera tegebha.
el kolera kant mareed ma3ady bey2ather 3ala akter el sakana fe el makan elly bedawwer feh a7'das el 2esara.
ma3a en el rowaya de morkeza bshakl kbeer 3ala el mareed wel 7ob, el kateb rakez bshakl asasy 3ala el 7ob men el naha el gasdeya.
3ada ma nerbatesh el 7ob el nagy wel 3azeb bel eshala aw el 3ada aw el mawt el mo2lem, we da el sabab elly khala el kolera tetestakhdem 3ashan tesawar el 7ob men el naha el gasdeya fe el rowaya de.
el kolera mareed zy el 7ob (el 7ob men el naha el gasdeya), bey5alek majnoon we ta3any we momken temoot men gher ma teb2a radi 3an 7ayatek elly 3eshtaha.
mesal 3ala el 7ob men el naha el gasdeya fe el rowaya, lama florentino etganen lama wag3 fe 7ob fermina.
badal ma yekon mareed gasdy zy el kolera, el 7ob men el naha el gasdeya howa mareed nafsey.
2ra2 el mazed: el ketaba el tahleleyaflorentino kan majnoon be 7ob fermina, wel taree2a el wa7eda elly 2adar yet3amel beha ma3a el 7ob da howa enno ye2ol el ward.
el ward beyamthal ma3ana el 7ob wel mazed men el ma3ana.
ma3a en el ward kan beyamthal el amal wel 7ob le florentino, fe el akher ady le karetha el ma3ana, zy ma el kolera bentahy bel 7aya fa2dan.
kan fermina hya betalat el ward, we florentino akl betalat el ward 3ashan yestahlak kol el 7ob wel rafod elly kan beyestakablo men fermina.
le7ad ma fermina te2dar teb2a ma3ah, el shy2 el wa7ed elly ma3 florentino men fermina hya betalat el ward elly bayekolha.
florentino kaman bey3any men el alam el gasdeya lel 7ob men el naha el gasdeya.
betalat el ward elly bayekolha bte5aleeh mareed gedan, le daraja en ammo eftakart enno 3ando kolera, we da amr sakher bel nasser lel tashaboh bein el etnein.
florentino bey7es bema3ana el 7ob wel taree2a el wa7eda elly y2adar y3abar beha 3an da howa enno ye2ol betalat el ward.
da kan darory le florentino le2enno kan bey3any men alam 3atefy shadeed le daraja enno 7as enno mayet taqreeban, we el alam el gasdy kan darory 3ashan y7es enno 3ayesh.
el toyor zy el kolera, bet2od lel mawt.
marquez estakhdem el toyor fe el rowaya kersala sakha 3an el 7ob elly bey2od fe el nehaya le nehayet karethya.
fe el rowaya, marquez magabsh shakhsya matet fe3lan men el kolera.
bas gab shakhsyat matet men "el 7ob men el naha el gasdeya" besabab el toyor.
bema en el 7ob men el naha el gasdeya beyamthal tashaboh ma3a el kolera, n2dar nefretad en el toyor kaman betamthal el kolera, welly hya maser el mawt.
abrz mesal howa lama el doctor urbino 7awel yemsek el babagh2 bet3o we 7abeebo we fe el nehaya wag3 we mat.
el babagh2 elly el doctor urbino 2ada sa3at ketira fe terbeyeto wel teer elly ahtem beeh aktar men awlado, we da elly ady le mawto be sakha.
mesal tany lama olympia zolita adet le florentino 7amama zegel keshkor leeh 3ala enqazha we shamsetaha.
florentino rad el 7amama zegel ma3a resala 7ob men gher tawqe3, we bedat el romansa bein el etnein.
el 7amama elly adet le bedaya el romansa bein el etnein entahat besor3a lama jozo aktashef kheyana olympia we et2atlet.
el doctor urbino we olympia khsaro 7ayathom 3ashan el 7ob, sawaa kan besabab teer aw 3ashan teer.
ana mo2men en el toyor kamanwe 2akheran we leys akheran, el matar (aw ay no3 men el mayya) beyamthal fe el nehaya no2ta fe el rowaya lama yetgleb 3ala 7ager we beyb2a fe forsa motajada lel 7ob.
el matar beyamthal el taghyeer el moghaze2 fe el rowaya, zy ma el kolera momken tegeb taghyeer moghaze2 fe 7aya shakhs.
awel htool lel matar beyseb taghyeerin mohameen, homa mawt el doctor urbino we zohoor florentino tani fe 7aya fermina.
el matar mesh bas ramz lel mawt el masawy wel 7azen, welly howa el kolera, el matar kaman ramz lel amal el motajadad lel 7ob bein florentino we fermina.
el matar momken yekon el ramz el egeaby el wa7ed elly marquez estakhdamo 3ashan yesawar el kolera ketaghyeer moghaze2 fe el rowaya.
kholal rowayet el 7ob fe zaman el kolera, marquez estakhdem ramouz zy el kolera wel ward wel toyor wel matar, 3ashan yermoz lel jawaneeb el mohima lel 7ob we ywasaf el kolera.

howa ana b2et meshhoor wala eh?
ba2a el mohandes tamer hedayat byetkalem 3anni w 3an engeezati fi magal el teknologia?
ana saad el daly, elly kant shaghil fi 3az 7arb 56, 3amelt eh ya3ni?
bas ya sedy, ana wa7ed mn el nas elly shoft el 7arb b3enaha, w shoft ezay el teknologia momken tb2a sela7 gawy fi el ma3arek.
fi el w2t dah, kant shaghil fi magal el etesalat, w kant shayef en el teknologia hy el mostaqbal, w en masr momken tb2a ra2eda fi el magal dah.
el mohandes tamer hedayat bey2ol en masr 3andha forsa wa3da fi tasdeer el teknologia lel afreeka, w dah kalam mazboot.
ana shayef en afreeka ard khasba l el estethmar fi el teknologia, khososan ma3 enteshar el internet w el khidmat el ra2meyya hnak.

ya3ny zy ma bey2olo, kenya 3andha mashro3 silicon savanna, w nigeria 3andha markaz yabatech, w ooganda betet3awwar fi magal el internet w el hawatef, w ghana nag7et fi nashr el teknologia fi el 7'eitat el fa2era.
w besara7a, ana fakhour be masr w be qeyadetha lel etehad el afreeki, w dah hay5ally 3andena fursa akbar nef7'et aswaq gededa fi afreeka.
ya3ny ehna 3andena khabarat kbera fi magal teknologia el ma3lomat, w el sana3at el teknologeya el masreya momken tel2a souq kbeer fi afreeka.

w kaman mobadara "afreeka le ebda3 el 3'aba w el tatbeqat el ra2meyya" elly atlaha el ra2ees el sisi hatsa3ed fi tadreeb el shabab el masry w el afreeki w ta2helem l el 3amal fi el magal el teknology.
bas ta3raf, ana shayef en ahmm haga hy t2meen el beyanat w el shabakat, w tadreeb el kawader el shaba 3al 3amal fi ketar el teknologia.
ya3ny ehna lazzem net3awwar mn el zekaa el esna3y w nemn beyanatna w sherekatna, w dah haydeena meza tanafseya kbera fi el souq el afreeky.
ya3ny ehna momken nb2a zy wadi el silikon fi america, bs b naga7 masry!
w besara7a, ana sa3eed en el mohandes tamer hedayat byesheed be engeezatna, w beyshof en leena dor mhm fi tatweer el teknologia fi afreeka.
bs ana 3ayez a2ool en ehna kmasreyyeen, lazzem nkoun wa3yeen l el tahadeyat elly w2fodamna, w nestagel el foras elly 2odamna, w nbny mostaqbal afdal le masr w afreeka fi magal el teknologia.
w ba3deen, ehna k sha3b masry, ma3roof 3anna enna ben7eb baladna w benft5er beha.
ana shakhsyan ba7eb masr w ba7eb afreeka, w bashouf en leena dor mhm fi tatweer el 2ara kolha.

men a5eer el-thamanenaat, twasol akthar men 15 gom3a 3erqeya, bema feha el-moon, le safqat wofood el-nar me3 el-magles el-3askary.
men el-morja7 eno el-wefaa be el-7okom de kaman y2ather 3la e7temalat el-tamarod fe el-mostaqbal.
men ghayr el-morja7 en el-e7tejaj yektefy bel-mo3arada el-lfozeya, nazaran le tekeef el-nezam el-kammy wel-da3f el-tandemy le gama3et el-moon.
3ayesh aktar el-moon fe welaaya el-moon el-sharkeya 3ala raghm men wogood a3da2 men el-gom3a fe thailand el-majeera.
yerga3 tarikh e2amet el-moon fe borma le ma2bel wosool el-mogtama3 el-mo7tamel, el-borman, elly 7awlo yghazo el-moon fe el-qarn el-7ady ashar.
estaw3ab el-borman b3d keda kteer men el-momarasat el-thaqafeya lel-moon bema feha deenohom, el-boodeeya el-therafeya (relig1 = 7).
kan fe 2akel men hegra el-gom3a 3abr mnte2at el-balad.
yertabet el-moon loghyan wethaqafyan be gom3et el-khemer fe cambodia, wbyet7addo lahjat el-moon-el-khemer fe 7een en el-lo3'a el-rasmey lel-balad hya el-bormeyya elly byet7addo beha el-borman.
byesharak a3da2 el-gom3a el-3adat el-ejtem3eya lel-borman, w3ala raghm enohom men salala 3erqeya mokhtalefa, fa kan fe ekhtelat kbeer beenhom (race = 2).
7atta el-ghazw el-bormy fe nos el-qarn el-thamen ashar, kan lel-moon dowletohom el-mosta2lela el-khasah bihom (autlost = 1).

mafeesh la3been, w mafeesh kesb aw 5sara.
bmagrad ma tet7at "el-2ata3" fel-wad3 el-ebtedayee, el-2awa2d bet7addad kol elly hay7sal ba3d keda.
w ma3 zalek, el-7ayah malyana mfa2at!
fel-akser el-7alat, mosta7eel ennak tshof el-wad3 el-ebtedayee (aw el-nammat) w ta3raf eh elly hay7sal fel-mosta2bal.
el-tare2a el-wa7eda 3ashan ta3raf hya ennak tatba3 2awa2d el-lo3ba.
awa2d lo3bat el-7ayah:betetla3eb el-7ayah 3ala shabka men el-5aleya el-moro2a - zy req3et el-shatranj bas mamteda ela ma la nehayah fe kol el-2etegaahaat.
el-5alya momken tekoon 7aya w momken tekoon mayta.
el-5alya el-7aya betetza3'ar bewad3 3alamah 3ala morab3'ha.
el-5alya el-mayta betetza3'ar be-tark el-morab3' fa2dy.
lelkol 5alya fel-shabka jwar mokon men thaman 5aleya fe kol etejaah bema feeh el-etejaahaat el-qatraweeya.
3ashan netba2 5otwa wa7da men el-2awa2d, ben3ad 3add el-jeeran el-7ayeen lekol 5alya.
elly hay7sal ba3d keda by3tamed 3ala haza el-3add.
* 5alya mayta ma3 thalatha jeeran 7ayeen bel-zabat betsoob7 5alya 7aya (walaada).
* 5alya 7aya ma3 jareen aw thalatha jeeran 7ayeen betfadl 7aya (ba2a2).
* fel-kol el-7alat el-tanya, el-5alya betmoot aw betfadl mayta (z7am aw wahda).
add el-jeeran el-7ayeen dayman bykoon 3ala asass el-5aleya abl tatbeeq el-2a3'a.
bema3na tany, lazamn nel2y kol el-5aleya elly hatetghayar el-awal abl ma negar ay 5alya menhom.
el-ryady john konway howa elly e5ter3 el-7ayah fe 1970.
ekhtar el-2awa2d be3naaya ba3d ma garrab emkaneeyat tanya keteer, ba3daha kan beysebb moot el-5aleya be-sora 2awee, w el-ba3d el-tany kan beysebb walaada 5aleya keteer awe.
el-7ayah bettwazen been el-etejaheen dol, w dah bey5aleeha sa3b ennak ta3raf law kan el-nammat haymoot tamaman, aw hayshakl 3add sakkan mostaker, aw hayekbar lel-abad.
fe beos la2et tabye2een lel-7ayah, wa7ed esmo glife w howa 3'er shasha tawa2of, w el-tany esmo life w howa tabye2 bey7akee nemothag lo3bat el-7ayah el-ryadi.
lel-asaf, tabye2 life kan feeh link mayet, fa dorna 3ala el-masader w 7awelna ne7asno shwya.
men fadlak khaly balk en ahme ajeza el-code fel-tabye2 dah gaya men tabye2 life, elly 3amlo jeremy w matt.
belife by2adem nafs el-wazayef zy life, b-el-2'eada lel-alwan el-m7adada men el-mst5dem, w el-anma6 el-5asa, w el-anma6 el-3ashwa2eya, w kheyar 2a2tel kol el-7ayah.

matarmesh eladweya el2adima fel 7aweds: sam3t en lamma elnas matarmesh adwiyetohom beshkel sa7ee7, betwasel l elmaya elly beneshrabha.
hel elmafrood a2la2?
g: elmaya elly betegi men el7anefeya 3andena nazeefa w amanah 3omoman.
bas fe 2ala2 motazada men en elkeemawyat men eladweya elly mast5demtesh twasel lemaya elshrab beta3etna.
eladweya momken towasel lelmaya be6or2 mokhtalefa.
nas keteer beyermow eladweya elly mast5demtesh aw elly entahat sal7eyetha fel 7amam aw fel 7awed.
ba3d dor elmosanen w elmostashfayat bet3mel kedah bardoh.
masane3 eladweya betsahim fel talooth eldaway.
elmakhalafat elzera3eya, men eltoyor w el7ayawanat elly betakal 3alef malyan bemodadat 7ayaweya w hormonat, masdar tanee kbeer.
ma7atat me3alaga elsarf else7y w ma7atat me3alaga elmaya mesh mota7'asema 3ashan tet5alas men eladweya fel maya.
w netayga le keda, ba3d eltalooth eldaway beyetzaher fel maya elly beneshrabha.
le7ad delwa2ty, kamyat soghayara gedan men eladweya etwogodat fel maya elshrab, a2al bekteer men elmostawayat elly momken ta2ther 3ala elbashar.
momken en 7atta elkamyat elsoghayara de men eladweya lama betetbl3, ma3 elwa2t, ta2ther 3ala se7etna.
bas le7ad delwa2ty, mafeesh dalel en eladweya elly fel maya bet2atherna.
bas eladweya elly benermeeha fel 7awed momken ta2ther 3ala elsamak.

masalan, masader elmaya elmolwetha belestrogeen w elkeemawyat elmosha7'ela lelestrogeen (men 7obob man3 el7aml w el3elajat elhormoneya) bet7tawy 3ala samak aktar beyekon 3ando khasayess thokoorya w onthaweya fel nafs elwa2t.

elmbade2 el2ershadeya elgededa betshage3 elmostashfayat w dor elmosanen 3ala eltakhallas men eladweya be6areeka mas2oola.

elzegagat elkobera men eladweya elly entahat sal7eyetha aktar e7temal enha towasel lelmaya.
- metdafeesh eladweya elly mast5demtesh fel 7amam aw termeha fel 7awed.
dah abeset 7aga n2dar na3melha, w mafrood na3melha.
eladweya elly betetremy keda betet7'ar2 aw betendafen fe makalef elzabala.
dah mesh mithaly, bas afdal men enak tedfeha aw termeha fel 7awed.
- w elafdal men keda, est5dem barameg esterja3 eladweya.
elbarameg de betsamahlek enak terga3 eladweya elly mast5demtesh le amaken mohadada fe mogtama3ak.
barameg esterja3 eladweya bentonemha el7okoomat elmahleya w elwelaayat, w kaman elmo2assasat elkhassa, bema feehom salasel elsaydaleat.
3areft men zaameel en a7'er barnamg 7okoomy zay dah wafar amaken estelam fe 7awaly 6000 makan fe an7a2 elwelaayat elmet7eda.

de magarad tareeqa men 6or2 keteer 3ashan teb2a mowaten kwayyes - mesh bas le bany adameen taneen, laken kaman lel samak.

ba7th etnasr fe magalet frontiers of psychology esmoh "me3alaga el-oxytocin el-anfy bet2asar 3ala entebah elklab el-basry we estejabthom el3atfy ta7t ta3beerat elwesh el-ensany el-ejaby", etnasr fe october 2017, we zekr: "awel dalel 3ala en el-oxytocin momken ye2asar 3ala me3alaga elklab elbasrya le ta3beerat elwesh el3atfya lelkay2at elmokhtalafa, we dah metwaf2 ma3 el-melal7at elly bet2oul en el-oxytocin el-kharegy bey7afez elslookyat el-ejtma3ya lelkelob na7ya shoraka2hom men elbashar.
el-oxytocin beyesser elertbat beyn el-anwa3 elmokhtalafa 3an tera2 zyada dafa3 elkelaab leltagrob welentema2 lelbashar."bma3na tany: elkelaab bet7eb lama benebtsem.
elba7esheen, aktherhom men gam3et helsinki, 3amlo etnekhteyn mokhtalefen 3ala 43 kelb.
fe kol etekhter, kan beyet3rad 3ala elkelaab sourtin mokhtalefetin: sora lewa7ed weshoh ghadban we ba3deen sora lewa7ed tany weshoh beyebtsem.
la2n bob2 el3een elkelaab beyetwas3 lama yehes be2awy 3atfa aw tafseela, elba7esheen estekhadmo jihaz lekyas el3een 3ashan yeragbo rodod elf3l el3atfya lelkelaab lekol sora.
fe eltekhtar elawal, elkelaab kan 3andha rodod fe3l 2wya 3ala sor elweshosh elghadbana 3ashan homa 7aso belte7ded.
we dah metawk3, la2n gharezet elba2a2 lelkelaab mabramja 3ashan tetf3al ma3 el5atar wel3odwaneya.
laken fe eltekhtar eltany, elkelaab shafet elsur we homa ta7t ta2seer el-oxytocin (hormon 2awy beyetshagel kan2el 3asaby fe elmak, we bey3raf ahyanan be-hormon el7ob).
elba7esheen andahasho lama la2o en bob2 el3een elkelaab etwas3 estejaba lel-ebtesamat, mesh lel-weshosh elghadbana.
we dah ma3nah enhom tejahalou gharezet elba2a2 beta3hom 3ashan mogma3a men el-asnan elbyeda el-lam3a.
galet elprofesor otty fainyo, elly kanet ra2esa magmo3et elba7s: "kenna men awael elba7esheen fe el3alam elly estekhadmo kyas elbob2 fe te2ym el7ala el3atfya lelkelaab.
eltare2a de kanet betetstakhdem abl keda bas 3ala elbashar welgorood."magmo3et "elwesh elsa3eed" kanet asra3 ketir fe lams sor el-ebtesamat.
elkelaab bel2y elweshosh el-mebtesema ashal fe elt3amol ma3aha.

sa7 walla ghalat: eno katf zhoor elbluebonnets fe texas gheir qanony?
eljawab: ghalat, fe akser el7alat.

tam e3tebar zohret elbluebonnets elzohra elrasmeia lilmadeena men 3'eer elmajles eltashre3y fe 1901 kano3 lupinus subcarnosus wfe 1971 tam tawse3 eltasneef lyeshmo3 lupinus texensis w2ay no3 tany men elbluebonnets.
7alyan katf elbluebonnets mosh gheir qanony, laken momken yet6abe2 3aleh qawanen tamen eltakhreeb aw elta3di 3ala mamlekate elghayer.
fe qanun 1933 kan men gheir elqanony katf ay zhoor men aradi maghloka aw aradi mamlooka lildawla kmontazahat 3amma aw mahmeiat tabee3ya mn 3'eer ezn mohaddad.
elqanun byezkor betal7'ees zhoor elbluebonnets wfarshat eltal3 elhendeya w2anwa3 tanya men elzohor elbarrya fe elmahzoorat elmet3le2a belnasel aw elbe3 lel zohor elle etkatfet bshkel gheir qanony.
ma3 tadeen qanoun el3oqobat fe 1973 tam elghaa2 elqanun elgadim.
fe ay 3am tam e9ra2 awel e5tebar mow7ad fe elmadares el3amma fe texas wma kan esmoh?
eljawab: awel e5tebar mow7ad, texas assessment of basic skills [tabs], tam tawfeezoh men 3'eer mo5tasar elqanun raqm 350 fe eldawra eltashre3ya 66 wtam e9ra2oh fe madares texas fe 1979.
qanun elta3leem 39.023, e3tamad w edara eli5tebarat.
shouf kaman gam3eyat eltarbawyeen elmo7tarfeen fe texas [atpe], "re7let texas men tabs le taks", khareef 2005.
ay 3odw saabeq fe magles elno6ob men mo7afzet washington adeleh sawtoh elra2asy elawal le gever cleveland, wtam da3wtoh le 7afal tanseed el7akem james s.
hogg, wkan 2areb le 7ad men ketab 2ogneyet zohret elmadeena fe texas, "elbluebonnets"?

[tameeh: momken y7tag elso2al da 2azora le gharet elcapitol 2n.3!]eljawab: william david crockett, 3odw magles elno6ob men chapel hill, mo7afzet washington fe eldawrat eltashre3ya 29-31 (1905-11) wra2ees leganet el2e3tamadat.

3end elba7th fe qa3det beyaneat a3da2 elmagles eltashre3y fe texas, texas meshre3een: elmadi w el7ader, 3an mo7afzet washington, sejel crockett beyetla3 feh nabadh 3anho men ketab tar7 texas w eltexaseyeen (1916) beyesharr en sawtoh elra2asy elawal kan le gever cleveland.
ma3rad tanseed el7akem fe maktabet elmagles eltashre3y fe gharet elcapitol 2n.3 beyetla3 feh da3wa men 3am 1891 le 7afal tanseed el7akem hogg etb3at le w.d.
crockett, w2ogneyet zohret elmadeena, "elbluebonnets", men ta2leef julia d.
crockett [zawget 2akho william david crockett], et3emadeh elmagles eltashre3y fe 1933 (dalel texas elek7tare).
2esma3 le2ogneyet "elbluebonnets" men 2ad2 donald brewer men maktabet elmagles eltashre3y.
fe temthalani nasfeen fe magmo3at el2a3mal elfaneya elma3roza fe maktabet elmagles eltashre3y.
wa7ed menhom le sam houston, fa men eltany?

[tameeh: momken y7tag elso2al da 2azora le gharet elcapitol 2n.3!]eljawab: eltemthal elnasf eltany le memucan hunt, elwazeer men eljomhoreya lel 3alamat le ta2meen ela3traf be2ste2lal texas wwazeer elbahreya fe texas, elle khadem ba3deen fe magles elno6ob fe eldawra eltashre3ya elkhamesa men galveston.
emta kanet akher mara etgawez feeto el7akem men 3'eer elmagles eltashre3y?
eljawab: 15 w 17 may 1979.

fe eldawra eltashre3ya 66, eldawra el3adyah, etgawez elmagles eltashre3y feeto el7akem bill clements 3ala mo5tasar elqanun raqm 2153, elmet3ale2 be mawaf2et magmet elmo7afzeen fe mo7afzet comal 3ala qawanen elsayd wseyd el2asam.
shouf vetoat maktabet elmagles eltashre3y, 2esmet vetoat elle etgawezet, nass magalet magles elno6ob, nass magalet magles elshyokh.
el3'yal el amerikany el soghayareen elly 3ayeshyn fe beet el 3ayela wesselu le mostawa 1940.

leh dah momken yekoon 7aga kaweesanemazeg fekreya betzaher 3ala el sett elly 3ayesh feeh 40% men el shabab elly 3omrhom been 18 w 34 sana 3ayeshyn ma3 3aylet'hom fe 2015, w dee a3la nafsya men sana 1940.
el etegah dah bey3akes daghat iqtisadeya, bas momken kamen yekoon 3alama 3ala zeyada el foras w el esteklalya le ba3d el nas.
- 7ewaly 40% men geel el alfeya el amerikany 3ayeshyn fe beet el 3ayela ma3 abo'hom aw 5awat'hom aw ay 7ad men el 3ayela fe 2015, w dah 7asab tahleel 7adith, w dee a3la nafsya fe 75 sana.

hasab tahleel le bayanat el ta3dad el sakany el amerikany men khilal shareka trollia el 3aqariya, 2015 shaft a3la nafsya men el shabab elly 3omrhom been 18 w 34 sana ekhtaraw ye3ayeshaw ma3 3aylet'hom men sana 1940, w dee el sana elly ba3daha besana men nehayet el kessad el 3azeem resmeya.
el ar9am el qeyasaya dee heya estemrar le etegah estemrar le 3aqd bada fe nos el awelany w mefesh 3alamat 3ala ennoh hayerg3, 3ala 2argam tahsen el iqtisad w nmo el wazaef mawana.

fe 3edad men el 3awamel el iqtisadeya elly bet5alee qeta3 kbeer men geel el alfeya may2adroosh ye5rogo men beet el 3ayela, w dee te5'ool zeyada el eegarat, thabat aw en5'foz el ag'or, zeyada deen el talaba, w so3oba en el shabab el a2al ta3leem khososan yela2o wazaef be moratbat tekfeehom ye3ayeshaw 7aya mostakella.

bas kamen fe taghyyarat thaqafeya - w fawa2ed mogtama3eya mo7tamila - bet7asal, zy ma bey2ool 3olamaa el egtema3, w dee te5'ool zeyada 3edad el shabab elly bed5'ol el ta3leem el 3aaly w motawaset 3omr el zawaj el awel beyzid.
w kamen, ma3 zeyada 3edad el shabab elly beyrogo ye3ayeshaw fe beet el 3ayela, el wasma elly kant bet5alee'hom ye5rogo men el beet besor3a fe el 3oqod elly fatet bet5tefee tadreegyan.

"el daghat el iqtisadeya mertabeta beshkel kbeer be ta25eer takween el osra, bas el etegah le ta25eer el zawaj w zeyada el ta3leem bey7asal men 3oqod, w dah besabab zeyada el foras w el esteklalya lel setat beshkel kbeer", dah kalam filib kohen, ostaz 3elm el egtema3 fe gam3et maryland, college park.

"felly momken yeban ennoh fatra moraha2a tawela w 2alat ehtemam, howa kamen 7ekaya zeyada foras w esteklalya le ba3d el nas 3ala el mado el tawel."zeyada 3edad el setat elly bed5'ol el koleya w bey5'od'o dorat 3elmeya 3alya nataja 3anha en keteer men'hom bey5taraw ta25eer el zawaj le7ad ma yeqdro yed5'ol fe 3elaga "aktar mosaawa, mesh motawake3een 3ala goz'hom", dah kalam el ostaz kohen fe resala email le magalet christian science monitor.
motawaset 3omr el zawaj lel regala w el setat beyestemr fe el zeyada men sneen, zy ma 2alet stephanie haynz fe m2alet glaf el magala 3an zeyada thaqafat el 3ozab fe amerka el sana elly fatet.
fe 1960, el setat kanu beytegawzo 3ala 3omr 20, w el regala 3ala 3omr 22.
el naharda, motawaset 3omr el zawaj be2a 27 lel setat w 29 lel regala.
"bbasata, be2a 3andena 3edad akbar men el 3ozab", dah kalam richard fry, khabeer ektesady kbeer fe markaz pew lel ab7'ath, fe tasree7 le jaridet los angeles times fe bdayet el sana dee.
"hom el magmo3a elly aktar e7temal en'hom ye3ayeshaw ma3 abo'hom w om'hom".

ma2 en zeyada el shabab elly 3ayeshyn fe beet el 3ayela mertabeta be zeyada foras el setat, momken kamen temsel no3 mokhtalef men el etegah el iqtisady lel regala, zy ma josh kenwrthy ketab fe el magala fe may:belnesba lel regala, el 3aysha ma3 el aboyn betbeen en'hom aswa2 nesebyan fe sok el shogh'l 3an zaman.
beshkel 3am, el tawzeef lel regala been 3omr 18 w 34 fe en5'foz men sana 1960, lama kan 84%.
fe 2014, bas 71% kan 3and'hom wazaef.
w el ag'or kamen bet2al men sana 1970, w 2alet beshkel kbeer fe el fatra men 2000 le7ad 2010.

w belmethel, kohen bey2ool en ma3 en 3edad akbar men el shabab men kol mostaweyat el ta3leem bey5taraw yeg3'od'o fe el beet, tafaseel elly bey7arak el etegah dah kamen beteen zeyada 2alat el mosaawa beyn geel el alfeya elly beyentemo le taba2at egtema3eya-eqtesadeya mokhtalafa.

"shabab el naharda mensaqemeen ben elly 3and'hom foras aswa2, elly momken yeg3'od'o fe el beet 3ashan mesh 2adrin ye5rogo law7'od'hom, w elly 3and'hom foras a7san, elly momken yeg3'od'o fe el beet le7ad mayekhmel'o ta3leem'hom w yebda2o shogh'l'hom", dah kalamoh.
frank forestberg, ostaz 3elm el egtema3 fe gam3et pensylvania, beyrogo bdayet el etegah fe nos el awelany lel daghat el iqtisadeya, elly zatet besabab el kessad.

bas fe el sneen elly ba3daha, bey2ool en el waqe3 el iqtisady elly agbar keteer men el shabab en'hom yergo ye3ayeshaw ma3 abo'hom w om'hom nataja 3anho taghyeer "kbeer" fe el mogtama3 fe el mawqef, w dah 2alet el daghat el thaqafeya elly momken tekoun khellat el shabab fe el 3oqod elly fatet ye5rogo men el beet besor3a.
"a3teqed en el aboyn be2o aktar taqbelan en wlad'hom me7tageen ye3ayeshaw fe el beet, w el shabab nafs'hom bey7es'o en'hom a2al tanazel 3an 7oriyyet'hom

ezzay twasel 5artoom lal oxegen?
manshour fe 31 may 2012fel mostashfayat, el oxegen byetwafar men masdar markezy lel oxegen 3an teer2 fat7a fel 7eeta.
gheza2 keyas el tafak beyet7'amem fe tafak el oxegen.
we fe amaken tanya zy el beet, betest5dem astwanat el oxegen elle bet7'oteny 3al gaz fe sora mad'goota.
de tare2a tawseel el qaneya aw el 5artoom bas7'et astwana el oxegen:1.
astwana aw anbooba el oxegen haykoon 3aleha 3'eta2 plastik aw sada2a bet2'aty sa7'am el anbooba.
haykoon be 27'am mat5alefa 3ala 7'sb 7'am el anbooba.
sheel el 3'eta2 aw el sada2a de.
7'ot el monazem (elly mofro'3 ykoon ma3ah gheza2 keyas el tafak) 3al sa7'am.
eftah sa7'am el anbooba.
rakab el moratab 3al gheza2 keyas el tafak.
et'aked enno morkab fe wade3 est2amy.
rakab 5artoom el qaneya bel moratab.
eftah el sa7'am fe gheza2 keyas el tafak zy ma el doctor 2alek.
lama gheza2 keyas el tafak yeb2a mostawayat mon5afeda men el oxegen, yeb2a wa2t ennak testabdel astwana el oxegen.
zy ma shoft, mesh sa3b ennak te7'ot astwana el oxegen fel beet, bas lazma tehtem be gheza2 keyas el tafak tool el wa2t.
men fawayed el derasa de enaha 3amlet e5tebarat abl w ba3d el tajarob 3ala kol el atfal fe el magmo3atayn, magmo3a el atfal el as7a2 w magmo3a el atfal el badan2.
wel motaghyar elly et7akam feeh howa 3ard 120 sh3ar l el atfal el 3ashra w 3aml e5tebarat abl w ba3d el tajaroba b estekhdam asha3a el rennin el maghneteesy.
men 3yoob el derasa en 3add el mosharakeen 2alel, w mada 3omr el mosharakeen mo7addad, w kamen en el e3lanat el televezyonyya mekonsh mostakhdema fe3lan fe el derasa.
ya3ny badal ma yesawwaro makh el atfal athna2 mosha3'et el e3lanat, 3arado 3alehom sh3arat markat el akl, w dah mesh byethbat ay 7aga w malosh 3ala2a bel natega elly el 3olamaa kanoo byydawaro 3aleh.
el sh3arat de byethbat el ta3araf bas, laken mesh byeban a7meetha, w bena2aly el atfal el badan2 elly byya3'lo aktar momken yeta3rafo 3ala sh3arat motanawea aktar men el atfal elly weznohom tabee3y.
"el atfal el badan2 zahar 3andohom nashat aktar fe markaz el mokaf2at w el mot3a fe el makh, elly etnasht lamma shafoo sh3arat el akl, mo2arana lama shafoo sh3arat mesh beta3'et akl.
el atfal el as7a2 men na7ya tanya zahar 3andohom bardoo nashat fe el makh lama shafoo sh3arat el akl, laken fe markaz el tah'am fe el nafs fe el makh.

el atfal el as7a2 kamen kanoo aktar meyla l el ablagh 3an tah'am a3la fe el nafs lama etsalaw ba3d el tajaroba, mo2arana bel atfal el badan2.""fe el khamsenaat w el setenaat, el khadar el mafdal l el atfal fe amreeka kan el sabana5.
w dah besabab bobay." de gamla men el m2al bas mafeesh dalel en akl el sabana5 kan besabab sha3beyet bobay, momken yekoon mejarad sadafa.
el khamsenaat w el setenaat kamen kan feehom markat akl 2alela, w estekhdam a3la l el khadar, w dah momken yekoon besabab el omahat elly mekonsh byeshteghlo w byetba5o waghat motawazena l atfalohom.
ta7seen gawda elbe2asa7eb elgalala elmalek dayman beyhtem belbe2a elly bettedahor besabab 3adam tawazon eltanmeyya el7aditha.
fi eltas3eenat, eltelwoth elmayy elmetzayed estada 3adid men elmobadarat elmalakiya letkhfeef elmoshkela.

estejaba le 2alak sa7eb elgalala w mobadaratoh besbokhsoos telwoth elmayy, bedat mo2assasa chaipatanah gohoodaha letatawer edarat mayyet else7'y, weltekhles men elgamama, we e3ada estekhdam elmawad elmehmlah.
aham mobadara malakiya le edarat mayyet else7'y hya ekhte3 sa7eb elgalala elmalek le jihaz chaipatanah lel teweya.
jihaz chaipatanah lel teweya: jihaz letweya elmayy w tahseen gowdetha"gam3na eljihaz fe ma nsemeeh 3arab el'amwaj le2enno beyshbeh 3arab el'amwaj be marwa7a dawara.
dah el3arab adeh natayej gameela.

mohrek el3arab be quwa wa7ed aw etnein 7esan beyshoft elmayy w yerashha 3al elsoot7 3ashan yed5ol el'oksijeen le mayyet else7'y."mola7'at sa7eb elgalala elmalekoksada elmayy b2estekhdam jihaz teweya mekaneky le zeyada elbakteria elly betedmar eltelwothtalab sa7eb elgalala elmalek benay jihaz teweya mekaneky 3ala amal tekhfeef el7em 3al el7okoma fe edarat telwoth elmayy.
w 2adem tasmeem eljihaz le 2esm elrey elmaleky fe 1988 letataweroh akter.
eljihaz bemasaba nemoth le jihaz mekaneky baset w mon5afid eltekalof le tekhfeef mayyet else7'y benay 3ala mafhoom sa7eb elgalala lel e3temad 3al elnafs.
w elhadaf meno kaman khaleq she3'or bel'el7'a le tahseen gawda elmayy w eltashdeed 3al darora mosharka el3amm fe el3amleya di.
jihaz chaipatanah lel teweya howa 3awama 3a2ema tedawwar be boto2 le da5l el'oksijeen fe mayyet else7'y.
tam tasjeel bara2a ekhte3oh besm sa7eb elgalala fe 1993.
ta3awant mo2assasa chaipatanah ma3 2esm elrey elmaleky fe tatawer w estekhdamo eljihaz le 3elaj mayyet else7'y fe thailand.

kol nashat men ansha6a el-7aya el-3amalya fe montessori beyshage3 tatwor el-maharat el-gasdeya wel-7arakat el-kebeera wel-sagheera wel-maharat el-ma3refeya wel-ejtem3eya wel-3atafeya elly betsehhel akter tatwor maharat el-tanzem el-thaty wel-endemaam el-thaty.

el tasneef el-amreeki lel-gataa el-nabati (usnvc) w el-tasneef el-kandi lel-gataa el-nabati (cnvc) byestakhdmo nafs taree2a "ecoveg" fel tasneef el-nezam el-be2eya.
wel-haddaf men taree2a ecoveg di enaha towsef taw3ooz el-nezam el-be2eya el-ardeya fel kol 7etta fel 3alam w tes3ed fe etekhaz el-qararat el-met3le2a behraya 7ameya el-be2a w edaret el-mawared.

el taree2a di bet2adem he2al haramy men 8 mostawaat lel-anwa3 el-tabee3eya, ma3a 3 mostawaat 3olweya (takweeneya), w 3 mostawaat wasta (fezyolojya-go2rafa-nabateya), w mostaweyyen seflieen (nabateyeen), w he2al haramy menfesel men 8 mostawaat lel-anwa3 el-thaqafeya.
w bast5dam nafs el taree2a di, 3olamaa el-be2a el-nabati fe amreeka w kanda 2adro yeta3awno fe tatweer el-tasneefat el-wataneya beta3tom.
wel-tasneefat el-wataneya di kamen etatawwerat kaz2 men ta3awon gawy ma3 shoraka 3ala mostawa el-welayat w el-mo7afazat w el-2eqalim.

beirut: men wara el 2eddan el 7adeed el sada2a, el 3esh lilmaya betet2afa be mayya weskha, laken el 3esh lilhoreya 3omro ma betet2afa.
"el 7ada2e2 fe lebnan heya soghoon lilhayawanat", di waghet nazar monee khoury, mosasa monazmat beirut lilt3amol el akhla2y ma3 el hayawanat, w 3asha2a lilhayawanat men we heya soghayara.
"kol el hayawanat hena makte2ba".
wakalat 7ameya el hayawan 7atet ma3ayeer dawleya le3elaga el hayawanat w zoroof 3ayeshom fe el 7ada2e2.
laken gam3eyat 7o2o2 el hayawan w el atba2 el baytareen bey2oolo en el ma3ayeer di mesh betet2af fe 7ada2e2 el hayawan el lebnany.
7aseb gam3et 7ameya el hayawan el 3alameya, "el ma3ayeer el tafseelya lel 7add el adna men el motatalabat...
fe ma yeta3le2 be ta2theeth 2afas el hayawanat, w ra3aytom, w tashghilhom [w ta3leem] el shakhs el mas2ool 3anhom, hetet7add men 7'lal...
el solta el mokhtasa ma3 el akhd fe el e3tebar...
el nateeg el 3elmeyya w 7tageyat anwa3 el hayawanat el mokhtalafa".

el doctor gabby helal, wa7ed men 2alel men el atba2 el baytareen el lebnaneen elly 3andohom khobra fe 3elaga el hayawanat el ber2eya, 2al lel daily star 3an 7tageyat el hayawanat el ber2eya fe 7ada2e2 el hayawan.
7aseb kalam el doctor helal, 7ada2e2 el hayawan 7ataga atba2 baytareen mo2eemeen feha, w bey3rafo el hayawanat kways, w bey2adro yebno 3ala2at tha2a ma3ahom.
el doctor helal bey2ool en el atba2 dol bey3rafo shakhsyyet el hayawan kways, w bey3rafo yet3amalo ma3ah "a7san men el atba2 el baytareen el 3adyeen".
laken 2allet el atba2 dol fe lebnan 5alet 7ada2e2 el hayawan el lebnany tet5ad na7'a mokhtalef fe tawzeef el 3omala.

"fe lebnan, beyest5admo 3omala aganeb [gheir modarebeen] be 2oghoor 2alela 3ashan ye3tanyo bel hayawanat", el doctor helal beyfasser, w beyedaf en el 3omala dol mesh mot3almeen kways 3ashan yet3amalo ma3 el hayawanat el ber2eya.
el nateega fe el 2aghal heya el e7mal w so2 el mo3amala w el ett7ad 3ala el hayawanat.
"ezzay el 2erd walla el shimpanzy hayb2a 3ayesh w howa 2a3ed wara el 2eddan men 3'eer shagara yetasala2ha walla masaha kafaia 3ashan yegri feha?

w ezzay el tamase7 hayb2a 3ayesh fe 7amam seba7a fady?"lamma sa2al morsal el daily star mas2ool fe 7ada2et hayawan 3an sabab edaret el 7ada2a bedoon mawared kafaia, 2alet enohom kebaro 2afas ba3d el hayawanat men wakt ma estalmo el edara men el malaak el sa2been, w enohom "bedo a7san ma 3andohom".
mas2ool fe 7ada2et hayawan tanya, shaaf feha el morsal 2erd fomo akhder, ghalban men akl dahen el 2afas, 2afel el seka bso3oba lamma 3araf en el sa7afa betkalmo.
so2 el mo3amala w el ett7ad 3ala el hayawanat heya bas 7ez2 men el mo3anata elly bet3aneha el hayawanat fe 7ada2e2 el hayawan el lebnany.
7aseb ra2y sorya za3tar ma3awwad, mosasa w modera gam3et 7ameya w 7oreya el hayawanat, el hayawanat lazom tet7amel el mayya el weskha, w el akl el rady2, w el zoroof el bey2eya el say2a.
sorya ma3awwad, rasama betemawl gam3et 7ameya w 7oreya el hayawanat men bey3 loghataha, bet7asor 3ala 2allet el masahat el khadra2 fe 7ada2e2 el hayawan el lebnany.
bet2ool en el 2afas soghayara gedan nesbetan le 7tageyat el hayawanat lel 7araka, w el ardeya 7agareya men 3'eer ay shagar walla nabateet yetzakrohom bebyetohom el tab3eya.
"ezzay el 2erd walla el shimpanzy hayb2a 3ayesh w howa 2a3ed wara el 2eddan men 3'eer shagara yetasala2ha walla masaha kafaia 3ashan yegri feha?
w ezzay el tamase7 hayb2a 3ayesh fe 7amam seba7a fady?" bet2ool sorya ma3awwad, w betedaf en el zoroof fe 7ada2e2 el hayawan el lebnany "mesh ma2boola abadan".

el doctor helal bey3teref en wad3 el hayawanat fe 2afas be ardeya 7agareya beyeman3 tarakom el baktereia w byesahl el tanzeef, laken fe nafs el wa2t bey2ool en el 2afas ghalban betkoon men 3'eer "amakn lel e5teba2".
"el hayawanat dayman betb2a motawtera fe 2afas beta3'ohom", el doctor helal beyfasser.
bey2ool en law el hayawanat 3andohom amaken khassa beehom, momken yet7'arbo men el zawar lama yehes enohom madgooteen.
belnesba le sorya ma3awwad, el taree2a el wa7eda 3ashan te2alel men tawtor el hayawanat heya elgha2 7ada2e2 el hayawan.
monee khoury betetfa2 ma3aha.
"e5raj el hayawanat el ber2eya men beytaha el tab3eya bey2a2ohom gedan.
hom makanohom el tab3y howa el ber2a, 3ashan keda bensmeehom hayawanat ber2eya", bet2ool monee khoury.

el doctor helal bey3teref en akthar 7ada2e2 el hayawan fe lebnan say2a el edara w betetjahal rafahet el hayawanat, laken bey2ool enoh 3ala etsal be 7ada2et hayawan lebnanyet mo7adada talabt meno ennoh yishtagel ma3ahom bedwam kamil, w beyedaf enohom "bedo a7san ma 3andohom".
laken monee khoury masmema 3ala en lazom yeb2a fe e7'radat akter.
"momken el hayawanat tekoon se7etha kwaysa, laken dah mesh kefaya", betser monee khoury.
"mesh hasadd2 en el 2asad hayb2a mabsoot fe 2afas 10 meter mertab3.
el 2asad hayb2a a7san fe el ber2a 7atta law ga3".

nahayat 7ameya el-borgy - rooset-ta7'eer fe roos nahayat masameer el-e7'kam kan 3ashan yetgannab el-darar elly betesebbo masameer el-e7'kam el-taqlidya bel-no2a6 el-7ada.
ghaleban betestakhdem masameer el-e7'kam bel-ras el-krawy le-tethbeet el-mokonat el-dawwara 3ala el-me7awer.
ras el-borgy el-krawy et-tasmem 3ashan te2ta3 fe el-me7war el-mota2ayem ma3aha.
el-enteba3 dah bey5ale2 not2 da2ry 3ala el-me7war we bey3mel rab6a gawy.
laken dah byeb2a mazyada fe el-tatebeeqat el-da2ema, bas beysebbal mo3'a6at fel-7alat elly enta fe7'etan feha te7'tayar ta3eed tamwe2o el-me7war aw tez3alo.
el-not2 el-da2ry el-bariz 3ala el-me7war elly masameer el-e7'kam bel-ras el-krawy betesebbo bey2awem ta3eed tamwe2 el-mokawen el-methabet we momken yedarr bel-me7war we el-mokawen sawa2.
nahayat nesf el-kelb el-masewya men nylon aw na7as, ma3a nahayat beyda2eya fel-7'am el-fedy, kaman ma3a nahayat bokrat el-kora bel-7'amol el-ertedady.
el-masameer deh bel-roos el-motadraja el-sodda betethabet el-mokawenat fe makanaha men 3'eer ma tedarr bel-me7war aw el-mokawen.
ras kora ma3a nabed
we ashkaalo elmokhtalafa, bema feehom el3onf elmanzly, betsabeb fe mashaakel se7ia khateera 2esra we tawela el2amad, gesdia we 3a2lia we jinsia we enjaabya.
we bet2a2er 3ala elatfal, we bet2odi ela takaleef egtema3ia we e2tesadia 3alia l elsetat we el3a2elat we elmogtama3at.
we dawrat el3onf metakera we most3beda.
bet2a2er 3alamat 3ala el3oqool we el2ajsad we elaro7.
betdarab el2ste2lalia, we betdamar e7teram el2a7tiram, we bet2alel gawdet el7aya, ma3a 3awakef salbia 3ala el3ala2at elshakhsia we el3a2elia we el2egtema3ia.
we el23teda2at elmor2aba mehdeda we 3amaan mertabeta bema2shel egtema3ia we beta2a we tashmeel we 3adam mosaawa 2egtema3ia we fokdan gawdet el7aya we zeiada takaleef elra3aya else7ia, etc.

we enteshar el3onf 2edda elsetat 3ali: akter men nos elsetat elalbaneiat (52.9 fe elmaya) bey3ano men wa7ed aw aktar men khamsa anwa3 men el3onf (3onf elshareek el7ameem, we 3onf elmoda3a, we 3onf ghier elshareek, we eltaharosh eljinsi, we/aw elmotab3a) khlal 7ayathom.

we 3ala ragm go7ood el7okoma elmahalia le ta2deem elda3m le da7aya el3onf elmanzly we elnajeiat meno, fa elghalbia el3othma men el7alat la yotabbal 3anha, we la yezal eltahadoth 3alania 3an el3onf da5l el3ala2at el3a2elia men elmo7arramat.

ma3a el2akheth fe el23tibar el2asbab eljathria lel3onf 2edda elsetat we el3onf elmanzly, we ta2theero 3ala elsetat we elmogtama3at, yajib tesleet eldaw 3ala hadh elmoshkela 3ala a3la elmostawaat el3amia, men khilal ansha6at mostamera le ref3 elwa3y we elma3lomat we elta3leem.
we men agl da3m elda7aya/elna2eyat we men3 el3onf, men elmohem gedan eltahadoth 3alania 3an elashkal elmokhtalafa lel3onf 2edda elsetat, bema feeh el3onf elmanzly.
yajib 3ala elmogtama3 eno yet3araf 3aleehom zay ma homa; eno yegabal enohom mawgoodeen; yenshro 3alamathom we asbabhom we 3awakefhom; we yemenn enno feh tedeebat 7emaya we men3 fa3ala.
we nazaran lel2athar elsalbia tawela elamad 3ala elmogtama3at we elmogtama3at kkol, la yomken 3ad el3onf elmanzly mosaala khasa ba3ad delwa2ti.
yajib da3m elmogtama3at lestejaba bekafiya lel3onf 2edda elsetat we 7alat el3onf elmanzly.
we dah sa7ee7 be shakl khas lelmogtama3at fe elmnate2 elly feha eltawasol mo7dod be sabab elmawka3 elgo2rafi, ay el2areya elsoghayara aw elwehdat el2edaria elba3eda 3an elmadina elly feha elbaladia.

fe hadh elsayak, fe november 2019, nazamat baladia serik, elshareek fe barnamaj el7okm elmahaly we eltanaia, 7adthan eftetahy fe 2etar 7amlet el16 yom le monahda el3onf el2ased 3ala elno3 el2ijtema3y fe elwehda el2edaria le mulas.

kan elnashat goz2 la yatajoz min mobadara "shaher wa7ed - mogtama3 wa7ed" elmostamera le ra2ees elbaladia, elly betehdef ela ta3zeez eltawasol elmatloob be shakl shadeed ma3a elwehdat el2edaria elly la tazal la te7sal 3ala khidma kafia le7ad delwa2ti.
sharek akter men 52 mosharak, bema feehom elsetat we elregala we elbanat we elawlad men mogtama3at 3omria mokhtalafa (betraw7 3omrohom ben elmoraha2een we elkebar).
kan di awel mara bey7sal feha zay elnashat dah fe 2aryathom.

lel2a3da2 hadh elmogtama3 elryfe elsoghayar, fa wodo3 ra2ees elbaladia, kaman wodo3 ra2ees 7ezb barnamaj el7okm elmahaly we eltanaia, ersal eshera wa7eda enohom mowateeneen mohemmen we mo3tabareen ba3d wa2t elentekhabat.

et2adem ma3lomat 3an el3onf el2ased 3ala elno3 el2egtema3y we el3onf elmanzly, we ashkaalohom elmokhtalafa, we el7emaya elly beyewafroha elteshree3 elalbany, we elkhadamat elmarbotoh fe elbalad we fe baladia serik be takhsees.
we yetatalab eltada3ol lel3onf 2edda elsetat we el3onf elmanzly en elmo2asesat el7okomia elmas2ola we elfathe3 elmo3neia betansig 2e7'raatohom we mawarefohom.

fe khetaboh, salat ra2ees baladia serik eldaw 3ala el7aja ela tatbeeq elestejaba elmot3adeda elqeta3at, we ahmeia khadamat elda3m elmokhtasasa, we ahmeia 7emayat elsetat we afraad el3a2ela men el3onf.
"ana motashaker gedan le kol elsetat we elregala we elbanat we elawlad elly sharako fe 2ejtemaa elnaharda.
bash3or belse3ada le2no ma3a ba3d ben7awel net7ada 2olayk el2afkar elnafsia eldaya2a, elly 7ata wa2t gara2eb kanat betet3abar mosha3el 7as belsetat.
ma3a ba3d lazem ne2ool la lel3onf 2edda elsetat we elbanat, le2no kol set motanakha 7'las heya benta aw 2okht aw zawga fe 3a2ela.

bda eltamared elfa3'ly - elthawra elbolshevya - fee 6 november, 3'ndama 'amr kyrensky be'8la9 el9'afa elbolshevya.

estawla elbolshefya 3la magles el7okoma elmo2eata fee maqra fee 9asr elshita2 tlk allayla doon '2'la9 r9'a9a wahda taqreeban fee aldefa3 3n el7okoma.

el-fiber el-dwa2y howa no3 men el-alyaaf elly betwasel mawjat el-dwa2 wel-esharat el-dwa2ya el-mokhtalafa.

fe 3asr el-ma3lomat elly e7na 3ayshin feeh delwa2ty, fe kemya kbeera men el-ma3lomat wel-bayanaat elly me7taga tet3amal me3aha wetet3alaj fe el-anshita el-eqtesadya wel-bahth el-3elmy, wel-fiber el-dwa2y howa afdal ada le-nagl el-ma3lomat.
dah no3 men el-alyaaf masno3 men el-zogaaj aw el-plastick we bey3mel ka-ada le-nagl el-dwa2.

7alyan, el-fiber el-dwa2y el-mostakhdem fe el-etessalat howa fe el-asass fiber dwa2y qa2em 3ala el-kwarts, wel-mokon el-ra2eesi beta3oh howa zogaj el-kwarts 3ali el-noqa2, ya3ny thani okseed el-sileekoon (sio2).
el-fiber el-dwa2y el-3aary beyte2sem 3omoman le-thalatha tabaqat: el-leb, el-ghilaf, wel-taba2a el-kharejiya.
el-leb: el-gasem el-ra2eesi beta3 madet el-leb howa el-sileeka, elly betkoon madhoof leha kemya saghira gedan men mawad tanya zy okseed el-sereeyoom we khames okseed el-fosfor w keda.
ta2seer el-e'zda di howa zeyada ma3amel enksar el-dwa2 lel-mada.
el-ghilaf: madet el-ghilaf 3omoman betkoon sileeka naqya, we betkoon kaman madhoof leha kemya saghira gedan men okseed el-boron.
ta2seer el-e'zda di howa taqleel ma3amel enksar el-dwa2 lel-mada.
ma3amel enksar el-dwa2 fe leb el-fiber beykoon a3la shwaya men ma3amel enksar el-dwa2 fe el-ghilaf.
el-far2 fe ma3amel el-enksar dah bey2dem en el-dwa2 yefdal ma7boos fe el-leb beshkal asasy 3ashan yentakel.
el-taba2a el-kharejiya: w de kaman betet3araf bel-taba2a el-moghalfet, we hay 3abaret 3an taba2a men el-tala2 el-polimer, w de betdi 7ameya mekanekya lel-fiber el-3aary.
el-mokon el-ra2eesi lel-fiber el-3aary howa el-sileeka, w de madet hashma w da3eefa w mesh 2adra 3ala moqawamet el-en7ena2 aw el-sodmat.
3ashan keda, 3ashan n7assen adaa el-fiber fe el-en7ena2at el-saghira, benest5dem taba2a men el-tala2 el-polimer.
anwa3 el-fiber el-dwa2y:- 7sb madet el-fiber el-dwa2y: fiber el-kwarts, fiber morakab, fiber plastick, w heka.

- 7sb taweze3 ma3amel el-enksar fe moqta3 el-fiber:fiber men no3 el-khotwa (si): fe mnte2at el-leb wel-ghilaf, taweze3 ma3amel el-enksar beykoon motasawy, n1 w n2 3ala el-twaly, wel-taghyeer fe ma3amel el-enksar beykoon 3ala shakel khotwa 3and el-7ad el-faseel beyn el-leb wel-ghilaf.
3ard el-nataa2 el-tarddy beykoon dayye2, w munasib lel-etessalat 9'eyret el-mada.

fiber men no3 el-tadrad (gi): ma3amel el-enksar fe markez el-fiber beykoon el-akbar (n1), laken bey2al bel-tadrad ma3a zeyada el-etegah el-sha3a3y, le7ad el-7ad el-faseel beyn el-leb wel-ghilaf, w beyb2a 3ala ma3amel el-enksar n2.
3ard el-nataa2 el-tarddy beykoon wase3, w munasib lel-etessalat 3ala masafat motawaset.
- 7sb tareeqet el-nagel:fiber mot3added el-anma6 (mmf): dah fiber bey2der yentakel anma6 mot3addeda men el-dwa2.
bs el-tasheet beyn el-anma6 beykoon kbeer, w dah bey7add men taredd ersal el-esharat el-raqamya, w beyb2a aswa2 ma3a zeyada el-masafa, feb2a aham fe magal el-etessalat 9'eyret el-mada.
fiber 7adey el-namat (smf): dah fiber bey2der yentakel namat wa7ed bas men el-dwa2, f el-tasheet beyn el-anma6 beykoon soghayar gedan.
7alyan dah el-no3 el-akthar estekhdaman fe el-telefzeeon el-kably wel-etessalat el-dwa2ya.

ya ahla ya ahla, ana a7mad mn markaz mlwii, w3ayz a7kylkom 3n moshkla btwaagah nas kteer fe markaz el-bdary basyoot.
elnas hnak btshky mn 7ala el-tara2 el-da5leia fe el-ma2abar el-gdedah b3arb mtir, wally bgad b2t sa3ba gedan ldarja enaha msh sal7a 7tta llmshy 3leha.

el-presentation beta3 el-egtema3 howa 3ard by2ademoh shakhs le-mogmaa mn el-nas khlal egtema3.
wel-hadef mn el-presentation dah momken yekon taqdeem ma3lomat, aw tahdeeth el-7adhoor 3ala mawdoo3 ma7adad, aw taqdeem e9tar7.
momken taqdeem el-presentation dah shakhsyan aw 3an ba3d b-estekhlaas adwat zy barameg el-video conference.
presentation el-egtema3 momken ya5od ashkal ketira, mn 3arade ghayr rasmeia by2ademha mot7adeeth wa7ed le-3arade akthar rasmeia betshamel mot7adeethin ketir, sharayeh 3ard, w-wasael mosa3da basareya.
mo7tawa el-presentation dah hayetwaka3 3ala hadef el-egtema3 w-ahdaf mo9addem el-3ard.
3ashan ta2dem presentation na7'eg fe egtema3, momken tkoon mosta3ed w-monazam kwayes.
dah momken yeshmel tadreeb 3ala 3ardak, 3amal sharayeh 3ard waade7a w-fa3ala, w-el-tfa3ol ma3 gomhourak 3ashan tet2aked enhom fahemeen w-metabe3een ma3ak.
ezzay ta3mel presentation motamayez?
3ashan ta3mel presentation motamayez, 5od balk mn el-nasa7'ih di:- a3raf gomhourak: afham meen howa gomhourak w-ay elly yehmhom.
dah hayesa3dak tazbet 3ardak 3ala e7teyaatohom w-5alleeh aktar sella w-mot3a leh.
- 5a6et le-mo7tawa 3ardak: nazem mo7tawa 3ardak b-tareeqa manteqya w-sahla el-motaba3a.
estekhle5 3anawein w-3anawein fer3eya w-no2at mar2oma 3ashan tes3ed gomhourak fel-motaba3a.
- estekhle5 wasael mosa3da basareya: estekhle5 wasael mosa3da basareya zy el-sowar w-el-rasoom el-bayania w-elfideos 3ashan twad7 no6ak w-5alleeh aktar mot3a.
- tadreb 3ala tareeqa taqdeemak: tadreb 3ala 3ardak ablaha 3ashan teb2a merta7 ma3 el-mada elly hat2ademha w-t7asen mn tareeqa taqdeemak.
estekhle5 el-eima2at w-ghayyir nebrah sawtak w-7ajem sawtak 3ashan te7'alef 3ala entebah gomhourak.
- tfa3ol ma3 gomhourak: shaje3 el-mosharaka w-el-tfa3ol ma3 gomhourak.
2'ool as2ela w-shaje3hom homa kaman yes2aloo as2ela.
- 5alleeh 3ardak mokhtasar: ta7'od 3an e9afet mo7tawa ghayr darory aw el-en7eraf 3an el-mawdoo3.
rakiz 3ala mawdoo3 3ardak w-5alleeh mokhtasar w-mofeed.
- raag3 w-5aleeh sa7: raag3 3ardak 3ashan tet2aked mn 3adam wodo5 akhta2 2emla2eya aw na7aweya, w-ta2aked en kol 7aga waade7a w-sahla el-fahm.
b-etba3 el-nasa7'ih di, momken ta3mel presentation monazam w-mota3 w-fa3al.

fe adwat ketira mokhtalafa momken testekhle5ha 3ashan ta3mel presentation, menha:- microsoft powerpoint: dah barnamg mostakhell 3ala nitaq wase3 w-by5alleek ta3mel presentation mo7taref el-shakl b-estekhlaas sharayeh 3ard, nas, sowar, w-3anaser basareya tanya.
- google slides: dah ada 3ard magania 3al web w-bet3teber juz2 mn magmo3a adwat google lel-entage7eya.
howa shebeeh barnamg powerpoint w-by5alleek ta3mel sharayeh 3ard w-teta3awn ma3 nas tanya fel-waqt el-7a2ee2y.
- prezi: dah ada 3ard by5alleek ta3mel presentation tafa3oly aktar w-qabel lel-takbeer.

- keynote: dah ada 3ard betkoon mawgooda ma3 aghezzt apple zy el-iphone w-ipad.
laha wa7'et most5dem sahel el-estekhlaas w-by5alleek ta3mel presentation mo7taref el-shakl b-estekhlaas sharayeh 3ard, nas, sowar, w-3anaser basareya tanya.
- canva: dah ada tasmem graphic momken testekhle5ha 3ashan ta3mel presentation mo7taref el-shakl.
laha magmo3a kbera mn el-qawaleb w-3anaser el-tasmem elly momken testekhle5ha 3ashan ta3mel presentation gazab basareyan.

25$ raspberry pi: 24 december 2011 by nancy owano fel technology/hardware(physorg.com) - 25$ computer designed to help young people learn more about computers than just uploading photos and documents, will start mass production in january.

el-mabda2 wara el-mashro3 en el-talaba el-youm momken yekoono 3arefin yektbo mawad w 3araye2 basash, bas momken mayekoonosh 3arefin 7aga 3an el-handasa el-mo3maraya el-asasiya lelnazm w tatawor el-anzema.
raspberry pi 3ayez yelham el-shabab yebda2o masarat mahniya fel-technology.

el-doroos elly betrokoz 3ala el-mostakhdem momken tekoon kowayesa, bas el-hardware haye7ot el-talaba 3ala masar el-ta3leem w el-estekshaf 2aqrab le 3oloum el-computer men skills el-mostakhdem el-nahai.
el-talaba haye7'od el-computers deh be7ajem bita2at el-eitman w hayetnazem courses 7awalehom.
post 3ala blog raspberry pi fel-osboo3 dah 3an el-e3lan en el-computers gayza 2asasan, w da 3'eer keteer men elly beyetabe3o el-ta7deethat.
el-post bey2ol en awel printed circuit boards elly etmamet waslet w en el-beta versions hatet3'abar be 7'otot kareba w barnamgiya w 7'otot fel-hardware.
law el-7agat mashet kowayes, el-2intag hayebda2 be 7'otot kbeyra w hayetesta7'od el-talabat lel-computers fel-shahr el-gay.
wosool el-printed circuit boards el-osboo3 dah bet3'abar 3an landmark, 3ashan el-printed circuit boards el-asasiya deh elly hatetrabet 3aleha kol el-mokonat lel-product el-nahai.
el-mouse w el-keyboard w el-network adapters w el-storage el-kharegy beyetwasalo 3an tare2 usb hub.
raspberry pi foundation deh khayria w matsoja fel-uk w bet7'os fe 3oloum el-computer w el-mawade3 elly betet3ale2 beha.
3ashan keda, el-foundation deh bet7'os en el-hardware yeb2a fel-mota7' w fe mota7' el-kol.
the register kan 2al abl keda fel-sana en el-team wara el-computer da 2a3ad shohoor beyedawwer 3ala mokonat te7'aleeq el-mawazena el-sa7' w el-goda.
el-gihaz beyestakhdem sd cards lel-storage w beyet3'az bel-processor arm be 7'osos 700 mhz.
el-product el-nahai hayet3'azar fel-asool fel-shakl beta, el-model a be 25$ w el-model b be 35$.
el-model b beyet7'ata ethernet wired 10/100.
"law konna radyeen en el-beta deh kowayesa, hanedbas 3ala el-button fel-wa2t dah lel-2intag el-kbeer fel-masare3, warda fel-blog.
el-batch el-awwal men 10 boards hatetba3 lel-3'alban lel-a3la soum w el-devices hatetba3 lel-3amm fel-january.
a7'eran, fe3lan n7eb en el-atfal fel-3alam yestakhdmo el-computer deh lel-programming, warda fel-team el-3amel fel-raspberry pi.

tem t7'adeen el la7'm el mafroom bel eshrekya el qolonya o157:h7, we teshkeelo 3ala heya2a a2ras we tem tagleefoh fe wa7ed men talata nizam tagleef motawfera tjarreban 1) nylon/poly ethylene 2) tagleef saran aw 3) saran/polyester/poly ethylene.

ba3d ma tem el esh3'a3, tem ersaal el 3'ena2 lal el ma5tebar 3ashan 3ad el najeen men el eshrekya el qolonya o157:h7.

mafesh ta'theer le mawade el tagleef aw el glaf el jawwy 3ala 2e2am d10, we heya 2e2am betemthel kamya gor3a el esh3'a3 el matloba le ta3teel mostawaat mo7adada men el eshrekya el qolonya o157:h7, bighad el 2enshad 3an no3 masdar el esh3'a3 el mostakhdam.
el a2ras el magmada e7tajet le mostawaat a3la men el esh3'a3 (d10) le ta3teel el eshrekya el qolonya o157:h7 3an el a2ras el tazege.
etla7'az kaman fe el derasa dee, en wodo el oxegen 3'eb dor ra2eesi fe ta3teel el eshrekya el qolonya o157:h7 we dah kan sa7ee7 be shakl khas fe mostawaat el gor3a el monkhafada.

waf2 el ra2ees abraham lincoln, wa2mr el 3ameed el general irvin macdowell be2aydat hjwm 3la 20,000 2ndy mn 2u2wat el confederate 29reb mn ta9a3 manassas, virginia, feen kano by5ymoon 3la n7r esmoh bool renn.

w3la 2a7'er en lincoln raf'd el talab wa2mr el 2u2wat belbda2 fe el maseer fe 16 yoolyo, ella en el w2t el 2a7'er fe el mona2shat sme7 lel general p.
beauregard, elly kan by2od el geesh el genooby fe bool renn, belda3wa le ta3zeezat.

w5lal el sa3at el 2alela el awela, bda wade7 en 2u2wat el etehad kanet hat7'os el nsr tany, feen dafa3 10,000 2ndy jnoob el motamaredeen elly 3ddhom 4,500 2ndy 3la el jan7 lelwara2 3br tareeq washington el sa3eed.

3ashan keda, el doctor beta3'ek hay3mel lak e5tebar 7asasya.
e5tebar el 7asasya: el gald walla el damfe no3een men e5tebarat el 7asasya elly betest5dem 3ada: e5tebarat el gald we e5tebarat el dam.
kol wa7ed fehom leeh mamezat we 3eyoub, laken akser el dokatra beyefdalou e5tebarat el gald le2anha amena we rakheesa we betdi nateeg nwtha2a.
e5tebar el 7asasya beyet3'amel 3an tare2 el gald aw el dam.
fe el e5tebar el kemmy el m3'ayyer (mqt), beyest5dem mazeej men wakazat el gald we ebar dakhel el gald elly bet7'tawy 3ala no2at men masabbab el 7asasya el meshteba feeh.
beyest5dem gezaz mot3added el ro2oos le wakz el gald, we dah bey5ally masabbab el 7asasya yekhtar2 el gald we yesabab entefakh aw tawram.
law 7asal e7marar aw tawram, betet3'abar el nateega eyjabya w mesh ma7tageen e5tebar tany lel mostaddah dah.
lama tekon el nateega salbya, beyest5dem ebra saghyra le 7a2n masabbab el 7asasya mubashara fe el gald.

el e5tebar el kemmy el m3'ayyer (mqt) aktar shamolyya le2enno mesh bas bey3arefek law kont 7assas le mawad mo3ayna, laken kaman beyesa3'd fe tahdeed el jor3a el monasba le bdaya 3elaj el 7asasya beta3'tak.

gazeera sandy, elly mawgoodah 3la kharaa'6 kteer w kharaay6 b7ryah w 7atta 3la google earth, leftt entebah el-nas b3d ma fareeq mn el-gyologyeen kanu msafreen bel-safenah f el-manta2ah de w aktshafu enha mesh mawgoodah.
"kharaay6 el-mreekh w el-2amar da2taha w tghteetaha 2a3la bkteer mn kharaay6 el-m7eetaat bta3etna." - sabine zahirovitsh, gyology.

dalo2ty wa7ed mn el-3olamaa2 el-ostralyeen elly kanu mtwajedeen bey2ool en el-2akhta2 elly 7asalet mn el-nas elly n'6let el-kharaay6 el-wargyiah ll-kharaay6 el-ra2meeyah momken tekoon sabab zohoor w 2khtfa2 el-gazeera el-3'amda de.

sabine zahirovitsh, gyology mn game3at sydney, 2al le-royters: "momken gedan enha kanet ghaltah basharyah f t7'weel el-kharaay6 de ll-sigha el-ra2meeyah f mar7ala mo3aynah.""w yemken da5'lat 2awa2ed el-bayanaat marrah wa7dah, w fadelt mawgoodah jowaaha, 3shan mafeesh safn 3elmeyah da5'lat el-manta2ah de mn fatrah tawelah gedan."sabine shar7 en b7r el-morgaan, zy aktar m7eetaat el-3alam, menta2a mesh msteksfah bshkl kafe.

"kharaay6 el-mreekh w el-2amar da2taha w tghteetaha 2a3la bkteer mn kharaay6 el-m7eetaat bta3etna.""f ehna m7tageen fe3lan nrga3 w nb3at safn b7'6eyah 2ktar 3shan nrasm kharaay6 le-2a3 el-m7eet w nefham 2ktar elly mawgood hnak."gazeera sandy kanet mawgoodah 3la ba3d 7'alas 1200 km sharq sa7l queensland, ostralya, na7yah arkhabeel kaledonya el-gdedah elly ta7t seytra fransaa.
fareeq mn el-gyologyeen mn game3at sydney, be2'6det mary seaton, 3amlu re7la b7'6eyah le-modat 25 yom f el-manta2ah de 3la mtan safenah b7'6eyah, w ent'7at el-re7la f bdayet el-shahr dah.
kanu by3'mlu 2stekshaf w bygma3o ma3lomat 3n 2a3 el-b7r.
laken lamma wsalu ll-manta2ah elly kan el-mafrood tekoon feeh gazeera sandy, mal2osh gher b7r 2azra2.

mary seaton 2alet le-s7eft sydney morning herald: "shakena f el-mawdoo3 lamma el-kharaay6 el-b7'6eyah elly kanet el-safenah betest5'adamha 2az'har 3'am2 1400 meter f menta2a kharaay6na el-3elmeyah w google earth bywade7 wjoode gazeera kbeera."el-mashro3 jama3 197 3'enya s'7ryah mokhtalafa w ras'm kharaay6 le-2ktar mn 14,000 km mrab3 mn 2a3 el-m7eet.
- mafeesh moqawma l 2mradd 3een el-dafd3a fe iowa- fe mawsem 2011, kan fe 3edda amrad war2eya fe iowa, w mnaha el-baga el-bany, w bala2 awraq el-sirkospora, w 2mradd 3een el-dafd3a.
el-mradd elly kan wa7esh aktar fe 2011 moqaranet bel-seneen elly fatet kan 2mradd 3een el-dafd3a, 3ala el-2a2al fe el-anwa3 elly betta2ther bel-mradd.
el-ka2en el-mosabbeb le 2mradd 3een el-dafd3a, sirkospora sogena, kan fe el-akhbar 3edda marrat fe el-seneen elly fatet besabab taqareer 3an moqawamto le mobeydat el-fateeryat el-strobilurineya.

- besabab el-taqareer de, el-ba7ethen fe gam3et iowa gam3o awra2 3aleha 2mradd 3een el-dafd3a men tajarebna 3ala mobeydat el-fateeryat w ba3taw el-awra2 de le gam3et illinois 3ashan yekhtabroha w yshofo 7asaseetaha.
kol el-3enayat elly etgama3et men awra2 iowa 6alet 7asasa, w da ma3na2 enha mesh moqawama le mobeydat el-fateeryat el-strobilurineya.
- el-awra2 de betemthel nesba soghayara bas men 2mradd 3een el-dafd3a fe iowa.

3ala el-3'eram men en 3enayat iowa fe 2011 makantesh moqawama le mobeydat el-fateeryat el-strobilurineya, bas bardo kways enna nefakar fe el-estekhdamm tawel el-mada le el-no3 da el-mohem men mobeydat el-fateeryat.
3enayat men sirkospora sogena el-moqawama le el-strobilurineyat et3azlat men welayat majawera, w heya illinois w missouri.
bema en abwa2 el-fateeryat de bentasher fe el-hawa, f fe e7temalya 7a2eeya enna nel2a 3enayat moqawama fe iowa.

- el-tatwor el-mo7tamel le 3enayat moqawama men el-ka2en el-mosabbeb le 2mradd 3een el-dafd3a le mobeydat el-fateeryat el-strobilurineya lazzem yeb2a fe el-e3tebar lama el-mazare3een bey2arru estekhdamm mobeydat el-fateeryat el-war2eya fe 2012.
nasa7 tanya men el-doktor karl bradley, el-3alem men illinois elly bey2od e5tebarat moqawama mobeydat el-fateeryat, mawgooda fe ma9alo fe awail shahr october.
