el 2a5ar elli 3amaltu el bgs men senin el 5amsinayat, kan fe 3adad kbeer men el mas7'ot el geofizya2ya eli et3'amet fel uk le3'radat mashro3at w 3omala2, ba3daha 3ala nitaam 2eqlimi, zay mas7'ot el gathbiya el wataniya, w ba3daha 3ala nitaam mahali.

akter el mas7'ot et3'amet le wa7da men el 2ghrad el talata eli gaya di:- el moshrfa 3ala rasm el khara2et el jologyia, aw 7all mo3'azelat jologyia mo7adada,- estekshaf el ma3aden; et3'amet ketir menhom le barnamaj el estekshaf el ma3adi le wizara el tigarra w el sena3'a fel sab3inat w el tamaneinat.
el data el meta le aktar el mas7'ot el geofizya2ya eli et3'ametha el bgs mawgooda fel qawa3ed el beyanat oracle.

w le 2ghrad estekshaf el ma3aden, el qawa3ed el beyanat el momken tefedi hena:qaa3det beyanat el mas7'ot el mahalia, (el mamleka el mut7eda)el qaa3da di bet7'tawi 3ala tafaseel 800 mas7' geofizya2i, et3'amet ta7'riban 500 menhom le estekshaf el ma3aden.
momken tel2a aktar 3an el mas7'ot di 3ala maw9e3 el geoindex lel bgs 3ala el web.

qaa3det beyanat el mas7'ot el gawya 2aliat el daqa, (el mamleka el mut7eda)el bgs bey7'tafez be data le aktar men 30 mas7' 2ali el daqa eli et3'amet be mosaft wodo7 ardi 2al men 150 meter w mosaft khotoot teyaran men 50 l 400 meter.
et3'amet aktar el mas7'ot di le mashro3at estekshaf el ma3aden estekhdama majmo3at men 2as'at el estesh'af el maghnetya w el 2ektrumaghnetya w el 2es3'aya.
ketir men el beyanat di etraqemet delwa2ti, ba3d ma etsajlet aslan be shakl tanazoli.
beyttala3mol el mo3'ayarat el mas7' w tawfor el beyanat fel jadwal el marf2.
le aktar ma3lomat 3an mawqe3 w minta2at el mas7'at, 2ad5ol hena.
fi 2005-2006, kajeza2 men mashro3 tellus, el bgs, be shiraka ma3 el hay2a el jologyia el finlandia, 3'amet mas7' gawi monkhas w 2ali el daqa lel mas7' el geofizya2i fo2 irland el shomalia.
2ad5ol hena le aktar tafaseel.
ibda2 el begonia el dernia fel da5elezra3 el begonia el dernia el meshtera walla el makhzona 3shan tibda fel nomo abl ma el se2e3 yekhlis.
7ot'ha fel asees malyan khelit torba ratib b7ayth yekon el garza el moghof menha le2'2ol.
gatifha be 6aba2a khafeefa men khelit el torba.
khalli el torba ratiba bas mesh mablola, w 7ot'ha fel makan dolma daraghet 7aratoh 70 fahranheit.
awel ma yebda el nomo, 7ot'ha fel daw2 sa7eb bas mesh fel daw2 el shams el mubashir.

nambissan*banoo n.p.*el3adala wel-tamayoz: qadeaya fe el-ta3leem el-hendife 7agat keteer fel-seyasa el-ta3leemeya el-7adisa fel-balad el-kebeera el-ra2smeleya fe el-3alam, fe trend kebeer enohom byerkezoo 3ala el-tamayoz wel-keffa2a fel-ta3leem.

wel-trend dah betet3abar 3ano be-ta3beerat keteer zay "el-3awda lel-asaseyat" we "el-tamsook bel-ma3ayeer" we "tatweer el-madares" we keda, we el-focus be2a 3ala el-7aga lel-"gawda" badal el-"kamya" fel-ta3leem.

wel-m3alle2een 3ala el-ta3leem beyrabeto el-trend dah bel-3amaleiat el-eqtesadeya wel-ejtemeya el-awse3, we khososan azmet el-ra2smeleya el-gharbiya: el-rokod el-eqtesady, we d'3'6 el-mawared, wel-darora el-mosaada le-3'eer hekelet el-mal.
bas el-wa2e3 el-wa7e7 howa en fe t7awol beytem be-batee2 bas motazayed be3eedan 7atta 3an sheb el-mosawa wel-3adala el-ejtemeya elly kanet betemayez el-ta3leem fe el-balad de fe el-seneen elly fatet.

we fe ta3leeqoh 3ala el-seyasa el-fedraleya el-amrekeya, bey2ool sekada (1986) "ma3ayeer el-tamayoz 7'allet ma3ayeer el-mosawa; wel-kefaya wel-ekhtyar 7'allet el-7agat wel-wosool; wel-e7'temamat el-ejtemeya wel-refahya etneg'het lel-7'alaf lel-entaajeya."seyaset el-ta3leem el-hendi el-naharda bet3akes kaman en fe ehtemam metzayed bel-tamayoz fel-ta3leem.

we 3ala 3'eer en taqreer lejnet kotari (1968) beyetkallem 3an enhom ye3'melo adad adny men "mo2assasat el-gawda", el-focus el-ra2eesi kan 3ala el-mosawa' fel-foras el-ta3leemeya bein el-f'2at el-ejtemeya el-mokhtalafa.

we fel-seyasa el-gededa lel-ta3leem fe 1986, ba3d 3esreen sana, 3ala 3'eer enna benasma3 e7'teyaj lel-ta3leem el-shaamel, el-qala2 elly et3'abar 3ano 3ala "el-ta3leem el-gameel" we el-7aga le- "gharbalet el-mawaheb" we ta7deed we ta3zeez "el-tamayoz" fel-madrasa nafsaha howa aktar wade7.

we el-t7awol dah fel-seyasa momken yetshof be-wodo7 awse3 fel-program el-3amal we el-watha2'eq el-l7'a2'a, fel-tafaseel 3an nawodaya vidyalyas - madares betet3'amar fel-reefeeya ma3a target mo7addad enohom ye7'arroo we ye3'azzoo el-tamayoz wel-mawaheb.

wel-mawdoo3 kan kbeer, ya3ny kan ma3ah el-doktor wagee3 3azzam, rayes el-ette7ad el-afreegy wel-masry, wel-na2eb el-awal le-rayes el-ette7ad el-dawly leldaragat, w-kaman khaled mostafa el-medeer el-tanfeethy lel-botola.

el-wazeer elqa kalema tar7ebeya bel-mosharekeen, w-2al en masr ba2et men a7san el-dawal fe estedafa el-7adath el-reyadeya el-3alameya, w-kaman byet7'attoo 3'aaleyat el-wakaaya 3ashan yedmennoo salama el-mosharekeen.
wel-3'areeb en ragm kol el-e7tya6at de, mafeesh wala 7ala e5saba etsajlet!
el-netayeg kant keda mafage2a shwya, ya3ny fe sabaq 3omomy 2ensha2 taht 23 sana, rwanda khadoo el-markez eltany wel-talet, w-ganoub afreega el-awal.
w-fe 3omomy regala taht 23 sana, rwanda eltalt wel-jaza2er eltany w-ganoub afreega el-awal.
ama fe 3omomy 2ensha2 el-kebar, namibya eltalt wel-tany wel-awal le-ganoub afreega, w-3omomy regala el-kebar, el-jaza2er eltalt wel-tany wel-awal ganoub afreega brdo!
bas elly kan laft nazry akter, sabaq el-nasha2een wel-nasha2at.
fe sabaq el-nasha2at, el-masreya 7abeba 3alawa 5adet el-markez eltany, wel-ganouby afreegy shanty 3olayfar el-2awla, wel-jaza2erya nesreen 7awely eltalt.
ama fe sabaq el-nasha2een, el-rwandy etyen twyzery el-awal, wel-magreby mohamed nagyeb sanboley eltany, wel-rwandy eltany samwel nyan7'oro eltalt.
wel-masreyeen 3abd allah 3afefy w-3abd el-ra7man faheem 5adoo el-markez el-5ames wel-sades 3al-tarteeb.
besara7a, ana ma3geb gedan bel-tandem wel-e7'temaam bel-reyada fe baladna, w-far7an en masr ba2et ma7'6 enazaar el-3alam fel-7adath el-reyadeya.
w-kaman 3agbny en el-wazeer 3'taraf be-ehmeeyet el-wakaaya wel-e7tya6at, w-da byedal 3al-e7'temaamhom bes7a el-mosharekeen, ya3ny mesh bas el-tarkeez 3al-fawz.
ama belnesba lel-netayeg, fa heya keda laftet nazry, ya3ny ganoub afreega masetra 3al-markaz el-2awwal fe keda sabaq, w-da by3aks e7'temaamhom bel-reyada 3andohom.
w-kaman el-rwandyeen 3amloo shoghl 3aly fe sabaq el-nasha2een, ya3ny mesh sahel enohom yakhdoo el-markez el-awal wel-talet.
bas ana fakhour tab3an bel-masreyeen elly sharfoona, w-5ososan 7abeba 3alawa elly 5adet el-markez eltany fe sabaq el-nasha2at.
akheeran, ana sa3eed en baladna betandem 7adath zy de, w-betdy e7'temaal lel-reyada wel-shabab.
w-da byedal 3al enna mashyeen fel-tareeq el-sa7, w-rabena ywaf2na w-nshof masr fe 3'aaleyat el-moratab fe kol el-magalat, mesh bas el-reyada.
3aziz/3azeezti illy m7tar/m7tara fe mawdoo3 il-broteen,enta/enti mesh law7dak - il-mawdoo3 dah momken ykoon m7ayer fe3lan.
el-awal khaleena nwadd7 - il-broteen il-kaamel howa il-broteen illy feeh kol il-7'amas il-aminiya il-asasiya il-tisa3a (elly hi labanat bena2 il-broteen, w illy momken n7sal 3aleehom men il-akl bas).
il-broteen il-kaamel beygi men il-montagat il-7aywaneya (zi il-lohom w il-dawagin w il-alban w il-beid w il-samak, w gherha), w men fool il-soy w il-kinwa (naw3 men il-7'obob).

il-broteen il-na2is feeh 2al men il-7'amas il-aminiya il-asasiya il-tisa3a, bas momken n2addem brouteenat na2isa ma3 ba3d fe il-woghat 3ashan na3mel broteen kaamel (zi ma ben2addem il-arroz ma3 il-b2oliyat aw zabada il-fool il-sodani ma3 il-toast).
mesh lazim n2ool il-aklat di fe nafs il-wa2t 3ashan il-gism y2dar yestakhdemha fe bena2 il-broteen, zi ma kan met3aref 3aleeh zaman.
kol illy 7'atageenah enna na2ool il-brouteenat di fe khilal 24 sa3a.
il-brouteenat il-na2isa betigi men il-aklat il-nabatiya, zi il-b2oliyat w il-arroz w il-7'obob w il-b2oliyat (ghir fool il-soy) w il-khodrawat.
gism il-ensan byestakhdem il-7'amas il-aminiya men il-akl 3ashan yisna3 il-broteenat.

w il-7a2i2a en gism il-ensan il-3ageeb bey3mel kol anwa3 il-mawad - men hormonat le 3'azalat w kholaya dem w enzimat w sha3r w 2azafir w 7agat ketir tanya - talama feeh nisb se7eya men il-7'amas il-aminiya.
kol il-aklat illy betetkallem 3anha feeh 7'amas aminiya, w beltaali feeh broteen benisab mokhtalifa.
bas 3ashan feeh 7'amas aminiya 2al men illy 7'atageenaha, dah mesh ma3nah enaha mafeha broteen khales.
3ala rigm men en il-broteen 3on9or ghizai mohem, bas gism il-ensan mesh 7'atageen kamya kbera zi ma enta momken tet5ayyal.
il-kamya il-mawso baha men il-broteen fe il-welayat il-mot7eda hi 0.8 gram/kilogram fe il-yom l-l-ba2leen.
il-kamya di betekfi e7tiyajat 97.5% men il-sakkan.
belnesba le set waznaha 57 kilogram, hi 7'ataga 46 gram broteen fe il-yom.
w belnesba le ragel waznoh 70 kilogram, howa 7'atageen 56 gram broteen fe il-yom.
w il-shakhs lazmo yakhod sa3rat 7'arariya kefaya 3ashan y7'afez 3ala waznoh fe il-7alatain dol.
il-nas illy bet3mel diet 7'atageen kamya akbar men il-broteen, 3ashan ghoz2 menha beyte7'ar 3ashan yetla3 ta2a.
il-rayadeyeen kaman 7'atageen kamya akbar shwaya men il-broteen.
il-nas 3ada beya2ool anwa3 mokhtalifa men il-akl, w beltaali byakhod il-7'amas il-aminiya illy 7'atageenaha 3ashan yisna3 il-broteen il-kaamel.
akeed law shakhs akal bas 3eish, howa 7'atageen 7'amdh amini asasi.
bas law nabatyeen 2adfoo il-b2oliyat lenizamhom il-ghizai, hye2daro y7'asloo 3ala kol il-7'amas il-aminiya il-asasiya illy 7'atageenaha 3ashan yefdalow as7a2.

magles il-ghiza2 w il-taghziya fe il-akadimeya il-wataniya l-l-3oloum (elly bey7addid il-kamiyat il-mawso baha men il-3on9or il-ghizaiya) bey7addid kamya kol 7'amdh amini asasi 7'atageenaha 3ashan nisma3 il-broteen il-kaamel.
bas mesh lazim netba3 il-kamiyat di belzabt, talama nizamna il-ghizai motanawwe3 w beyghati e7tiyagatna men il-broteen.
3ashan t7addid e7tiyagatak men il-broteen 7'sban il-kamiyat il-mawso baha, 2'asmem waznak bel-pound 3ala 2.2 3ashan t3raf waznak bel-kilogram, w ba3deen darab il-ra2am dah fe 0.8.
zi ma enta shayef, mesh sa3b ennak twasol lel-kamya il-yomeya il-mawso baha men il-broteen, talama nizamak il-ghizai feeh tanawwo3.
il-brouteenat il-na2isa mesh lazim tekoon masdar 9al2.
il-nabatyeen illy byakhdo brouteenat takmeelia 3ada bey2dro be-suhoola ywasool lel-kamya il-mawso baha men il-broteen.
law 3ayez ma3lomat aktar, momken te7'oz maw3ad ma3 akhsa2i taghziya 3ashan yes3adak tefham e7tiyagatak il-ghizaiya w ta7'a2ha.
elba7ethoon ekhtashoo en elno3 da el-aktr she23an men el-b6are2 fe el-qara el-qotbeeya el-gnoobeya bykoon mabsoot aktar lama ykoon fe tlj b7r a2al.
b6are2 3adeely bet2dr tesafar aktar 3an tary2 el-sba7a fe thoroof khaaleeya men el-tlj, w betwsel lel-akl bsohola aktar, dah elly l2etoh el-drasa.
3olamaa el-7aya el-qotbeeya 3areen men fatra en el-b6are2 betmayel en 3dd sakaneha yezid fe el-seneen elly feha tlj b7r qaleel, bs makanoosh 3areen leeh - l7ad delwa2ty.
el-6oyoor dee kamen bet3any men fashl ha2el fe el-tkather fe el-seneen elly feha akbr nmo lel-tlj el-b7r.
ba7ethen men el-ma3had el-qawmy el-yabany ll-bo7ooth el-qotbeeya 7a6oo ajeza tabe3 elektroneya 3ala 175 b6aree2 ma3 ajeza gps w kameraat fedyo khlal 4 mawasem mokhtalefa fe thoroof tlj el-b7r.
dah sam7 lohom enohm yetaba3oo el-b6are2 fe r7laathom, w ysnfo sokook el-mashi w el-sba7a w el-ra7a, w y2dro kamya el-farysa elly bts6adaha el-b6are2 2athna2 el-ghtas.
gal youki watanabe, men el-ma3had el-qawmy ll-bo7ooth el-qotbeeya: "belsbta lel-b6are2, el-sba7a asr3 arba3 mrat men el-mashi.
"momken ykoonoo rash2een fe el-maya bs hom bty2een gedan fe el-mashi 3ala el-ard.
"tla3 en el-b6are2 dee betkoon mabsota aktar lama ykoon fe tlj b7r a2al.
bs lama ykoon fe tlj b7r a2al, el-6oyoor dee bet2dr tghtas fe ay makan 3ayzah, w ghalban betd5ol el-maya gamn 3shasha bta3tha 3ala tool.
el-3olmaa by2oolo en dah by7'feth el-taqa w el-wa2t aktar w byw3'a n6a2 b7thohm 3n el-akl.
kaman dah momken y2'all el-mnafasah ma3 el-b6are2 el-tanya 3ala el-farysa w ysm7 lohm enohm ystado aktar men el-kreel - el-msadr el-ra2eesi le-ghaza2 el-b6are2.
tlj el-b7r el-a2al kamen y3ny en fe daw' shams aktar da5el el-maya, w dah by2'3y le-zahr 2akbr ll-blankton elly el-kreel betetghaza 3aleh.
bs dah byntbe2 bs 3ala el-b6are2 elly 3aysha fe el-jzo2 el-ra2eesi "el-qary" men el-qara el-qotbeeya el-gnoobeya.
elly by7sal 3'kooh ma3 el-b6are2 elly 3aysha 3ala shbh el-jazera el-qotbeeya el-raf3'a elly betbraz men el-qara aw 3aysha 3ala jzoorha.
el-drasa, elly etnasart fe magalet science advances, l2et en el-b6are2 momken tkoon esthlkt taqa a2al b-nsebt 15% l-33% fe el-mta7' w byst5dem el-taqa dee fe el-nmo w el-tkather.
fe el-3oqood el-2a5eera, el-qara el-qotbeeya shahdt zeyada thabeta fe mada tlj el-b7r beta3ha, 7atta ma3 el-3na2 el-qotb el-shmaley men en5efad mal7ooz, zy ma gal el-ba7thyn.
bs dah mesh motw23 enoh ystmr keteer bsbb el-taghyyr el-manawy, w el-qara el-qotbeeya kamen motw23 enha tshof en5efad fe tlj el-b7r beta3ha.

el talaba byb2o wa3yeen llesawteyat elly 3andhom mochkila fehael talaba 3adaan byb2o wa3yeen le masha'kel el n6a2 elly 3andhom, la2en modareeseehom aw ahlhom bey2ololhom 3ala el masha'kel de 3ala tool.

el talaba byb2o wa3yeen le masha'kel el n6a2 el shay2a 3and mot7adethey loghatohom el oula.
el talaba elly kanow bysma3o w yektebo kan 3andohom forsa enohom yelt2to el masha'kel el shay2a fe el fals 3an tewsel el kalam ma3 talaba tanya.

fe lughat elixir, te2dar tetktb fe melf gzip b2est5dam el-moodyool :zlib men maktebat erlang el-keyasiah.

mesal 3ala keyfiah el-ketabah fe melf gzip:defmodule mesal dorequire :zlibdef write_to_gzip_file(el-byanat, esm_el-melf) doel-melf = file.open(esm_el-melf, [:write, :binary])gz = :zlib.open(el-melf, [:gzip, :best_compression]):zlib.compress(gz, el-byanat):zlib.close(gz)file.close(el-melf)endendfe el-mesal dah, el-dalet write_to_gzip_file bet5od 7ojatayn: el-byanat (el-byanat ally hatetktb fe melf gzip) w esm_el-melf (esm melf gzip ally hatetktb feeh).
awl 7aga, el-dalet betfate7 melf gzip fe wad3 el-ketabt el-thnayeey b2est5dam file.open.
ba3d keda, betfate7 stream gzip b2est5dam :zlib.open, w betmarr el-melf w khayarat da5t gzip (:gzip bet2ol l :zlib test5dem da5t gzip, w :best_compression bet2olha test5dem a3la mostawa mn el-da5t).
ba3d keda, el-dalet bet3mel da5t l-el-byanat b2est5dam :zlib.compress w stream gzip.
akheeran, bet2afel stream gzip b2est5dam :zlib.close w bet2afel el-melf b2est5dam file.close.
la7ez ennak me7tag test5dem require :zlib fe el-moodyool beta3ak 3ashan test5dem moodyool :zlib.

joryan fe elkalema elra2eeseya fe elmo2tamar elsanawy elthameen lelkolya el5amsaweya lelmo7'talefeen jinsyan w elmot7'alefeen jinsyan fe kolyet hampshire: "ahna medyooneen be7ayateena kolha lelsetat elmot7'alefat jinsyan men elmolawween".
7'addar elmo2tamar 7'ales 400 taleb w a3da2 heya'et tadrees w afrad men elmagtem3 elmahaly, elly estamer yowmey 3 w 4 mars.
kolyet hampshire heya asghar w akter elkolyateen el5ams el7'atefeen taqaddomeya, w betetmayez be2akbalha lel6alaba as7ab elfikr elna6'eet.
men elbedaya, tam takhteet w edara elmo2tamar wassltan 3'eer talaba hampshire kastagaba lel7'otwa2 elly byshofooha fe magtem3'hom.
bet2ool emily remer, modera khadmet elmara'a w elmo7'talefeen jinsyan fe kolyet hampshire: "elmo2tamar dah momken ye7sal hena bas w fe elwa2t dah bas".
lawl marra, elmo2tamar leeh mawdoo3 w howwa "elba2a2".
betwadd7 remer enn elmawdoo3 dah tam ekhtyaro fe nafs wa2t elentekhabat elra2aseya elamrekeya kast ra2'ey 3'eer el7'eetab elly tam tawjeehoh le magtem3' lgbtq men 7amlet trump/pence w ansaro.

fe a3mal shoghoob stonewall fe 1969, zabayyen bar lelmo7'talefeen jinsyan fe madina new york 9awemoo eldarabat w elghar2at elrooteenyya lelshor6a 3'eer elbarat elly kanet malaz lel3omala eljenseyeen w a3'za2 magtem3' elmo7'talefeen jinsyan.
marsha johnson, set mot7'alafa jinsyan men elmolawween, kanet gowa bar stonewall lama elshor6a hejmet 3'alyeh.

johnson w zabayen elbar elta7'een (keteer menhom kanet setat mot7'alefat bymarso elda3ara w gayeen bar stonewall 3ashan yestarkho w yeshawfo magtem3'hom ba3d layla sheghl fe elshare3) 9awemoo ela7'tezal.

khaleena netkalem 3an el-kewords el-sabe3a, w-t7deedan el-kewords el-sabe3a el-masetera.

el-keword el-sabe3 el-masetir howa elly hte2ableh ghaleban fe most mousika el-rock w-el-blues, w-3amaan fe el-moseeka el-sha3beyya, fedah no3 el-keword elly lazzem tet3allemoh w-t7'od fe3lah awel ma tentakel lel-kewords el-sabe3a el-kebeera w-el-tanawayat el-tanya lel-kewords.
tab3an, abl ma tet3allem el-kewords di, lazzem tet3allem awalan ashkal el-kewords el-asasia lel-piano.
ba3d ma tet3allem el-kewords el-asasia di, et3allem kewords el-bar ba3d keda 3al-piano.
w-ba3deen 2arg3 hena w-et3allem el-kewords el-sabe3a.
zay ma 2olt, ehna bnetkalem t7deedan 3an el-kewords el-sabe3a el-masetera hena.
men khaberti, mograed taseem el-kewords di "kewords sabe3a" howa amr ma2bool ela 7ad kbeer.
fe anwa3 tanya men el-kewords el-sabe3a, laken lama el-nas bet2ool "keword sabe3", bey2oono 3adaan betkalemo 3an el-keword el-sabe3 el-masetir.
eih howa el-keword el-sabe3?

fa7na bnetkalem 3an el-talathe 3adi (1, 3, 5) be2ezafat ela sabe3.

el-keword el-sabe3 el-masetir howa mograed sabe3 maset7.
fe el-sollam el-kebeer, fe nisf nagma (freet wahid) been el-sabe3 w-el-darja el-asasia.
fa el-sabe3 el-maset7 bey7sal law 7e6eet nagma kaamila (freetain) been el-sabe3 w-el-darja el-asasia.
hal-tana2om bey5aleq nashaz bafdal el-treeton been el-darja el-talta w-el-sabe3a men el-sollam.
el-keword el-sabe3 el-masetir bey7sal tabee3ean lel-keword elly byesta7'ed 3al-darja el-khamesa men el-sollam el-kebeer w-el-darja el-sabe3a men el-sollam el-sagheer el-tabe3y.
felo betdarab 3al-do, el-keword jee hay7tawi tabee3ean 3al-keword el-sabe3 el-masetir.
ma3a keda, fe el-moseeka el-sha3beyya, hatshoof ghaleban el-kewords el-sabe3a el-masetira mostakhdema fe agneya kaamila bighad el-darja 3an darja el-sollam.
ezzay tetdarab 3al-kewords el-sabe3aet3allem 3al-kewords di zay ma bett3allem 3ala ay keword tani.
law enta bel-f3l metamken men el-ashkal el-asasia lel-kewords el-mofte7a w-ashkal kewords el-bar, el-ashkal di mesh hatkoon sa3ba 3aleek.
zay el-kewords el-tanya, bas et2akkad en kol el-negmat bet6el3 bishakel kaamel.
5od wa2tak fe el-awal.
ashkal el-kewords el-sabe3a 3al-pianodi ba3d el-rawabet el-sare3a lel-ashkalla7ez en mafeesh ay ashkal kewords soghayara hena.
3ashan ehna bnetkalem t7deedan 3an el-kewords el-sabe3a el-masetira hena.
el-soghayara bet7tawi tabee3ean 3al-sabe3 el-maset7, laken dah beyte3abar sabe3 soghayar badalan men sabe3 masetir.
ma3a keda, bema en el-keword el-sabe3 el-masetir w-el-keword el-sabe3 el-soghayar homa el-etnein sabe3 maset7 men 7eit el-darja el-asasia lel-keword, fahma nafs el-nagma.
y3ni law 3ebt el-ashkal el-soghayara lel-kewords elly hatteba3ha, el-sabe3 el-maset7 haykoon fe nafs el-makan.
ezzay tel3eb keword e7 3al-pianokholeena nbed2 be-keword e7 w-shakloh el-3am.
fe makanin tel2a feehom el-keword el-sabe3 el-masetir fe el-shakl dah.
makan wahid tel2ah feeh howa 3al-watar el-rabee3 w-el-makan el-tani howa 3al-watar el-tani.
el-etnein mawgoodeen fe el-rasm el-tawde7y (w-kaman nuskha el-bar tab3an).
ana shakhseya ba7eb al3eb el-sabe3 3al-watar el-tani 3ashan ba7es enoh bey6el3 shwaya aktar fe el-keword, laken howa shwaya as3ab fe el-3eb, khososan law bar.
e7tara7y howa ennak tet3awwed 3al-etnein 3ashan ykoonow mawgoodeen 3andak w-te2dar tel3ebhom zay ma ynasebak.
ahyanan hat7es en wahid feehom bey6el3 a7san men el-tani, 3al-7asb el-agneya.

bey6el3 3al-watar el-rabee3 w-el-watar el-awal.
tani, et3awwed 3al-etnein 3ashan homa beenfa3o fe mawaqeef mokhtalafa.

fe el-shakl dah, ana ba7eb al3eb el-sabe3 3al-watar el-awal 3ashan dah bey5alleeh momte3/sahl ennak taghyro le-keword d be3mel bar 3al-awal talat awtar w-ba3deen b-estekhdami sab3y el-tani aw el-talet 3al-freet el-talet men el-watar el-tani.
w-ba3deen, ma3a taqadomak, bet3'ani bishakel 3am been keword a w-keword d.

a7san el-mamarekat fe el-edrak wel-wazayef el-tanfeedeya le ta3zeez el-mosharka (elfasal 35)el-mo2alefoon we tatawor el-ta3leem el-mostamir: winifred sholtz-kron, phd, otr/l, otd, faota we helen polatajko, phd, ot, fcaot, fcahsa7sal 3ala 0.15 wihda ta3leem mostamir men el-gam3eya el-amrekeya lel-3elaj el-mehni (1.88 wihda tatawor mehni men el-majles el-watani lel-mosadaka 3ala el-3elaj el-mehni/1.5 sa3a etsall)el-dawara di mabneya 3ala elfasal 35 men el-manshoor el-akthar bey3'a lel-gam3eya el-amrekeya lel-3elaj el-mehni, a7san el-mamarekat lel-3elaj el-mehni fel-madaris.
ma3 el-dawara di, hatet3allem ezay tera3y el-3egz fel-wazayef el-tanfeedeya lel-talaba elly 3andohom e7teyat akademeya aw selokeya aw wezefeya.
fe as2ela emte7an motawafra le taqyeem ta3leemek.
3end etmam el-dawara di, el-mot3alem hayekon 2ader 3ala:- el-tamyeez beyn el-3anaser el-ra2eeseya lel-wazayef el-tanfeedeya wel-me7'arate el-ma3refeya el-3amma.
- tahdeed ezay melahaza el-3egz fel-wazayef el-tanfeedeya 3and el-atfal fel-senn el-madrasi.
- monagsha el-far2 beyn el-me7'arate el-tanfeedeya el-7ara we el-bardah.
- wasf el-mezarat el-mohmma lel-tawjeh el-ma3refi lel-ad2 el-wazefi el-yewmi (co-op) elly byed3em el-wazefa el-tanfeedeya.
et3allem aktar 3an el-dawar el-zayeda el-motawafra lel-a7san el-mamarekat lel-3elaj el-mehni fel-madaris.
moharero el-ta3leem el-mostamir: gloria frolek clark, phd, otr/l, otd, faota we barbara e.

"kma thal llnashdat el-gada lelly tm tawjeha mara w mara mn 2abl mba3'oothen el-konfedralya llqabayel el-hendyya el-mokhtalafa 3ashan y7afezaw 3la wala2hom llgnob, ha2teslak el-5etab el-taly, welly tm ersal nso5 menno 3n tary2 mrasleen kha5'een lkol el-qabayel el-mazkora.
mo2alef el-5etab, el-sayed s.
skot, tm ta3eenoh mn 2eferzon dayves kmfawed kha5' lel-qabayel el-hendyya:"al-welayat el-konfedralya el-amrekeyya,wezara el-7'ar, maktab sha2on el-hend,rychmond, feregneya, 26 desamber 1862.

ela sha3'b el-shokto, wel-shekasao, wel-tcheroky, wel-krek, wel-semynol,wejme3 el-2omam wel-qabayel el-hendyya el-tanya el-sadeka llkonfedralya:la2ad 3odt ll-tw le-rychmond, 3asemat welayat el-konfedralya, mn baladkom el-gameela.
lezyaretkom, safert akter mn setmeyet meel fe el-ashhor el-arba3'a el-2a5'era.

rayes welayat el-konfedralya, elly bey7ebkom gedan, amerny bel-2a2am behazeh el-re7la, 3ashan ashofkom fe byotkom, w atkalem ma3akom wogha le-wogha, 3ashan te7sal el-7okoma 3la m3lomat 2akedda w mawthoo2a fe 3'alat e7teyatkom w dororatakom, w 7ala baladkom.
kholal eqamety fe 2eqlym el-hend, feen ma 3ameltony bekol le6f w wud, kan leya mo7adathat motakera ma3a el-keteer menkom.
el-7a2ay2 elly 7aselt 3aleha menkom fe el-moqa'abat de kanet met2afera fe zakarty, w seyetbla3 3aleha bel-kamel l-7okoma.
fel-wa2t el-7ali, we2a3'ab fe qawl b3'ad el-kalemat el-2a5'era lekom, w ana wa2'3 men enkom hatwoloonha el-e3tebar el-wa6'y.
fe bdayet 3am 1861, tm ersal el-ganral albert bayk, mn arkansas, kmfawed le-baladkom le-sharh el-7a2ay2 el-met3al2a be-tanzeem el-7okoma el-konfedralya, w le-talab med yad el-salam wel-sada2a leha.
bmwgeb el-soltana el-mamnoha leeh, w 2abl nehayet el-3am, 2abrem mo3ahadat ma3a kolkom.
el-mo3ahadat de etsadd2et bsooroh menn sena7'etha, be-keda b2etom 7laf2a llwelayat el-konfedralya.
el-7okoma, 3and 2ebram el-mo3ahadat de ma3akom, ra3et rafahyetakom w sa3adetkom b2oddem rafahyeta w sa3adeta.
bel-2eshar le-el-mo3ahadat de, hatla2y en kol band feha el-3adala wel-karam.
betetman7o 3'eir 7'alas men el-7'o2oq wel-emteyazat elly etman3et menkom b2estmar ta7t el-7okoma el-2adyma.
be-2oshoor, bmwgeb shoroot el-mo3ahadat de, betet7'atoh fe mkanet 3alya w refe3a - mkanet mnasba le-7adaretkom w taqadomkom, w mnasba le-kobery2akom w este2lalakom.
betetman7o ta3een mendoobeen fe el-kongres, welly m7'ashtem el-7'aleseya fe morakabat w 7'ameyet masalehkom.
tm tawfeer ensha2 el-7'awatem benkom, 3ashan matet7'atarosh tethabbo le-7'awatem el-welayat el-moga'ara le-7'sol 3la el-3'ada2, laken momken te7'odoha fe byotkom.
tm da3' el-kol el-2'amwal el-mosta7'a lekom, sawa2 men el-7okoma el-2adyma aw ay mn el-welayat el-ly kanet betshakelha.
tm da3' 7'yzetkom w estemtakom el-salamy wel-monqata3 be-baladkom lel-abad, w tm t3'od kowet el-7okoma el-konfedralya be-m3awenetkom fe el-da3' 3anha fe kol el-2'awatem w 2ed el-2'ada2.

mn 6ab3yet el-mo3ahadat de, beyb2a en rab6et el-sada2a elly etshaklet ben el-welayat el-konfedralya w nafsakom lazem tefadel lel-abad, w men el-2aked en dah hay7'sol; le2en b2oddem el-2asbab elly etz'aret fe3lan, fe asbab tanya 2awyya gedan be-te7'ally keda.
en sha3'b el-welayat el-konfedralya homa as7'abkom w 2e5'otkom be-kol ta2'ked.
ento genobeyeen be-kol ma3na el-kalema.
el-genob kan maw6en 2abatkom.

1 yunyo 2021 โ ba7ethin bey2olu en el botagazat el gaz momken tetla3 mostawayat men akasid el nitrojin w molwethat tanya l el-hawa el da5ly betheyej el re2a.
el 5abar el 7elw en fe 7al sahel.
derasa gededa bet2ol en tshghyl el marwa7a w el tab5 3ala el botagazat el khalfeya momken y2allal mostawayat tlouth el hawa benesf el kemea.
el 5abar el wa7sh en aktar maraw7 el taweeya mesh bet5ales el moshkela tamaman.
"elly ehna shayfenoh en shafatat el botagaz momken tekon fa3ala bnesba 60 aw 70 fe el mya law etsammemt sa7 aw etest5demt sa7, w dah kwayyes.
bas mesh fa3ala bnesba 98 fe el mya", bey2ol glenn morrison, phd, mohandes by2y fe game3a missouri l el 3oloum w el teknologia fe rolla, missouri.
dah lesa so2al lazzem sa7eb el beyt yefaker feeh".
morrison beyedres tlouth el hawa el da5ly, bas howa mesh moshterek fe el ba7th el 7ali.
ekhtabar maraw7 el taweeya fawk el botagazat el gazfe el derasa, elly etnasart fe magalet el 3oloum w el teknologia el by2eya, el ba7thin 2asoo 2ad2 shafatat el botagaz.

ekhtabarou kafa2a el taqa w 2ad2 el shafatat fe el 2etla2 molwethat el hawa zy akasid el nitrojin, awel 2oksid el karbon, el formaldehyde, w jasemat el sokham el fa2et el daka elly betentegaha sh3alat w afran el gaz.

as3ar el shafatat betetrawa7 men 40 le 7ad 650 dollar.
kol an7'em el shoft masmema 3shan tetla3 el hawa le el khareeg.

el nizam elly shaghal a7san fe tanqyet el hawa kan 3ali gedan le daraga eno kan beyeman3 el kalam el 3ady.

bas kol an7'em el shoft shaghalet a7san fawk el botagazyn el khalfyeen fe botagaz b 4 sh3alat.

"law betetba5 3ala el sh3alat el amameya w teshghl el marwa7a, momken teshyel 25 fe el mya men el tlouth, bas law teba5t 3ala el sh3alat el khalfeya hatshyel dafa3 el kemea", bey2ol el ba7eth brett singer, phd, mohandes madany w by2y fe mokhtar lawrence berkeley el watany fe berkeley, california.

fe awail 3ahd osret han, ta3allam el-7akem ders mawt sheen, w 2alla min 2a2ema el-foo, laken osret han est2ajarat el-ard w kanet el-darayeb theqela.

darayeb el-2osra) bo2 aw el-kanab, lazem kaman yes5em 3ay el-5edma w el-5edma el-3askreya.

w kaman fe 5asayyer ghyr mobashara w sa3ba eltaqdeer, bas 7ajmha kbeer.
elfyoodat elmotakera fe baladna, w elly betzid kaman, bet5ale2 fekra ghalat en elfyoodat betzid fe el7ajm w el3add.

bas elzyada fe el5asayyer mesh besabab fyoodat akbar aw aktar, laken besabab zyada esty7'an dafaaf elanhar w awdeetoh belmdon w elbldat w elmasan3 w elkoobary w elskak el7adeedyya w eltarak, w zyada estekhdam elanhar kmasdar lelmaya lelmdon w elsn3at w eltaqa w elry w elmal7a w eltarfeyeh.
salama el7aya w taqleed el5asayyer elmobashara w ghyr elmobashara men elfyoodat momken tet7'a2 3an teery2 etkhath e7'ra2at lelhamaaya w elt7'am.
bas lazem yetfahem kways en mafeesh taree2a wa7da lesytera 3al elfyoodat hatdamen 7amaaya mnte2a tasreef kbeera.

"ta7seen elqanawat eltabee3ya; benna2 elsood - elly momken tekoon munasba lelry w eltaqa; benna2 elsood zy elly mawgooda delwa2ty 3al mississybee; e3ada elta7reeg w taghyeer ba3d elmnt2at men zera3a ma7asol le zera3a 3ashab, kol de momken te3'amer door fe ebta2 tadafoo elmaya lelba7r, aw fe eba3adaha 3an elmdon w elbldat w elardi elqeyma." (taqreer leganet wady elmississybee, eltab3a eltanya, saf7a 3, 1934.)"deraset syasa wataneya lesytera 3al elfyoodat lazem te3taref en jowaaneb elsytera 3al elfyoodat fe ay mo3'amar, sway kaan hadaf ra2eesi aw thanawy, lazem yet2am fe daw2 derasa wase3a betekhad fe el2a3tebar kol elahdaaf aw el7tmalat eltanya.
men elahdaaf de momken tekoon eltaqa w elmal7a w elry; momken tekoon elt7'am fe elmaya elmon7'afaa w tawfeer elmaya w elmagarey aw eltakhles men elmakhlafat.
lama ykoon fe aktar men hadaf, lazem kol hadaf yetfahem fe 3alaqatoh beba2y elahdaaf.

bas bel6areeqa de momken net6awwar mo3'amar moneaseq kways." (nafs elmarja3, saf7a 27.)fe takteet a3mal el3ama el3ama lel7amaaya men elfyoodat, w fe rabt ela3mal de bel2ste3mal elfa3al lelmaya elanhar lelahdaaf elmokhtalafa elly etzakart fo2, fe motatalabeen asaseeyeen: (1) sijlat da2e2a w motawa7a le mostawa w tadafoo elfyoodat elsab2a, w (2) tateweer tarak le t7'leel elbeyanaty de, 3shan tahdeed tekrar elfyoodat elly 7asalet abl keda w taqdeer 7ajm w tekrar elfyoodat fe elmosta2bal.

w bey2oolo kaman enhom heyshteghlo ma3 ba3d fe magal el sena3'at el madanya, ya3ny hyta3awno fe magalat keteer zy el taqa el gededa wel motajadeda, w hy3'maloo ma7atat taqa shamsya w taqa re7, w nezam tarshid estekhlaas el taqa w el ma2a wel kahraba2.

w balnesba lanzmat el moraqaba welta2meen, hey3'maloo shabakat anzma etfa2 w enzar jowa el mo2assasat w el mabany el 7okoomeya, w herakbo kamerat moraqaba w aghezzt tasgeel, w bawabat amniya w aghezzt kesf 3an el madan w el motafajrat.

w kaman heyshteghlo 3ala t7seen el be2a, hey3'maloo 7aweyat zamma w afran fo7m nabaaty sa7bety llb2a, w mahareq llnfayat el tabeeya el khedra, w m3'addat le tadoor el makhlefat, w 3arabeyat le raf3 el makhlefat w naql el zamma w tanzeef el shaware3.

w balnesba le m3'alaga el ma2a, hey3'maloo ma7atat t7'leeyet ma2a el bahr, w tanqeyat ma2a el shorb, w m3'alaga ma2a el 9arf el se7'y w ma2a el abyar.
ya3ny hyes3'do fe 7al mochklet el ma2a kaman.
w bey2oolo enhom heyshteghlo 3ala el ab7'aath el fenneya w eltatawer, w dah mohem 3ashan yt6awaro el sena3'a beta3etna w njary el tatawer elly fe el 3alam.

w besara7a ana shaifa en el t3awon dah mohem gedan, w khososan en kol men wazaret el en7'raaz el 7arby w el hay'a el 3arabeya lltasne3 3andhom emkanyat tasne3eya w ba7'eya 3alya, w kawader basharyya motamayezza, w dah hey5aleehom y2adro yenfetho el mashro3at de fe el tawqeetat el mo7adda w begaoda 3alya.
w kaman hey5alleehom y5alelo mntagat motaba2a llmo3'eyar el 3alameya w bas3ar kwayesa, w dah hayfyd el balad w ygazeb estethmarat aganebeya.

w bey2oolo kaman en el t3awon dah emteda2 llt3awon elly kan mawgood benhom abl keda fe magalat tanya zy el electronyat w nezam el ma3lomat, w tasne3 aghezzt teknologya w aghezzt etsal, w tasne3 el tablet el t3leemy le wazaret el tarbeyya w el t3leem.

khilal 2eset-hom (2eset esabet amanda w estekhdamha leltekno 3ashan tekmel shaghl-ha) 2addamo 7ojoum-hom elra2eesya: eltekno betzood 2oderna 3ala 3amal etsalat, wel etsalat betsa3edna net3allem bishakel aseel w mobtaker akter.
ba3d keda galna trevor w matt be7ojoum-hom el2eftetahya elmo3arada lel mawdoo3.
kanet tajroba momte3a fe3lan enny asma3 etneen a3raf-hom mo2yedeen leltekno fe elfesl yen2ashou da7d 2e7timaleyyet enaha betzood elta3lem.
adaa2-hom kan mozahal.
tanfeeth-hom (le7ad ekhtiyar khafeya elzoom w elbadel elmotashabaha) kan momtaz.
no2at-hom kanet mol7oza.

bas fe nafs elwa2t, 7aset en-hom kanou beyte3'abou 3ashan yen2ashou wog'et nazar-hom, besabab mawfe2-hom elly kan bey7awel yerag3 elta3leem le3azamet-o tani (make education great again) - ma3a eltweetyat elmazefa w keda.
momken yekon ra2y mo7ayaz besabab 2020, bas law bet3'ayyar fe eltweetyat - momken yekon 3andak 7oga sa3ba fel 3ard.
2etrou7et-hom elra2eesya 3an estekhdam eltalaab leltekno badal eltafkeer elnaqdy kanet moltafa fe3lan.
fe bdayet elfesl sawetna, w 6al3 en aglabe elfesl mo2tan3 en eltekno fe3lan betzood elta3lem.
ba3d el7ojoum, w ba3d elraddod men eltarafein (elly kanet mokhtasara bishakel mozahal w shakhsya shwaya) delna fe monaqasha 3amma 3an el mawdoo3.
akter 7aga estafedt-ha men elnaqash:- ketir menna beyfekrou fe eltekno 3ala enaha tatbeqat ferdya aw anzhma edara ta3leem mo7adada.
akber entekadat kan 3an mo'akhel 7al elmo'akhel w 3adam emkaneyyet elwasol lel talaab men mokhtalef el2a3mar w elqodrat.
- ehna ben3teref en eltekno magarad ada, mesh heya elta3leem nafso, bas heya el taree2a.

ba3d ba3d el7ojoum el5atameya, elly feha eltarafein rakozou 3ala no2at-hom elra2eesya, sawetna tany.
nas ketir sawet en elnaqash ghayar ra2y-hom!

ana 2aret ketab gamd gedan esmoh "elmalek elzahaby 3alam toot 3ankh aamon" lldoktuur zahy hawas, ally howa 3alem 2athar kbeer we mo7taram.
elketab dah etnashar belrussy, we targaamtoh elbena we gozel we maryam, we rag3toh eldoctora elianora yefimovna koremshieva.
elketab dah begad mawsou3a thaqafeya kbeera, we targaamoh men el3araby llerussy 3ashan yed3amoo elthaqafa elmasreya elrussy.
beyetkallem 3an akteshaf maqbara elmalek toot 3ankh aamon fe 4 november 1922, we bey7telfo be moroor 100 sana 3ala elakteshaf dah fe 2022.
hay3amloo nadawa 3an elketab fe ma3rad elqahera eldawly llketab youm 30 yanayer elsa3a 1:30 elzahr fe plaza raqm 1, 2a3et elmaktaba eladabeya.

elketab bey7eky 2eset el3asr elzahaby, ya3ny elfatra ally kanat feha masr we mostamarataha fe aman we ta7t se7taha, welzahab kan malyan felkhazaneen, welmolook kanu beytegawzo banat a3da2ohom el2adama badal ma y7arboohm.
elketab feh tafaseel 3an moqtaneat maqbara toot 3ankh aamon ally sajalha el3alem elenglezy howard carter.
toot 3ankh aamon dah b2a malek fe awakhir elthawra eldeeneya beta3et elmalek akhnaton we howa lessa tefl, we mat abl ma yekbar.
elmoqtaneat dee bet5aleena na3raf 3an 7ayato el2aseera, bas zy ma 2al howard carter, logz 7ayato lessa ghammad.
3ashan keda 3ashan nefham 7ayaat elmalek eltefl dah, lazma neraga3 qroon lwara le3asr elmolook elmo7arebeen el3azam ally banaw el2empratora.

w kaman 2al en elketab heytba3 fe ma3rad elqahera llketab sana 2022 3ashan ye7telfo be moroor 100 sana 3ala akteshaf elmaqbara, we dah 3ashan yeshage3 elsay7a elrussyya fe masr ally feha kanooz atharya wthaqafeya kteer.

elmo2assa elmasreya elrussyya lllthaqafa wel3oloom hatsharek fe ma3rad elketab bketab kteer 3an eltarikh welthaqafa wel7adara wel3oloom w3elm elmasreyeen, wmenha ketab "mo3gizat elharam elakbar" lldoktuur zahy hawas.
begad elketab dah momtez gedan, we bey5aleena na3raf aktar 3an tar5ena el3areeq, we bey2akad en masr feha kanooz lazma el3alam kollo ya3rafha.
ansa7 ay 7ad me7tamy beltarikh wel2athar eno yegraah, w mstany ashoofkoom felnadawa fe ma3rad elketab.
eh elly bymizz elthaqafa el afro-american delw2ty?
elthaqafa el afro-american momken tttshaaf kagza2 men elthaqafa elamrekeya w kamman kthaqafa mnfslah.
men ayam tegarat el3'aba2d, elafareka w el afro-american sahew fe elthaqafa elamrekeya men khilal eladab wel fen welkhbra elzera3eya welakl welmusiqy walla2a.
w 7ata abl ma el3'obodyah ttlghy, el afro-american kanw m3roofen be3abqaryet'hom elthaqafeya.
w 3la r2m enhom fe kteer men el'a7'yan kanw m'gbrin 7rfyan enhom y2ledw ta2aled asyad el3'aba2d beta3'thom, ella en el3'aba2d el afro-american kanw lsa bymarsa2o ma3te2adat'hom fel ser.
elnaharda, yemken aktar sha5l mmyz llthaqafa el afro-american momken tshofoh men khilal t3beer'hom 3n elfen elmusiqy.
anwa3 elmusiqa elly btmdl elthaqafa el afro-american bshkl afdl hya elhip hop welrap welblues welr&b welgospel.
nas kteer btshof anwa3 elmusiqa de 3la enha m'gred dwa2'a mz3ja, laken fe el7'a2eya hya t3beer 3n no3 mn eltamyez elsyasy aw el2ejtma3y aw eltaba2y.
elshakl dah men elta3beer byrga3 wra lezmn el3'obodyah lama el afro-american kanw byst5dmw ta'leef el'aghany kwsyla llra7a el2ejtma3ya.
kanw byktb'w 'aghany bel'l'2at'hom el'aslyah betwsef masha3'rhom tjah elwad3 elly kanw bet3'rdo leh, w asyad el3'aba2d, w ttwl 7yathom.

law 3ndk elwasayel enk tdres anwa3 elmusiqa de elly btmdl elthaqafa el afro-american elnaharda, hb2a wadh gedan en el'aghany de btfdakrna en elmady wel7adr mertabtein bshkl wadh lama ygy el'amr l'fhm ma3any elmusiqa el afro-american.
eltrkeez 3la ella2a bywda7 azay elmojtama3at el afro-american bta3rf nafs'ha wel3laqa bthaqafa elbyda2a elmheymna fe amreka.
fe el7'a2eya, kteer men kalemat el'aghany el afro-american bthawl testakhaf el3la2at elly elmojtama3 elabyad shark feha m3 el afro-american le'ajyal kteera le7ad elnaharda.

el musiqa el afro-american momken tkoun wa7da men aktar elta2thyrat elthaqafeya el afro-american entsharan fe amreka elnaharda, w heya men aktar el'anwa3 elmusiqya elmheymna fe elmusiqa elsha3'eya elsa2eda.
anwa3 elmusiqa zy elhip hop welr&b welfunk welsoul weltechno w anwa3 mosiqya amrekeya 7adetha kteer tanya l2t asool'ha fe elmojtama3at eswda2.
fbaltaaly, bsbb sh3beyetha w rbma 7ata tbe3'etha, kteer men el afro-american byst5dmw el'anwa3 elmusiqya de 3shan y3rfou sh5syt'hom el5asa.
elnaharda kan yom malyan a7'bar mohema fe wazaret el-eskan wel-maraafeq wel-mogtama3at el-3omraneya, wel-hey2at el-taabe2a leha.
ana kmowaten masry mhtam dayman bel-akhbar ellly bet5os el-tatweer fe baladna, we khososan fe magal el-eskan wel-maraafeq.
elnaharda el-doktor 3asem el-gazar, wezeer el-eskan wel-maraafeq wel-mogtama3at el-3omraneya, 2adem taqreer 3an el-masharee2 ellly etnafethat fe madent 3ashr ramadan fe 2021.

el-w7da de hatwafar khadmet tajdeed tar5ees w-f7'as el-mora7'at le ay makan fel-gomhoreya, w-kaman khadmet el-27'wal el-madanya fe nafs el-mawke3.

el-est3'la3 el-demoghrafy wel-se7y le-ganoub afreeka 2016, elly kan maghood ta3awony ben el-gihaz el-markazy lel-ta3be'a el-3amma wel-2e7sa2 fe ganoub afreeka we barnamg el-est3'la3 el-demoghrafy wel-se7y el-3alami, ghatte kaman el-3onf el-manzaly wel-3onf el-mabny 3ala el-naw3 el-ejtem3y.

3ala ragm men el-7amayate el-dustoreya, el-3onf el-mabny 3ala el-naw3 el-ejtem3y lissa mostamer we montasher fe ganoub afreeka wel-3onf did el-setat bey7sal 3aber kol el-teba2at el-ejtem3eya wel-eqtesadeya wel-2a2raq wel-2a3mar wel-adyan.

el-na2eb zak mbele men el-t7alof el-democraty, talab el-gelsa el-3ajela ba3d zyada jarayem el-3onf did el-setat wel-atfal fe el-2asab3' elly fatet.

7asab mela7'zat magles el7'oboob elamreeky, mante2teen men montajeen elzara fe elseen 3'ano men gafaf we 7asharat kefaya 3ashan ye2alelo el7'amas el2awmey lel zara 7'ales 39-79 melyon booshel men ejmali elsanah elly fatet elly kan 5.48 melyar booshel.
gawla magles el7'oboob elamreeky lel zara fe elseen 2006 2a2det 7'amas elzara fe elseen, we 6al3et bente2'ej mokhtaleta we en5efad koli.

"shofna thoroof kwayesa 3omoman fe shmal shar2 elseen, elly heya el mante2a elly 3ada tazer3 zara akter men elly momken test5odmo fe el mante2a", bey2ool eldoctor todd mayer, mudeer magles el7'oboob elamreeky fe bekeen, elseen.

"laken ana shaif en el7'amas el2a2al elly etsha2fet fe sa7el shmal elseen we ba2ey elseen he3awed ay magaseb et7'a2et fe elshmal elshar2y."mayer shaif en eltalab 3ala el3'alaaf fe elseen mostamer, ma3a zeyada sakkan el7'odor elly bey6alebo akter men el la7'om wel laban wel bayd.
"kol da bey2'ody lenmo2 awqa fe eltalab, we 7'ales 7'ales ehna mesh motawa23een en 7'amas elzara heywakab eltalab da", bey2ool mayer.

fe shmal shar2 elseen, elly benteg 7'ales 40% men 7'amas elzara el2awmey, el7'amas fadelt 7'ales 4-5% aktar, laken elgafaf wel7asharat darro bel7'amas fe sa7el shmal elseen we walaaya wa7da 3'anet men en5efad fe elentaaj benesba 25% be3'osab gafaf shadeed.
ma3a erta3a2 as3ar elzara fe elseen, elzara elamreekeya 7'a2et adaa2 kwayes feek fe elsayef da.
fe elshohor el2'a7'era, 7'amleen 7'asoos elta3reefa elgamrekeya estawrado 7'ales 2.36 melyon booshel men elzara elamreekeya.
3ala ragam en elmoshtareen elseenyeen bey7ebo jawda we etsaaq elzara elamreekeya, mayer bey2ool en elsa3r howa elmeta7: "heya 3ala2a sa3r lama yege el2amr lesteyrad elzara elamreekeya.
law elzara elamreekeya ar5as men elzara elseeneyya, momken yestawradoha."

belsabba le nizam tashgeel mubasher zy slax, ehna fe3lan mesh me7tageen ne7'azz aktar men keda le ay 3amaliya mo7adada.
law 3ayez te7'azz aktar, hatestakhdem nizam tashgeel tani 3ala ay 7al.

3youb tanya momken tekoon en lamma el-barnamijat bettetgamm3 le nizam 32-bit, mesh hatestakhdem ba3d el-2awamir el-ahdar (w el-afdal akid) elly betkoon motahia bas le nizam 64-bit el-gdeed, w mesh motahia le nizam zy i486, w b3d keda momken ykoon fe khsara fe el-2ad2.

ana baftared en dah mesh haykoon moshkela kebira le nizam tashgeel mubasher zy slax tani, le2enno law el-mostakhdem fe3lan me7tag ye7'a2 ad2 2edafi, howa aw heya hatestakhdem nizam tashgeel tani 3ala ay 7al.

ennek ykoon 3andak nuskha wa7da men slax (nizam tashgeel 32-bit, ma3 na2a 64-bit 2edafya, w de btzed 7awaly 20 mega bas le 7ajem nizam el-tashgeel el-koli), haywafar 3alaya 7awaly 40% men wa2t el-ta3meer elly me7tagah 3ashan a3mel w awaz3 nuskhatein mokhtalefin 32+64, fa akid ana mot7ames agarab dah.
kaman dah bey5alli el-garaar ashal lel-mostakhdemeen, elly mesh me7tageen yehtemou bel-me3mariya, w momken yestakhdemo slax wa7da 3ala kol ajhazhom be kol aman.
ya reet te2olli ra2yek fe el-mawdoo3 dah.
ba2a el doctor el sayed el badwi bey2ool en nezam mubarak kan deemoqrateya?
de 7aga ted7ak wallah.
ya3ny howa 7adretah kan 3ayesh ma3ana fe nafs el balad walla kan fe kawkab tany?
ana ba2a ya sedy, sett beet masreya men sa3eed masr, men 2esm jarja fe sohag.
w 3omry ma shoft deemoqrateya fe 3ahd mubarak walla ghyro.
howa ehna kan 3arfyn 7aga 3an tadawl el solta de gher fe el kotob?
nezam mubarak kan kolo ma7soobeyat w fasad, w el solta kant fe eed kam wa7ed bas, w elly yetkalem yet2asemn aw yet3azeb.
w ba3deen howa ya3ny eh kanoon entekhabat ma3eeb?
howa 7adretah kan 3ayez kanoon eh belzabt?
ana mesh fahma besara7a, bas elly a3rafoh en el thawra 2amat 3ashan negar el nezam el gdeed kollo, mesh 3ashan nerga3 nentakheb nafs el nas tany.
w eh 7ekaya en el kanoon hay7rem elly sharko fe el thawra men el tamtheel el parlamany?
la abadan, howa 7adretak 3ayez tet2amen 3ala eh hnak belzabt?
ehna 3ayzeen nas gededa temselna, nas sharkt fe el thawra w 3arfa matalebna.
w ba3deen ana mesh fahma ya3ny eh "laken loun amamhom sawa el e7tejaaj"?
howa 7adretah beyshage3 3al e7tejaaj walla eh?
ehna 3ayzeen 7olool mesh e7tejaagat.
el nas ta3bat men ketr el e7tejaagat w el 3etesaamat.
ehna 3ayzeen nas temselna fel barlaman w te3melna kanoon y7meena w y7mey 7o2o2na.
w ba3deen ya3ny eh "da3a el ra2ees el-sisi le e3adet el nazar fe el kanoon"?
howa 7adretah mesh fahim el kanoon walla eh?
ana mesh 3arfa besara7a, bas elly a3rafoh enna 3ayzeen kanoon entekhabat 3adel, yedmem tamtheel kol fatat el sha3b, mesh kanoon y5dem masaleh nas mo3ayna.
besara7a, ana mesh motaba3a awy el syasa, bas elly bashofoh w elly 7awalya bey2ooloh, bey2ool en lesa fe nas keteer men el nezam el gdeed lesa maska fel balad, w 3ayzeen yefdal masaytereen.
bas ana 3andy amal en rabena hay5ale7 el 7al, w en masr hatb2a a7san be2ezn allah.
bas besara7a, ana mesh 3arfa ezay el doctor el sayed el badwi y2ool kalam zy dah!
momken 3ashan howa men el taba2a elly kant mostafeeda men el nezam el gdeed, f bey7awel yedaf3 3anho.
bas ehna ba2a kafaaya 3alena elly shofnah, w 3ayzeen nbda2 saf7a gededa, saf7a feha deemoqrateya 7a2eeya, mesh kalam bas.
w allah a3lam, ana mesh fahma awy fel syasa, bas elly 2alby 7aso en masr hatetghayar lel a7san, w han3mel barlaman mo7taram, w nb2a balad deemoqratey beged, mesh kalam bas.
rabena yewally 3alena elly feh el 5eer, w yb3ad 3anna welad el 7aram.
ya gama3a, elnaharda 7abb asharek ma3akom tajarobet 7asaletly men fatra, besara7a lessa ma2theraly feeya llennaharda.
ana ba2a esmy sa3d, w3andy 40 sana, wbetshtaghl mowazaf fe sherkat 5assa.
elmohim, men kam shahr kedah, wa7ed kalmny fel telefoon, sawto kan gharib kedah w mesh bayen howa meneen.
elmohim, elragel dah 2ally kalam gharib, 2ally enny lazzem aseeb elbalad w emshi, w law ma3rafsh emshi, ebny hay7selo 7aga!
ta5ayalo ba2a elro3b elly ana 7asset bih!
2adett afaker meen momken yekoon 3ayez ya2zeny aw ya2zy ebny, w wasolt lneteeja en mafeesh 7ad momken ya3mel kedah gher elnas elly bthajer beshkel gher shar3y.
dol nas momken ya3melou ay 7aga 3ashan elflous.
elmohim, ana 2oltlo enny mesh haseeb elbalad, w law 3ayzny emshi yeb2a yoriny nafso elawal.
2ally enno hay3arefny benafso felwa2t elmonaseb, w 2afel elsekka fe weshy!
ma3rafsh meen elly kalmny?
bas 2ally law makhodsh ebny w meshyt men elbalad mesh hay7sely tayeb ya sa3d bey.
ana ba2a 2adett afaker, w 2olt lnafsey enny lazzem abligh elshorta, bas khafet enohm momken may3melosh 7aga, aw en elmwdoo yetfahm ghalat.
fegarrart enny atsarraf law7dy.
rah 2eibt kamerat morakaba w 7ateetaha fel beet w 7awaleeh, 3ashan law 7ad gee yekhtof ebny, yeb2a 3andy dalel 3alelly 7asal.
w fe3lan, ba3d kam yom, la2eet wa7ed gharib beytsallal 7awaleen elbeet, w lama wagahto, gary besor3a.
rah 2ebelt elshorta, w 6al3 enno wa7ed men 3esaba betehrab elnas bra elbalad, w kano nawyeen yekhtofou ebny 3ashan yetlabou fedya!
el7amdellah en rabena sterha ma3aya, bas begad ba2a lazzem nakhed balna men awladna, w ne7myhom men ay khatar.
w ya reet el7okoma teshadd elmorakaba 3alhodood, 3ashan nemna3 ay 7ad enno yehager beshkel gher shar3y, w yeb2a fe 3oqobat sarma 3alelly bey3emlou kedah.

elmatra2a elmalakeyya beta3et elgame3a elmalakeyya mawgooda 2odam elra2ees awel ma yebtedy el2e7'tema3 fee somerset house.
somerset house kan elbeet eltalet lelgame3a elmalakeyya wette7'adem men 1780 le7ad 1857.
somerset house etbana fee strand 3ala mawke3 2asr tudor 2adeem elly ethad fee 1775.

elmohandes elme3mary sir william chambers ettalab meno enno yeghez elmagma3 lemagles elbahreya welgame3at el3elmeya eltalata elra2eeseya: elgame3a elmalakeyya wel2akademeya elmalakeyya lelfonoon wgame3et el2athaar.

waghet elmagma3 lelgame3a fee strand kant gayza lelesh'gal fee aw2at 1779, ma3 takhsees elgame3a elmalakeyya wgame3et el2athaar lelmagma3 shar2 medkhal elstrand, elly feeh selim meshterak bywady lelshog'al men elgame3a.
elgame3a enta2alet le somerset house felwa2t elmonaseb le2e7'tema3 elthekra elsanaweya beta3ha fee november 1780.

ganb elstrand men somerset house, bema feeh elbeet el2adeem lelgame3a, kan bysheel mo3'eed cortold lelfonoon men sana 1990 - delwa2ty feeh lawa7et 7ayet wlafatet ra7am men7otet 3end mostawa elsaqf betsheer lelghoraf elly kant betesta5demha elgame3a abl keda.
elfane2a elra2e3 w'agza2 elwa7et elnahreya lelmagma3 kanu mawdoo3 barnamaj tajdeed mo2akharan wbe2o mftoo7een lelgamee3.
wafad men elgame3a elmalakeyya e7taga men 7agm elghoraf elmotawafra, w2ashar bekhsoos en mafeesh makan lelmastawda3, elly et7'awel lemagmo3a mohima men el3enayat men britain wel5arej.
elmonakasha ma3 chambers sa3adet 3ala tehde2et makhaof elgame3a, bas elmastawda3 makansh momken el7efz 3aleh wetesalem le2omana2 elmat7af elbritany lelendaam fe elmagmo3at elwa6anya.
sa3b tla2y ay n6a6 ensany el yomyn dol mn 3'eer ma ykoon feeh jwaaneb mn el tekno'logya el r2meeya bshakl aw be2a5r.
el e2tesad el r2meey bytkwn mn en7'et el tekno'logya el r2meeya de w est7'laka aw est5'damha.
bs eh howa shkl el en7'et w el est5'dam dah belzabt?
ezay el e2tesad el r2meey bytkwn fe3'lyan men 7'lal mmarasaat basharya m7adada fe mwa2f m7adada?
eh elly bey5'alee el mmarasaat de nag7a?
w law fhamna el mmarasaat de kways, eh elly momken nta3lmoh mnha 3shan ntwr el tekno'logya el r2meeya aktar?
fe el nehayah, el tjarb'a bet2olna en tsmym el tekno'logya bykoon aktar fa3'leya lma ykoon mabny 3la fhm 7'eety le eh elly el nas bet3'melo fe3'lyan fe mwa2f el est5'dam el 7'eety.

3la rghm mn el 3'teraf el waas3 bel7'aga le rab6 tsmym el tekno'logya bel mmarasa el fa3'lya, ella en el gohood elly et5'ezlet le drasa est5'dam el nas w en7'et'hom lel tekno'logya el r2meeya le7ad delwa2ty kant mjaz2a w bet3'tmed 3la 2'yood mawadee3 m7adada fe mshary3 m7adada.

fe mshro3 rsm khreeta el e2tesad el r2meey, ba7'etyn kba7'tyn mte3'oodyn 3la drasa el mmarasaat el basharya fe seyaq el tsmym, hebd'oo le awl marra fe rsm khreeta mnahgya lel mmarasaat de fe mjaalat m5talefa kteer fe m7awla le rsm sora le keyfya ta7'eel el nas lel e2tesad el r2meey kkol.
el ba7't hyeshml drasaat mla7'eya m7'z2a kteer le af3'al basharya fe mwa2f m5talefa mtenawa3a, fe ay makan w zaman betfkr feeh fel tekno'logya el r2meeya w bettm est5'damha.

el nateg'a elly htetla3 mn el ba7't dah htet5'zam b3d kda le ta3'zeez el ebtdaa3 aktar gowa horizon w shreka2'ha, men 7'lal rab6 el fhm el da2' lel 3anaser el basharya fel e2tesad el r2meey be en7'et el tekno'logya el r2meeya fel mosta2bal.

el-gze2 el-awal byttba3 el-tar5 el-mobaker le-qanun el-b7ar, el-qanun el-3orphy le-3alay el-b7ar, w mabda2 7oreya el-b7ar men 3asr el-nahda le7ad montasaf el-qarn el-2eshreen.

el-gze2 el-tany by7allal 7oreyat 3alay el-b7ar zy matfawed 3aleehom fe etefaqyat qanun el-b7ar fe 1958 w 1982, ma3 el-eshara le-mafahim shaab'ha fe qanun el-fada2 w le-b3d el-mnte2at el-barreya, w bel-5asos el-2ara el-qotbeya el-gnoobyah.

el-gze2 el-talet byrbt qanun el-b7ar be-qanun el-7arb el-bahreya w el-7eyad, w howa qanun khass gamb qanun el-mohteat el-3am, w betna2ash fe 2awade7 el-mo3ahdat el-5asa taht el-etefaqyat, ta'ther el-qanun el-3orphy w el-2awade7 el-2amra 3ala el-mo3ahdat w el-2awade7 el-3orphy, w makan qanun el-mona2'3 el-dawleya, w bel-5asos qararat magles el-2amn w el-gam3eya el-3amma lel-omam el-mot7'eda, w moqarna sena el-2awaneen lel-an7'eta6 el-fadayya.

el-gze2 el-rab3 bysheer le-3awamel tanya fe 2a2'6eya qanun el-b7ar lel-qarn dah: 7orob soghayara, gawezan ghyr dawleya fe 6abee3at'ha, zy el-tamerodat w el-7orob el-ahleya; w fa3leen ghyr 7okomyeen zy el-qaraseena aw el-erhabyeen, w el-ta'ther el-mazeed lel-mona2'3 el-ghyr 7okomeya, w "7arb el-qanun", w ally gawezan betdar fe wasayel el-2e3lam el-fawreyah zy el-enternet.

alfred nobel w shoghlo fe el barood w el motafajrat, w bendeqya hiram maxim el 2aleya, w ablhom kolohom richard gordon gatling w e5tera3oh el raheeb, el bendeqya ally etsemet 3ala esmo.

"get fe baly fekra" ketb gatling lesahbo fe 1877, "en law a2dar a5tar3 ala - bendeqya - b sor3a etla2 el narha, te5ally ragel wahid ye3mel shoghl meyya ragel fe el ma3raka, dah hay2all gedan mn el 7aga le gyoush kbeera, w b2olna hay2al faras el ta3arod lel ma3arek w el amrad be shakl kbeer."hasb el model w el 3eyar, bendeqya gatling kant te2dar tetla2 men 150 l 700 tal2a fe el da2ee2a.
w 3ala fekra, mama en bendeqya gatling kant me7taga shakhs yelaf fe el maqbod beta3ha - fanya, heya mesh bendeqya 2aleya.
bendeqya gatling kan leha estekhdam m7dod fe el 7arb el ahleya el amerykya.
kan mn el 3ady w2taha en 2a2dat el etehad yeshtero bena2eq gatling le gyoshohom be shakl khas.

3al2an men en bendeqya gatling kant beteklef magh 2adm w2taha how 1500 dollar, ally bysawee taqreban 35 alf dollar delwa2ty, 2ela enha kant beteklef goz2 sagheer mn teklef tagedd gez2a kameela mn el jnoood; w bendeqya gatling kant bet2dar te3mel shoghl gez2a kameela.
akter estekhdam mashhoor le bendeqya gatling kan fe el 7amla el amerykya el espanya fe nehayet el qarn el 19, bal2as fe hajom fursan el khayala 3ala tal san juan.
teddy roosevelt, wahid mn el mot7amesen le bendeqya gatling, wasaf awel estekhdam leha bel shape dah: "foghan seme3na sawt darb gharib.
wa7ed aw etneen mn el regala sarkou, 'el bendeqya el 2aleya el espanya!' laken ba3d ma seme3t el sawt le 7aza, 2amet mn makaney w galt 'dee bena2eq gatling ya regala!

bena2eqna!' 3ala tool, el jnoood 2ebtedet tehtaf be 7amas, l2en el sawt kan molahem gedan."be nehayet 3asr el jilded w bedaya qarn gedeed, bendeqya gatling kant khalas etbaddelt be awel bendeqya 2aleya 7a2e2ya, bendeqya maxim.

tesla momken test5asem batareyat graphene fe 3arabeyataha fe el mostaqbalel 3arabeyat elly betshtegl bel kahraba betetsama mostaqbal el mawaslat fe el 3alam kollah.

w dah momken ykoon 7al let5feef wazen w 7ajem el batareyat fe el 3arabeyat di, w elly momken ykoon leeh ta'theer kbeer 3al mostaqbal el 3arabeyat el kahraba fe el 3alam.
el graphene byet3'ar akteshaf 7adeeth w mofeed gedan.
el tarkeeb el kemya2y el fareed lel mada di bey5ally mawasel momtez lel kahraba w el 7araara, w kamen 7ajemha s3'eer gedan.
el tarkeeb el fareed dah bey5ally el electronat tetasaraf kanno men 3'eer ketla.
w el 7ajem el s3'eer gedan lel tarkeeb dah bey5ally yentegy taba2at rafe2a gedan (bessmakka zarra wa7da).
batareyat el graphene betettawar beshkel motazada w bett7asan 3ashan testekhdem beshkel fa3al w kef2 fe sena3et el 3arabeyat.
wa2t sh7'an a2sarbatareyat el graphene ma3roofa enaha bet5od wa2t sh7'an a2al, w bet2dar takhzen ta2a aktar, w bedeen felta a6wal lestekhdam el batareya.
el mada el mobtakra di betsa3ed 3ala ta7seen adaa el batareya beshkel kbeer men 7'lal tawseel a7san lel kahraba.

sa3et takhzeen mobherael naharda, sherket tesla el 3amlaqa lesena3 el 3arabeyat el kahraba, betetjeh na7w dmag batareyat graphene motakadema momken te7'al me7al batareyat el lithium ion (li-ion) el taqlidya gareeb.

sherket grapheneano el espaneya lesena3 el batareyat, kashfet 3an batareya thawreya beastekhdam boleemer momken taddi lel 3arabeya el kahraba masafa 2yetla3 mobhera betwasel le 800 kilometer (aw 7'awaly 500 mayl) besh7'na wa7da.
w kamen el batareya di bet2dar tesh7'an nafsaha bel kamil besor3a aktar 33 mara men batareya el lithium ion el taqlidya fe el 3arabeyat el kahraba.

momken yekoon 3andak mashakel fe el-gazhaz el-3asabi beta3ak, w di momken te5alli 7ayatek as3ab mma hi.
el-gazhaz el-3asabi el-gheir monzam (aw elly betketab kaman: gheir monzam aw gheir madboot) yani in gazhak el-3asabi mesh madboot w mesh shaghall be shakl saleem.

w da bey7asal lama el-gazhaz el-3asabi elly beyhaddi (el-gazhaz el-3asabi el-wodi) beyetghallab 3aleeh el-gazhaz el-3asabi elly bey7afezz (el-gazhaz el-3asabi el-sympathawi), w beyekhleeh el-gasem sa3b yedkhol fe 7ala esterkha2.
fe el-7aya el-yoomya, el-gazhaz el-3asabi momken yeb2a gheir monzam lefatra mo2aqata w ba3deen yerja3 yenzam nafso tani.
lama 7ad yehess in gazhoh el-3asabi gheir monzam, beyeb2a qasdo 3omoman in gazhoh el-3asabi bewageh so3ooba aw fashal fe enno yenzam nafso tani ba3d el-daght.
2are2 ma3ana 3ashan net3aref 3ala 6 3alamat wa7eda lel-gazhaz el-3asabi el-gheir monzam.
1) el-daght el-mozmenwa7ed men el-mo2asharat el-ra2eeseya lel-gazhaz el-3asabi el-gheir monzam howa el-daght el-mozmen.
law 7aseet inak madgoot aw 2alek be shakl mostamir, momken yekoon gazhak el-3asabi fe 7ala mobalgha fe el-nashat.
w da momken yekoon besabab 3awamel ketir, menha el-sodmat elly 7asalet fe el-madey, el-2alam el-mozmen, aw daghat el-7aya el-mostamera.
el-daght el-mozmen momken ye2ather be shakl kbeer 3ala se7tek el-gasmiya w el-3atafeya.
momken yesahm fe ertefa3 daght el-dam, amrad el-2alb, w amrad mozmana tanya.
kaman momken yesabbo mashael 2alek, iktieab, w erhaq.
2) el-sho3oor bel-tawter3alama tanya men 3alamat el-gazhaz el-3asabi el-gheir monzam hya el-sho3oor el-da2em bel-tawter w el-2alek w 3adam el-ra7a.
momken te7ess inak fe 7ala tahob mostamir, hatta law mafeesh 5atar 7a2eeqy mawgood.
w da momken yazhar fe 2a3rad gasmiya zay tawter el-3adalat, zeyada darabat el-2alb, w el-tanafos el-sata7y.

el-ashkhas elly 3andhom gazhaz 3asabi gheir monzam momken yetfaje2o be sohola men el-asosat el-3alya aw el-7arakat el-mofaja2a, w momken yelagaw so3ooba fe ennohom yehaddo hatta law mafeesh 5atar 7a2eeqy.
w da momken yeb2a marhek w momken yekhleehom yelagaw so3ooba fe mumarasa el-anashit el-yoomya.
3) so3ooba el-noomel-gazhaz el-3asabi el-gheir monzam momken yesabeb so3ooba fe el-noom.
w di momken tezhar be ashkal mokhtalefa, zay so3ooba el-noom, el-esteeqaz el-moktarer 2awel el-lail, aw el-noom el-modtarib.
so3obat el-noom ghalban betekoon mertabeta be ertefa3 mostawaat hormoon el-daght (el-kortizol), w da momken yekhleeh gasmak yelaga so3ooba fe el-esterkha2 el-tamm w el-dokhol fe noom 3ameeq w mori7.
lama gazhak el-3asabi yeb2a gheir monzam, momken yeb2a as3ab inak testerkhe men daghat el-yom w tehaddi 3a2lak w gasmak 3ashan te7sal 3ala noom jayed.
4) so3ooba el-tarkeezlama el-gasem w el-3a2l yekoono fe 7ala daght aw teheej mostamir, momken yeb2a sa3b el-tarkeez fe el-maham w el-twajod fe el-lahza el-7aliya.
w da momken ye2ather 3ala 2a2dertak 3al el-shoghl, el-deraasa, aw hatta el-tawasol el-ejtem3y be shakl fa3al.
momken te7ess inak moshatit, nase, aw 3andak so3ooba fe etkhath el-qararat.
momken kamen te7ess be da7'aneya fe el-tafkeer, w di 7ala men el-erhaq el-3a2ly aw 3adam el-wodo7 elly bekhalley mo3ajala el-ma3lomat sa3ba.
so3ooba el-tarkeez hya 3alama sha2e3a lel-gazhaz el-3asabi el-gheir monzam, laken momken tekoun 3ared le 3adad men el-mashakel el-se7eya.
law bet3ani men so3ooba el-tarkeez, mohim inak tedawwer 3ala mosa3ada men motakhasses fe el-raya el-se7eya yegdar yes3adak fe tahdeed el-sabeb el-asasy w yewafar el-3elaj el-monaseb.
5) taqalabat el-mizaajlaw 7aseet inak bet3ani men taghyirat mofaja2a w 7ada fe el-mizaaj, momken tekoun di wa7da men 3alamat el-gazhaz el-3asabi el-gheir monzam.
gazhak el-3asabi howa elly beyet7akam fe mashakerek, felo howa gheir motawazen, momken ye2ody le taqalabat mizaajeya wa7da.
taqalabat el-mizaaj mesh bas 3ared lel-gazhaz el-3asabi el-gheir monzam, laken hi eshara wa7eda in feh 7aga gheir motawazna.
law bet3ani men taqalabat mizaajeya, mohim inak taragab wa2t 7odootha w elly beysebabha.

6) mashakel fe el-gazhaz el-hazeemygazhazna el-3asabi beyela3eb dawr hayawy fe wazefa el-gazhaz el-hazeemy beta3na, le2enno beyet7akam fe efraz el-3asarat el-hazeemeya w 7arakat el-ta3am fe el-gazhaz el-hazeemy.

enta2ed en shakhsyt abigail williams fe masra7yt el-7ena, arthur miller byosl6 el-daw2 3la el-nezam el-ejtma3y we 3a2letaha el-tathorya elly adet le m7akemat el-sa7erat fe salem.
abigail williams hy m7arak el-masra7ya, fa heya bet7mel aktsar el-mas2oleyya 3an egtema3 el-banat ma3 tituba fe el-ghaba, we 3andama yektashef parris da.
ehda el-shakhseyat el-ra2esyya fe masra7yt el-7ena, abigail williams, hy shareera el-masra7ya, akter 7atta men parris aw danforth fe el-fasl el-awal, meharatha fel-tela3eb wade7a gedan.
el-7ena - kowa abigail williams 4 saf7at 1025 kalema november 2014 mqalat mahfoza a7feth mqalatak hena 7atta temkenak men el-3othor 3alehoma be sor3a.
khet el-mosh3at el-wagibat el-manzelya tahleel shakhsyt el-7ena mqal a7san 3ard atro7a awraq el-kolya el-rakheesa 3abr el-enternet.

el-dawafe3 fe el-7ena mokhtalefa lekl shakhsyyet we tenasab e7teyjathom fe da el-wa2t abigail arthur miller dawafe3 el-shakhsyyet elizabeth proctor john proctor el-qes hale el-7ena tituba mckinley 3la el-maqal.

mqal 3an el-7ena abigail williams abigail williams tahleel el-shakhsyyet shareer estethna2y abigail entqameyya, ananyya, mtala3ba, we kadeba ra2e3a el-7ena abigail williams mosa3da mqal el-7ena mosa3da.
mowdo3 geded abigail williams el-7ena mqalat - mqal maghany 3an abigail williams 3ala el-7ena say3ty fahm el-shakhsyyet we say3dak 3ala ketabet mqal gameel 3an el-mawdoo3.

wafar el-wa2t we 2atleb tahleel shakhsyyet el-7ena (john proctor) tahrir el-maqal mogabal 139 dollar bas lel-saf7a a3la el-darajat we el-gawda momken ykoon ehda el-shakhseyat el-ra2esyya fe el-7ena elizabeth proctor we abigail williams homa emra2tan mohimatan fe el-7ena.
mqal el-7ena kanat el-7ena ketab 3atefy gedan men 7yth el-mo2amara kanat el-mo2amara tedawwar 7awal fatat beda2et abigail tethem el-3ady men el-ashkhas be mmarasa el-sa7er.

100% awraq magany 3an mqalat el-7ena 3eynat el-mawade3, moqademat el-fagra el-mosh3at, el-bahth we akthar abigail williams hy ehda el-shakhseyat el-ra2esyya fe masra7yt arthur miller el-7ena el-shakhseyat fe el-7ena motawrat be shakel wase3 me3 el-sa7erat we de el-7a2y2a bet5ale el-mo2amara moshweka lel-ehtemam.
abigail williams hy shakhsyyet ra2esyya fe masra7yt el-7ena le arthur miller, lakenha bettsawar 3ala enaha bet2dar 17 3am, ay akbar be khams sneen taqreeban men 3omraha el-7a2yqy.
el-7ena hy masra7ya men 3am 1953 lel-kateb el-masry arthur miller john yehajem shakhsyyet abigail fe mqal 1953, re7la lel-7ena.

el-3amal el-adaby el-7ena le arthur miller howa kheyar gameel gedan le mqalak el-7ena hy wa7da men proctor we abigail williams bel3ab fe el-7ena eh howa dawr el-jins el-malek oedipus fe oedipus malekan le sophocles we el-shakhsyyet el-ra2esyya fe william.

3aly2 fe ketabet mqal el-7ena khabeer fe el-sa7er, parris byes2al abigail williams, za3ema el-sayedat, 3an el-monasabat elly 7asalet fe el-ghaba abigail hadan el-shakhsan homa 3ala el-arg7 el-shakhsyatan el-akhtar ehtemaman fe el-masra7ya.

shakhsyat arthur miller fe el-7ena: bywsf arthur miller abigail williams fe el-7ena be enaha shakhs shadd el-tala3eb we el-enteqam beyetla3 lel-7asem fe etkhaz el-qararat el-khat2a beyodhy el-akharen 7awalo leh 3ashan yewsel lelly howa 3ayzo, john benfsaha we lenfsaha bas abigail ra2e2a.

mqal el-7ena el-moqan3 3ala 2add en john proctor shakhsyyet mostadara ba3d el-shway, thmel, we ehtemam yozker, 3ala moshrf yestakhdem arthur miller ethos men arthur miller la mqal el-7ena lamma abigail williams awal men 3adam 7odour el-kanesa kol youm sabt.
el-mo2amara we el-sera3 el-7ena hy 7ekaya 3an el-karamah we el-akhlaq, 3ala 2add el-s3obat el-rewaya bet2a3 fe balad salem.
mqal maghany: abigail williams mtala3ba we 3ayza en el-omoor temshi 3ala tareeqetha heya el-shakhsyyet el-ra2esyya we betesabab fe el-mata3eb fe kol makan betro7o salem.

el ensan bey3tady 3ala maw6en el hayawanat (gheir el taghyirat el manakhya elly bey3melha el ensan) w dah ley ta'thir madmar 3ala 3edad kbeer men el hayawanat, bighad el nazar 3an enaha 3aysha fel gaw wala 3ala el ard wala fel meya.
el dab el qotby men el hayawanat elly bet3tbar "moftaresa qema" - ye3ny haywan qemat el selesela el ghadya.

khsara el maw6en bet2ther 3ala el hayawanat el moftaresa di marratayn - 3andhom masaha ard a2al ye3ysho feha, w dah beyseb enkhfadh fe 3eddem, laken kaman lazom yet3amlo ma3 enkhfadh masader el akl le2en el hayawanat el a2al fel selesela el ghadya betmout.
w eh akhbar el manakh fe maw6enhom el asasy - el qotb el shomaly?
fe taqdeerat bet2ol en fe men 20,000 le 25,000 dab qotby ba2een 3ala el ard, w el naw3 dah b2a msanaf 3ala enno "naw3 mofte7 el 2ala2".
w el mawqe3 mesh beyta7asan, le2enno el gelid el bahry fel qotb el shomaly beyzab be m3'dal 11% kol 3aqd.
derasa 7aditha 3ala 7araka el dab el qotby aktshafet 7aga2e2 sadma b5soos fokdan el gelid.
akbar moghraga kant en ontha dab qotby men elly etdrasat sab7et tes3 ayam w 700 kilometer taqreeban men ghyr taw2of 3ashan telagy gelid fel bahr.
el daba di khsaret 22% men dohon gesmha, ghyr enha fa2dat wa7ed men sogharha, fe reghltha fe bahr beyofoort, elly howa gez' men el mohit el qotby fo2 el a2alem el shomalya el gharbya w alsaka.
"dah shy2 momayyaz.
di a6wal modda mesjela lesba7at el dab el qotby men ghyr taw2of", dah elly 2alo anthony bagano, 3alem 7ayat barya fel mes7 el jology el amreky w katib ra2esy lderasa, le jarida toronto star.

"tarikhyan, maskansh fe kamya meya mofata7a kbeera bel shakl dah elly tegbar el dabbat enaha tesba7 feha."nateg el derasa, elly est5demet tateb3 gps 3ala 68 dab qotby ben 2004 w 2009, et3radet fe otawa el seif elly fat fe mo2tamar gam3eyat el dabbat el dawleya.
7ajm el gelid fel bahr a2al bena2a 47% men elly kan 3aleh fe 1979, w dah bey5ally el dabbat tesba7 masafat a6wal 3ashan twasel lgelid, w mn ba3d keda lel akl.

le7san el 7ad, sandook el 7aya el barya el 3alami (wwf) beyshteghl 3ashan el dab el qotby, zy ma bey2olo 3ala mawke3hom el electrony ennohm bey3mlo khams mobadarat asasya 3ashan yes3do fe 7maya el dabbat di el mehdada.
- el tafawod ma3 el 7okomat w el sena3a w el afrad 3ashan takleel enba3athat el ghazat el dafe2a w takhfeef ta'theer el taghyir el manakhy.

- teshege3 el est5dam el mostadam el esthalky w ghyr el esthalky leldab el qotby elly bye2ser beshra men 7ad 3ala el naw3 dah, zy el sayd w el etjar el ghyr meshroo3 w el estighlal el sena3y w el seya7a el ghyr mostadama.
- 7maya el maw6en el 7arag bema fe dah mamarat el 7araka el mohma w maw6en el ta3sheesh.
- mone3 aw ezalat el tehdydat el moshara men el nashat el sena3y zy tatweer el naft w el gaz w el sh7n fel qotb el shomaly.
- tamweel el ab7ath el maydeya men gabal khobarat el dab el qotby fel 3alam 3ashan ye3rafo ezay el e7tibas el 7arary heye2ser 3ala 7ala el dab el qotby 3ala el mada el tawel.
w ma3 mosa7'ma el taghyir el manakhy fe zoban el qotb el shomaly, el dab el qotby (gheir ay haywan tany) me7tag kol el mosada elly yegdar y7sal 3aleh.
3ashan te3raf aktar ezay te2dar tes3ed el dab el qotby w tesahm fel kesa, zwr el mawke3: wwf.cahaza el mawdoo3 bera3'aet.

el elgha2 howa fekra thomas jefferson, wally 3br 3nha bwa5o fe qrarat kentaky le 1798, wally bton 3la en law 2sdrt el 7okoma el federaalya 2y qanun byt3ada el sala7yat ally fawdt'hom el wlayat, fe 2lzem 3la el wlayat rfd tnfyzoh.
kan jefferson by2men en law sm7t lel 7okoma el federaalya be27tkar t7deed sala7yatha, msh 3ndna el 7a2 en ntfa2'a lma testmr fe aktshaaf sala7yat gdyda.
law 2nthaqoo el dostor, fa 27na "melzmyn bel mo9awama", 3la 7d te3beer james madison fe qrarat farginya le 1798.
eh ba3d el amthla 3la 2st5dam el wlayat lel elgha2 w el ta3deel el 3ashr tarykhan?
2thart farginya w kentaky emkaneya el elgha2 2daam el tshre3at fe 1798 ally 23'atha mn en2de7 el ra2es aw el kongres 2gmra.
23mloo dah fe w2t kan aktar el qdat w aktar el wlayat by2menoo en dah 7aga 7lwa w dostorya tmam.
fe 1814, 7'6 danial webster el wlayat 3la el mo9awama law tmn el tagneed el 3skry.
fe monasbat 3deda, bzlto el wlayat el shmalya qsaara 23'la2'ha le 3'r9a tnfyz qanun el 3abd el hab 1850, ally 23tbrt jwanb menoh ghyr dostorya 3'yr 3n bnd el 3abd el hab fe el dostor.
marr el magles el tashre3y le wlayt wskonseen qarar fe 1859 bydaf3 3n 3'dm 2t5azhom 2y 23'ra2', wbystsh'hed 7rfyan be qrarat kentaky le jefferson le 1798.
hal 2st5damt el wlayat el elgha2 m7'zan?

rbma tkwn el qdaya el met3l2a be el r3aya el 7'ashea w mlkea el asl7a w el qanb el tby lehm howa el akthr wdo7a', 7yt 2ma en el wlayat bt7addy aw mst3da lel t7ady el t7al el federaaly el ghyr dostory fe hadh el m7'al.
el qanb el tby howa mthl jydan 5'as, 7yt 7kmt el m7'ama el 3alya 2daamoh, w wzaret el 3'dl bta3'doh, w m3'eer dah howa mstmr.
akthr mn 3shr wlayat btsma7 bih fe tahady mba5r lel erada el federaalya.

law kan el nas msemyn 3la mo9awama qanun by2menoo eno bynthq el dostor w mst3dyn lel 2wgof 2daamoh, fa 2lzem el 7okoma el federaalya el trga3 - zay ma 3mlt bnosba lel qanb el tby w qanun el 7'oya el 7a2e6ya le 2005.
eh howa el rab6 el tary5eya ben 2ydaologyet el abaa2 el moseseen w el elgha2?
tm 5od 7arb el est2l2l 3la mabda2 el 7okm el 2thy el mahaly, f2ly btab3an msh hynfa3 en el amerkyeen yrga3o w y2nsh2o 7okoma morkzya qwya hat2dy 3la el 7okm el 2thy el mahaly.
fe el 7'a2e6, m3mlosh keda.
2n mo2tmer el t5seeq fe farginya 1788 howa drs t3leemy.
kan el moshkkon fe el dostor by5af enoh hye2dy le 7okoma bla 7dod.
w2mna mo2yde el dostor el moshkkon en el 7okoma el federaalya msh hatmlk gher el sala7yat "el mfwda sar7a" lha.

2kda george nykolas, ally b2a 2wl na2eb 3am le wlayt kentaky, lel fargynyn en law 7awlt el 7okoma el federaalya 2frad "2y shrot takmeelya" 3'alyhom - ay law 7awlt mmarasa sola7ya bt3da el sala7yat el mfwda lha sar7a - farginya hatkoon "m3fya" mn hadh el 23'ra2.
bhadh el t2keed, swt farginya b3'6 el 2swa2 lel t5seeq 3la el dostor.
keef shayf en el 7okoma el federaalya bt3da 7dodha?

l25'lat el 7okoma el federaalya el nzam ally trkholna moshkeen el dostor, ally kan feh 7okoma morkzya b sola7yat "25'6 w m7doda" (3la 7d te3beer madison) bt2men el dafa3 el moshtarak lel wlayat b sola7yat "el 3dyda w ghyr el m7doda" (3la 7d te3beer madison tany).

fe madrasa honkoot el-ebtedaya, ben5ali el-musiqa tegraba ta3leemeya momte3a liltelamiz w el-modariseen.
benashag3 el-atfal 3ala el-mosharaka fe tegareb moseyya motanaweya, w benzar3 feehom 7ob el-musiqa w bentawwer tha2athom fe nafs el-wa2t.

ta3leem el-musiqa 3andena beyerkiz 3ala tatawor 2adra el-atfal 3ala el-ghena fe tanaghom ma3 ba3d, w 3azf el-alat el-musiqeya el-mawzoda be-dabet sawt w elly bedoon dabet sawt be-mahara motazayeda, w el-estema3 w taqyeem anwa3 mokhtalafa men el-musiqa men fotarat w anwa3 w asaleeb w taqaleed mokhtalefa.
ma3 taqaddomhom fe el-madrasa, el-atfal beyetawwor fahmom lelnabed w el-eyqaa3 w el-taba2a el-sawteyya w el-sor3a w el-dynamekeyya w el-6ab3 el-musiqy w keyfeya benya el-musiqa.
beyest5admoo el-ma3refa de fe ta2leef w 2ada2 mosyqathom el-5asa fe magmo3at saghyra.
ta3leem el-musiqa fe madrasa honkoot el-ebtedaya beyewsel motatalabat el-manhag el-watany men khilal estekham manhag charanja, elly mosedam khososan le ta3leem el-musiqa fe el-madaris el-ebtedaya.
doros el-musiqa betet2asem le wa7adat nesf faselya w betdi el-atfal forsa le moraja3a w fahm w ta3meeq fahmom fe el-mawdoo da.
ganb da, el-tagamo3at el-ghena2eya elly bet7sal kol esbou3een betdi el-atfal fursa le tatawor me7arat el-ghena2 w 2ada2 magmo3a motanaweya men el-aghany ma3 ba3d.
belnesba lel-atfal elly 3andohom sha2f bel-ghena2, yeqderoo yetawwor 7obohom lel-musiqa aktar men khilal nady ghena2y kharg el-manhag, bey2addy fe monasabat mogtame3eya mokhtalefa 3ala madar el-sana.

el-3arodo el-masra7eya kaman 3on9r asasy fe manhag el-musiqa, ma3 3arodo tranem 3eed el-miled fe el-kenesa el-mahleya le mor7ala el-ta3leem el-asasy el-tanya, w 3arodo meled el-mase7 le mor7ala el-ta3leem el-asasy el-ola w mor7ala ma 2abl el-madrasa, w 3arodo nehayet el-fasl el-darasiy le mor7alety 3 w 4 w mor7alety 5 w 6.

el-atfal fe sana 4 beyestafedo men ta3leem motakhases lekol el-fasl, bey2addemo 3odw men khadamat leicester-shire el-musiqeya, w sana 5 w 6 3andohom el-forsa lel-estemrar k magmo3a saghyra law 3ayzeen.
el-doros de betdi el-atfal forsa le ta3alom el-3azf 3ala 2ala el-okeleely fe sana 4 w el-geetar fe sana 5 w 6.

khilal el-gelessat de, el-3anaser el-motaraketa lel-musiqa betetawwor ganb me7arat gededa, w da bey2ody le 3aml 7afla kol fasl darasy beyetda3a leha awleya el-2amr w ba2ey el-madrasa lestemta3 bel-3ard.
fe madrasa honkoot el-ebtedaya, kol el-atfal heisharako fe gelessat moseyya 3alya el-gawda 3ala madar el-sana, w ta2theer da heban fe el-madrasa kolha be-ziada el-ehtemam bel-musiqa.

manhag charanja leeh tasalsol wa7ed lel-doros w ahdaaf el-doros w mol5asatohom, ma3 el-mawared el-lazema le-tadreesaha; da heysame7 lekol a3da2 hay2at el-tadrees (bema feehom ghyr el-motakhaseseen) be-taqdeem doros makhtata gedda w 3alya el-gawda, ma3 el-tamayoz el-monaseb.

mosharaka el-madrasa kolha w awleya el-2amr het7asan men khilal el-3arodo w el-an6ema5 kharg el-manhag, w el-mosharaka fe el-musiqa hetawwor refahyet el-atfal, w te2az 3ala el-estema3 w tatawor el-tarkeez.
maria montisori kant doctora w mo3alema w mobtakra etaleeya, w etshahrat b-tare2et elta3leem beta3etha elly bet3tmed 3ala tare2et ta3leem elatfal el-tabe3eya.
fat7et awel madrasa montisori - w heya casa di bambini aw daar el-atfal - fe roma youm 6 yanayer 1907.
w ba3d keda safert el3alam w katabet kteer 3an tare2et elta3leem beta3etha, w get lha atba3 kteer.

men sogharha, maria 3aychet fe roma, elly kanet gena lilmaktabat w elmata7ef w elmadares el3azema.

walada 7arakamaria fe bdayet mmasarsetha l-tbe rkzet 3ala el-tbe elnafsy.
w kman ehtemet belta3leem, w 7adret doros felterbya w 2at3asfet nafsaha fe nazaryat elta3leem.
derasetha 5aletha tera2eb w tshakkek fel-tara2eq elsa2eda fe ta3leem elatfal elly 3andhom e3a2at zheya w ta25or felnmo.
elforsa le-t7seen eltara2eq deh get fe 1900, lma et3eynet modera mosharaka fe ma3had tadreeb geded le-mo3alemeen elta3leem el-5as.

fe 1907, maria 2ablat tahady geded 3shan teft7 markez le-ra3aya elatfal fe mnte2a fa2era felmadena.
w dah b2a awel casa di bambini, w howa beya2a ta3leemeya 3alya eljoda lel-atfal elsoghar.
elawl elwelad kanu mesh mondabteen, bs besra3a 2azharu ehtemam kbeer bel-l3ab bel-puzzle, w t3alemo ta7deer el-akl, w elta3amol ma3 mawad feha doros fel7esab.
w la7zet ezay beymtso elmarifa men elbe2a el7awaleehom, w by3allmo nafs'hom asasan.
b-est5dam el-mola7aza el3elmeya w el-5ebra elly aktsebetha men shoghlha elsab2 ma3 elatfal elsoghar, maria sammet mawad ta3leemeya w beya2a safeya betshag3 elraghba eltabe3eya lel-atfal felta3leem.
mobtakra, nsweya, mthaleyafe elsenen elly ba3d keda, w leb2et 7ayatha, maria kraset nafs'ha le-taqdem tare2et elta3leem elly bertkez 3ala el-tfel.
w 2alqat m7adarat kteer, w katabet mqalat w kotob, w tawt3t program le-ta7deer elmo3alemeen fe tare2et montisori.
k-shakhsya 3amma, maria kman nadalet be-gdeya 3shan 7o2oq elsetat.
katbet w etkalemet kteer 3an el7aga le-foras aktar lel-setat, w et3arfet fe eetalya w bara7a k-sot nswy keyadi.
maria montisori sa3et le-ta7'6eeq mthulha fe awqat modtareba.
