elwezeer gal en egmaly el-este7marat felmashro3at di wselat le7waly 124 meelyon geneh, w dah yshmel mashro3at e7lal w tajdeed shabakat mayet elsherb w elsarf else7y, w kaman mashro3at tanya lemayet elsherb w elsarf else7y beteshraf 3aleha elheya elqawmeyet lemayet elsherb w elsarf else7y w jihat tanya felmo7afza, w betekalefa meleyarat elgenehat.

elmohandes mamdouh raslan, rayes elsharika elqabeda lemayet elsherb w elsarf else7y, aked en eldawla mohtama gedan bmashro3at mayet elsherb w elsarf else7y fe kol mo7afazat masr, khososan felmanateq el-refeya.
w dah bayen felmashro3at elmobadara elreyaseya "7ayaat kareema" letatweer elreef elmasry, w kol dah fel-etar ro2ya masr 2030 3ashan nwassel le-ahdaf el-tanmeya elmostadama.

el-doktor mohandess mohamed nagib saleh, rayes sharikat mayet elsherb w elsarf else7y felmonofeya, gal en elsharika 7a2at enjazat kebeera fe 2021, zy tanfeeth meshro3 sarf se7y fe manti2et elsheikh ramadan fe qwesna, w a3mal e7lal w tajdeed leshabakat mayet elsherb betekalefa 40 meelyon geneh, w entaha2 a3mal e7lal w tajdeed shabakat elsarf else7y fe nawahy elmo7afza betekalefa 12 meelyon geneh.

w kaman tam tataweer manti2 menateq ghyr makhtata fel7y elgharby fe shbeen elkoom betekalefa 22 meelyon geneh, w shamel dah a3mal e7lal w tajdeed w mad w tade3em shabakat mayet elsherb w elsarf else7y belta3awon ma3 mo7afzet elmonofeya.
w bedat elsharika kaman fe ejra2at eltar7 w elterseya le3amal elmar7ala eltanya men barnamg khadamat elsarf else7y elmostadama, wally betetmawwel men elbank eldawly w elbank el-asye afrekey.
w bey2ool rayes elsharika enhom bey2ademo khadema motameza lelmowatneen w bey7awelo yelbew e7teyjatohom men mayet elsherb w elsarf else7y.

w dah 3an tewseel elmarafeq (mayet sherb w sarf se7y) le3adad kebeer men elnas fe nawahy elmo7afza, w dah byshmel mad khotout mayet w khotout en7adar betekalefa 20 meelyon geneh belta3awon ma3 elmogtama3 elmadany.
w kaman tam tanfeeth a3mal fe madares w heya2at 7okmeyya w khaassa w mostashfayat betekalefa 15 meelyon geneh men khetet eltanmeya el-ejtemaya w el-eqtesadeya felmo7afza.

w beyetabe3 rayes elsharika enhom kaman mohtameen be7lal w tajdeed w raf3 kafa2a mahatat raf3 w m3alaga elsarf else7y betekalefa 15 meelyon geneh, w estelmo aktar men 90 km shabakat en7adar be3ama2 mokhtalefa, w 2alllo fa2ed elmayet benesba 20% bestekhlaas 2azhaa 7adetha lelb7th 3an eltesreebat.

w fe 2021, de5let mahatat mayet w raf3 w m3alaga gadedda elkhadema, zy mahatat mayet (shma tarsh7 mubasher) w mahatat raf3 (abshesh, nader, geziret el7agar, ab5as, elraheb, bara el3gouz, kafar mansour, bqesa, shabra qabala, abshady, elmaqata3, shmandel, elswalmeya, el5or, w 3ezbet elkom el7amr).
w kaman fe mahatat 7asalet 3ala shahada el-edara elfaneya elmostadama tsm zy mahatet elshohdaa elbahary, w mahatet m3alaga sabk el7ad, w mahatet eldaba2eba elbahary.
w fe mahatat gaddadet shahadat el-tsm zy mahatet tala elbahary lelmarra eltaltah, w mahatet m3alaga tala lelmarra eltaltah, w mahatet elfar3onya lelmarra eltanya.
w bey2ool rayes elsharika en ket3 elma3amel feeh 3arabeyat maghazza 3ashan sabb el3enayat w 3amal elta7aleel elkemeya el-lazema lef7'5 ay shekawey met3al2a bejowda elmayet.
w dah mohem 3ashan net2aked en mayet elsherb amena w neqya.
3adad el3enayat elly etsabbet wselat le7waly 45146 3enya mayet w 6320 3enya sarf se7y.
w kaman ket3 elma3amel 7asal 3ala shahada salama w mamoneyet elmayet lemahatet shbeen elkoom elmarsha7a.
elnaharda 6 ebril 2021, elsa3a 12:06 sabahan, w haba asharekkom tjarbty fe worshet 3aml 7adertaha elnaharda nazmaha 7ezb elsha3b elgomhory le mmo7'taleeh fe magles elnowab w elshyou5.
elmawdoo3 kan 3an el3ala2at el5aregeya, w moha'der elworsha kan elsfeer mohamed 7agazy, mosa3ed wazeer el5aregeya elasbak.
elworsha de kant mohema gedan, etkalamna feha 3an syaset masr el5aregeya w mawqefha mn elsar3at el2e2lemya w eldawleya.

kan ma3aya fe elworsha nwaba el7ezb fe magles elnowab zy elna2eb mohamed safy eldeen kharboosh, elameen el3am ll7ezb, w elna2eb mohamed salah abo homela, rayes elkotla elparlmanyya ll7ezb, w elna2eb mohamed eltoukhy 3abdo mostafa elqasby mn lagnat elda3m w el2amn el2almy.
w kamen 7ader nwaba mn legan mokhtalefa zy leganet elsha2on elafrekeya, wel3ala2at el5aregeya, welta3leem welbahs el3elmy, welqowa el3amela, wel5ana3a.
elly 3agbny besara7a en elworsha kant monazma bshakl kways, welneqaash kan mofeed gedan.
elsfeer mohamed 7agazy shar7 lana bmntahy elwodo7 mo7addadat elsyasa el5aregeya elmasreya w ezzay masr bet3aml ma3 elmalafat el2e2lemya weldawleya elmo3akada.
7aset bfaker be balady w ezzay syasetha el5aregeya gaweya w wad7a.
7ader mn nwaba el7ezb fe magles elshyou5 shakhsyat mohema zy elna2eb hazem 3omar, rayes el7ezb, welna2eb ehhab wahba, welna2eb reham 3afify, welna2eb mohamed ahmed 7asan 3ali 7asan.
w kan ma3ahom ahmed elalfy, ameen eltanzeem bel7ezb.
besara7a, ana mabsoota en 7ezb elsha3b elgomhory mhtm be ta3leem w tadreeb nwabo fe elmagalet elmokhtalefa, w khososan fe mawdoo3 7assas zy el3ala2at el5aregeya.
dah bydy amal en 3andena nwaba fahemeen w wa3een le dworhom fe khdemet elbalad.
fe elnehayya, elworsha de kant edafa leya, w forsa kwayesa enny afham aktar 3an syaset masr el5aregeya.
ana kam masreya, mohem 3andy en balady tekoon gaweya w mawaqefha wad7a fe elmahafel eldawleya.
rabena y7me masr wy7fazaha mn kol shar!
dersa 3n ta'ther sokariat alnada almnzly 3la 3mr zabat alba3'od w 2draha 3la altayaran w alhdam m2abel sokariat alra7e2 alzahry /stanfeld, trody k.
byanat al3rad alkaamel lile3nseralra7e2 alzahry by3tbr almasdar alrayesy llkarbohydrat lmo3zam anwa3 zabab aldibreda.

lkn, etwada7 en zabab alba3'od (brgen w hantr 1997 a, b, g), w alba3'od (fastr 1995; borkit w akheron 1999; rassel w hantr 2002), w zabab algazlan (maghnarely w brgr 1984; janzan w hantr 1998; osowsky w hantr 2000), w zabab al5'yl (shoutz w goglr 1989; hantr w osowsky 1999) w zabab alrmal (makfekr w akheron 1990; walbanks w akheron 1990; kamiron w akheron 1992, 1995; shlen w jakobson 1994, 1999; hamilton w aln3eem 2000) bttghza 3la sokariat alnada almnzly w alra7e2 alzahry kman.
abl sana 1997, kan mtaaraf en alra7e2 alzahry howa almasdar alrayesy llkarbohydrat lzabab alba3'od.
lkn, brgen w hantr (1997 a) athbtw en 7waly 35% mn zabab alba3'od kan akl wjbat mn sokariat alnada almnzly.
alma3lomat de khltna n3ed taqym jwaneb kteera mn tar5eya 7aya zabab alba3'od.
w dl2ty fe m7awlat ldersa ta'ther alra7e2 mqabel alnada almnzly 3la khsobyat zabab alba3'od w n9l altfyleat (hazard 2003).
m7'eran, stanfeld w hantr (byanat ghyr mnsora) athbtw en sokariat alnada almnzly btkhy zabab alba3'od alan9a tetyr msafat w ftrat awla mn sokariat alra7e2.
alrslh de btdres jnaben mn jwaneb belywlogya zabab alba3'od almt3leqa b2sthlak wjbat alsokr.
awlan, btdrs ta'ther alnada almnzly w alra7e2 3la 3mr zabab alba3'od.
thanyan, htdrs alsbb almbasher wra adaa' altayaran al'6ol fe alzabab ally btetghza 3la alnada almnzly.

almoqarna byn almasderen dol mhmh l2n alra7e2 bytkon bshkl asasy mn alsokariat albseeta (alsokariat al7adya w alsokariat althnaya) bema feha alnada almnzly bytkon mn alsokariat albseeta w alma3'qda (bma fe da alsokariat althlathya w alsokariat alrba3ya).
- wallah ya g3dan, ana far7an gedan en elnaharda kan fe e7tefaleya mohema 3an da3m elmaraa fe qeta3 elsay7a.
eldoctor khaled el3enany, wazeer elsay7a wel2athar, sharek fe el7adath dah elnaharda fe elqahera.
- eh elly 7asal fe el e7tefaleya di ya khaled?
- bas ya sedy, el mawdoo3 kebeer w mohem.
el e7tefaleya di kant 3an mo3'amar "da3m tahye2a be2a 3amal 2amna llmaraa fe qeta3 elsay7a".
ya3ny 3ayzeen ywafro faras 3amal 2amna llsetat fe magal elsay7a, w dah shy 2amel be7'alas.
- wallah fekra 7elwa, ezzay ya3ny hewafro faras el3amal di?
- homa he3melo tadreebat w ta2heel llsetat elly 3ayza te7'ter fe el magal dah, w kamen hewafro faras 3amal fe el fanadeq w el manate2 el say7eya.
wel wazeer gal en el qeta3 dah byshegl aktar men million osra masreya, ya3ny fursa kbera llsetat elly 3ayza te7'ter.
- tab wel magmo3 beta3 elsetat elly heystafedo men el mo3'amar dah hekoon 2add eh?

- wallah ya sa7by, el wazeer gal en el mo3'amar dah hedmaj ma2at elsetat el3amlat fe el nashat el say7y, w kamen talab koleyat el say7a wel fandak fe mo7afazat mokhtalefa zy elqahera, wel2skandareya, wel2oksoor, welba7r el27mar, wganoub sena2, wmatrou7.
ya3ny hekoon 3add kebeer mostafeed en sha2 allah.
- rabena ywaf2hom, welsetat 3andena mo7tageen da3m fe kol el magalat.
bas eh 3ala2a el mandel wel gathan bel mawdoo3 dah?
- hahahaha, la di 7aga tanya koles.
3ala hamesh el e7tefaleya di, el wazeer ra7 ma3rad el montagat el fandakeeya llmaraa el masreya, w shaf montagat 7elwa awy masno3a men mawad tab3eya.
w gal en el montagat di sadeeqa llbe2a, w dah shy mohem gedan 3ashan el say7a el mostadama.
- aywa keda, lazem n7'tem belbe2a w nshage3 el montagat sadeeqa llbe2a.
bas eh 3ala2a elmodreb wel mofaker bel mawdoo3?
- homa kanu betklmo 3an 2ahmeyet el tadreeb wel ta3leem fe magal el say7a, w 3ar'o afkar gededa 3ashan tatawor el meharat.

ya3ny maslan galaw en hekoon fe mobadara aw mosaba2a le a7san tasmeem be monasba morour 200 sana 3al fek romoz el ketaba el masreya el 2adima w nash2a 3elm el masreyeen, w 100 sana 3al aktashaf maqbara el malek toot 3an5 amon.
ya3ny hekoon fe e7tefalat w a7das kbera?
- aked tab3an, di fursa 3azeema enna n3'arred tar5ena w 7adaretna lel 3alam.
wel wazeer gal en el mawak3 el 2athareya wel mata7'ef hekoon mftou7a lesa7bat el 7eraf el yadeya 3ashan y3'arred montagat'hom, w dah he3'a'ed fe el tamkeen el eghtesady llsetat.
- rabena ywaf2hom, w rabena yseh'al el omor w nshof masr fe a7san sora.

|el-maqal/el-gouz' dah beyetkallem 3an mafahim riyadiya munasiba le akher el-thanaweya el-3amma aw awel el-koleya.|t7'weel fourier (elly betesma ghalban t7'weel fourier aw takamel fourier) howa t7'weel takamel 3akos beyefakkeek el-dawwal el-mostamera el-qate3ya el-2abila lel-takamel el-tarebe3y 3ala magmo3a tobologyia ela terkeba khateya men 3anaser el-asas.

momken n3tbrh el-tamdeed el-asma lel-selselat fourier, welly feha fatrah el-dawreyya bt2bal taweela gedan w"el-mo3amalat" bt2bal qareeba gedan men ba3d, wbt2bal dawaal badal ma tb2a selselat la nahaya.
kteer men el-dawwal elly bt2bal sa3ba el-t7'leel fe magmo3a tobologyia wa7da bt2bal ashal lel-t7'leel lama btet7'allel le magmo3a tobologyia tanya.
el-sigh elly byefdalha 3olamaa el-re7'amyaat 3ada hya el-sigha "el-me3yaria".

belnesbal law 3andena dawaal ma3refa 3ala khat el-2adad el-7'a2eeya kolo, t7'weel fourier beta3ha byeb2a:el-t7'weel el-3aksey, elly byerja3 el-daawaal el-asleya, howa:el-thowaabt elly 2odam el-takameelat de 3ashwa2eya, tool ma en 7asel darabha howa .
3ashan n5'ally el-t7'weel el-2amamy w el-3aksey shebha ba3d 2ed el-2emkan, 3ada benest5'adem etefa2eya enna ben5'allyhom metsawyen.

t7'weel fourier le dawaal ma betetkatab 3ada be3lama 2ob3a:t7'weel fourier el-motakate3t7'weel fourier el-motakate3 bet3raf 3ala el-magame3 el-tobologyia el-motakate3a, w el-takamel byetbadal bel-gam3.

el-wagaayat el-fameya, w elly b2a ma3roof kman be-asm waqayaat el-asnan el-reyadiya aw hamee el-asnan el-reyadi, hya m3adad darorya le-ay tifl byshark fe ay nsha6 2erfyhy aw reyadi momken ysabb esabaat.
el-wagaayat dee btetlbs 3ala el-asnan el-3olwya w bthmy el-manta2a el-fameya kola men ay esaba men momken t7sal, w btkda bthafez 3ala el-shakl el-gamaly l-l-ebtesama w se7tha.
kman el-wagaayat dee btst5dem a7yanan' le-7maya asnan el-atfal elly by3ano men sreer el-asnan bel-leel.
akademya tbb asnan el-atfal el-amrekeya t7dedan' btdres b-est5dam el-wagaayat el-fameya fe ay nsha6 reyadi aw 2erfyhy.
a3'leb el-wagaayat el-fameya elly btetba3 fe el-m7alat btkon bs3r akal men 10 dollar, w da by5leha 2stthmar mthaley le-ay ab aw om.
m3'leb el-mona5azat el-reyadya delwa2ty bttaleb men el-msharkyn enohm ylbsu el-wagaayat dee bshakl rutynee.

3la 2rghm men en el-wagaayat dee msamma fe el-asl le-7maya el-asnan, lknaha kman momken t2allal bshakl kbeer men 2wya el-sokma elly momken tnt2al men mnt2a el-sokma (el-fak) l-l-netham el-3asaby el-mrkzy (2a2edet el-m5).
btkda, el-wagaayat dee btsa3d 3ala t2leel 5atar el-esaba el-dme3'ya, w da mhm gedan' le-l-atfal el-soghar.
el-wagaayat dee kman bt2allal mn entshar el-esabaat elly ba3daha:ana ashtry naw3 eh men el-wagaayat el-fameya le-ebnay?
3la 2rghm men wgod alaf el-marakat le-l-wagaayat dee, lkn a3'lebha b2an2sem le-thalatha anwa3 ra2eesya: el-wagaayat el-gaheza, w el-wagaayat elly btetbl w tte3d, w el-wagaayat el-mokhsasa.
fe b3d el-nqaat elly lazml takhd balak mnha w enta bt5tar el-wagaaya el-mnasba:- ma3ak flos mayn momken tsrafha?
- ebnk byl3b reyada bktra?
- naw3 el-reyada elly byl3bha eh?
ben2'ed 3la el-nqaat dee, hna nezra 3amma 3la memyazat w 3yob kol naw3 men el-wagaayat:el-wagaayat el-gaheza - el-wagaayat dee momken tshtereeha mba7'ra men 3ala el-raf w tlbsha le-ebnak 3la tool.
el-mkaas bykon qyasy (mkaas wa7ed ynaseb el-gam3), w da m3nah en el-wagaaya mesh bett3'yar.
el-wagaayat dee r5ysha gedan', sahela fe el-lbs, w sahel tl2eeha fe m7alat el-adawat el-reyadya.
atba2 asnan el-atfal by7ebo el-naw3 dah a5al 7aga, 3shan bydy 7maya 2wya, w b3'eeq el-tanafes w el-klm bshakl slym, w kman btkon ghyr mry7a.
el-wagaayat elly btetbl w tte3d - el-wagaayat dee bt3mel 3ada men mawad blastykeya 7araryya w sahel tl2eeha fe m3'leb el-m7alat el-reyadya.
awlan', el-mawad el-blastykeya dee lazml tet7at fe mayya skhna 3shan tb2a lena, w b3deen bett5t 3ala asnan ebnk 3shan t3mel 2ablab mnasb.
el-wagaayat dee aghla shwya men el-wagaayat el-gaheza, lknaha btdy 7maya aktar, w btkon mry7a aktar fe el-fam, w btsma7 bel-tanafes w el-klm bsahela.
el-wagaayat el-mokhsasa - el-wagaayat dee btdy akbar darja men el-7maya, w bt3mel m5sas 3nd doktor el-asnan.
awlan', el-doktor by3mel 2ablab le-asnan ebnk b2st5dam mawad khasa, w b3deen el-wagaaya bt3mel 3ala el-2ablab dah.
el-wagaayat el-mokhsasa dee aghla shwya w bt7tag wa2t aktar 3shan t3mel, lknaha btkon mry7a aktar, w btkon mnasba men el-n7ya el-tqwymeya, w btkon m3tmeda tmamn men doktor el-asnan.

taareekh sa3r el-faayda 3ala el-fedral funds(sa3r el-faayda el-fa3al 3ala el-fedral funds)eh how sa3r el-faayda 3ala el-fedral funds?
sa3r el-faayda 3ala el-fedral funds dah sa3r faayda qaseer el-maddaa bet3amlu magles el-e7teya6y el-fedraly.
w dah kamen ma3roof be esm sa3r el-faayda el-mestahdaf 3ala el-fedral funds aw sa3r el-faayda el-maqsood.

laken sa3r el-faayda el-fa3aly 3ala el-fedral funds how sa3r el-faayda elly bet2red bih el-mo2assasat el-wadee3a arsedetaha elly fe el-e7teya6y el-fedraly l el-mo2assasat el-wadee3a el-tanya lel-leela wa7da.

el-as3ar dee betetghayar yewmyan, bas betkoon 3ada 2areeba men sa3r el-faayda el-mestahdaf men el-e7teya6y el-fedraly, w bet3raf be esm sa3r el-faayda el-fa3al 3ala el-fedral funds aw sa3r el-faayda el-fa3al 3ala el-fedral funds w bet3akes sa3r el-faayda el-soo2y 3ala el-fedral funds.
taareekh el-sa3r el-fa3al (beyet7aseb shahriaan) betawda7 fe el-rasm el-byaany elly ta7t 3ashan yebeen el-as3ar el-7a2e2eya el-tarikhya.
law betdor 3ala sa3r el-faayda 3ala el-fedral funds (sa3r el-faayda el-mestahdaf 3ala el-fedral funds), momken tela2eeh 3ala el-mawqe3 dah: http://www.moneycafe.com/personal-finance/fed-funds-rate/.
el-masdar: magles el-e7teya6y el-fedralybenta2ed enna el-ma3lomat sa7e7a 3ala qadd ma n2dar.
laken el-ma3lomat momken te7tawy 3ala akhta2 aw 3adam daqa w bet2addam men 3'eer ay da3m.
mafeesh ay mas2oolya 3an el-akhta2 aw el-eghfalat.

el-parliament el-holandi yemorar ektar7'an lewa2f ab7'ath el-gorood ghair el-basharyamen talat asabe3, el-parliament el-holandi marar ektar7' beda3m men kol el-7'ezab byetlob men el-7okoma enhia tedres wa2f ab7'ath el-gorood ghair el-basharya fe markaz ab7'ath el-gorood el-biologya el-tibeya (bprc) fe rysfayk w markaz ab7'ath tanya, zy ma galt gam3et ab7'ath el-7ayawanat el-awrobeya (eara).
markaz bprc kan dayman mahal e7tejajat men nesht2'at 7'o2o2 el-7ayawan, w fat7 baboh le 2an el-7'abar el-3alami fe 2015, w nataj 3an dah film wathayee2y esmoh "dakhel ma3mel el-gorood".

fe 2014, el-gorood ghair el-basharya kant 2'al men 0.05% men el-7ayawanat el-mestakhdemah fe el-aghraz el-3elmeya fe holanda; ma3a keda, ab7'ath el-gorood ghair el-basharya bet2ady dawr mohem fe tatawor el-adweya, w mo7arbet el-amrad el-mo3'deya, w 3elaj el-amrad el-khatira.

el-parliament 3teraf bekdah, w talab men el-7okoma enhia tdamn en el-ab7'ath di tefdl mawgoda beshkel amthal, w fe nafs el-wa2t wa2f ab7'ath el-gorood ghair el-basharya fe a2rab wa2t momken fe thal el-zoroof di.

el-ektar7' el-7ali etmarar ba3d shohoor 2'alela men e3lan wazerat el-sh2oon el-eqtesadeya da3maha lesando2 le tashgee3 tatawor tarakeb badela khalya men el-7ayawanat; el-7okoma el-holandya 2alet enhia 3ayza teb2a ra2eda 3alameya fe el-tarakeb el-badela b7'olol 2025.

wazerat el-ta3leem w el-thaqafa w el-3oloum hatab3at jawab lel-parliament fe nosh shahr mayu bet2ol feh a3da2 la7'anet el-ta7'ee2 el-mosta2le w el-2'etr el-zameni el-mokhtat leeh 3ashan el-ta7'ee2 yetem.
jam3et 7'o2o2 el-7ayawan fe el-mamlaka el-mot7'eda (peta uk) a3'lnet entesarah besor3a 3al el-internet.

elba7ethoon aktashfoo taree2a gdeedah le7sad kmeeyat sghayrah men elka7raba men el7araka fe el3aalem men 7awalna - de elmara de 3an teer2 elte2a6 elsh7na elka7rabeya elly betentej lama 7ata2 mateen plastikyat men noo3een mkhtelefeen beb3dohom 3an ba3d.
wbena2an 3ala mawade elpolymer elmarna, yemken le mawled "el7araka el7tekakeya" da enno yewafra teyar motareded (ac) men el2an6'6a zay elmashee.
yeemken le mawled el7araka el7tekakeya enno yekmel eltaqa elmontaga men elmawaled elnanoeyya elly betesta5dem ta2theer elkahrod86eya le2ensha2 teyar men 7an'6ya aslak 2oksyd elzank elnanoeyya.

wbema enno elmawaled de el7tekakeya yemken tekoon shebha shafafa, fa 3'eer momken tewafera taree2a gdeedah le2entaj as7'6at 7assa nef3'a te7'leef elteknology elmosta5dama 7'aleefa le3'rad el2ajheza el7assa lelmas.
2al chung lin wang, ostaz magles el2edara fe kalet 3loom w hendasa elmawade fe ma3'hod georgia leltekno'logya: "en 7a2e2a enno momken 2entaj sh7na ka7rabeya men 3'eer elmabda2 da ma3roof gedan".
"elly 2a7na 2a7'naha howa teqneya fesel elfa2'a elly betentej 2enteqas fe eljohd, elly bey2odey le tadaf2 elteyar, elly bey2odey le 2est5dam elsh7na.
yemken lelma7'led da enno y7'ool eltaqa elme7'aneekya el3ashwa'eya men be2etna le taqa ka7rabeya".
etmam tadmeen elba7'6 men 3'eer mo2assa el3loom elwatee'a, we wizara eltaqa, w el2a7'6eya elgawweeya el2amrekeya.
etmam el2eblaagh 3an eltafaseel fe magalet nano letters.
bel2e'6afa le wang, tada7'em mo2alefee elwara2a feng-ru fan, w long lin, w guang zhu, w wenzhuo wu, w rui chang men ma3'hod georgia leltekno'logya.
fan howa kaman tabe3 le ma3'hod eldawla lelkeemya elfezeeya lel2as7'6a elsolba fe jam3et xiamen fe elseen.
ya3mel mawled el7araka el7tekakeya lama 7ata2 2eshta 7eta men elpolyester be 2eshta ma3moola men polydimethylsiloxane (pdms).
beymeel elpolyester lelto3'oot belektronat, walla pdms bey2bal elektronat.
ba3d 7ata2 as7'6at elpolymer beb3dohom ba3d, betetfa'el me7'aneeky men ba3d, elly bey5ale2 fa2'a howa'eya bet3'ool elsh7na 3ala sa7'6 elpdms w betsh'3'ol 3azm thna2y elqotb.
law etwasel ba3deen 7aml ka7rabey men elsa7'6een, faso7 yetadaf2 teyar sghayar le mowaazana jo'7d elsh7na.
men 3'eer el7ata2 elmostamar lel2as7'6at ma3 ba3dhom w sefa7'ohom be sor3a, yemken lelma7'led enno yewafra teyar motareded sghayar.
betetesta5dem 2eshtebah kharegeya lelde'66 3ala el2as7'6at ma3 ba3dohom w t7'aleekohom le2ensha2 7araka el7ata2.
w2awda7 wang: "3ashan y3'6al da, lazem ytesta5dem no3een mkhtelef men elmawade le 2ensha2 el2a2tab elka7rabeya elmkhtelefa".
"law 7ata2et el2as7'6at elma3moola men nafs elmaada, felmesh hat2od 2efraq elsh7na".
yeemken kaman 2est5dam elteqneya le2ensha2 as7'6at 7assa lelde'66 nef3'a gedan bete3'az beltaqa elnafsya lel2st5dam elmohtemal ma3 el2an6'6ema elek7tareya walla elfo2'a elek7tareya.
betentej el2a7'6a men reesha walla 2eshta 2eshta maa betelmes sa7'6 mawled el7araka el7tekakeya teyar sghayar yemken 2akte2afoh lel2eshara lel2et5al.
yemken lel2as7'6at enohom yekte2fo de'66 menta6'e7 yewsal le 7'alef 13 melli pascal.
nazaran le2enno momken 2entaj el2ajheza be nefs seba7'a shafafa tewasel le 7'alef 7'amsa we 7'amsen fe elmeeya, fa yemken yetesta5demo fe shashat elmas le2estebdal el2as7'6at el7'aleefa.
2al wang: "momken taseen elmawaled elshafafa 3ala 2e7'6eer ay sa7'6.
momken 2est5dam elteqneya de le2ensha2 as7'6at shafafa nef3'a gedan la hat7'ta' 2e7'6eer taqa men batareya el2ajeza".
3ala 2a7'6 el2as7'6at elna3'ma elly bet7ata2 beb3dohom beywaledo sh7na, fa 2azad wang w faree2oh elba7'6y men 2entaj elteyar be2est5dam 2as7'6at be anma6 deqe2a.

darsow 7'ales na3'6 men elanma6 elsa7'6 - elkhotoot w elmak3'66at w elahramat - w 2alo enno wade3 ashkaal elahramat 3ala 2eshta men as7'6at el7ata2 beywaled a2'6a ka7rabeya: beywaseel le 18 volt 3end 7'alef 0.13 micro ampere le kel sentemeter mrab3.

2al wang enno elanma6 2azadat el2a2'6eya eltawledeya men 3'eer zeedaad kamya elsh7na elshakla, w t7seen elta3'eer fe elsa3a bessabab elforagh elhowaya elly et3'azalat ben elanma6, w taseel fesel elsh7na.

bema enno el2a6b et3'azalat, elly etsha'alat feeh mawze3 elanma6 fe tejawef, be mawade kemeeya le mne3 elsete2'6.

el-ameen el3aam lmonazamat elta3awn el-islamy, 7osain ebraheem taha, beyshaker el-sa3udia 3ala maghoodatha fee mawsem el7agg dah.
bey2olak a3dad el7aggag el-sanna de rag3et zy ma kanat abl ga27at corona, wdah 5abar yefra7 begedd.
ta5ayaly ya 2okhti, el-sa3udia 5afadat ta2meen el7aggag binosba 73%, ya3ny 7aga keda zy fek raba6 men 3ala fek el7aggag, 5alet elre7la beta3et-hom ashal w akhaf.
ana ba2a men sa3a ma seme3t el5abar dah, w 2alby beyra2os men el-far7a.
el7agg dah re7la mohima awy lkol moslem, w rabena yeshal w nro7 kolna el-sanna el-gayya en sha2 allah.
bas ally 3agabny begedd fe kalam el-ameen el3aam dah, tha2toh el-kbeera fe el-sa3udia w eshadtoh bemaghoodatha.
2alak eh, beyshakerhom 3ala wteera el3amal el-sare3a fe teyser el7agg, w kaman 3ala ta2meen re7la el7aggag bishkal namoothagy w estethna2y.
ya3ny ta5ayaly keda, zy ma yekon wa7ed betasala2 gabal, w kol ma yewsel lmar7ala sa3ba, yel2a mosa3ada tesahl 3aleh elmoshhad.
ana ba2a magid, ragel masry sa3eedy men el-fayoum, mo2men en el7agg dah rakna men arkan el-islam, w rabena yektbhalna kolna.
w besara7a, ana mabsoot awy en el-sa3udia betsa3ed el7aggag belshakl dah, w dah mesh 3areb 3aleehom, ahaleena brdo.
w bema enny ragel metdeen w ba7eb deeny, f mawdoo3 el7agg dah bemas 2alby.
ana ba2a men elnas ally btro7 elkanisa akter men marra fe el-osboo3 w basally kteer, w de 7agat mohima fe 7ayaty.
w besara7a, ana shaif en eldeen mohim fe 7ayateena, w rabena yehdena kolna lltaree2 el-7a2.
w bema enna bnetkallem fe mawadee3 mohima, ana 3ayez atkallem shwaya 3an ra2yee fe 7agat tanya.
ana masalan shaif en el-ommahat ally beteshtegel, wladha bey3anaw shwaya, bas mesh ma3na keda enny ded 3amal elmar2a, ana bas shaif en elmawdoo3 me7tag tawazon.
w kaman ana mo2men en el-regala momken yekono 2a2ada syaseyeen a7san men elsetat, bas dah ma yemnesh en elsetat momken yekon leehom door fa3al fel syasa brdo.
w bema enna bnetkallem fel syasa, ana me7tam bel syasa gedan w benaqash el mawadee3 de ma3 as7aby, bas mesh ba7eb asharak fe mazarat wala 7aga.
ana mo2men en elnezam eldemokraty kways w mohim, bas brdo ba7eb asharak fel 7agat ally tefre2 ma3aya w ma3 3ayelty.
amma belnesba lltakha, ana betha2 fe 3ayelty gedan, w fe nas tanya brdo, bas mesh ay 7ad.
ya3ny masalan ana betha2 fe gary, bas mesh hab2a wa2af awy fe wa7ed ma3rafosh.
w besara7a, ana fekhor be kony masry, w ba7eb balady awy, w ba7es enny gareeb men balady w men el3alam kolloh.
w bema enna bnetkallem fe 7agat mohima, ana 3ayez atkallem 3an el3elm w eltknologia.
ana shaif en el3elm dah 7aga mohima awy, w bey7assen 7ayateena w byedy foras llagyal ally gaya.
bas brdo, ana mesh ma3 el-tatarof fel etemad 3ala el3elm, ya3ny mesh lazamn na3temed 3ala el3elm aktar men eemanna, w lazamn na7afez 3ala qeyamna el-akhla2eya.

w rabena yeshal lena kolna w ne2dar nowazen ben el-etneen.
el-gouz' el-awalqamous webster bey3aref kelmet "ramz" 3ala enha 7ekaya baseta betetesta5dem 3ashan to5tar leson akhlaky aw ro7y, zy ma yesou3 kan bey2oul fel-anageel.
moradifat kelmet "ramz" momken te5tal: 7ekaya ramziya, 7ekaya akhlaqya, 7ekaya, wamithal.
afdal ta3reef momken ne2demeh howa el-7ekaya el-ramziya elly hiya, 7asab el-qamous, "7ekaya aw qeseda aw sora momken tafseerha 3ashan tekshaf ma3na khafi, 3ada'an beykon ma3na akhlaky aw siyasi".
"2areeb aw 2areeba".
fel-lo3'a el-3ameya el-mo3asra momken nestakhdem 3ebarat zy; "5aleeny a3rad 3aleek 7aga" aw "jareb di we shoof" 3ashan nesf 7aga "2areeba" aw "shebeha" fel-shar7 mefhoum ma7dod.
hadef el-7ekaya el-ramziya howa tawseel el-shakhs le-natiga mo7adada fe 3a2leh bedoon ma ne2oulehalha mebasher.
dah hayeb2a zy "keshaf el-asrar".
fe keteer men el-5otaba2 el-mo7tarfeen elly 3andohom khabra fe fen el-mo7adetha dah.

fek shefarat el-amthela di momken yekoun baset law geena men tajroba motakera fel-7ayah, laken momken kaman yekoun sa3b gedan le daraja enha metetkeshash 3'eer fe jaw mo7addad zy el-mawsoof fel-7ekaya el-ramziya.
net7arak lel-2amam we nakeshaf el-ramouz/el-7ekayat el-ramziya elly yehoshua 2ademha lel-nas, wenesta7'7er kalam yohanna elly kan beybsher beeh.
yohanna 1:11 "gaa' elaa khassetoh, we khassetoh lem te2baloh".
matta 21:33-45 "esma3ou methlan akhar: kan ensaan rab beit gharas karam, we a7atoh be-sayag, we 7afar feeh ma3sara, we bana borjan, we salemoh ela karamin, we safer.
we lama 2areb we2t el-2ethmaar, arsal 3ebedoh ela el-karamin le-yakheth athmaaroh.
fakhath el-karamoun 3ebedoh, we geladou ba3d, we 2atalou ba3d, we ragmou ba3d.
thoumma arsal ayzan 3ebedaan akharin akthar men el-awalyn, fef3alou behom keda.
fa'7eeran arsal elaihom abneh 2a2oulan: 'seyhaboun abny'.
laken el-karamin lama ra2aw el-ebn 2a2alou feinama bainohom: 'haza howa el-wareeth, halouma nekteloh we ne2khoth meera7oh'.
fakhathouh we akhrajouh kharej el-karm we 2atalouh.

fematteaa jaa' saheb el-karam, matha yef3al be-2oulaa' el-karamin?" 2a2alou leh: "oulaa' el-2ardeaa yehlekohom helakaan 2ardeaan, we yeslem el-karam ela karamin akharin ye3tounoh el-2ethmaar fe 2awqatha".
faa2al lahom yesou3: "amma qara'toum qat fel-kotob: 'el-7ajar elly rafdooh el-benayoun howa qad saar ras el-zaweya.
men 2abl el-rab kan haza we 3ajeeb fe 3eyouna'?.
le-dha le2oul lakom: en melkout allah yenz3 menkom we yutee le-2omma te3mel athmaaroh.
we men saqata 3ala haza el-7ajar yetredad, we men saqata howa 3aleh yes7a2oh".
flemma same3 ro2asaa el-kohana wel-farisyoun amthaloh, 3alamou ennah tekallam 3alayhom.
hayekoun men el-sahl gedan enna nshof en el-7ekaya di betetkalem 3an el-3adala we moka2afa saheb el-2ard.
laken lazzem net3amel ma3 el-jemal el-5etamiya ba3d ma el-7ekaya el-asasyya tetkhalas.
fe ta3reef el-masate7at hanshof ta3leem akbar bektir.
rab el-beet howa masdar kan beytestakhdem fel-wa2t dah 3ashan yesaf ras el-3a2ela.
rab el-beet beta3na howa yehowah, ras beit 2esra'eel.
yehoshua bey2oulna mebasheran 3an khdemtoh benafs el-masate7at el-mostakhdema hena fel-enjeel yohanna.
yohanna 15:1-2, 5 "ana el-kerma el-7a2e2ya, we abi el-karam.
kol ghosn fe la yatee be-thmar yenze3oh, we kol ma yatee be-thmar yenga7oh le-yatee be-thmar akthar.

elly yethabet fe we ana feh yatee be-thmar keteer, le2annakom bedoni la te2daroun ennakom te3melou shay'an".
yehowah asasa sha3ban mofasalan beyekber taht wodo7oh el-yakez, beyetm tehedeboh we ra3aaytoh be3naaya.
"el-sayag" elly "7awal" el-karam howa 7ajes 7ameya 3ashan yehmy el-nabatat el-saghyra men el-ta2thiraat el-5aregyia.
ta3leemat yehowah betetwajeh leena 3ashan el-7ameya elly betewafreh men el-ta2thiraat el-3alamya we el-khatay.
da'oud ketab fel-mazmour 119:53 "r3ab amsekny besabab el-ashrar elly yetar7oun shareetak".
momken yekoun fe nas fahmou el-gouz' dah men el-7ekaya, ma3a keda, fe ezdeya' kbeer akid le-ta3leemat el-tawra men 2abl ketla kbeera men el-mas7eya.
el-7ekaya betesta7'7el fel-tafaseel elly 3amloha el-nas fel-wa2t dah ma3 el-karam elly et3'add be-shakl muthal.
"fakhath el-karamoun 3ebedoh, we geladou ba3d, we 2atalou ba3d, we ragmou ba3d".

ana ba2a rabee3, ragel masry aseel men baladna, men manti2a reefeya fe markaz belqas, mo7afzet el-daqahleya.
7ayaty baseta w motanawwe3a, metgawez w 3andy 3ayel wa7ed, w 3ayesh ma3 3ayelty el-soghayara.
ana ma3aya bakaloryoos, w bashteghl bedawam jaz2y fe wazefa fenneya fe mo2assasa 7okoomeya.
dakholy ma32ool, ya3ny mesh 3ala 2ad el-7al, bas el7amdolellah mostoura.
ahmm haga fe 7ayaty hya el-3ayela, ba7ebhom gedan w b3tbarhom asass 7ayaty.
amma sa7aby, f mesh mohemmen awy belnesba leya, ya3ny mesh men el-naw3 elly bey2addy wa2t faraghoh ma3 as7abo, wala ba7eb el-siyasa khales.
shagly mohem barado, w ba7awel adeeh 7a2oh 3ala 2ad ma 2a2dar.
w el-deen ba2a, dah 7aga tanya khales, ana moslem w el7amdolellah, basally w basawem w ba7awel a2tazem beldeen 3ala 2ad ma 2a2dar.
besara7a, ana ba7eb akon 7azeer fe ta3amolaty ma3 elnas, bas ana ragel mabsoot w motafael, ba3ty le7ayaty taqyeem 7 men 10, ya3ny mesh battal.
bas madiyan, el-wad3 mesh awy, ba3ty taqyeem 5 men 10, ya3ny noss noss.
el7amdolellah sa7ty kwayesa, w ba7es enny masetar 3ala 7ayaty, ba3ty le nafsi taqyeem 8 men 10 fel-saytara 3ala omory.

ana 3andy afkar taqleedyya shwaya 3an door el-set fel-mogtama3, ya3ny shaayef en el-set makanaha el-beet w tarbeyet el-3eyal, w en shaghl el-set bey2ather 3ala 3eyalha, bas fe nafs el-wa2t, mesh shaayef en el-regala a7san men el-setat fe kol 7aga, ya3ny mesh shaayef en el-regala a7san fel-siyasa wala en ta3leem el-wald aham men el-bant.
ana mohtam bel-eqtesad aktar men el-be2a, w bashouf en el-monafasa 7aga kwayesa fel-3omom.
ana ma3 fekra en fe nas agna men nas, bas mesh awy ya3ny, ya3ny mesh men mo2aydeen el-fawar2 el-kbeyra fel-dakhl.
el-siyasa mesh betestahwiny awy, bas bkoon mohtam belly bey7sal fel-balad.
ana shaayef en el-nezam el-demoqratey kwayes, bas mesh awy ya3ny, ya3ny mesh ba7eb asharek fe ay nashat syaasy, la betwa2ee3 3ara2ed wala bemo2a7'at wala bemozaharat wala tab3aat.
ana beth2 fe 3ayelty w geerany gedan, w beth2 fel-nas elly a3rafhom shakhsyan, bas mesh beth2 fe nas gededa wala nas men deyanat aw genseyat tanya.
ana fekhor gedan bemasryty, w ba7eb balady w balady w balady, ya3ny ba7eb balady 3ala mostawa el-mo7afza w el-manti2a w el-2a2ara w el-3alam koloh.
ana basma3 akhbar el-televezyon kol yom, bas mesh men howat el-jara2ed wala el-radio wala el-mobile wala el-internet wala el-social media, ya3ny mesh motaba3 awy lel-akhbar.

belnesba lel-akhlakyat, ana shaayef en fe 7agat keteer 3'alat w mesh mobarra, zy el-tazoer w el-sara2a w el-ghesh w el-fesad w el-taharosh w el-3onf w el-erhab, bas fe 7agat tanya shaayef enha momken tekon mobarra ahyanan zy darb el-3eyal aw 3eqabhom, bas tab3an fe 7odoood.
ana ba7eb araby 3eyaly 3ala el-akhlak el-7ameeda, zy el-adab w el-este2laleya w el-shaghl w el-eltazam w el-e7tram w el-tadbeer w el-tamo7 w el-eman w el-ta3awon w el-ta3a.
ana shaayef en el-3elm mofeed gedan w byessahel 7ayaty, bas mesh shaayef en el-3elm howa kol 7aga, ya3ny mesh shaayef en el-3elm howa elly hey7all kol mo3'alatna wala enno beykharreb el-akhlak.
besara7a, ana mesh mo2ta3 awy bel-3elm fe 7ayaty el-yawmeyya, ya3ny mesh shaayef en el-3alam be2a a7san besabab el-3elm.
ana shaayef en el-3elm mofeed fe magalat mo7adada, bas mesh fe kol 7aga.

ya3ny mesh zy fel-mawdoo3 el-este7mar w el-seyasat el-maleyya, ana shaayef en fe 7agat kteer ma7taga tetghar w tetatawor, zy ma etna2ash fe el-warsha el-eftiradeya elly 7adartaha ma3 el-doktora rania el-mashat, wazeera el-ta3awon el-dawly, 3an taqyeem seyasat el-este7mar lel-mo2assasat el-maleyya el-3arabeya.

el-warsha de kant mohema gedan le2anaha betena2esh mawdoo3 mohem w howa moraja3a w taqyeem seyasat el-este7mar lel-mo2assasat el-maleyya el-3arabeya, w dah mawdoo3 ma7tag derasa mot2anya w takteeb sa7.

ana shaayef en el-mo2assasat de ma7taga terkez aktar 3ala tanwe3 este7maratha w takteebaha beshkel a7san, khososan ma3 el-zoroof el-eqtesadeya el-3alameya elly betetghar kol shwaya, zy azmet corona elly lesh makhlseen minha, w elly aked hat2ather 3ala ferss el-este7mar w el-rab7 w el-khasara.

ana shaayef en dah door mohem gedan lel-mo2assasat de, enaha te7awel tetatawor men seyasatha el-este7marya w testafeed men el-derasat elly zy de, 3ashan te2dar towageh el-tahadeyat el-eqtesadeya elly benshofha kol yom.

ya3ny mesh zy fel-mawdoo3 el-hekal el-tanzeemy w e6ar el-7okma w a7'6af el-este7mar w el-estera7eyat el-tawela el-ajal, kol de 7agat ma7taga moraja3a w tatawor 3ashan ne2dar nestathmer flosna beshkel a7san w ne7'9a arb7 aktar.
fel-nehayya, ana rabee3, ragel masry baset, ba7eb balady w 3ayelty w deeny, w ba7awel a3ayesh 7ayaty bebasata w rda, w ba7awel atawar men nafsi w men mogtama3y 3ala 2ad ma 2a2dar.

by7sl dl2o2ty en modrsyn eltshry7 el7dys bywageho t7adyat t3lymya ktyra mertab6a btegyyrat fel mnahg w e3ada tanzym elmo2assasat elt3lymya w t5fyed sa3at eltadrys, w dah kollo jnb elanteqadat elly bt2ol en ma3rfa talaba elteb bel tshry7 msh kfaya w2t elt5rejj.
fe gam3a notngham fe elmamleka elmt7eda, bytm etba3 nhg tqlydy fel tshry7 elgthth elkaaml fe mnhg elteb ltalaba elbakaloryos, w dah b2st5dam adla tshry7 mabnya 3la adla tshry7 manshora mn zaman.

talaba elsana el2ola fe klyet elteb byshofo mnte2a elkatf btry2a st7ya 3shan y2dro yshofo el3dlat w elhaykl el3sbya w elwa3ya elly 7awaleha kways, 3la rghm mn en ro2ya elmfsl elda5ely btkon m7doda bshkl kbyr.
eldrasa de bt7ky 3n tary2a tshry7 gded lmfsl elkatfy-el3dy elly by2odha eltalaba, w elly bettdmn taqsym ras 3zma el3dd 3shan ykshfo 3n kapsola elmfsl elda5ely beltfseel.
eltshry7 dah tm dmjoh fe 7zma t3lymya onlen ltalaba elsana el2ola fe klyet elteb.
ma3rfa eltalaba bel mnte2a de et2ymt abl w b3d ma shofoh elmada elt3lymya elonlen, w elntayeg azhart t7sn kbyr fe ma3rfhom bel tshry7 b3d ma khlsow el7zma elt3lymya (p = 0.013).
talaba elsana el2ola elly shofow eltshry7 elgded kman kanow afdl mn talaba elsana eltanya elly drsow elmnt2a de bel tary2a eltqlydya (p = 0.002).

welmar7ala eltanya hatbada2 2areeb, hayshmloo ba2y masaged elqahira, w kaman haybdo2o yateb2oh fe mo7afzat tanya, bas hay5od balhom men far2 elta2et fe kol menta2a.

fe ma2al kristofer reeks "tennyson tennyson", tennyson bey2ol en 2aema el sayra el zateya bet3tamad 3ala iza kant maktooba mn shakhs bey7eb el shakhs elly beyktb 3an 7ayato, bas bey7ebo 7ob mamayez (2ebtasas men reeks 172).
el 7ob el mamayez dah bey3'es fe el ejaba 3ala el so2al elly 6ar7o samuel johnson: eh elly beymezz el sayra el zateya el gameela.
ma2al reeks betwasa3 el so2al lelshamel: meen elly yest7'2 eno yegra sayra zateya gameela.

fekra tennyson bet'2'ed tanya lleso2al elly betet7'at fe derasa 7aya w a3mal el shakhs: bel'2ada lel so2al 3an sabab 2era2et el seer el zateya wel a3mal welly beymezz el sayra el zateya el gameela, so2al meen elly yest7'2 eno yegra a3mal w seer zateya le shakhs mo3ayan.
tennyson, fe eshara le byron, bey7'adem fekra en kol el asrar hatet3raf fe el nehya, bey2ol en elly bet3raf howa bs el sora el 3amma lel shakhs mesh el shakhs el 7a2e2y (reeks 172).

el nas elly me7tameen bs bel nemema 3an shakhs meshhoor mn 3'eer ma ye3rafo a3malo abl keda homa el no3 elly tennyson bey3teberhom "mbtazleen" welly reeks momken yesmohm "ba7'esheen 3an el tafahat" (172).
fa eh e5tebar el naga elly momken yet3'em llesa2a wel ketab lama yet3'allem bel sayra el zateya?
hel lazem el sa2a wel ketab yekono mn el no3 elly tennyson bedo leeh fe 2ebtasaso 3an el sayra el zateya?

belnazar le ra2'a tennyson fe eno y5'ally a3malo khasa (187), ana bafakar en momken el sha3'er kan yefdal tasree7at charles olson el moftrada 3an egla2 kolyet black mountain: "leh el ashyaa matw2fesh lama tntahy?"laken, el 3amma hat3'amel elly te2dar 3aleh 3ashan te3raf 3an 7aya elly bey7tarmo.
momken en 3adam tha2a tennyson fe el sa2a (wel ketab) el ghayr mosta7'2 tet3'alem besten7'a2 ebno men 7'lal milton en men el mosta7'el ennak te3raf 3ala shakhs men 7'lal magmo3a mn thakrayato (191).
momken yekon afdal enna n3tber, zy reeks, 7aya w a3mal el shakhs ka2bano: mesh nse7a taba2 el asl mn el shakhs laken "mo2asreen w mo2asra feehom" (191, 204).
law kanet 7aya w a3mal el shakhs bet3tbr abna2, yeb2a mafeesh 7a'ez 3ala meen momken yegra 3an 7ayato, lanno zy ma el atfal bey7'amlo genehat el aba2, el 7aya wel a3mal hat7'amlo torath.

sherkat limelight 3amlat 7amla bet3'rad feha nas bale2een hestafeedo mn e5tebar oncoblotยฎ elly hayeghyar el la3ba.
el e5tebar dah, elly beyet3'amal 3an tare2 doctor el mared, yegdar yekte'sh 25 no3 mokhtalef mn el sara7'an.
e5tebar oncoblotยฎ ll'dam yegdar yekte'sh kemya sghayara gedan mn el sara7'an fe ay makan fe el gesm, saw2 entasher wala la.
el taqdeerat bet2ol en el e5tebar dah yegdar yekte'sh 7'lal 2 meelyon khalya sara7'anya, w dah beyqabel taqreeban werm be7ajm 1 l 2 mm - taqreeban be7ajm ras el dabous!
qarn dah bel mamogram elly mo7tag werm be7ajm 7'lal 100 l 1000 mara khalya akter (be7ajm 7.5 mm) 3ashan yekte'sho bthaka!
7ata law mafesh werm, laken law fe akter mn 2 meelyon khalya sara7'anya 3ayma fe el dam aw el jihaz ellymfaawy, oncoblotยฎ hikte'sh el sara7'an bedaka 3alya gedan.
elsara7'anat fe "el mar7ala sefr" bettekshaf kaman bedaka 3alya (zy dcis elly howa sara7'an mahaly fe el thady).
w elly akter mn keda en oncoblotยฎ kaman 3andha nseba sghayara gedan mn el natayej el eyjabya el khate2a akal mn 1% (e7temalya enaha te2olak en fe sara7'an fe el gesm w howa mesh mawgood fe3lan).
de 7aga mohema gedan 3ashan el e5tebar mesh haykoon mofeed law kan bey2ol en fe sara7'an kteer w howa mesh mawgood.
kaman, oncoblotยฎ tegdar tahadd el 3odw elly el sara7'an ge mnh ("el ansgeya el aslyya") mn 3'eer asha3'a aw khaza3a, bedaka akter mn 96%.
law fe khalya sara7'anya akter mawgoda, daka tahdeed el 3odw el sa7ee7 betzid.
ma3lomat akter tafseelya 3an daka oncoblotยฎ mamken tel'aaha 3ala saf7a el as2ela el shay2a.
eh howa el3ayesh el3odwi?
3ayesh ma3mol mn 7obob kamla etzara3et mn gher mabydat 7ashreya, wla asmda sena3eya, wla 7m2a magary, wla ka2nat modela warathyen, wla esh3a2 mowyen.

el3ayesh el3odwi masdar kways llkarbohydrat, elly btygy mn el7obob elkamla welmawad elghaza2eya zy elmagnesium wel7adeed welselinyom wfetamin b welalyaf elghaza2eya.

lma d'a2e2 el3ayesh elabyad betn5l, bydy3 mnh elagza2 elghaza2ya fel 7obob - elalyaf wel7amad eldhnya el2sasy, wmost elfetamyn welm3aden.

elbanat ally etwldw fy 2016 hkoon 3ndhom fursa akbr bnsba 75% enhom ydrosoo ll7sol 3la shahada gam3ya mn zmaylhom elwlad lw mfesh e7'ra2at betet5'ad llm3alja elfo2a elgndrya elmtzaeda fy elgame3a, 7sb teqreer etnshr elshahr elly fat.
wel7'amoh fy el2stmrar fy elta3leem el3aly fy sn 15 aw 16 by3ml ferg kbeer fy akhtyarat elmostwa a, wda elly azhartoh a7'r darsah nshrt'ha mo2assa soton trust.
byanat mn 3000 shab w shaba l2yt en 7waly 65% mn elbanat fy sana talta e3dady kanw sha'feen en elgame3a mhmah gedan, mo2aranah b 58% mn elwlad, 7sb ma zakrt wkala el2nba press association.
aktar mn n's talabt sana talta e3dady elly etsa2lo (61%) kanw sha'feen en el7sol 3la shahada gam3ya mhmah gedan, mo2aranah b 13% bs elly 2alo enha msh mhma aw msh mhma 5ales.
7waly wa7da mn kl 10 banat kanw sha'feen en el7sol 3la shahada gam3ya msh mhm, lkn wst elwlad elnsba elly 2alto en elgame3a msh mhma kant 15%.

eltalba elly 3ndhom 15 w 16 sana w nteyg'thom fy elamt7'anat mtshabehah kanw aktar 3'rada mratyn enhom ykmlo fy tlat mostawa3at a lw kanw sha'feen elgame3a hdf m7tmel lihom, w eldoctora kathy silva, elmo2lfa elmosharka fy elteqreer, 2alt en da momken yfser elfo2a fy elqbol b3d kda.

w2alt: "6mow7at elbanat el23'l mn elwlad momken tkwn mertbeta b nj7'hom el2kbr fy elmostwa a w do5'olhom elgame3a." elteqreer kman l2a en eltalba el7'rom kanw a2l a7tmalya fy eltfkeer enhom hyd5'lo elgame3a, m3 27% bs 3ndhom 6mow7at 3alya mo2aranah b 39% mn zmaylhom el2fdl 7'ala.
elra2ys eltenfeedy llmo2assa soton trust, w hy mo2assa btshg3 el7'raky el2jtma3y, da3a elmadares lrf3 6mow7at eltalba.
elseer peter lamel 2al: "e7na m7tageen n2dm dem aktr llshbab el7'rom 2'waal ta3leemhom 3shan ykoonw fy wda3 ysm7 lhom bt7'yez emkaneyat'hom b3d elamt7'anat."
etktshft lw7a 7eetan 3omrha aktar mn 4300 sana fe maqbra mawgooda shar2 elharam elakbar fe elgeza.
el-lw7a betwda7 mashad 7aya mn el7aya, mnha mra'ab btsafer ganoban 3al nil, w ra7la 5eed 6oyor fe mstn2a, w ragel esmoh barsnb m3 mrato w kelbhom.
ma en elgeza meshhora be a7ramatha, laken el mawk3 kman feeh ma2aber ketir bettfra3 shar2 w gharb elharam elakbar.
el ma2aber de et3mlt le ash5as 5as2een kanu by7mlu rtb w 2wya mkhtlfa fe 3asr eldawla el2adima (2649-2150 2bl elmilad), w howa el3asr elly etbny feeh a7ramat elgeza.
[shof sour el-lw7a w maqbra elgeza]el-lw7a elgdedda etktshft fe 2012 3la eed fere2 mn me3had el-derasat elshar2ya fe el-akadymya elrwsya ll3loom, w elly kan by7fer fe el-ma2aber de mn sana 1996.
aktshaaf mfa22e2el3olama aktshfu el-lw7a lma bda2u trmeem maqbra barsnb, w howa ragel kan "kahn" w "mdyr", 7sb nogosh el-maqbra.
maqbrtoh, el-mawgooda 3la ba3d 1000 2adam (300 meter) shar2 elharam elakbar fe elgeza, bet7tawy 3la garga 2orbn w garga mrkzeya w garga dafn.
el-goraf el-tlata dol by7taw 3la 11 tamthal bywda7 barsnb w afrad 3ayltoh.

el-maqbra de etsajelt awel mara fe el-qarn el-tase3 3la eed el-mstakshf el-almany karl reechard lebsios w elmasry elfaransawy awgost mariet, w by3te2d enha trga3 le mntasaf aw aw2at el-2asra el-5amsa (7waly 2450-2350 2bl elmilad).
el-2asra el-5amsa de fatra zamaneya gwa 3asr eldawla el2adima.
"el-maqbra de m3roufa mn el-qarn el-tase3, w 2aleel awe lw kanet ht2adem ay malame7 ra2esya gededa.

3shan keda, kan mfa22a7a 7a2e2ya lma aktshfna lw7a mn 3asr eldawla el2adima 3la el7eta el-shar2eya ll-gar2a elmrkzeya", ketb maxeem lebedeef, w howa qare2 (ma ye3'adel ostaz fe amreka) fe elgame3a elrwsya elgwmea ll3loom el-ensanya, fe emayl le maglet laif sayens.
"el-lw7a etrsmt 3la taba2a rf3a mn el-gibs el-abyad el-na3em, w elly eswad mn swad el-qarn el-tase3 w el-wskha.
2ot el-tsgeel, bs 7waly 30 fe el-meya mn el-gibs el-asly howa elly fadl 3la el7eta", gal lebedeef.
mn el-qarn el-tase3, nmo w sana3a el-qahera ady le mshakl tlwe2 fe elgeza.
ma3 keda, "mafesh wala mashad mn el-mashad etmas7 bel-kaml.
el-2athar el-ba2ya betsm7 be-23ada t2seem el-t2seen koloh", gal lebedeef.
mashad mn el7ayael-lw7a ba3d 23ada bna2ha bet3kes el7aya el2adema.
fe a3la el-lw7a fe sour le mra2ab btsafer 3la elnil, w mra2abha mtjha le ganob.
homa "3la el-arg7 bymthlu 3wda sa7eb el-mra2ab mn el-shmaly ba3d r7la 7g aw tftesh 3la amlakoh el-gena2zya", gal lebedeef.
el-amlak el-gena2zya de kant amlak m3fya mn el-drab, w elly kan bysyboh el-mtwfa 3shan yes3d fe 3ela el-m3aleen el-ba2een 3la 2ayyd el7aya w syana maqbrtoh.

[sour: aktshaafat mthlola fe a7ramat elgeza fe masr]"el-sjelyn el-sflyn ll-lw7a by7tfez btmthel le mashad 2az3eya mkhtlfa: 7rth, zra3, 3mal bys2o2 3'anam 3la el-bzor el-mzro3a, so2 7mear m7mla be7zm le el-2am 3la arda el-tathrya", gal lebedeef.

kman fe mashad mstn2a m3 ragel 3la mra2ab w elly byban enoh by5ted 6oyor.
"kol el-mashad elly etrsmt kan lha ma3any rmezya mhmh.
5eed el-6oyor fe el-mstn2at mmmkn ydl 3la afkar el-mylad el-gded w tw3 el-2wya el-fw8wya", gal lebedeef.
"el-trteeb el2az3y el-kamel el-mte3le2 bel-7asad bymthl ahm 7adas fe 7aya el-mjtma3 elmasry el2adym", adaf.

el-fere2 la2y adela gher mbashra 3la lw7at fe b3d el-ma2aber, zy 7etan na3ma gedan w 2athar le gbs 7etan w alwan, gal lebedeef.

"ma en ketir mn el-kna2s el-m7fora fe el-7afa el-shar2ya le hadbet elgeza et7frt bsr3a aw bs etsajelt [mn gher 7fer] fe el-nss el-2awl mn el-qarn el-20, a7yanan mn gher wathay2 kafa2a, w lazelet mghta be-taba2at smek mn el-gbs el-khshen mn sakane la22een [elly 3ashu fe el-ma2aber], mmkn ntw23 en lw7at aktar htktshf fe el-gza dah mn el-ma2aber".

te3raf el gam3ia el dawlia le derasat amrad el me7bal wel faraj en el tehab el me7bal el mozamn how 3adam el ra7a aw el alam el mozamn fe el faraj elly betemayez bel 7arak aw el wakhz aw el tehayoj aw el alam fe el a3da2 el tanasolia el onthawia.

- betemayez el tehab el me7bal el mozamn el 3amm bel alam elly bentasher 3abr mant2et el faraj.
ba3d el marat bey2asar 3al el bazar wel 3ajan wel 3ana we/aw el fakhdain el da5leyn.

- el tehab el me7bal el mozamn el mawdo3i akter she3'ol wel alam fe makan wa7ed bas, zay el mad5al.
bet3ani el setat elly 3andhom el tehab el me7bal el mozamn el mawdo3i men el alam 3and el lams aw el da2 3al mad5al (el mant2a el mohayta be fat7et el me7bal).
momken el banat yehisso bel alam 3and el gam3 aw edkhal el sada2a el 2atonia aw el fahes el nisa2i aw rakobat el daraga aw el khail aw el motorsykel, we ertiad el malabis el day2a, zay el jeans.

bel emailelmetgherat elkharegia hya metgherat most2ella momken tedded daw2a2 liltajreba aw ta2ther 3alelnatayeg, wedah momken yesab mochkila fe ta2thir elmetgher elmosta2ell elly etekhtaret 3alelmetgher eltab3.

fe eltajareb el3elmeya, elmetgherat betkoon taht elsetra be shakel kbeer, laken fe el3oloum elly feha morona akter, zy 3elm elnafs eltajreeby, beykoon as3ab ennak tefsel ben elsafat elly matlob teb2a sabeta wel safat elly lazem tetghayar ma3a kol tajreba.
elhadaf men tasmem eltajareb howa takleel ta2thir elmetgherat elkharegia kedr elamkan.
fe tlat anwa3 men elmetgherat elkharegia: metgherat 5assa belshakhs, wmetgherat 5assa beltajreba, wmetgherat 5assa belmawke3.
elmetgherat el5assa belshakhs hya ay metgherat 5assa belshakhs elly hayetdrass: zy el3omr, welse7a, welmazag, wel safat elgasedya, 3ala sebyl elmathal.
elmetgherat el5assa beltajreba hya elmetgherat elly byed5elha t7eez 3alem elnafs aw elmorakeb elly bey2om belakhtbarat elnafsya.

elmetgherat elbe2eya betygee men 3awamel be2eya zy ay 7aga momken teshtat elshakhs elly beyet3ared liltakhtabar men elbe2a el7awalo bih: zy elda2a elda3eefa, aw eltelooth eldaw2y, aw ay 7aga tanya momken teshtat terkizo.

law kan elmetgher elkharegy mo2ather be shakel kbeer, momken yeb2a sabet lel as7ab, aw momken yeb2a fe6e6 men elshadda el3alya lelshadda elmonkhafeda lelmetgher elkharegy elmo2ather 3an tare2 ekhtyar elmosharakeen fel takhtabar be3enaya.
mithal 3ala tajreba nafsya momken tet2ather be metgher kharegy howa akmal elgomla.
taleb ma3loom ma3amel zekao2o (iq) beyetlob meno enno yekmel gomla nagssa.
ba3deen beyet2asem 3adad elkalemat elly estakhdemha 3ashan yekmel elgomla lelkol fered.

3alem elnafs beybos 3ashan yeshouf law kan ma3amel elzeka2, elly howa elmetgher elmosta2ell, bey2ather 3ala 3adad elkalemat elly eltaleeb estakhdemha 3ashan yekmel elgomla, elly howa elmetgher eltab3.

metgher kharegy momken ye2ather 3ala natayeg fered ma7adad momken yekoon law kan eltaleeb akel feter fel yom dah wla la2, aw law kan darajat el7arara fel makan eltakhtebar monkhafeda, aw law kan elmorakeb kan beyebas kteer athna2 eltakhtebar.
lamma elba7eth beyekhtar metgher mosta2ell fe tajreba, selokyat elmetgherat elkharegia ghyr elmotawaka3a momken teb2a met3ameda 3ala shadda elmetgher elmosta2ell.
mital 3ala elmawke3 dah howa elly beyet2asem belmetgher elmarbek.
mital 3ala metgher zy dah momken yekoon waghet nazar elshakhs elly beyet3ared liltakhtebar.
masalan, law elashkhas elly beyet3aredo liltakhtebar fehom thokoor wbanat, kol men eltabe3a waltarbeya hat2ather 3ala waghet nazarhom fel takhtebar.

ba3d elashkhas momken yekono mor7een leselokyat eltajrebya elmatlooba, bema en elba3d elakhar la2, aw ba3d elashkhas momken yekoon 3ando ma3refa mose2a beltakhtabar welnatayeg elmotawaka3a, bema en elba3d elakhar la2.
wa7ed men elmo7arrereen 3andena hayshof e2terahak w hay3mel tageerat law kan dah matloob.
la7ez en dah momken yakhod men kam sa3a le kam yom 3ala 7asab 3adad el2e2terahat elly benestakblaha.

tar5 el mnte2a mn el n7ya el 2'afafyab2wsel el adela 3la wjood bashar fe el mnte2a de wra 7waly 10,000 sana, wda by5ly el mnte2a de mn 22dem el amaken ally 3raf feha nshat bashary fe kalifornia.
el sakaneen el asleeyeen le amreeka ally kanu 3ayshen fe el mnte2a de kanu m7mayeen bel talal ally 7awaleehom we 23tmedu 3la el mayya ally kanu byla2ooha fe el gadawel we el yanabe3.
kanu by3mlo mjtma3at 3a2elya kbeera we bytsyedou we bys7tadu el samak we bygma3u el bzour wel balot we el nabatat el tanya 3shan el akl.
sakan los fakyros el aw2elelsjlat ally ketbha el qsaosna el fransiskan btbyen en sakan los fakyros el aw2el kanu ya ema folfonz (elly betklmu l2a mwyk bay) aw ssaawamz (elly betklmu l2a kwstano).
taghyyr kbeer fe el mnte2afe n7yt el qarn el 18, el tws3 el espany ally estmr 300 sana fe shmal we janob amreeka wsl le ard dl2ty fe madena fremwnt, 3la b3d 7waly 40 mayl janob el mnte2a.
magmo3a mn el mabshryn el espan bnowa b3tha san khoseh fe 1797 we bda2u fe m7awla t7wyl el sakaneen el asleeyeen llms7ya we ensa2 e2tesad te3raf beeh espanya.
makhdsh el b3tha aktr mn kam sana 3shan twsl llmnte2a.
el mabshryn ra7u llmnte2a we 7awlu y2n3u el sakaneen el asleeyeen enhm ynt2lu ll b3tha.
el sakaneen el asleeyeen kan 3ndhm rdwod fe3l mokhtlfa; b3d mnhm kan mwaf2 3la el ent2al, lkn el b3d eltany la2.
elly rfdu el ent2al etgbaru 3la kda, we fe khlal kam sana, mab2ash fe ay sakaneen asleeyeen fe el mnte2a.
"wad3 ra3at el bkr"el 7komet el meksykya, ally setrlt 3la kalifornia fe 1821, estlmet el b3tha fe 1834.
wb7lol 1844, el mnte2a de kant maz3a meksykya.
esm los fakyros gay mn mnkha arda meksykya esmha kanyada de los fakyros, aw wad3 ra3at el bkr.
we b7lol awakhr el stynyat, el zera3a w2ft wel mnte2a de etst5dmt bshkl asasy lra3y el masha.

ba3eed 3an a2adam gozma we geeba fe el 3alam, armenia kaman hi maw2an a2adam ma3sara khomra fe el 3alam.
fe kahf areni-1, et3'ata3 3ala ma3sara 3enab we aw3eya takhmeer we aw3eya takzeen fakhareya, we kolha 3omrha aktar men 6000 sana.
el kahf etkashaf fe 2007, we dah athbat en el khomra kant betet3'amal fe gharb asia (we kaman fe el shar2 el awset) men zaman.
we dah mant2y le2en el minta2a di men el 3alam hi elly kan feha awel mogtama3at zera3eya.
we fe 3etqad kaman (we dah magarad nazreya) en el ragala ma enta2alosh le natem el 7aya zera3eya 3ashan el amn el gheda2y, laken 3ashan yekon 3andohom masdar da2em lel kahol.
sawa2 el arman fe 3osoor ma 2abl el tareekh kanu by3'mlu khomra 3ashan yetbasato aw le 2aghrad deeneya we tadh7yat -zy ma ba3d el adella el athareya betwadd7- fa hi balad el khomra men qoroon.
el khomra el armaneya kant betetghana beha fe el 3osoor el 2adima we fe el 3osoor el wosta.
ba3d keda, fe 3asr el qeyasar, el 3enab el armani kan betest5'adam fe el brandy badal el khomra, we fe el sherry fe ayam el et7ad el sowfiati.
ayam sena3'a el khomra el armaneya kant khalast, we etfa2edet taqaleed ketir.
laken armenia bertaga3 tani.
magalet "savior" bet7'ot 3an sa3'an khomra men california esmo paul hobz, kan me7'tam be kahf areni-1 we bada2 mochro3 fe 2008.
enjazab be fekra romansya 3an makan meelad el khomra, howa we etneen e5wat american men asl armani bada2o ye3'mlu khomra armaneya fe minta2a gareeba men el kahf el mashhoor.
3alra3m enohom bada2o fe 2008, laken awel khomra lehom mesh hatkon gahza lel sharab gher el sana el gayya.
momken te2ra aktar 3an dah hena.
el balad betktashif mad'eeha tani we bet3'ayyer taqleed el khomra elly kan entaqa3.
ma7adesh 3aref el khomra el armaneya el mafrood ta3maha eh, we dah biedy masaha kbera lel tajroba we el estekshaf.
felo 7asal we sa7et 3ala khomra armaneya fe el mosta2bel el 2areb, matensash tegrabha.

el mo2tamar el 3alami lel modon 2a2amto el omam el mot7eda 3ashan yodros wa7ed men aham el mashakel elly el 3alam bywageha delwa2ty: el tawso3 el 3omrani el saree3 w ta2thiro 3al magtama3at wel modon wel eghtsad wel syasat.
w motawakka3 fe el 50 sana el gayeen en talteen sakaneen el 3alam hayb2o 3ayshen fe modon.

wa7ed men akbar el tahadeyat howa ta2leel el fa2r elly beyzid fe el modon, w tahseen wosool el fokara2 fe el modon ll morafaq el asaseya zy el ma2wa w el mayya el nadefa w el sraf el s7y w tah2e2 nmo w tatawer 3omrani mostadam w sadeeq ll be2a.

el mo2tamar el 3alami lel modon howa tajmo3 bey7sl kol sneteen w bet7adro magmo3a kbeera men el shoraka2, men monazammat gheir 7okomiya w monazammat magtame3ya w mo7tarefen fe magal el takhteet el 3omrani w akadimeyen w 7okomat w sel6at mahleya w gam3eyat watania w dawleya ll 7okomat el mahleya.
el mo2tamar bydi kol el atraf de manset moshtaraka 3ashan yn2asho 2adayya el tawso3 el 3omrani bshkel rasmy w ghyr rasmy w y5argo b2ktar7at 3amalia 3ashan y5al2o modon mostadama.
el dawra el talta men el mo2tamar el 3alami lel modon (wufiii) hatstadefha 7okoma kanada.
w hatetm fe vancouver, kanada, men 19 le7ad 23 yunyo 2006 w haykoon mawdohaha el ra2eesi "mosta2balna: modon mostadama - ta7weel el afkar le af3al".
3edad el nas elly bet7dro el mo2tamar el 3alami lel modon zad bshkel kbeer men 1200 fe el dawra el ola fe nairobi fe 2002, le7ad 4400 fe el dawra el tanya fe barcelona fe 2004.
el mo2tamar naje7 3ashan by5talaf 3an el hay2at el 7akema fe el omam el mot7eda.

bema eno mesh tashre3y w mesh beymeesh 3ala 2a7kam el e5rarat el rasmeia elly bet7kom 3ada2 ejtema3at el omam el mot7eda el rasmeia, fetrtebat el 3aml fe el mo2tamar btkon baseta w ghyr rasmeia b2et3amad 3ashan toled n2ash sa7y w shamel 3an 2adayya el tawso3 el 3omrani.
el mosharaka mftou7a gedan 3ashan tesma7 be7war fa3al ben kol el atraf elly betshtegl 3ala 2adayya el tawso3 el 3omrani.

wazeerat el mawared el bashareya w el tanmeya el egtema3eya el kanadeya, el sayeda diane finley, 2alet en kanada sa3eeda bsherektha ma3 barnamaj el omam el mot7eda ll mostawtanat el bashareya (un-habitat) 3ashan testadef el dawra el talta men el mo2tamar el 3alami lel modon (wuf3) fe vancouver, wa7da men agmal w aktar modon kanada mostadama.
w 2alet: "2abl 30 sana, vancouver kant makan awl mo2tamar ll omam el mot7eda ll mostawtanat el bashareya.

el egtema3 el tare5y da 2ada le fahm geded 3an el modon w el magtama3at, w el e7teyaaj el mol7 enha tb2a mostadama w te7'alef tawazoon da3em ben el madina w el reef."w 2adat el wazeera: "ba3d 30 sana, el tawso3 el 3omrani fe el 3alam bey7sal bshkel asrar, w e7na benwageh tahadeyat mohema 3ashan n2addem en da ye7sal b2asloob mostadam.
ana mo2mena en el 7okoma momken tela3b dwr mohem fe benya magtama3at 2aweya, bel ta3awon el wase3 ma3 el monazammat el mahleya w el mowatneen el afraad.

ana b2od3o kol el mehtemmeen l7odoor wuf3 w mosharket afkarakom ll 3aml 3ashan n5allee modon el 3alam w magtama3ato amaken a7san ll 3aysha w el 3aml w el zeeyara.", w 2adat el wazeera 2alaf el mosharakeen el motawakka3 7odoorhom ll mo2tamar.

el modera el tanfeethya ll barnamaj el omam el mot7eda ll mostawtanat el bashareya (un-habitat), el sayeda anna tibaijuka, sa3eeda b2ostadafa el dawra el gaya men el mo2tamar el 3alami lel modon fe vancouver, kanada, makan mo2tamar el omam el mot7eda ll mostawtanat el bashareya fe 1976, elly 2ada le ensha2 wakaala tab3eya ll omam el mot7eda mokhasasa l tanmeya el mostawtanat el bashareya ba3d sena.

fe 5etam el dawra el talta men el mo2tamar el 3alami lel modon fe barcelona, shakarat el sayeda tibaijuka 7okoma kanada 3ala "da3wetha ll 3awda le vancouver, makan meelad barnamaj el omam el mot7eda ll mostawtanat el bashareya fe 1976".

ya gama3a, elnaharda kan fe agtma3 mohem ben eldoctor mostafa madbouly, rayes magles elwzar2, w eldoctor amr talaat, wezeer el-etessalat w teknologia elmalomat, 3ashan ytabe3o akher elttaworat fe mashro3at elwezara.

fahm anmat el-monafasa w el-tahyeen been el-boom el-morkat w el-boom el-mokhtatel-ba7eth el-ra2eesi: wool (game3at kalifernia, san francisco), dambatcher (akadimeyet kalifernia lilm3lomat)el-khalfeya: el-boom el-morkat (strix occidentalis) teyor kbeera w ferida te3eesh fel-ghabaat el-2adima fel-gareb el-amreeki el-shamali.
khilal el-qarn el-fatit, 3ana el-boom el-morkat men enkhfade 7ad fel-3adad men 3'eer ma7aloh el-mawael be-sabab 2as-set el-ashgar w el-monafasa ma3a el-boom el-mokhtat el-ghazi (strix varia).
el-boom el-mokhtat maw6anah el-2asli shar2 amreeka el-shamaliya, lakenoh etwas3a mo7'aran fel-na6a2 gharban 3abr canada w mn ba3d gam3an jonoban 3ala tool el-sa7el el-gharbi.
3ala ra3m en el-boom el-mokhtat ma3roof btefw2oh 3ala el-boom el-morkat fel-manate2 elly beyewjodo feha el-etnein, laken moosh men el-ma3roof ela ay mad'a tehayano el-etnein fel-bareya.

ba3d el-magmo3at men el-boom el-mokhtat fel-kalifernia bed'o safat wase6a been el-boom el-mokhtat el-shar2i w el-boom el-morkat, elly beyshir 2ema le-tahyeen 7adith aw takayof 7adith ma3a bey2at gededa.

el-nogoh: khotna howa estekhlaas byanateq el-taseel el-genom el-kaamel men 7'afef el-tagh6eya men magmo3a wase3a men el-3eyanat, bel-2afada men tarayeq gededa le-qeyas el-tahyeen w el-enteqaa, lel-2egaba 3ala el-2es2ala de.

el-mawared: la2 w 7'alas, a7'adna be-tawleed tajmee3 2aweli lel-genom el-kaamel lel-boom el-morkat (moghtalaf 7ajm el-2as'at 7awaly 3 megabyte), estekhlaas tasleel elumina lel-maktabat elly 3'er motadakhela w el-mo2tareena ma3a 7'afef 2edraj betraw7 men 170 base le-10 kilobyte.

3'eer keda, 3'andena byanateq tasleel el-genom el-kaamel be-mo3'at 20 dafa3 men boom mokhtat shar2i wa7ed, w byanateq tasleel el-genom el-kaamel be-mo3'at men 0.02 le-2 dafa3 men 52 3eyna boom 2'eerhom, bel-2afada men el-boom el-morkat w el-boom el-mokhtat w el-tahyeenat el-mo7tamila (aktharhom 2al men 0.5 dafa3 el-tagh6eya).
el-lisanis el-motaqaddem fe el-tamreede (apn)aaraf aktar 3an shahadat el-apn wel-furs el-kteer fe magal el-tamreede el-motaqaddem.
momarradeen el-youm el-motaqaddameen (apns) bey2omou be maham kant mawsooda lel-dokatra bass.
beysa3dou ba2i el-mohaneeyeen fe el-magal el-tibbi we beysharfou 3ala raya7a el-marda, we ketir menhom motakhasseseen fe magalat zey teb el-atfal, el-awram, we teb el-osra.
fe furs kteer fe magal el-tamreede el-motaqaddem besabab no2s el-momarradeen el-7ali we el-talab 3ala el-mohandeseen el-se7yeen el-mo2ahleen.

mesh bass el-apns bey3emlou floss kwayesa we beyishtaghlu fe wa2t feeh furs lel-tamreede, laken kaman beyestamte3ou bel-radah el-youmi men mosa3ada el-marda fe el-ta3afi men el-amrad wel-ejra2at el-tibbiya.
el-takhasosat weshahadat el-apntayeb ezay teb2a momarrad motaqaddem?

el-momarrad elly ma3ah magisteer betesmena momarrad motaqaddem (apn), we fe arba3 anwa3 menhom:momarrad momares (np) - el-momarrad el-momares beyewafor raya7a asasiya morkeza 3ala fegha mo3ayana men el-marda aw 7aga se7ya mo3ayana, ma3a el-qodra 3ala ketaba rawshatat.
momarrad takhdeer mo3tamad (crna) - momarrad el-takhdeer el-mo3tamad beyedir el-takhdeer le kol anwa3 el-garahate.

momarrad motakhasses seerki (cns) - el-momarradeen el-motakhasseen seerkian beyewafrou raya7a motakhassa fe 3edad men el-magalat: el-qalb, el-awram, teb 7adethey el-wilada, el-nisa'a wel-welada, teb el-atfal, el-a3sabe, wel-se7a el-nafsya.
momarrada welada mo3tamada (cnm) - momarradat el-welada beyewafrou raya7a ma qabl el-welada, beyesa3dou fe welada el-atfal, we beyegadrou raya7a ma ba3d el-welada lel-setat el-tabi3eya wel-se7ya.
el-tamreede el-motaqaddem mozaher fe sen3'ya el-raya7a el-se7ya el-naharda besabab no2s el-momarradeen.
el-apns beyegadem khidmaat kant betet2adem abl keda 3ala eed el-dokatra.
qawanen mamarasa el-tamreede betekhtalef beshkel kebeer been el-welayat, we bet3aref belzabt el-momarradeen el-motaqaddameen yeqdrou ya3moulou eh.

el rowaya di mn naw3eya el rowayat elly bettana2a belmostaqbal (aw elly byesemoha el rowayat did elutopia) w nazlet fe sana 1949.

el-dababir w nahl el-3asal w el-sirab - ba3d el-ma3lomat el-asasia.
noshir fi 14 yunyu 2018 fi el-sa3a 07:05e7na kmo7tarefin fi mokaf7a el-7asharat bnet3amel ma3 3shoush el-dababir laken mesh bnet3alag nahl el-3asal, khososan lama ykoon fi sarab.
el-7asharat di haadia nesbian w momken yelmeha morabi nahl mahali momken telagih men khilal el-ba7th 3an gam3ia morabi el-nahl el-britania.
sora lesarab fi shajira fi holi port elly ra7naloh el-osbo3 dah.

hena fi midnehed lemokaf7a el-afaat, bnbda nenshagh fi el-ta3amol ma3 el-dababir w 3shoush el-dababir; el-sayef ge w kol ma el-donia bitsakhin aktar, bneshof ziyada sarie3a fi a3dad el-dababir w el-ndaat lemo3alaghetaha.
fi haga e7na mesh bnet3alagha w mesh mo7taga ay tadakhul men mokaf7i el-afaat w heya sirab nahl el-3asal, lesa galna ndaa men holi port 3ashan 7aga etsemet "dababir" lama kanat fi el-7aqeeqa sarab.
el-sirab dah ghair mo2azi w bey7sal besabab zohoor dokhor el-nahl fi khaliya el-nahl elly ba3d keda betetzawwag ma3 malikat el-nahl.
el-sirab bey7sal besabab enqasam juz2 men el-most3amara 3ashan tatabe3 malika mofasala w fi el-nehayya tekoun most3amrataha el-khasa.
sarab nahl el-3asal momken yehtewi men 12,000 le 30,000 nahl w dah juz2 ghareizi w tabi3i men dawra el-taka7or el-sanaweya lemost3amra nahl el-3asal.
el-sirab dah 3adaan beyzaher men most3amarato fi el-ayam el-daafya w el-mashmosa, w la2an el-nahl beykoon malyan bel-3asal w beyb7as 3an beit gedid, feb2a 3adaan hadi w mesh mohtam bel-bshr.
sarab nahl el-3asal zy elly etsalona biano, hytgama3o kolhom mo2aqtan fi makan wahid, zy far3 shagara aw shajira.
tajamo3 el-nahl beyteraw7 7ajmo men 7ajm grapefroot kbeer le 7ajm kora salla w ahyanan akbar.
ba3d keda bettatalag el-nahl el-kashafa 3ashan tedawwar 3ala beit monaseb, zy fatha fi shagara aw mabna.
wogood el-sirab momken yestamer men kam sa3a le kam yom, le7ad ma yelago tajoof monaseb.

fi awakhir mayu w yunyu, khaliya nahl el-3asal hikoom fi talat anwa3 men nahl el-3asal; malika wa7ida, kam alf men dokhor el-nahl (7awaly 15% men sakkan el-khalia) w 3asharat el-alfat men el-3amalat el-enath.

el-dababir men na7ia tania hikoom 3andha malika wa7ida w 7awaly kam mayet men el-3amalat el-enath; el-3adad dah hizid besor3a delwa2ty le7ad ma yewsal le a3la mostawa fi awgoost w septembir, w hikoom 3andohom 7awaly 15,000 daboor ontha.
law la2eet 3esh dababir, el-afdal te3alago bdari badal ma tesebha le7ad ma tekbar w teb2a forsa ennak tetlad3.

kristian el-tamen, esmo bel-kaamel kristian fredrick (mawleed 18 september 1786, copenhagen - tawaffa 20 yanuary 1848, amalienborg, denmark), malek denmark khilal soo3od el-mo3arada el-lebraliya didd el-7okm el-mutlaq fel-nesf el-awal men el-qarn el-tase3 19.

fe heen kan la yezal waly 3ahd denmark we 7akem norway, kabal kristian entekhabo kamalek le-norway fe 1814 men gher el-fasel el-norweegi el-mo2ayed lestiklal, welly rafad el-e3teraf betanazel norway le-sweden.
wma3a keda, ba3d 2i9ada mo9awama ghayr mojdia didd el-swedyeen, 2ejbar kristian 3ala el-tanazel 3an el-3arsh.
zaret ta3a6fat kristian el-lebraliya be-wodo7 fe el-7aleka de, we lama raga3 le-denmark, nazar ilyih el-moshrafoon el-mo7afezon fel-dawla be 3een el-reeba.
3ashan keda ba2a be3eed 3an el-sho2oon el-3amma 7atta 1831, lama en7as le-majles el-dawla.
end ma3telayih el-3arsh ba3d wafato waledo fredrick el-sades fe 1839, tarak kristian el-tamen lebraliyeto el-sabaqa we 9awem beshada me6alib da3at el-nezam el-dostoury.
wma3a keda, 2eslah nezam el-sojoon we 3awad el-barlaman el-2eslandy (althing) fe 1843.
tawaffa kristian el-tamen fe 1848, lama kanet el-7amma tesayter 3ala el-ta7reed el-lebraly we el-qawmy fe denmark.
ana 7esham, ragel masry 3ala 2ad 7ali, 3ayesh fe 2esem el basateen, el kahera, ma3 mertty we 3yaly.
sam3t 5abar 7elw elnaharda, kolyet el 3oloum fe gam3et helwan fat7et program geded esmoh "el taknologia el 7yewya el gazmeyya" ta7t ra3ayet el doctor magd nagm.
bey2olk el program dah hay5arag kharegeen gamdeen, yeqdarw yenafaso fe so2 el shogh, we dah 3an teery2 taqdeem barameg akademeya we 7ewat 3elmeya gamda.

bas tab3an "ta2ty el reyah bema la tash7y el sofon", ya3ny mesh kelly elly beyetmanna el mar2 bey7aslo, lazzem nakhod balna men dah.
el program dah bey2adem bakaloryoos fe el taknologia el 7yewya el gazmeyya, we bey5od 136 sa3a ma3tmeda 3ala madar 8 fosol darasyya.
ya3ny mesh sahal, bas elly yesar yenool.
wel gameel fe el mawdoo3 en el talaba bedroso 7agat mohma zy el kimya el 7yewya wel mikrobeyology we byology el khalya, we kaman fe moqarrarat ekhtyarya zy 3elm el samom wel byology el esha3eya.
ana 3agbny awy enhom mohtemmen bel gawda, wel program ma3tamad men el hay2a el kawmeyya le daman gawdet el ta3leem wel e3temad.
we kaman byedaw 2ehtemam kbeer lel ganeb el 3amaly, bey3melo tadreebat 3amalya lel talaba 3ashan yeb2o jahzeen le so2 el shogh.
bas tab3an mesh ay 7ad momken yed5ol el program dah, lazzem yekon ma3ah shahada thanaweya 3amma 3elmy aw ma3adela, we kaman lazzem yekon maqboul fe kolyet el 3oloum.
ya3ny mesh sahla, bas el wa7ed law 7at fe damagho 7aga, rabena byesahlaha.

feekr fe el-tarak el-mokhtalafa le-tamtheel el-7ala fe prolog.
awalan, fe el-tare2a el-wazefeya, elly beyetm feha temreer 7ala el-program bega maleyya men modda3' le modda3' fe sora 7ogaz ezdya2eya.
ma enha tare2a morhega, bas betetfa3el kwees ma3 el-traga3: lama bey7sal fashl, el-taghyeerat elly 7asalet fe 7ala el-program betetraga3 telka2yan.
tare2a tanya le-tamtheel el-7ala fe prolog howa estekhlaas modda3'at el-tala3eb be 2a2eda el-beyanate el-medmadega "assert" we "retract".
el-tare2a de el-ejra2eya de leha meza enha mesh m7taga el-modda3'at te5od 7ogaz ezdya2eya, bas lel-asaf mesh betetfa3el kwees ma3 el-traga3.
we dah 3ashan "assert" we "retract" 3amelyat modammera, ya3ny betesta7mel 7atta ba3d el-traga3.
fa lama bey7sal fashl, el-mobarmeg lazmo yet2aked en kol "assert" etraga3 we el3aks sa7ee7, we dah mesh sahel ta72ee2oh.

law bas el-mobarmeg kan 3ando emkaneeyet el-wosool le neskh khasa men "assert" we "retract" elly betraga3 telka2yan atharha el-ganebeya lama betetraga3 3anha, el-tare2a el-ejra2eya kant hatemken men ba3d asaleeb el-barmaga el-mothera lel-2ahteyam elly mosta7eel ta3melha fe lougha ejra2eya "7a2e2eya".
we be shakl mothera lel-e7teyam, tim menzies beywade7lena ezay tenfath el-nuskh de fe kam setr bas men prolog el-qyasay.
(ma kontsh 2ablet el-7eela de abl keda, bas 3adam mobalat tim bet5aleeny afaker enha ma3rofa kwees fe mogtama3 prolog).
fe nuskha men el-modda3' "assert" elly beyerga3 nafso telka2yan lama betetraga3:assert2(x) :- assert(x).
el-sharteen el-2awaleen fo2 dol bey5alee "assert2" yetasaraf zy "assert" el-3ady law el-este3lam elly etest5dam feh nag7.
bas law el-este3lam fashl, el-program hayatabe3 el-traga3 le7ad el-no2ta elly etest5dam feha "assert2" we hayegarab el-shart el-tany, elly beyerga3 el-7a2e2a elly etm takyeedo bel-shart el-2awwalany.
assert2(x) :- retract(x), fail.
we be shakel meshabe7, momken na3raf "retract2" keda:retract2(x) :- retract(x).
bas feekr fe elly hay7sal law el-7oje2a beta3et "retract2" mesh mawgooda aslan fe 2a2eda beyanat prolog.
el-shart el-2awalany (elly byest5dem "retract") hayfashal, fa el-program hayegarab el-shart el-tany, elly hay2aked 7a2e2a makontsh etraga3et men el-asass!
momken nesla7 el-moshkela de be-3eed seyaqa "retract2" le modda3'een, zy ma howa mawdo7 ta7t:retract2(x) :- assert(x), fail.
retract2(x) :- x, reallyretract2(x).
reallyretract2(x) :- retract(x).
reallyretract2(x) :- assert(x), fail.

el-taf7 el-geldy el-ta7asseesy sha3'el gedan, w sa3at beyb2a sa3b n3raf eh elly msebbo.
momken el-taf7 yeb2a bsabab 7agat ketir zy el-smak el-saam, aw tfa3'ol ta7asseesy ma3 do2a aw akl, aw estejaba le mard.
el-ekzeema el-ta7asseesya (el-tehab el-geld el-ta2teby) w el-shara (el-ertekaarya) men ashher anwa3 el-taf7 el-geldy.
el-ekzeema betseeb men 10 l-20% men el-atfal w men 1 l-3% men el-kebar.
el-ekzeema de mstala7 le 3edda anwa3 mokhtelafa men twrem el-geld.
mesh khatira, laken aktar anwa3'ha betsabeb a7marar el-gel w twarmo w 7aka.
el-3awamel elly momken tesabeb el-ekzeema te2dem amrad tanya, w mawad mohayga, w ta7assesat, w tarkebtek el-geneya.
el-shara 3ebra 3an bothoor aw entefakhat 7amra betzahr 3al el-gism.
7awaly 20% men el-amerikan bey3ano men el-shara fe wagt ma fe 7eyathom.

el-artekaarya, aw el-shara, 3ebra 3an zohoor mfag2 l-bothoor aw lway7at mentefkha w baheta el-lon 3al el-gel (tsma el-wothmat) - ema bsabab rad fa3l el-gism el-salby tgaah ba3d el-mawad el-msebba l-7asasya, aw lasbab maghoora.
eltehab el-geld el-tmasy bey7sal lama el-geld ylmes ema mada msebba l-7asasya aw 7aga bettheygo, w bysabeb a3rad zy el-taf7 el-geldy, w el-enteffakhat, w el-7aka w el-7ar2an.
aktar 7alat eltehab el-geld el-tmasy mesh bet7sal bsabab mada msebba l-7asasya, laken bsabab 7aga btheyg el-geld zy el-saboon w el-monazefat w ba3d el-nabatat.

law elmagyas elly beteb3toh lelmaal lelma3ayra mesh met3ared le tshweeh aw sada2, w elmaal beyest5dem nfs elmo3ayyer w el2ajhza lelma3ayra elly est5demha fe el25tbarat elly 3amelha 3ashan yethbet 3adam elya2men, yeb2a ar9am 3adam elya2men momken tekon nfs elly fe magal 23tmad elmaal.
bas ghalban mesh hatkoon nfs elar9am elly maktoba, le2no law elmaal 3ayer magyasak benfs eltare2a elly 3amelha fe el25tebar elly 2a2dah lel23tmad, kont hatdaf3 aktar bektir lekhdemto elyomya.
fe 7ala elma3ayra fe elmawke3, zorof elmaal nadran ma betetkarar.
w bena2y, momken ykoon fe far2 kbeer ben 3adam elya2men fe eltaqreer elly betestlemoh mo2arana bel2a2ema elly maktoba fe magal 23tmad elmaal.
matlomsh ma3mal elma3ayra law ar9am 3adam elya2men fe elshoghl dah tal3et mesh wad7a.
law 3andak makhawef men ar9am 3adam elya2men elly betetbala3 beha, etkalem ma3 elmaal elly 3amel elshoghl.
w law elshoghl fe elmawke3 howa elly beyetm w elly ma3mal elma3ayra beyest5dem nfs el22em elly fe magal 23tmadoh, as2alhom 3an n6a2 daraja elharaara elly 3adam elya2men feh sa77.

law elrad elly hatestlemoh 7aga zy "nos daraga" aw ay 2a2ema tanya betkoon momkena bs fe zorof ma3mleya, w ent 3aref en daraga elharaara fe monsha2tak betetghayar be aktar men keda, yeb2a elwa2t elly targa3 feh mezaneyat 3adam elya2men elly bey2adem ma3mal elma3ayra w teb2a 3ala ay 7aga tanya mesh mazboot.
ta3le2y dah mabny 3ala efterad en 22em 3adam elya2men fe magalat elmaal bet3akes wa23 men naw3 ma.
lel2sf, ketir menha mesh bet3akes elwa23.
kent 3aref en dah hay7sal, sa7?
ba3d elmonazamat bet3ty 23tmad le ma3amel magalatha test7aq jwa2ez fe elktaba el2bda3ya bs malhash 3alaka belma3ayra el7a2e2ya.
elma3amel de bet2dar te3mel keda 3ashan elmonazamat elly bet2adem 23tmad r5ees w sare3 bet2dar te3mel keda 3an tary2 eltarkez 3ala anzema elgawda b2est5dam elawra2 elmogadma bs.
wakalat el23tmad de nadran ma betet3ada elly maktoob 3ala elwar2 w bett7a22a2 men nate2 elmaal bshkl mosta2lel.

elbyanat eltechnya le magal el23tmad ghalban betkoon m7tela, aw en elmo2ayem 3ando ma3refa aw khbera 2alela aw mafeesh kolesh w bywa2af 3ala ay 7aga shaklha ma32ol 3ala enha motalaba be 3adam elya2men.
momken mayb2ash fe moshkela kbera law ent bs mehamm belawra2 le malfatak.

bs law me7tag te7ader mezaneyat 3adam elya2men lekeyasatak elyomya - w kol shareka masna3a lazma te3mel keda, w elba3d lazma ye3mel keda 3ashan yeleby motatlabat elmo3ayyer - lazma teshmel 3adam elya2men lel2ajhza elkeyas.
law 3adam elya2men dah mesh bey3akes elwa23, mezaneyat 3adam elya2men beta3tak mesh hat3akes elwa23 w kol 7aga hatetdaharar men hena.
wakalat el23tmad elmawthoga bet7a22a2 fe eltaqareer elly betsaderha elma3amel elly m3tameda menha.
dah bey2amen en elmasaref elsa7a betetba3 fe el2balagh 3an 3adam elya2men fe elkeyas.
lel2sf, ba3d elly bey3tamed aw yesajel ma3amel elma3ayra momken mayb2osh benfs elda2a.
law 3ayez tet2aked en elar9am elly betestlemha bet3akes elwa23 elly hate3eesh beeh, rag3 eltaqareer elly betestlemha w magalat el23tmad elly waraha be3naya.
w law lazem elamr, 2a2em wakala el23tmad elly beted3amhom.
b2a heykl lmabat el3arabiat el7aditha beet3a2ad aktar w aktar, w fe nafs elwa2t wazeftaha bett7asan tadreegian.
ttwor lmabat el3arabiat mar bmarahl 4.
elgeel elawal lmsadr eldaw2 fe el3arabiat howa elw2ud (sh3'a aw zaet aw aseetilen).
elw2ud dah beyte7'ar2 3ashan yetla3 daw2.

elw2ud dah mesh byishba3 motatalabat lmabat el3arabiat fe mar7aleh el2wla bsebb kefaa2toh eldaw2ia elmonkhadifa, w 2owet daw2oh elda3'eefa, w adaa2oh ghyr elmostaqr, w ta3'qedoh fe elteshghil, w ghyroh mn el3'ioub.
elgeel eltani lmsadr eldaw2 fe el3arabiat howa elmasba7 elmtwohaj.
elmasba7 elmtwohaj e5ter3oh edison fe sana 1879.
fe sana 1913, elamrikan est5admo elmasba7 elmtwohaj lawl mara fe 3arabiat kadilak kamsabe7 amameya.
w mn sa3etha, lmabat el3arabiat mart bsalasela mn el2esla7at elthawriya w dakhlat el2edaa2a fe el3arabiat 3asr elkareba2.
ba3d keda, et5ter3et teknologia gedida zy el3akes, w elba2ed, w elmawled, w elbattareya.
w mknsh le7ad sana 1925 en el3arabiat test5dem elmsabe7 elmtwohaga bshakl wase3.
fe el5amseneiat, et5ter3et lmba eltangoostan elhalojeneia w b2et bso3'a ellmba elmosaytra kmsadr daw2 gawy fe el3arabiat.
elgeel eltalat lmsadr eldaw2 fe el3arabiat howa hid (efra2 elsh7'na 3alya elkenza).

hid beyemtaz bkefaa2a daw2ia 3alya, w stoo3 3aly, w mawtho2eya 3alya, w dah elly 5ala hid ye7'al mkan elmasba7 elmtwohaj w lmba eltangoostan elhalojeneia w yeb2a akhtyar gedid lmsadr eldaw2 fe el3arabiat.
del2oti ge elgeel elrab3 lmsadr eldaw2 fe el3arabiat - led.
led howa no3 mn elmontagat semi elmosala bwaslat pn.
lma beyet6abe2 te7'eez mowjab 3ala tarfey waslat pn, nezam elwaslat beyisht'3'l, w el7amalat htett7arak mn 7ala eltaqa elmonkhadifa le 7ala eltaqa el3alya.
fe el7ala di, el7amalat ghyr elmosta2ra fe 7ala eltaqa el3alya hterga3 le 7ala eltaqa elmonkhadifa, w b2odan htetwaled taqa zayeda htetal3 fe sora fowtonat, 7sb mabda2 7efz eltaqa.
dah howa mabda2 el2edaa2a fe led.
b3'aks masader eldaw2 fe elmarahl el2wla, led mbyetla3sh daw2 bsebb ertefa3 daraja el7'ara2a elnatag 3n eltaqa el7'areya.
fe led, eltaqa elkarebaia bett7'awel mbadan le taqa daw2ia.
tool moga eldaw2 elly beyetla3oh led betet2arr bfar2 eltaqa beyn el7amalat fe 7ala eltaqa elmonkhadifa w 7ala eltaqa el3alya.
tatbeeq led fe msadr eldaw2 elda5'ely fe el3arabiat beyetwas3 aktar.
beyetesta5dem 3ala n6a2 wase3 kmasabe7 2edaa2a 2edafya, w 2edaa2a khalfya llw7a el3edadat, w heka.
elmomaknat el2asasia el2amsa lmasba7 led el2amamy fe el3arabiat homa: masfara led, w 3akes, w 3dasa, w mobared, w da2rat 2eyada.
led mesh yetesta5dem 3ala n6a2 aws3 kmasabe7 2amameya fe el3arabiat ella lma teknolojeyat el2edaa2a fe led tte2dem.
fe elmosta2bel el9areb, ma3a t7seen gawda led w en5efad el2es3ar, montagat led hat3'mel thawra gedida fe magal el2edaa2a, w elly hat2a5'er bshakl akbar 3la t7'awol lmabat el3arabiat.

el moroor mesh wa7sh awe.
wel madan fe kol 7eta fe el 3alam 3amlto elly 3aleehom 3ashan yesehlu 3ala el saw2een yewaslo le ay makan, ma3 shwaya w2t entezar hena w henaak.
bas law kont bet2od fe aw2at 3'areeba men el youm, yeb2a aked 3aref enak mesh hatshof el eshara bettghayar bel sor3a elly enta 3ayzo.
bas, be fadhl ba7ethen, dah momken yetghayar fel mosta2bal el gareeb.
stefan lamir men gam3et dresden lel tekno logia w dirk helbing men eth zurich gabo fekra 3ashan ya3melo esharat moroor azka.
delwa2ty, anzema el esharat elly 3andena, 3ala el a2al hena fel welaayat el mot7eda, betest5dem 7agat mokhtalefa, zy el cameras, aw 7assasat fe el share3, le7ad ma3refet el wazn fe el share3.

bas, esharat el moroor el zakya de hatest5dem 7assasat 3ashan te7addad el 3edad el motawk3 lel sayarat elly gaya, w ba3deen te7addad el modda elly kol na7ya hat7tagha 3ashan teb2a 7amra 3ashan tefady el share3 men el na7ya el tanya.
3ala 2rgam men en dah momken yeban enno hay5ally w2t el entezar awla, bas howa bey2allal w2t el entezar el 3aam men 10 l 30%.
el ba7ethen delwa2ty beyesta5dem el fekra de fe manazer regmeyya, bas en sha2 allah el tamweel haywassel 3ashan yetm tarkeb esharat el moroor el zakya de fe kol el 3alam.

qera2et el-tawrat: 5okhooj 1:1-6:1qera2et el-haftarah: ash3'ya2 27: 6-28:13, 29:22-23weel l-tag el-mtekebber, lesokara 2efra2eem, elly gamalhom el-baheer zahra zabila fe ras el-awdeya el-khadra, l-ly homa tagallab 3aleehom el-khamr!
ha howa el-rab 3ando gawy w 3azeem, zay 3asfa bard w 3asfa madmera, zay feyoodan mayya 3azeeema motadfa2a, elly hay-essakthom 3al-ard be-eedoh.

tag el-tekebber, sokara 2efra2eem, hay-edassoon taht el-2a2dam; w gamalhom el-baheer zahra zabila fe ras el-wadi el-akhdar, zay el-thamar el-2awal abl el-sayf, elly yerah el-mora2eb; ye'kolooha w heya lazeez fe eedo.
ash3'ya2 28: 1-4yekhatab el-nabi el-mamlaka el-shmalyya elly kanet betet3araf be-mamlaket 2esra2eel w mamlaket 2efra2eem.
deeh el-mamlaka elly et2aset fe el-ard el-mamno7a le-2efra2eem lamma 2aqsam yash3' el-omma ba3d do5oolhom 2ard el-m3ad.
le-el-mawqe3 el-geoghrafee et7araket el-2asabe3 el-3ashara lamma tamaredo 3ala yehuda elly kan mawgood fe el-qods w daw'eha.

w be-sora 2asra2a 2adart el-mamlaka el-shmalyya tamaredha be-taghyer el-awqat w el-mawaseem, w taghyer el-ta3leemaat elly fe el-tawrat le-tenteeseb ma3a afdaleyathom, w fe el-nehayet etghazoohom ba3d 70 sana bas w etshatathom ben el-2omam.
betet7addad 2asl asasy le-tamaredhom fe el-kalemat el-efteta7eya: weel le-tag el-mtekebber...
stott, ragel motawade3 be-shakl mela7'oz zoy 2a2darat w enjazat 3azeeema, byentaseb leeh el-tasree7 el-mokhtasar 3an el-kebra2 w el-tawado3.
enno beyro7 besara2a le-2alb eh elly bey3allemoh el-ketab el-mokaddas 3an el-2asl el-memet le-5atayana w 7azana.
2al stott: "el-kebra2 howa 3adoak el-2akbar, w el-tawado3 howa sadeekak el-2a3zam."ma seme3na keteer 2akhran 3an el-mawdoo3 da, mesh keda?
eh elly kan bey3teref beeh 3al-madr el-tar5 k-2akhar el-radayel besara7a be7'tefal beeh k-fazela fe mogtama3na el-7ali.
el-kebra2 w el-ghatroosa wade7een ben el-2aghnya w el-2a2waya w el-nag7een w el-mashaher w el-mashaher men kol el-anwa3, w lesaw2 el-7'eer, kaman fe ba3d el-2a2demeyeen el-deenyeen.
w howa kaman 7'ay w be-se7a w 2a7'bar fe el-shakhsyat el-3adyeen, be-ma feehom kol wa7ed menna.
w ma3'aloob, yefham el-2a2al menna madayeh khatartoh 3ala 2arwa7'na w ezay bey3'eez be-shakl kbeer 3ala 3ala2etna el-7ameema ma3a allah w 7obna lel-2a5areen.
men na7yet tany, el-tawado3 beyentazar leeh keteer 3ala enno da3f, w el-2a2al menna yefham keteer 3anho wala bey7'osoh.
w ma3'aloob, le-5eer 2arwa7'na, ne7'tagey fahm 2awda7 lel-kebra2 w el-tawado3 w ezay netkhala 3an wa7ed menhom w netbany el-2a5er.

el-kebra2 beyetla2 awel mara fe el-ketab el-mokaddas fe s'afar el-takoon 3, feen nshoof el-shaytan, da el-roh el-mtekebber zay ma wsefoh ba3dhom, beyest5'adm el-kebra2 k-tareeq le-2eghwa2 weldna el-2awal.
met5'ed shakl 7'eyt, kan nah'oh baset laken memet.
2awal 7aga, te7'alef be-ghatroosa eh elly 2alooh allah le-7awa2 3an akl el-fekha el-m7arama w et7'am allah bel-kedb.
da el-rafd el-sadem le-kalemat allah 2a3ta 7awa2 emkaneya men 3adam el-eman elly ma kanet ma3roofa men abl w 2athar el-shak fe 3a2lha 3an mawthoo3yet allah.
w fe nafs el-tany, jazarha el-shaytan le-5ed3 2a3'ma men 7'lal el-2ed3a2 enno sabab kedb allah howa men3ha men enaha tetmatta3 be-kol barakat 7alat'ha.
kan hadofoh ta7'yeef eman 7awa2 w ye5aleehom te5'od fe sedk allah.
bema en 7awa2 kanet fe 7ala menteya mesh moshawwaha w med'oo3a delwa2ty, kanet betefaker fe el-emkaneyat, w beset 2a2wy raghbet'ha enha teb2a 'shebeha be-allah'.
baset el-fekha el-m7arama 2a3'la.
zadet el-raghba, w gebt ma3aha el-meyl lel-tabreer w men 7'lal keda et'akal ay meyl le-2era2'etha le-moqawamet el-2egra2 el-m3'rod.
2a5eran, 2ad3'fet 7awa2 men 3adam el-eman, w estedraj'ha el-kebra2, w 2aw2etha el-5ed3 el-2a7'er fe fakh, fa3'set 2amr allah.
fe kam kelma zakeeya w m5ade3a, 2a2dar el-shaytan yest5'adm el-ana le-7adoth se9o7 7awa2 w garo2 el-jens el-beshery fe el-5arab el-ro7y.
de el-3ameleya el-2adima laken el-malof gedan deh betwageh kol wa7ed menna yomyan.
el-2egra2 be-ekhtyar el-nafs 3ala allah howa 2amya 2amya.

el-esraf fe el-nafs, w el-shaf2a 3ala el-nafs, w el-ta3'zeem el-nafsy, w el-2era2a el-nafsya, w akh'oz el-nafs 3ala me7'z bel-jed w el-tafkeer aktar fe el-nafs aktar men ma yeb2a lazem nefker feeh homa kolohom 2a3rad lel-kebra2 fe el-2alb elly mayerdesh 2elahna.
2al el-nabi mikhah keda: la2 fe3lan
- alo, alo, izaik ya om khaled, 3amla eh elnaharda?
