- ah, sam3et 3anho, dah mosalsal bey2addem 2esawy w 7ekayat mofasla 3an 2a2ayed elmara2a, kol 7ekaya betkoon 5 7ala2at.
- belzabt keda, welly shadny aktar en el7ekaya elly hayebda2o beha esmaha "ghalia", w botolet dora.
- ayo, ya setty, heya di, w bet2ool fel promo enha bentazel el super market bel short w el shabshab!
di akid hatkoon 7ekaya mothera llgadlal.
- belzabt, khososan enha betetkalem 3an 2a2ayed elmara2a.
ana 3arfa enek mesh betetabe3y mosalsalat ketir, bas 2olt yemken dah yeshdek.
- wallah ya lobna, ana mesh men hawayat elmosalsalat, bas 3arfa eh elly shadny fel mawdoo3 dah?
- asl ana sam3et en el7ekaya di feha tihdeedat w drama kawya, w kamen betmas 7aya elmazare3 elbaseet w elsetat fel 2ora.

- la tab3an, ana bakhtar leehom el barameg elly betesa3edohom fel ta3leemohom, w ben7awel na3mel tawazon been el tarfeeh w el ta3leem.

ma3 el salama ya lobna, w hab2a atasal beek tani.
- ma3 el salama ya om khaled, 5ady balk men nafsik.
khatwa mohima tanya le ay 7aga bt3mlha howa el ra7a.
wel ra7a di ma3naha fatra mn 3adam el nashat aw el esterkha2 aw el noom 3shan trga3 nashit tani.
el mo2assa el watania lel noom 3mlt derasat w tl3et en 40 meelion amreeky 3ndhom no3 mn e6terabat el noom, 7atta 69% mn el 3yal 3ndhom masha'kel fe el noom kam mara fe el osboo3.
shwya mn 2olt el noom di tabi3ya fe el 7aya w mesh bt2bl moshkla 7a2e2ya gher lma tb2a 7ala mzmna, bs eh elly bey7sal l gosamna lma mn5odsh el kmeia el kafaia mn el noom?

mn el 3wa2eb el wa7'ha hy 7awadeth el 3arabeyat, w 2olt el 2a2dra 3la el ta3lem, w el twtr, w da3f el 7okm 3la el omor, bs kman bthlak gosamna w ta2ther 3la kol 7aga l2n 2olt el noom btsebb da5t 3la el gosm.
zy ma el noom mohim l gosamna, ana shaif en el ra7a mohima l el tabi3a kman.

el-fayoum kromositoma, elly betetsamma kaman awram gelomous, bet7asal fe amaken mokhtalafa fe el-ras wel-regba.
nos kol el-fayoum kromositoma taqreeban betezhar fe el-3adam 3ala ganb el-ras/el-gamaga (el-3adam el-saddagi).
el-awram di baseta nesbiya waghanan betkon mertabeta be awram 3asabya tanya betetkon fe el-ajina, zy awram el-kimo diktoma we awram el-neuro kristobatik.

lama el-waram dah yezhar kaafa baseta we mo3zola, momken te7es be a3rad kamel nesbiya.

el-karnabeet khadar baset w mata7 fe kol 7eta w 2ader 3ala mo7araba el-sara7'an.
melian bel-3anaser el-ghizayia zy khadar el-3ayla el-kornabia elly howa menha.

3ashan testafeed men kol fawa2'ed el-karnabeet w el-khadar el-kornabia el-tanya lazem takolo yomyan.
momken tenaw3 been el-khadar el-kornabia 3ashan el-taghyeer, laken lazem takol 3/4 kob men el-khadar dee yomyan.

el-karnabeet lono abyad w asher khadar fe el-3ayla el-kornabia yallyeh el-malfouf.

eid el3omala beda emta?
el3eed elmodaren dah beyetabe3 aslo le mawkeb menzmem fe madinat new york sana 1882.

2a2adet elneqabat el3omaleia kanu da3aw le mawkeb samoh "moharag 3eed el3omala elda7em" yom eltalat, 5 sebtember, 3ala 7sb linda stenson, mo2arrakha sabega fe wizaret el3aml (fekra elmoharag el3am lel3omala mamken tekoun get mn canada, elly bet3tbar brdo "yom el3omala" agaza rasmeia fe awel yom etneen fe sebtember).
felbedaia elsab7, 2aleel mn elnas kanu 7adru, welmonzemen kanu 2al2anen en el3omala kanu metredden yed7u be yom mn moratabhom 3ashan yenzemu lel mawkeb.
bas bad shwaya, elgom3a bedat tegi mn kol 7etta fe elmadina, w7ad 2a5er elnahar 7awaly 10,000 shakhs kanu fe el mawkeb we entamu lel e7tefalat ba3d keda felly el sahafa sametha "yom elsha3b".
emta b2a agaza rasmeia?
el e7tefalat elsanaweya de entasharat fe kol elbalad, bas 3eed el3omala ma2besh agaza rasmeia le7ad bad aktr mn 3ash sneen.
wlayet oregon kanet awel wlayet te3len 3eed el3omala agaza rasmeia fe 1887, we wlayat tanya zy new york, massachusetts, we colorado 3amlu zayha ba3d keda.
fe 3ahd elra2ees grover cleveland, we fe wast wa3y metzayed bel7araka el3omaleia, awel yom etneen fe sebtember b2a agaza rasmeia fe 1896.
leh b2a fe awel yom etneen fe sebtember?
2a2adet elneqabat kanu da3'u 3ashan yekoun el mawkeb fe sebtember fe madinat new york, welly etzamant ma3 mo2tamar fe elmadina lelforsan el3omaleen, wa7da mn akbar we a2wa elneqabat.
awel yomeyn 3eed 3omala fe new york kanu fe 5 sebtember, bas fe 1884, el3eed eltalet b2a fe awel yom etneen fe sebtember, welnahardah dah estemr.
mawkeb sebtember dah kan haytsadam ma3 yom el3omala el3alami fe awel may, welly tal3 mn elly et3araf be2asmyet haymarket.
fe 4 may 1886, elmotazahreen fe chicago etgma3u 3ashan yatalbu be yom 3aml 8 sa3at.
naghet a5er elnahar, elmozahra elsalmia et7awalat le3onf lama 2andofa et7adfet naghet elshorta, we 2atalat wa7ed menhom 3ala tool we asabet nas tanya.
elshorta radet be2etla2 elnadher 3ala eljom3, we 2atalat 3adad lsa mesh ma3roof mn elnas.

el7adatha de atharat ghadab elnesh2a el3omaleen, bas kaman zodat elmakhaof fe amreka en el7araka el3omaleia b2et motataraf, we dah ady le2a9am magmo3at el3omala: elly 7adfat el2andofa ma3rafsh, bas arba3a etshan2u sebab et7amhom belmosharaka fe el7adatha.
bad 2asyet haymarket, 2a2adet elneqabat wel2ishtirakyeen a3lenu awel may yom el3omala el3alami, welnahardah dah et7afel bih beshkl ghyr rasmi fe amreka.
dah kaman elnahardah elly akter elbalad bet7tfl bih rasmy aw ghyr rasmy k3eed lel3omala.
bas lama elra2ees grover cleveland karar ye3mel 3eed 3omala watany, ekhtar eno yetjanab eltarikh elmo3akkad beta3 may.
tab eih elfar2 bein 3eed el3omala we yom el3omala el3alami (yom el3omala) fe amreka?
jonathan cutler, ostaz mos3ed fe 3elm el2ijtema3 fe jam3et wesleyan, wasaf 3eed el3omala 3ala enno "bedayel 7okoomy" le yom el3omala fe mo2aaba ma3 el2ethaa2 elwatany 3an 2asyet haymarket.
yom el3omala momken yekoun sa3ed fe eltrawyej le3eed watany, bas 3eed el3omala mertabet ma3 ma3na mokhtalef.
"yom el3omala kan mertabet daiman ma3 eltalab be2a2al sa3at 3aml we 2ajr a3la; 3eed el3omala bey7tfl be 'karamet' elshogl", dah elly 2aloh cutler felmo2aaba.
a7na 3andena yom el etneen agaza, bas el3omala lsa bey7tfelu bel3eed dah?
le7ad delwa2ty feh mawkeb kbeer fe madinat new york (we fe madan tanya fe elbalad, kbera we saghera), we hashtag #2owet_elneqaba haykoon manshar 3ala twitter.

ezay elqanawat el-i3lamya el-kebeera betestakhdem twitter?
khedmet twitter lel-tawasol el-ejtema3y wel-resayel 3al internet (el-ma3rofa kamen besm ada el-tadween el-mogr) ettala2et yom 15 yoolyo 2006.
fi 2011, kan et2al en 3andha 7waly 200 million mostakhdem 3alami.

w e3tibar2an men yoonyo 2011, 13% men el-amreekan 3al internet 2alo enohom beyestakhdmo twitter, w dah besab 2e2a3at mashro3 pew lel-internet w el-7aya el-amrekeya, w dah qafza kbeera men 8% fi nobember 2010.
akter 7aga momayza fi el-ada di hi 7odooha, welly mesh mokhtelafa kteer 3an khadmet el-resayel el-naseya (sms aw khadmet el-resayel el-2aseera).
el-taghreedat el-fardeya mo7dodah be 140 7arf, w dah bey5ally ay fard aw monazma aw mo2essa aw 3alama tegarya te2dar te2ool elly 3ayzah fi taghreeda wa7da.

ay 7ad ye2dar yedawwer 3al taghzeeyat twitter elly momken tehmooh, saw2an bel-esm aw bel-mawdoo3 aw bel-hashtag, w dah ramz mo3ayan lel-mawdoo3 bey2dar el-mostakhdemeen y7addooh le mawdoo3 aw 7adath mo3ayan.
el-mostakhdemeen kamen momken ye5taraw ennohom yetaba3o taghzeeyet twitter mo3ayana, w dah ma3nah ennohom heystaqbelow kol el-taghreedat men el-qan2a aw el-fard dah.
fi sayaq el-akhbar, dah bey5ally el-mostakhdemeen ennohom ye5taraw akhbarhom benafsohom.
law mostakhdem 3amal e3ada taghreeda (y3ny 7ot taghreeda 7ad tany fi taghzeeyetoh 3al twitter), momken to5ool el-taghreeda el-asleya le 3adad kbeer men el-nas.
men el-7agat elly ekhtalefat feha hi el-3adad el-koley le taghzeeyat twitter el-monfasela aw el-qanawat elly bet2ademha.
fi el-motawaset, el-qanawat elly etdarsat 2adet 41 taghzeeya twitter, men el-mawade3 el-3amma zy el-siyasa, le7ad el-mawade3 el-mo7addada zy el-7arb el-ahleya aw rokoob el-3agel.
washington post 2adet akbar 3adad men el-taghzeeyat el-monfasela, w 3adadhom 98.
daily caller, mawke3 akhbary mo7afez 3al internet bas, w elly byedaro tucker carlson, modareb barameg sabeg, 2adet a2al 3adad men el-taghzeeyat, w 3adadhom wa7ed.
el-gara2ed el-wataneya el-kebeera bet2adem akter 3adad men el-taghzeeyat: el-gara2ed el-arba3a elly etdarsat fi el-motawaset bet2adem 74 taghzeeya.
qanawat el-akhbar 3al cable bet2adem fi el-motawaset 45 taghzeeya.
ba2y el-qanawat elly etdarsat - el-telefazeon, el-ethaa3a, el-internet bas, wel-gara2ed el-mahleya - bet2adem fi el-motawaset 18 taghzeeya le kol qan2a.
el-no2ta el-tanya elly ekhtalefat feha el-qanawat hi 3adad el-taghreedat elly bet2ademha.
benoslet lel-taghzeeya el-ra2eeseya 3al twitter, washington post kanat akter wa7da betghared, w 3adadhom 664 taghreeda mokhtelafa 2owal el-osbo3 elly etdars (men 14 le7ad 20 febrayer 2011).

el-dwal el-gnoobeya el-kasoola w el-semenah el-mofreta te2shkl 7ezam el-sukkari lemarkaz el-seetrah 3la el-amradtm mn7 mnte2a gnoob shar2 el-wlayat el-mte7eda le2ab "7ezam el-sekta el-dema3'eya" mn 2abl mrkaz el-seetrah 3la el-amrad w el-wka2ya menha fee aw2el el-steenaat.

la7'az el-ba7'ethoon fee wka2a el-se7'a an el-3'deed mn hadh el-wlayat nafs'ha 3'nda kman nsebt 3alya mn el-2'esaab be-mrad el-sukkari mn el-naw3 el-thany, f-2as'hab 7adad 644 m7afza fe 15 wlaaya welly btet2asam el-2an bshkl mnasb "7ezam el-sukkari".
tm jme3 el-data est5daman el-ma3lomat mn nzam el-mora2aba 3la 3wamel el-5atar el-slooky le-3ammy 2007 w 2008 w taqdeemat entshar el-sukkari 3la mostawa el-m7afza.
balaght m3'dlat el-sukkari fe el-7ezam 11.7% mqabl 8.5% le-b2yet el-balda.

"el-sukkari byshbh el-sekta el-dema3'eya fe eno bet2asar bshddah be-3wamel slookeya w 2'a7'ya w by2eya metrakma w mt2a5'la ma3 el-est3'dad el-wara'y", yktb el-ba7'ethoon mn qesm tarjamat el-sukkari fe mrkaz el-seetrah 3la el-amrad.
7add el-ba7'ethoon arba3 3wamel tanya temayez "7ezam el-sukkari" 3n b2yet el-wlayat el-mte7eda.
tm tsnsef ma y9rb mn 33% mn el-ash5'as fe hadh el-m7afzat 3la enohm 3'eer sa7'een, mqabl 26.1% mn b2yet el-balda.
kan aktr mn 30% kman aktr meyl le-2yada nme6 7ayaat kasool.

mn el-na7'eya el-demoghrafeya, y7'twy sakkan m7afzat 7ezam el-sukkari 3la 3'dad akbr bkteer mn el-amrekeyeen mn asl 2afre'y ghyr el-mota7'atheen bel-espanyola w 3'dad a5'as mn el-7a2leen 3la shahadat gam3eya.

yshmel 7ezam el-sukkari m7afzat fe 2ajza2 mn 2alabama w arkansas w florida w georgia w kentaky w louisiana w mississippi w north carolina w ohio w pensylvania w south carolina w tennessee w texas w virginia w west virginia.
tshmel el-wlayat elly bett2atel ma3 7ezam el-sekta el-dema3'eya alabama w arkansas w georgia w louisiana w mississippi w north carolina w south carolina w tennessee w virginia.
by2ol lawrence e.

barker, howa e7'sa'y fe mrkaz el-seetrah 3la el-amrad, "en tahdeed 7ezam el-sukkari 7'sb el-m7afzat bysm7 le-2a2dem el-mogtama3 be-t7deed el-mnte2at el-aktr 7'at'a lel-jhod el-mbzoola le-mn3 mrad el-sukkari mn el-naw3 el-thany w edara el-7alat el-mawjoda lel-mrad".
"3la 2'as'ar eno msh momken tghyr el-kteer mn 3wamel el-5atar lel-sukkari mn el-naw3 el-thany, laken momken tghyr el-ba3d el-tany.

momken tswym el-mogtama3 elly by3'azez el-nsh'6 el-bade'y, ma3 t7seen el-wsool lel-2akel el-se7'y, eno yshg3 el-tghyyrat fe nme6 el-7ayaa el-se7'ya elly bt2alel mn 5atar el-2'esaab be-mrad el-sukkari mn el-naw3 el-thany".

2'2oraf el nabat el madiif el mot2asirby2asar 3la el awra2 el 3olwia w el sflya w kaman seeghan el 5os.
marad tesa2ot el 5os bysabeb fel bdaya zwol el awra2 el sflya w so2otoha 3la sa7et el torba (elsora 1).
w law fe r6oba, momken yetshakl ghasha2 f6ry abyad (elsora 2) w momken yetshakl agsam 7agria (elsora 3 w elsora 4) fel makan elly el war2a btlames feeh el torba.

el zoroof el by2awia el monasba l el maradel marad dah by7eb el zoroof el barida w el r6ba w el torba el mablola.

- kol rab3' bey7'tawy 3ala 8 asnan da2ema betetrakem bel tare2a elly fe el ta7t:- el qawat3: el 3oly el yemeen (11, 12), el 3oly el shamaly (21, 22), el safl el shamaly (31, 32) we el safl el yemeen (41, 42) (le ma2goom 8 qawat3).
- el anyab: el 3oly el yemeen (13), el 3oly el shamaly (23), el safl el shamaly (33) we el safl el yemeen (43) (4 anyab).
- el daw7ak: el 3oly el yemeen (14, 15), el 3oly el shamaly (24, 25), el safl el shamaly (34, 35) we el safl el yemeen (44, 45) (fe 8 daw7ak).
- el taw7an: el 3oly el yemeen (16, 17), el 3oly el shamaly (26, 27), el safl el shamaly (36, 37) we el safl el yemeen (46, 47).
- daros el 3a2l (el taw7an el talta): el 3oly el yemeen (18), el 3oly el shamaly (28), el safl el shamaly (38) we el safl el yemeen (48) (fe 12 taw7ana).
- (el rasmy el tawde7y fo2 da mestansakh we m3'ayyar be2ezn men el mo'allif.)- tegdar te7'tasab en "yemeen" we "shamal" beysha'ro lel yemeen wel shamal el mared lel mared lama neshoufoh 2odamna.
3ala fekra, le kol sen 3edda so7'at:- el shafa: so7'a 3ala ganb el shafat lel asnan el 2emameya (el qawat3 we el anyab).
- el khodod: so7'a 3ala ganb el khodod lel asnan el khalfeeya (el daw7ak we el taw7an).
- el lisan: so7'a 3ala ganb el lisan le kol sen (el 2emameya we el khalfeeya).
- el etbaq: so7'a el madgh lel asnan el khalfeeya.
- el qate3: el 7ada el 7ada lel qawat3.
- el waset: el so7'a ben el asnan (ben el asnan el metjawareya) el aqrab lel khat el montasaf.
- el ba3eed: el so7'a ben el asnan (ben el asnan el metjawareya) el ab3ed 3an el khat el montasaf.

[mostaqbal sy7a7et el-fada2: meen bey2adem eh]el-fawayed el-moughtamalastern shaif foras b7othya hala2a men re7lat el-fada2 el-tijareya, ma3 tatbeeqat betetrawa7 men 3oloum el-ghilaf el-gawi w 3oloum el-7aya w el-fayzeya w el-3oloum el-kokabya lel-ta3leem w el-tawasol ma3 el-3amma.
"el-ta2thir haykoun hala2", 2al stern.

"kanna fe awakher el-sab3eenat w bett5ayalou ezay el-computer el-7adeeth hayeghyar el-3alam."3amal el-tajareb 3ala re7lat 5asa taht madarya w madarya momken kaman ysed faga2a b7othya mhmah bayn el-ard w m7atet el-fada2 el-dawleya, el-m3mel el-da7em elly bedawwer 3ala erta7a2 220 mayl (354 kilometer) fo2 kawkebna.

"m7atet el-fada2 madhsha, w 3andha qodra hala2a, bs hatfadl dayman maqtesra 3ala 3adad 2alel men el-nas hnak, w bet5od sneen 3ashan te7dar el-7agat elly hatet3.

fe el-nazm el-taqleedy akter, momken mat5odsh forsa tanya lesneen - law 5adt aslan."el-emkanya di le takrar el-tajareb aw 3amal dorasat motaba3a momken tekoun wa7da men el-mazaia el-ra2e2sa le re7lat el-fada2 el-5asa.

e7na fakreen enha hatkoun minta2a mhmah fe el-souq."el-mostaqbalvirgin galactic shafat bel-f3l el-e5team beyzid ma3 wa3y el-ba7athen w el-moukasaat be re7lat el-fada2 taht madarya kmonasfat farida lel-tajareb, 2al whitesides.

el-ba7'etha fe gam3et vanderbilt beya3melo 3ala badil, we howa ebrah roboteya mon7anya betet7arak fe el-mokh fe masar be7ajm el-ebra lel-taglot, fe momken tesht el-waram el-demawy.
we le zeyada el-dak'a, etsamtet lel-3amal gedda as7'at el-tasweer bel-r'nen el-mag'nateesy we sam7et lel-jar7 be tageeh el-jihaz lel-taglot estekhdaman el-tasweer fe el-wa2t el-f3'ely.

yu chen, tabeeb 7'er 3'eer mot5ases fe el-handasa el-mekaneya fe ma3'ad el-handasa el-tebya we el-ketshaf we ma3'ad tasmem we nizam el-t7'amem bel-ta9'eza fe gam3et vanderbilt, we a3'ad'a el-fary2 7aloh el-moshkela de men 7'alal tasmem we tasne3 el-jihaz estekhdaman el-plastk we el-mawad elly matet2'as'eresh bel-9'ata el-mag'nateya.

braysville, illinois - lama te3di 3ala braidwood w lasalle county generation station, momken l-mashahdeen yshofou hayawanat bariya zay elghazalan w eldiyouk elromy w eltoyor.
w 3ala righem men en ma7atat eltaqa elnawiya di beta3et exelon feha ketir men elamn w elqowat elmosalaha, ella en elhayawanat di betzahr w bet3eesh fe salam 3ala mamlekatexelon.
e3trafan behada, qadem magles mawahil el7aya elberya mo7'aran shahadat el3amal lel7aya elberya lekol men elma7tatein.

w tam mon7 shahadat el2edara elbe2eya lelma7ata braidwood generation station fe braysville, illinois w ma7ata lasalle county generation station fe marseilles, illinois lebramajihim elmotamayez fe edarat mawahil el7aya elberya w elta3leem elbe2y fe mawake3ihim.

w qal robert johnson, rayes magles mawahil el7aya elberya: "en magles mawahil el7aya elberya, elly tashakhal kishiraka ghayr moqayada bein elsherekat w elmagtem3at w monazamat el7efaz 3ala elbe2a, yojassid kowat el7efaz elta3awony kaseas lel2edara elbe2eya".
"nehane2 exelon 3ala eltalzemaha w mosahamatha fe ta3zeez mawahil el7aya elberya w eltaw3eya elmagtem3eya w elta3leem elbe2y".

tam mon7 had eltamayoz lelma7tatein leltazameihim biansha2 tahseenat tawela el2ajal lel mawahil el7aya elberya elly betewafir mawahil ghayr modtariba ma3a el2akel w elma2 w elma2wa w elmasaha lelnawa3 el7ayawanya elly bet3eesh 3ala mamlekatexelon.

ba3d el2ameza elly 2amt beha exelon le7ameya elnawa3 el7ayawanya w ta3zeez elwa3y elbe2y fe elma7atat betshamel:โข tesharek ma7ata braidwood 7aliyan fe program el3amal lel7aya elberya men khilal mashro3 esta3adat mawahil elsamak fein betetwed mawahil sina3eya fe bahrat braidwood.

samt we7dat elmawahil letaqdeem fawa2ed ketira le samak elblaty zow elfam elkeber, howa elmafdal 3and howat seid elsamak fe elgharb elawset, fe marahil mokhtalafa men 7ayathom - men el3amal komawil 7adana lel2esmak elsoghayara ela tawfeer mawak3 ta3'eza lel2esmak elkebera w elnader.
w qad e3taz program elmawahil elsina3eya ela ganeb gohed e3adat takzeen el2esmak men masayed el2esmak be shakl kbeer.
โข tesharek ma7ata lasalle 7aliyan fe program el3amal lel7aya elberya men khilal da3maha le seyanat mawahil bahrat lasalle w edarat mafra5 el2esmak.

w qad 7asalt anfeshet edarat masayed el2esmak le 3oqod w tam tazweed elbahrat be shakel takmeely be anwa3 mokhtalafa men el2esmak eldaf2a w elbareda elly betetreba fe mafra5 el2esmak elmawgood fe elmawke3.
w shamelat hadih elanwa3 samak elblaty zow elfam elkeber w samak elblaty zow elfam elsoghayar w samak elsolor elazra2 w samak elblaty elmokhtat w samak elshams elazra2 w samak elshams elahmar.
ted3em elbahrat magmo3a motanawea men el2esmak w tewafeer mawil 7ayawy leltoyor w heya mohima lelterfih.
el7efaz 3ala gawdat elmawahil byesm7 lelmagtem3 be el estefadat men elforas elterfihya w da3m el7aya elberya elmahalya w elmohajera.
w qal dan enright, na2eb rayes ma7ata braidwood: "nahno sa3edeen le2en gohedna le mosa3adat el7aya elberya gharb men monsha2atna be7adef farqan".
"nahno moltazemoun be da2aman este2amat el7aya elberya else7ya 7awal maf3alna, tamaman zay eltalzemna be nseb 100% be da2aman elta7'eel el2aman lel ma7ata braidwood".

fe elmajmo3, tam el2e3teraf be tisa3a men asl 3ashar men marafiq exelon elnawiya men magles mawahil el7aya elberya lebramajihom elly betokalef men elta2teer 3ala elbe2a w bet3az el7aya elberya elmahalya.

w tashmal elma7atat elokhra elly 7amelat elshahada ma7ata byron generation station fe byron, illinois, w ma7ata clinton power station fe clinton, illinois, w ma7ata three mile island generation station fe middletown, pennsylvania, w ma7ata limerick generation station fe pottstown, pennsylvania, w ma7ata oyster creek generation station fe lacey township, new jersey, w ma7ata quad cities generation station fe cordova, illinois, w ma7ata peach bottom atomic power station fe delta, pennsylvania.
kol men ma7ata braidwood w ma7ata lasalle county heya geza2 men asfloot exelon generation elmomken men 10 marafiq leltaqa elnawiya.
magles mawahil el7aya elberya (whc) howa monazama ghayr rba7eya w ghayr daghta makrasa le ziyadat gawdat w kamya mawahil el7aya elberya 3ala el2ard elmo2assasat w elkhasa w el3ama.

yekres magles mawahil el7aya elberya mawaredo le benayeat sharakat ma3 elsherekat w gam3at el7efaz 3ala elbe2a le eygad 7olol betewazen bein motatalabat elnomo el2eqtesady w motatalabat elbe2a else7ya w elmotanawea w elmostadama.
yimken el2e9ef 3ala bramaj mawahil el7aya elberya w elta3leem elbe2y elly byesa3ed magles mawahil el7aya elberya fe 45 welaaya w ma7afzet el3asma w 12 balad okhra.

el mwaslat el 3amma hya waseela mwaslat badela fe el 7ayat el youmeya, fe 7agat keteer 3'eer el mashy we rekoob el daragat, we elly madina naperville betestakshifa we betetwara7'ha kaghez men khatet el mwaslat el shamila beta3et'ha.
nizam mwaslat 3amma motawer byesahl el wesool le madina naperville we el manate2 el mo7eta el biha fe maqate3ty dupage we will.

nizam el mwaslat el 3amma matlob 3ashan byegallal el zahma, we de mo3'zala bet3ani minha madina naperville ma3 tazayed 3edad el sakana, we elly motawaka yewsel le 155,000 b7olool sana 2020 (7'waly 100,000 men sakaneen naperville 3ayyezen fe maqate3 dupage, we 7'waly 45,000 3ayyezen fe maqate3 will) we da momken yegallal 3edad re7lat el 3arabeyat, we beka da yegallal el zahma, telooth el hawaa, ta2akol el tora2, we 7awadeth el 3arabeyat elly betesabeb esabet.
benasba le nas keteer fe naperville, el mwaslat el 3amma amana we darorya fe el 7aya el youmeya, we beten2el el nas men el madares le el shogh'l we lel aswa2.
khademat el mwaslat el 3amma el motah'a lel 3omom 3adaan betew2a3 ta7t f'ateen: 3amma we motakhasesa.
el mwaslat el 3amma el 3amma, zy heya'et n'a2l chicago (cta) we metra, motah'a lel 3omom we momken teshtemel khademat el ketarat we el awtobeesat.
el mwaslat el 3amma el motakhasesa men naga7'ya tanya betetdeman 3adaan mosharaka el 3arabeyat, awtobeesat el madares, we el basat el saghyra, we momken yekoon leha shoroot ahleya.
3alragm men en maqate3 will we dupage 7awelou yekhaffo el zahma be mashro3at tawse3 el tora2, zy mashro3 tareeq butterfield, laken da el manhag law7'do mesh hay7'all el mo3'zala.
naperville ekhtaret be 7ekma n'haghet mot3added el jawaneb, we elly beyekhatab tawse3 el tora2 we el mwaslat el 3amma.
ana mo'men en da hayekoon leeh el ta'theer el maqsood fe taqleel el e3temad 3ala el 3arabeyat we el morakeb el shakhsya, we kaman hayezood aman el tora2.

mo'tamar ro2asa el baladeyat we el modireen fe maqate3 dupage, we elly madina naperville 3'ed feeh, 7'addad el ahdaaf el talyya el met3'leqa be mwaslat naperville:- dmag khademat el mwaslat el 3amma ma3 kol wasayel nizam el mwaslat el e2lemy.
- tanfeeth khadema mwaslat 3amma le takhfeef aw e7'tawa2 el zahma el mororya 3ala el tora2 el sare3'a fe mamarrat aw manate2 for3'eya aw marakez tawzeef mokhtara.
- tew'war nizam mwaslat mostadam fe menta2a dupage ma3 3ard el tahadeyat we el foras el met3'leqa be taqdeem khadema mwaslat 3amma.
- tasys we daaman mostawa monaseb men el tanakel lel sakana el mahroomen fe menta2a maqate3 dupage.
- estekhma el mwaslat el 3amma le rab6 aswa2 el shogh'l el mahleya we el e2lemy ma3 el wazayef el sa3ba fe maqate3 dupage.
- estekhma el mwaslat el 3amma we estratejyiat el tanmeya el mawjaha lel mwaslat (tod) le da3m el 7ayaweya el ektesadeya le markaz el balad el nad'a we el marakez el tejareyya el e2lemy.
la2n el khata de hayekhad wa2t fe el tanfeeth, ba3d el ahdaaf hayekoon leha awlaweya a3'la.
3ala sabee2 el meisal, e7tayaat e7tayaat el sakana elly ma3andhomsh mwaslat badela we elly m3tamedeen be shakl kbeer 3ala el mwaslat el 3amma, zy kebar el sen, hayetm telbeet'ha awalan.
el awlaweya el talyya hayekoon el terkiz 3ala taghyeer anmat el safar le zeyada naseba el re7lat el betetm 3an tareeq el mwaslat el 3amma.
3ashan nelbe ahdaaf el madena, mawkef el mwaslat el 3amma we wa7'adat el mwaslat nafs'ha lazma telbe me3'yarat mo3'yana le gazeb we el e7tefaaz be mostakhdemy nizam el mwaslat.
fe foras le taqdeem magmo3a motanaweya men el khademat fe mawkef el mwaslat aw marakez el mwaslat.
we kaman momken demag el e3'lanat fe mawkef we marakez el mwaslat ketar'a le tawleed el da5l.
leh el mwaslat el 3amma mohemma le taqleel 7awadeth el 3arabeyat?
el salaama el 3amma hya mawsool kol qararat nizam el mwaslat el 3amma.
kmo7'amy 7awadeth 3arabeyat, ana 3aref en afdal tare'a le taqleel 7awadeth el morour hya taqleel 7arakat morour el 3arabeyat.

fe wa2t beyetm feeh tewjeeh el keteer men el ehtemam le ektesad w'ood el 3arabeyat we taqleel el e3temad 3ala el w'ood el 7afory, ana mo'men en men el mohem benafs el qadr el tafkeer fe ta7senat el aman elly momken tofor'ha anzema el mwaslat el 3amma lel nas fe naperville we el mojtama3 el mo7eta beeh.

leh dayret el-akyas el-plastiki sha3'ala?
el-soora: samouatfrank29 september 2016 // by: stephen devlin3adi sana taqreeban men sa3et ma ba2ena bendo3 5 piuns 3ashan kays plastik lama benro7 nishtery 7agat fi england.
bas hal nag7et el-syasa di?
aam wa beshkel sa7eq, zy ma kan motawwa3 bena2an 3ala tajareb dowal w manti2 tanya.
el-taqdeerat el-asleya lel-7okoma kanat en egtema3 estekhla2 el-akyas el-plastiki heen7'fod binoobah 58% (men 7awaly 200 kays lel-fard kol sana le 7awaly 90 kays), w 81% fel super market.
le7ad delwa2ty, kways: sha3'al estekhla2 el-akyas el-plastiki fel super market en7'af taqreeban binoobah 83%.
dah taghyeer fel-sokook 3ala nitaq 3adaan ma bey7lem beyh sana3 el-syasat.
law el-taqdeerat el-awleya lel-7okoma sa7e7a taqreeban, yeb2a kol sana 7awaly 8 meleya kays plastik mesh hatkoon matlooba.
dah ye3adil taqreeban 1% men egtema3 wazn el-plastik men masader mokhtalafa elly betetdad lel-me7eet kol sana, w beysebb fawda fel-nezam el-biy2y el-7asass.
w dah magarad syasa wa7da fe dawla wa7da - ta5ayyal law kol dawla 7a2at nafs el-naga7.
el-fawayed hatkoon ha2ela.

el-syasa di sha3'ala le-sabbein baseteen:- heya mabniya 3ala adella men 3elm el-nafs w el-eqtesad el-sokoky 3an keyfeya ettasroof el-nas fel-waqe3- el-sharekat ma2daratch tasmemha le-masla7etha w mesh 2adra tetkharrag menhadelwa2ty e7na 3arfeen en el-syasa di sha3'ala w natayejaha mefesh takaleef saafeya lel-sharekat, yeb2a lazem no3'ya lel-akyas el-plastiki fel-sharekat el-soghayara w el-motawasta, elly ma3feya 7aliyan men 3'eer sabab mo2ne3.
eh tani momken net3allemoh men dah?
khaleena ne2aren dah be-syasa 7okomiya tanya motaleka bel-nefayat.
men sana 2005 w el-7okoma beteshtegel ma3 el-super market w ba3d montigi el-akel 3ashan yetfa2o 3ala ahdaaf taw3eya le-takhfeef nefayat el-akel w el-tagleef, mobadara esmaha "eltizam courtald".
ahdaaf takhfeef el-nefayat di 3adaan mesh tamowwa3a - takhfeef be-kam no2ta m2aweya 3ala madar sneen - w mesh dayman betet7a2a2.
le2enaha taw3eya, mafeesh ay 3awa2eb law el-sharekat ma7a2adatsh el-hadaf.
momken hatta yekoon en el-sharekat kant nawya te2alel nefayatha le-asbab takaleef 3ala ay 7al w kol elly 3amlato enaha eshtaraket fel-mobadara el-7okomiya 3ashan el-soma3a.

aghlabeeya el-makhtatat bet7addad ahdaaf mesh tamowwa3a, w ketir menha kaman fa2alet fe ta7qe2 el-ahdaaf 'gheir el-tamowwa3a' ...

en shorb elmayeh bey2alal men elskarat el7'areya mesh mofaga2a.

"elmayeh mfehash ta2a laken momken tesaham fel sho3'or belshaba3", dah elly katbeh mo2alefen elderasa.

el-fahm le-qeymet we ahmeeyet el-asma2 el-3elmeya el-lateeny, el-ma3roofa ayzaan bel-asma2 el-nabatya lel-nabatat, amr 7ewy.
el-esm el-nabaty howa esm thanawy betekoon men gosseen: el-gosef el-awal beyshir le-jins el-nabat, we el-gosef el-tany beyshir le-el-naw3.
3ala sebl el-mathal, beybda esm bursera graveolens (el-shakl 1) be-esm el-jins - bursera - yel72oh esm el-naw3 - graveolens.
el-asma2 el-nabatya ma3roofa 3alamyan we betsa3ed 3ala el-eshara lel-anwa3 we fihresetha beshetaqan.
bursera graveolens3ala 3aks el-asma2 el-shaa2e3a lel-nabatat - zay "khashab moqaddas" - el-asma2 el-nabatya mohaddada we day2a we motaseta le2enaha ma3roofa 3elmeyan fe kol el-3alam.
3ala el-naqeed men keda, ymken en nafs el-esm el-shaa2e3 yshir le-mogmaa3a men el-anwa3 el-nabatya el-mokhtelafa.

3ala sebl el-mathal, bytustakhdem el-esm el-shaa2e3 "palo santo" men el-skan el-mahaly fe mnte2 jografeya mokhtelafa lesshif naw3een mokhtalefeen geddan: bursera graveolens we gonopterodendron (el-ma3roof sabaqan be-bulnesia) sarmientoi.
3ala 3aks el-esm el-nabaty, el-asma2 el-shaa2e3a mesh bet2ather 3ala el-tamyeez el-3elmy lel-anwa3.

el-asma2 el-nabatya bet3mel 3ala el-tamyeez beyn el-anwa3 el-mokhtelafa da5el nafs el-jins - 3ala sebl el-mathal, bursera graveolens we bursera morelensis - we agnas mokhtelafa betesharek fe nafs el-esm el-shaa2e3 - 3ala sebl el-mathal, bursera graveolens we gonopterodendron sarmientoi.

elly beylo2oh el-nas keteer men el-aw2at mo5tel6 we mo7ayra howa 7a2e2et en el-esm el-shaa2e3 "palo santo" ("khashab moqaddas") byt7att be-koll men bursera graveolens we gonopterodendron sarmientoi - el-naw3 el-akher el-ma3roof kaman be-esm "guaiac wood".
3ala 3'eer en el-nawa3een dol bysherkoh fe esm shaa2e3, laken homa mo5talefeen tamamalan!

betetkawn zayt bursera graveolens el-asasy men el-lemonene we el-menthofuran we el-alpha-terpineol; fe 7een betetkawn zayt gonopterodendron sarmientoi el-asasy men el-bulnesol we el-guaiol we 10-epi-yodesmol (prudent et al., 1991; young et al., 2007).

el-asma2 el-shaa2e3a bet2odey le-naw3 men el-so2 el-fahm elly momken ye2ther salbiyan 3ala ezay da3mna we edrakna le-7alaat el-7efz 3ala el-anwa3 dol; 3ashan keda, 3amel daeman men woghet nazar el-esm el-nabaty.
gonopterodendron sarmientoi betet5assaf 3ala enha mehdada bel-enda7ar (barstow, 2018) we bet7miha etfa2qeyet cites men el-tigara.

3and el-7osool 3ala el-mawadef el-nabatya aw el-zayot el-asasya, el-mazar3een we el-7asadeen we el-3alajeen beyetshaja3 3ala ezar el-edara el-mostadama men khilal el-shohadat, we te2deem delil 3ala tesare7 cites 3and el-darora - zay fe 7alaat g.
7atta lama yet5assaf nabat 3ala eno naw3 ghyr mehdad, ben2es be-el-7osool 3ala el-mawadef be-tare2a akhlaqeya.
el-masdar el-akhlaqy bey7taj fahm kwayyes le-ay gosef (agza2) men el-shagara beyetesta5dem lestekhraj el-zayt el-asasy.
beyt7'allel el-7asad el-mostadam lel-ashjar estekhlaf el-akhshab el-maqt3a we/aw el-foroo3, aw agza2 tanya men el-shagara, zay el-fakooh we el-awraq.
beyt3'azez fe el-7alat elly momken lel-mazar3een feha enhom yethbetoh e3ada zera3 el-ashjar!

men zaman nafs el-esm el-shaa2e3 momken ye7'tar le-anwa3 mokhtelafa, lama teb2a mesh mot2akid, et2akad men el-esm el-3elmy el-lateeny lel-montag we talab teqreer kromatografeia el-gaz (gc) lel-ta7'eeq.
daiman 3amel el-masdar el-akhlaqy.
el-3amal keda bey3'eth el-7efz 3ala el-nabatat el-thameena we ethra2 el-mogtama3at - keteer menhom bymaseel el-sokan el-asleeyeen elly bey3tamdoh 3aleh fe estekhlafoh fe el-teb el-taqledy.

b'edaf le haza el-shajar, awad enny azawed wa7da men ashjary el-mafadala bta3ty el-dayye2 el-qalf, "karpins carolina".
qalf haza el-shagara ramady zay shagara el-zan laken 3adaly, zay 2ed 3'a2eb kamaal el-2ajsam, wmn hena el-esem el-shay3 elly ba7eb eny ashofha bih - "khashab el-3adalat".
lel-shajar da, el-gaza2eb btzood 3omoman ma3a 7ajm el-jothom, fmat2dr tstmet3 bih shwaya kol sana.
el-zawaya welselwyatzawaya tthbeet el-for3 lel-jothom aw el-for3 el-om howa derasa eftradyet fe el-handasa wel-handasa el-me3marya wel-fezeaa fe w2t wa7ed.

3ala sbeel el-mesal, 3ndo shagara el-cherry el-aswad (nyssa sylvatica) tthbeet foroo3 be zawya 90 daraga.

mo2akran, el-3olamaa bas bed2o yefhamo door el-mehateen men treelyonat el-bakterya di gowa el-gazm, khososan fe el-gazhaz el-hazemee.

delwa2ty el-3olamaa 3arfeen, 3ala sebeel el-mathal, en el-bakterya di mohema 3ashan nkoon fe se7a gaeda w en momken no2ther 3ala el-nezam el-beye2y dah el-da3eef dah benezamna el-ghizayee w 3adatna el-yawmeyya.

daleel 3ala keda derasa gededa methera lel-gadel beteqter7 en el-akl el-m7ala sana3eyan momken ykoon looh ta'theer salbee 3ala mycrobes el-ame3aa, w dah momken yewdee le mostawaat sokar a3la fe el-dam, w de 7ala momken tekoon moqadema lel-sukaree.

el-derasa di 3ala el-7ayawanat, w neshret fe majalet nature b2odam ba7ethen fe ma3had weismann lel-3oloom fe rehovot, israel, w khalast le en el-m7aleat el-sena3eya zy el-sakareen w el-aspartam (elly betest5dem bshakl motakerr fe el-gahwa w el-mashrobat w el-akl el-gayed kbedeel lel-sukar) momken, bshakl mofare2, tezed el-mashakel elly el-mafrood enha te7ella: el-sukaree w el-samna.

le-fatra tawela, kan bey3tbr en el-ra7em beya2a mo3akama tamaaman, laken fe el-sanawat el-2akhera, 3edda ekte2afat keshet en el-mawaleed momken ykoon awl twasel lehom me3 el-mycrobes belzabt fe ra7em el-om.
bakterya el-mashima 3and el-set el-7amel beteshbeh bakterya famha aktar men ay geza tany fe gazmha.
law el-bakterya entaqalet men el-fam lel-mashima, famomken el-akl elly bey3ady men fam el-om el-7amel momken fe el-nehayya yo2ther 3ala mycrobes el-tfel fe el-mosta2bal w se7toh.
el-natayej di neshret fe majalet science translational medicine, b2odam fareeq be2odam kirsty agard, men koleyet baylor lel-tebb fe houston, w mostashfa texas lel-atfal.
el-3olamaa gam3o 3eynat men 320 mashima men setat walado.
3ashan yetjanbo el-talooth be-bakterya el-mahbal, el-3eynat etgama3et fe zoroof mo3akama.
ba3d keda, 2ammo be-tahlil taseel el-geneom lel-bakterya elly la2ooha fe el-3eynat.
kano metawa23een enhom yel2o bakterya men flora el-mahbal, bsebb qorbha, laken badalan men keda, el-mycrobes kant meshabeha lelly mawgoda fe el-fam, laken be-3edad akal bekatheer.
3ala madar el-sanawat el-2akhera, el-3olamaa la2o en el-mycrobes elly mawgoda fe el-gazhaz el-hazemee (mycrobes el-ame3aa aw flora el-ame3aa) bet2om be-wazayef asaseya lel-se7a.
el-hezam w el-mana3a w 7atta el-se7a el-3a2leya betet3amed be-shakl kbeer 3ala el-mahaam elly bet2om beha bakterya el-ame3aa.
delwa2ty, derastyn la2o en el-ame3aa el-besharya be3eesh feha 500 naw3 men el-mycrobes - w 7 million jeen mycrobee - kano mosh ma3roofeen le7ad delwa2ty.

nesba flora el-ame3aa elly kant mest5ba le7ad delwa2ty momken te7tawy 3ala ma3lomat asaseya 3an asl mogmaa3a men el-amrad (marad el-te7am el-ame3aa w el-metlazemah el-aydeya, men ben amrad tanya), w kaman adella 3an ezay n3alaghom.

how 3odw fee magmo3et el-bank el-dawly we 3odw fee magmo3et el-omam el-mota7eda el-tanmoyya (undg).
e3tibar'an men 3am 2022, 7add el-bank el-dawly 17 hadaf le-t7'qeekah be7'oloos 3am 2030.
el-hadafan el-rayseyen mazkouran fee bayaan me7'teh.
el-awal how eneh'a el-foqar el-mota7'em 3an tareeq tek'leel 3edad el-ashkhas elly 3ay'sheen 3ala '2al men 1.90 dollar fee el-yom le-2al men 3% men sakaneen el-3alam.
wel-hadaf el-thany how ta3'zeez el-ezdehaar el-3aam 3an tareeq zeeda n'3o el-dakhl le-2af'r 40% men dowal el-3alam.

ye2dem el-bank el-dawly, ba3'do ka-mawred 3alami lel-mosaa'dat el-maaleya wel-teqneya lel-dwal el-fardeya, lel-7okomat el-mo2ah'la qar'oodan monkh'afdet el-fa'eda we e'tema'adat mn'3'eer fa'eda we mank'hat, kol dah le-da3m tanmeyet el-eqtesad'yat el-fardeya.
tes'aad el-eqtera'at el-naqdeya we 7'a2n el-amwal fee el-ta3'leem el-3alami wel-ra3aya el-se7'eya wel-edara el-3aama wel-b'nya el-ta7'teya we tanmeyet el-qeta3 el-5a's.
ysha'rak el-bank el-dawly aysan el-ma3loomat ma3a mokhtalef el-mo'asasat 3an tareeq taqdeem el-moshura fee magal el-seyasat wel-abhath wel-t7'leel wel-mosaa'da el-teqneya.
ye2dem el-moshura wel-tadreeb le-kol men el-qeta3een el-3aam wel-5a's.
tar'e5 el-bank el-dawlytas'sas el-bank el-dawly fee 3am 1944 men etefaqeyet bretton woods, welly et'amanet ta7't re3aya el-omam el-mota7eda fee el-ayyam el-2a5'era men el-7arb el-3alameya el-thanya.
t'amen etefaq bretton woods 3edda mokanat: el-nezam el-naqdy el-dawly el-gam3ey, we ensha' el-bank el-dawly, we ensha' sondoq el-naq'd el-dawly (imf).
men'3'eer tas'ses'hom, kan le-kol men el-bank el-dawly we sondoq el-naq'd el-dawly el-3'adeed men el-ah'daf nafs'ha.
kanet el-ah'daf el-2a5'era le-kol men el-bank el-dawly we sondoq el-naq'd el-dawly how mosaa'da dowal o'robba el-ghar'beyya 3ala e3a'da ben'a' eqtesad'yatha ba3d el-7arb.
wel'akn, ba3d 3am 1948, bada2et 3'adeed men el-dwal el-awropeya fee el-e3'temad 3ala kha6et marshall le-e3a'da ben'a' el-ente3ash el-eqtesady lel-dwal.
lel-7'alas, tawaj'ah el-bank el-dawly ne7'et el-dwal el-naamya.
qadem da3'man lel-qar'ood el-motaw'seta wel-taweela el-2'amed le-ta3'zeez tanmeyetha el-eqtesadeya wel-ejtema3'eya.
el-bank el-dawly mosh "bank" bel-ma3na el-sha2e3.

ya3'mal el-bank el-dawly we magmo3'atoh el-far'eya 3'eir el-2'a7'eya 7'alef e7'kam'ha el-5a'sa we tatawwer mentaq'at'ha el-maaleya el-5a'sa lel-mosaa'da, we kol dah be-hadaf khidmet 7'a7'yet e7'teyajat ra's el-maal lel-dwal 3ala el-mostawa el-dawly.

mo'asasat el-bank el-dawlyyed'eer el-bank el-dawly el-bank el-dawly lel-ensha' wel-ta3'meer (ibrd), wel-mo'asaasa el-dawleya lel-tanmeyya (ida), we mo'asaasa el-ta'meel el-dawleya (ifc), we wakeet da3'm el-esta7'mar el-mota3'ded (miga), wel-markaz el-dawly le-tes'yet monaz3at el-esta7'mar (icsid), we kol men'hom y3'aleg 3ala jowa'neb mokhtalefa men el-moshkela be-hadaf "eneh'a el-foqar el-mota7'em we ta3'zeez el-ezdehaar el-moshtarake".
fee ay balad ya23od maqarr el-bank el-dawly?
ya23od maqarr el-bank el-dawly fee washington dc, we le-7'alas 189 dawl 3odw, we makateb fee '2ak'ar men 130 mawqe3'an.
el-bank el-dawly how munaazma to2afer el-amwal wel-moshura wel-abhath lel-dwal el-naamya lel-mosaa'da fee taq'dom eqtes'ha we mokaf7et el-foqar.

etaba3 mo2sher el'asha3'a fo2 elbanfsagya yewmya, masalan 3ala saf7't taw23at elta2'3 elgaw elyom: kol ma elmo2sher beykoon a3'la, kol ma beykoon mohem ennak te7'my nafsak bewaqy shams 3amel 7'maya 3aly.

da2ayel men elgeologyemta 7asal eltofan fe tar5ees elard?

law hnakhdo el2oset bejdeya, mesh kefaya enna ne2arneha beltaqaleed elshafweya elmomathla fe babel we amerika elshamaleya we amaken ba3eeda tanya.
ma3 enna f2adna ay taqaleed zy de 5assa bina, bas 3andena el2a2sya 3ala e3ada tashkeel el2asaseyat fe tar5ees elkoob lelta72ee2 el3elmy elda2e2.

ay tatabe2 ma3 elsejel elgeology yefdal yashba3 3ala el2a2al talat shoro6:- lazzem ykoon fe faga 3'eyra betmessel tadmear "qeshet" elard, ya3ny elard elyabesa fawk el3om2 elkober elmazkoor fe el2oset eltorateya.
- kol elard lazzem tekoon 2ar2et felmaya 3ala tool ba3d elkaretha.

- el7afa2er lazzem ya3kes 3amleya e3ada 2est3mar, 3ashan 7aya elmo7eet delwa2ty b2et mawgoda fe 7awad 3ala sa77 elard wel7aya elardeya b2et mawgoda 3ala el22a5ar elgedeeda ellet etkoonat ba3d elkaretha.
tadmear elard3ashan kol 7aga ba3d elkaretha hatmessel tajdeed, ay dalel 3ala eltadmear elkaamel lel2ard elyabesa el2asleya lazzem ykoon mawgood fe 2ased el3amood elgeology.
elgeologyeen mesh 2adreen yet3a2bo elsejel elgeology lel2ard le7ad wa2t takween elkoob.
awel 700 melyon sana men ejmaly 4550 melyon sana (7asab elteselsol elzamaney elmaqbool) mesh mawgooden 5ales.

dah bas be2a wa5od wa5od men wa2t program abolo fe elsab3eneenat, lama et2akshaf en elsejel el2amry howa 3aks elsejel el2ardy taqreeban: mo3zam s5or el2amr 2a2dem men 3850 melyon sana, bema en s5or elard (ma3 2stethna2 wa7ed mo7tamel) 7adith.
3omr elnyazek kaman dayman 2akbar.
elard ta7t elmayaeltaqaleed eltorateya betshadded 3ala en elkoob kolo et2arag, bema feeh elgoabal.
7a2ee2a: fe no2ta wa7da bas fe tar5ees elard lama elkoob kolo kan ta7t elmaya - fe badeeyet elsejel (7awaly awel 100 melyon sana).
fe3lan mo3zam elkoob estamr ta7t elmaya lefatra 2awel men keda.
derasa 7adetha 2a2daret en 7atta nehayet elarcky (men 2500 melyon sana) bas 2-3% men mas7et elard kanet qeshet 2a2aryet (flament we 25o7roon, 2008).
el7aya betesta3mer elard tanykol 7aya el7ayawanat 3ala wajh elard etmas7et - "etma7at".
fel7afa2er men el3alam abl eltofan mosta7ela.
law elsejel el7afawery leeh 3ala2a belkaretha, lazzem ykoon mertabet be3afy el7aya elnabateya wel7ayawanya 3ala el22a5ar elgedeeda ellet etkoonat ba3d en7esaar elkaretha.

7a2ee2a: elsejel el7afawery mesh beybeen shajara 7aya motafare3a tadrejyan: magmo3at el7aya elra2eeseya betzaher fe mawjat motatale2a, motawafe2a ma3 tesalsol e3ada el2est3mar (ma3 taw3ey el2anwa3 kajeza2 men el3amleya).

ba3d keda fe elsejel el7afawery el2ardy zahert el7'ata2 welashnat - ka2enaat bet2adr tetfetet els5or elsalba.

7awaly nafs elwa2t, zahert el7asharat wel3anakeb wel3anakeb elme2aweya wka2enaat tanya zy keda, kanha get men el3adam.

mohamed shahbaz sharif b2a rayes wozara2 pakistan el gedid ba3d ma a7zab el mo3arada kasabet el tasweet 3ala 7ojob el tha2a 3an 7okoma 7ezb el ensaaf.

el ragel da b2a rayes wozara2 pakistan, w da mesh gdeed 3aleh, 3shan kan rayes wozara2 e2leem el punjab abl keda.

eza es7'tadam el nayazk bel gheta2 el gelidy el 2obori?
el gelid hena 3ameeq w meteen.
men el momken en el nayazk el mofret yesaab endefaa meel aw akter men el gelid doon tark ay fo7'at.
msh hatkoon feeh ay 7ara2'e8, wala 7aga le7'tara2'.
lakenoh momken yezeyb kamya kbeera men el gelid w raba7' yebda nehayet el 3asr el gelidy.
kezay y'athar dah 3al naqash?
fel waqe3, fe akser el amaken, el gheta2 el gelidy el 2obori rak2' nesbiyaan, w ahyanan mabyet3adsh 3an kam metr, khososan fel seef.
fe ba3d el amaken ely beywsel feeh samk el gelid le 1 km, laken fel 3aam, ymken wesf samk el gheta2 bel teba2' el shadeed, bmo3'tarf samk akal bekatheer men meel wa7ed.
a3'taked en ay nayazk be 7ajem ma3'ool (zay fe 7adath el enqerad) ymkenoh bsohola yekhtar2 akser el mawaqe3 fel gheta2 el gelidy el 2obori.
mowa7'et el s'adma hatdamar be sohola 2a3 el me7eet asfoh, bma ysaab tkoonat da'erya mesh 7'assa.
men el moshaweq, law n'etret le khareeta [national geographic] le 2a3 el me7eet el 2obori, hatshof ma yebdo le 7'osoos el ghar2'a 3al 2a3 el me7eet.
bel tab3, bel 2a7'eer, hatkoon el gheta2 el 3a'em el shomaly, ely howa jeologyan 7adeth, tashakol men zaman w msh hatzeher ay nad'a.
men momken en mithl el es7'tedam dah ykoon leeh athar ekologyya dramatykeya.
laken, 3and el n'dhar le dynamykat el madar lel es7'tedam, momken en akser el nayazk tes7'tedem bel wajh el 2amamy lel 2ard 7'las dewaranha 7'lef el shams.
le2en el ghalbya el 3'albya men el nayazk f madarat shamsya fe el mostawa el madary (+- 20 daraga), fa men el motawakad en akser el es7'tedamat hatkoon fe khotot el 3'ard el wastany.

bel tab3, lesa fe masarat madaryya momken to2'ady le es7'tedamat fe ay no2'a 3al 2a3 el 2ard, laken a3'taked en e7'temalya el es7'tedam hatkoon akal bekatheer fe khotot el 3'ard el 3alya fe el 2obori.
law 7asal mithl el es7'tedam dah, hatkoon el menta2a el 2oboryya 7ad el 2a3'al 7asab.
a3'taked en el beyanaat momken tekoon el 7akam fe el mawdoo3 dah.

le7ad matla2'y adella da3'ma (zay el soghar el s'admyya men 3eyanat el leb, rawased el 7ataam el mawjy, el shathooz el magh'a6esy, el teba2'at el gaweya el ma7'yeya, 7'esoos 7ataam el tektet, etc.), msh momken ne3'ty el tafseer dah keteer me7'tabarya.
tazamen enqerad el 7ayawanat el kbeera fe el ameryketeyn ma3' woso'ol ensan kalofees, ely howa saayed shared.
law kona mabyn teneen tafseerat le 7adath el enqerad, el ensan aw nayazk yes7'tedem bel gheta2 el gelidy, mabda2 ockham lel 7alaka byo2'ashar en te2'ethyr el ensan howa el aktar 7'amsa.

fe ra2'y, el 5eyarat el tanyya el momken, zay el asbab el tanyya (el akthar 6ab3'ya) lel taghyarat el manawyya el dramyeya ely betsaab 7adath el enqerad, hatkoon kaman tafseer akal 7asab men el nayazk.

"ragm enny dakhlit el3naya elmarkaza ba3d 3'ara2a zayda men talat anwa3 samom mokhtalafa, w shokook be2enny 3andy azma 2albeya besabab sam elcobra w saggy kanet betro7 fe dahya mo2aqqtan, laken le7ad delwa2ty mafeesh 7aga wagfetny 3an shaghy be derasa el la3ab elzay7ef dah el motatwer geddan", gal lawdeen fe gelset as2ela w agwaba 3ala mawke3 reddit yom eltholatha2.

el ejaba heya: no3'an ma.
laken akid mesh 7aga 3ayez tejrebha fe el beet.
fe wara2a nashart fe magalet nature fe october 2012, fareeq men el3olama2 elfaransawyein wasfoo ezay sam el af3a el sooda feeh no3 men el morakabat elly momken tentej mosakenat a2wa lel alam.
el 3olama2 3azaloo el morakabat elgedeeda de, elly esmaha "mambalgins", w jarraboha 3ala f2ran 3ashan yshofo ta2theerha 3ala masarat el alam.
el mambalgins 6al3oo beyeste7'demo minta2a mokhtalafa men masar el alam 3an ay adwya mostakhdama.
w kaman, el f2ran tawtaret moqawama a2al lel mambalgins 3an elly shaye3 ma3 el morfeen, w el morakab elgedeed mesh sabb nafs el athar elganeby 3ala el tanfas zay el morfeen.
ba7ethen taneen daraso 2odrat samom el af3a 3ala 2a2tal khaleya el sara7'an.

sam el af3a el torkya zat el anf el madabeb 2azher enno byew2af no2o khaleya sara7'an el qolon; samom el cobra el sahrawya wa2afat taqaddom el myeloma el mot3adeda, w howa no3 men sara7'an el dam shebhy mayoos men 3ela2o, fe ta2g beetri.
laken 2a2tal khaleya el sara7'an fe el ma3mel 7aga ba3eeda geddan 3an 3ela2 fa3al fe shakhs 7ay.
2ed3a2 se7y tanee motalaq be 7a2n el sam howa el ta2theer el mofrad 3ala el telomerat, elly heya agza2 men el 7amid elnaweey el motakera fe nehayet el kromosoom.
el telomerat betsa3ed fe 7ameya genatek ded el tadahor el tab3y elly bey7sal ma3 takrar el kromosoom w 2nqasam el khaleya.
heya betet2asser tab3yyan ma3 el wa2t, ma3 kol 2nqasam khalawy, w ba3d el 3olama2 beenazroo en taqseer el telomerat howa el mas2ool 3an 3alamat el sheykho5a.
derasat 7ayawaneya 3ala el telomerat w el sheykho5a 2azherat ba3d el nateg men el awelya el wa3da.

wara2a nashart fe magalet embp lel 3elam el jaz2ey fe may 2012 la2et en el f2ran elly et3amelt be 3ela2 geneey zadat mostawaat el telomeraz, el enzaym elly beybny el telomerat, kan 3andha 3omr a6wal be nosba 24% 3an el f2ran ghyr el mo3alaga.

w kaman el f2ran de kanet khalya men el sara7'an, w howa wa7ed men akbar el 3eqabat el nazareya le 3ela2 el telomeraz - el enzaym dah momken kaman ysa3ed khaleya el sara7'an testamer le fatra tawela ba3d tareekh entaha2 sal7eyetha.
lawdeen, elly 3ando 46 sana, 3ala mawke3 reddit, 2ada3 enno et3amal lo 2e7'tebar w la2a en el telomerat 3ando zy bet3et wa7ed 3ando 28 sana.
"ragm enny mesh benas7 aw ba2ayad ay shakhs enno y7a2n nafso aw gheroh be sam el af3a, laken ana basaddig men tajarby en fe fawayed mo7tamila lel ta7seen el nafsey", ketab lawdeen.
laken fe dalel da3eef 3ala en el ta3arod el motawal le sam el af3a leih ta2theer 3ala telomerat el shakhs.
w le7ad delwa2ty mesh wa7ed mayno kam men el sheykho5a momken nelomha 3ala taqseer el telomerat, 3ashan fe tabayan tab3y fe 2otool el telomerat been el nas - mesh zay 7alaqat el 3omr fe el shajar.

bell hast, modareb af3a mashhoor et3a' 2ktar men 173 mara men af3a sama2a abl ma ymout w 3omro 100 sana fe 2011, la2a taree2a gededa yestakhdem beeh samomo lel kheir - el tabar3 be demmo, elly malyan agsam modadda tab3eya ded el sam, leda7aya 3a9det el af3a.
hast, elly lawdeen beyeshyerlo kamsader elham, bana mona3eto el khassa 3an tareeq 7a2n nafso be samom men 32 no3 mokhtalef men el af3a el khatira kol yom le aktar men 60 sana.

"etowledt be shaghaf lel af3a, lama 2ablat bell hast w ana sagheer (9 senen) kont maftoon belly kan bey3melo w 3ayez ashoof law kunt a2dar adfa3 el nazareyat le 2aqsa 7ad", gal lawdeen 3ala mawke3 reddit.
"ba3d el nas beyshaloo geetar, ana shayelt af3a (w geetar kaman)".

deraset geneat sara7an elthadytaqneya gededa le deraset eltaghyirat elgeneya elly momken to2ody le sara7an elthady momken tekon khotwa garaiba.

game3a nottingham 7aslet 3ala 15 alf geneh esterlenee (22500 dollar) men game3et sara7an elthady elkhayreya 3ashan tesadd wa7da men faghaat elabhath elly 7addetha khobara2 sara7an elthady fe derasa 7adetha 3ameltaha elgame3a.
elhadaf howa tahdeed elgeneat el ghayr mokteshafa elly momken tekon motawarta fe elmar7al el mobakra men sara7an elthady.
elmon7a elly etman7et leldoctor ian ellis, ostaz 3elm amrad el sara7an, heya gaz2 men 2.3 million geneh esterlenee (3.5 million dollar) etman7ou le 20 mochroa fe an7a2 el mamleka el mot7eda.

el doctor ellis 2al: "befadel tamoel game3et sara7an elthady, batew3a atawwer taqneya tesma7 bederaset el ma3lomat elgeneya le alaf el3eyanat men sara7an elthady, w da howa momken yekoon mohem gedan le fahm eltaghyirat elgeneya elly bet7sal fe elmar7al elmobakra men sara7an elthady."ma3roof en sara7an elthady momken yetatawor lama elgeneat fe khaleya elthady tetaghayar w tebtal tetshagel beshkel sa7ee7.
elgeneat el ma3eeba de momken to2ody le taghyirat gesdya fe khaleya sara7an elthady w da by2ody le sara7an elthady.
awel 3alama gesdya 3ala khaleya thady tabee3ya betetatawor le no3 sha2e3 men sara7an elthady heya wogood khaleya zaherya gher namteya mas67a.
el doctor ellis hayedres elgeneat fe el khaleya elzaherya gher elnamteya 3ashan y7added elgeneat elly motawarta fe elmar7al el mobakra gedan men sara7an elthady.
pamela goldberg, elmodir el tanfezee le game3et sara7an elthady, 2alet: "kol sana sara7an elthady bey2tel 12500 set fe el mamleka el mot7eda.

3ashan keda men el darory enna n7added elgeneat el gededa el motawarta fe tatawor sara7an elthady 3ashan el setat elly beyretho elgeneat el ma3eeba de w beyb2o mot3'areen le khatar a3la men sara7an elthady, momken yet3amelhom motaba3a fe mar7ala mobakra."3ala el enternet:
el-roaya betetkallem 3an 7ob 7a2e2y w ezay athar 3ala 7ayat el-batal el-ra2e2y elly esmo "el-mosaawa 7-2521".
ba3d ma l2a el-7ob elly kan mamno3 3aleh fe el-mogtama3 el-dystopian dah, aktashef akheeran qadr eh howa 2ader 3ala 7agat ketir.
dalil derasa roaya "nashid" bey7tawy 3ala seera zatiya le ayn rand, mqalat adabeya, as2ela e5tebar, mawade3 ra2eeseya, shakhsyat, w mol5as w t7leel kamil l-roaya.
nozra 3ala el-7ob: howa 7ob ghayr mashroot, 2any, hows aw romancy.
el-7ob bey5telaf mn shakhs l-tany.
momken te7s beeh na7ya shakhs, aw shy2, aw e7sas, aw tare2a 7aya, w dah elly bey5leeh sa3b ennak t2afham ma3nah el-7a2e2y.
kelmet "nashid" w "shabab mo7kom 3aleh" betb2a tanakod sar5 lama betet7ot fe nafs el-jomla.
el-mafrood en el-nashid yekon 7aga moqadasa, 7aga betmthel magd balad w bet7mel f5r watany.
laken lama betet7ot fe syag mo3ayn.
ma9al 3an mawdoo3 roaya "nashid" el roaya de, "nashid" elly ketbaha ayn rand, bet2ter7 afkar ketir 3an mada fa3alya w kamal el-mogtama3at yootopia.
fe el-story, batalna elly howa "el-mosaawa" 3ayesh fe mogtama3 yootopi fe el-mosta2bal, laken teknologia el-mogtama3 dah mesh mot2adema awy.
"nashid" heya roaya 9'ayra ketbaha ayn rand, w bet7'et 3an sra3 batal el-roaya "el-mosaawa 7-2521" 3ashan yethbet howeyeto el-shakhsya fe mogtama3 gam3y.
batalna mo'men en el-fardeya janeb mohem fe 7aya ay shakhs le2enno bywade7 w bywade7 meen howa el-shakhs dah.
ma9al 3an roaya "nashid" le ayn rand.
fe el-roaya "nashid" le ayn rand, fe mawade3 ketir.

bas fi khatawat te2dar ta3'melha 3ashan telham el nas yeh'temo be ta3'eer el manakh, we a7'san makan tebda' meno howa el kalam ma3 el 3ayla we el as7'aab.
homa bey7ebouk, we haykoono aktar esta3'dadaan ennohom y3'tabrou ta3'eer el manakh kedaia mol7a law 3abart 3an 2alak ne7'etoh.

law kha2if men fekra el kalam 3an ta3'eer el manakh, el ma9'al dah maktoob 3ashanak!
de shwaya nasa7' tefadel fakrahom we enta betetkalem fi el mawade3 el sa3ba di.
awl 7aga, 3ala rigm men en dah momken yeban 3aks el mantiq, mat5alesh fi el kalam beneyet ennak te2tab en ta3'eer el manakh 7a2e2y we beyetatalab e7'ra2at 3ajela.

momken tekte'sh 2e2am moshtarka te2dar testakhdem'ha keno2ta twasel lama yegi doorak fi el kalam.
bas wenta besma3oh, azharlo ennak besma3oh be kalam eijaby we as2ela motaba3a.

badal kedah, momken tetkhafef ma3ah bezok.
wenta bet3'mel kedah, tajanab el shar7 el 3elmy; el kalam el tawil 3an el ghazat el daf2a we ertifa3 mostawa el bahr momken yekhally el nas tatanash.
badal kedah, 7awl twasel le 2albhom be 7ekayat shakhseya 3an leih enta mehtam be ta3'eer el manakh we ezay bey2ather 3alek aw 3ala nas te3rafhom.

wda3 el sabt fe el botagazat el 7aditha howa 5asaya m5asema 3shan tesma7 llyahood el moltazeemin be estekhlaas el botagaz wel forno, ma3 ba3d el kyoos, fe yom el sabt wel 3eyad el yahoodya zy yom tov, wf2an lshre3a el yahoodya.
el tba5 fe yom el sabt we yom tovel shre3a el yahoodya bt7'aram el tba5 fe yom el sabt, 3la 2'eram men en el akl el matbo5 momken yfdl dafy.

el yahood el orthodoks bey7telfo be yomeyn motataleen men yom tov fe n2a6 motafare2a fe el taqweem el yahoody.
law el yomeyn dol by23o 2abl aw ba3d yom el sabt bdo5l, dah bey5ale2 fatra tlat ayam momken el botagaz aw el forno maytft7esh feha.
a3'leb el botagazat wel afran el 7aditha feha 5asaya ghalaq tele2y bybda2 ba3d 12 sa3a, bas wda3 el sabt bey5ale el forno y7afez 3la sokhona el akl tool yom tov.

3shan nakhed khebra 3amalia fel shegl el-meidani, barnamig eagle bey2adem re7la le-demmin elly mawgooda fel wilaaya mecklenburg-vorpommern fel shamal sharq alemaniya.
manta2a el-ekhtibaar de 3ibara 3an nezam bay2i zera3i mostakhdem bishakel mokathaf, et2asas fe 1999 bet3awn waseem bein el-mazare3en el-mahaleeyin w-markaz el-fada2 el-almani (dlr).
w-kaman men sana 2011, ba2et goz2 men morsad terrino "se7ool shamal sharq alemaniya" elly beyediroh markaz ab7ath el-geologia (gfz) potsdam.
el-manazer el-tabi3eya el-shabba beta3et el-3asr el-pleistocene elly etshakelt men 7awaly 10,000 sana bessaabab el-gelyed w-el-maya el-thayeba, betestakhdem bishakel wase3 fel zera3a w-el-ghabaat.
delwa2ty akter men 65 mostash3er ler6oba el-torba w-aktr men 40 ma7atta le-qiyas el-be2a beyetemdara men gabal markaz ab7ath el-geologia w-markaz el-fada2 el-almani.
3ala mar el-sinin, tem jam3 3add kbeer men el-bayanat w-delwa2ty motah w-motafara (trokenbrot w-akheroon.
el-talaba kan 3andohom forsa le-jam3 anwa3 mokhtalafa men el-3eyanat, zy qiyas el-me3ayyer el-biofizya2ya zy mo2sher masa7et el-wara2a be-estekhdam mohalel mazallat el-nabat lai-2200 (li-cor).
bel-2eed men keda, mo7tawa el-chlorophyll fel-wara2a et2as men khilal qeyasat el-emtisas el-gheir madmora be-estekhdam mikyas el-chlorophyll spad-502plus.

el-maham el-tanya le-jam3 el-3eyanat shamlet qiyas r6oba el-torba be-estekhdam mostash3er mahmool, w-kaman 2okhod 3eyanat fe3leya men el-torba w-el-kattla el-7yaweeya elly momken tet2as ba3d keda fel-ma3mel.

el-7amla el-meidaniya de 2addamet le-talaba eagle nazra 3ala 3alam el-shegl el-meidani w-emkaneya le-eghra2 el-qeyasat be-estekhdam agheza mokhtalafa.

el etneen, 4 yunyo 2007azma fe tymoor el shar2eyaazma fe tymoor el shar2eya - el mawke3 dah by2adem t7leel ledawr endonezya w balad w wakala tanya kteera khlal el fawda ally 7asalet fe tymoor el shar2eya w ally wsalet le zroot'ha fe 1999.
el mawke3 mghatee tgh6eya was3a le entekhabat 1999, w erhab el meleeshyat, w tdkhal el omam el mot7eda.
el mawke3 bybos 3ala dawr el e3lam, w by2adem t7leelat w mqalat, w by7tawy 3ala links le m3lomat aktar.
mn el mawke3:tymoor el shar2eya kant ta7t 7'am el bortogal le modda 3 qron taqreeban.
khlal el 7arb el 3alameya el tanya, alaf mn tymoor el shar2yeen fad'oo 7ayathom w homa bysa3'doo el qwat el ostralya fe mo7arba el yabaneyeen.
w ba3deen endonezya ghazet tymoor el shar2eya ba3d ma el bortogal kharjet faga2a fe 1975.
dah kan el yom el taly le zyara el rayes el amerikey ford le endonezya, w ally el nas eshtabah eno kan bmathaba "daw2' akhdar" lel ghazw.

fe el wa2t dah, endonezya kan 3andha da3m 3askary w eghtsady w syasy mn balad zy b7'ereta w amerka w ostralya, le asbab mokhtalafa mnha e7tyatyt el petrol w el gaz, w el mawke3 el estrateegy, w masale7 tjaraya w masale7 mtl3'a bel 3omala el rakheesa.
bey2olo en 200 alf shakhs et2tl'oo mn 1975 - tholth sakaneen tymoor el shar2eya kolhom.
w fe nfs el wa2t, entekhatat 7'o2o el ensan estamrat.

- agost 1999 shahed tswet 3ala taqreer el maseer fe tymoor el shar2eya.
- abl el tswet dah w ba3doh, lama kant el aglbya el sa7'a sawet lel est2lal, el meleeshyat w el gam3at shbh el 3askareya el md3oma mn el gesh el endonezy bda'oo 7amla erhab ma3 rad fa3l dawly b6ee2.

en5efad daraga 7arara el-gism bey7sal lama daraga 7arara gesm el-7ayawan tenzel ta7t 100.5 daraga fahrenhayt, bema en daraga el-7arara el-tabe3eya lel-kelab w el-settat 7awaly 101 w 102.5 daraga fahrenhayt.
momken ye7sal lehom ragfa gheir met7akam feha, so3oba fe el-tanafos, tesalleb el-3adlaat, w etsa3 bo2bo2 el-3een w thabateh.
momken ye2foo kasoleen, d3af, w momken ma yerodosh.
momken kaman yekoono 7aseen be-2alam.

law shakayt fe en5efad daraga 7arara el-gism, 5ally 7aywanak el-l2eef fe makan dafee3 ma3 batateen keteer 3al tool (momken tesakhon el-batateen aw el-manasef fe nashefa el-melaabes le-kam da2eeqa) laken el-a7am fe nafs el-wa2t ennak tedawwer 3al mosada3a el-tabeebeya foora.
etganab en5efad daraga 7arara el-gism tamamman 3an tareeq tedfe2a 7ayawanatek el-l2eefa gowa el-beet.

el akl beyela3eb dor mohem fe el a3yad w el ta2sos el yahoodeya, w fe beyt el yahood kamen.
mislan fe 3eed mohem bey3tbaroh el yahood, w 7ata nas mesh yahood, (kena2es mas7eya betetba32anaw el 3ahd el 3adeem) w howa 3eed el fas7.
el akl beyela3eb dor kebeer fe beyot el nas elly betshark fe 3ashaa el fas7.
3eed el fas7 bey3tbar e7tfeal be5roog bany 2esra2eel men masr w t7rrohom.
awel leela fe el 3eed betbda2 be 3ashaa el fas7 -w howa 3ashaa e7tfaaly.
el khamr gez2 men el wagba de.
kaman khilal mawsoom el 3eed, beta2al 3eesh fateer.
el kharoof w el bayd w el fawakah/3ageena el makasarat, w el khodar el mor, w el baqdoons aw el garjeer, kol de betkoon gez2 men 3ashaa el fas7 fe wa2t el 3eed.
3eed el mazal (so7oot, 3eed el akshak) howa kaman 3eed bey3tbaroh el yahood w ba3d el mas7yeen.
el 3eed dah beykoon le modet sab3 ayam.
anwa3 keteer men el akl betetakal khilal el 3eed dah.
men domanaha 7agat keteer ma7shya zy el falafel el ma7shy, w el bazzangeen, w el karnab, kaman el fawakah w el 7alaweyat el ma7shya.
el keneesh w el kreblash, w fata2er el wagbat el ra2eeseya momken kaman tekoon gez2 men wagbat 3eed el mazal.
el 3eesh el makhammar beta2al khilal el 3eed dah; mafeesh ay 2ayood betens 3ala en el 3eesh el fateer lazmo yetakal.
3eed el mazal aw 3eed el akshak beyefakar 2esra2eel enohom kanu masafeereen fe el ard (safr el lawyeen 23).

3allemhom bel 2'oda: el awlad 3andohom mala7'aza koweyya geddan we bey3almo bel mora2'aba.

etkallem 3an 2'ehmeyyet mosa3'det el gher: el fe3'l gez' kbeer men el ta3leem, bass el awlad kaman me7tageen yefhamo leeh el mafrood yes3'do.
fekr fe 2'eyam 3ayletak we el doros elly enta 3ayez te3allem'ha le awladak.
we ba3deen eshrah lehom leeh enta betet3'abet ennohom me7tageen yes3'do el nas, we homa hay5od el doros dee we yebno 3'alyha lama yebda2o ya3melo.
3allemhom 3an el 3alam: dee momken tekoon m7'ammeh sa3ba la2n enta mesh 3ayezhom yekhafo men el 7agat el we7'sha elly bet7'sal, we keteer men mo'akil el 3alam sa3ba 3ala ay 7ad enno yefhamha.

bass law 3allemt awladak 3an el thaqafat we el nas el mokhtal'fa, homa hayebda2o yefhamo ennohom gez' men 3alam akbar, we fe el 3alam dah, homa momken ya3melo 7agat saghyra keteer momken tekoon leha ta'theer ejaby lel nas.
5allyhom yes2aloo as2'la: el awlad be6abe3yathom fodoolyeen we gez' men 3amelyet ta3leemhom ennohom yes2aloo as2'la.
momken yes2aloo as2'la sa3ba, 7agat enta momken mat3'arfhash ega'bat'ha, bass kon sareeh gad ma te2dar.
law mat3'arfsh el ega'ba, 2'ool lehom enno fe 7agat fe el donia 7atta enta mesh fahmo.
momken kaman tes3'edhom yefhamo el 7agat dee 3an tewselhom leeh homa sha'yfeen enno el donia bel sha'kl dah.
etta3'aw3 ma3a gam3eya 5eyrya: fe 2'alaaf el gam3eyat el 5eyrya elly momken tetta3'aw3 ma3'aha we keteer men el anshata el teta3'ow'eya elly mosleeya we meshow'2a.
dor 3ala 7aga awladak hayestamet3o beeha 3ashan yesh'ofo enno el mosa3'da mesh bas mjezeya, bass kaman tareeqa 7elwa yeg'awzo beeha w2t'hom.

5allyhom yekhtar'o 2'adya: hatetfa2'a besak'a ro7 awladak.

we ba3deen 5od wa2tak 3ashan ta3mel ba7't ma3'ahom 3ashan tela2'y gam3eya momken tet3a'won ma3'aha 3ashan ted3am el 2'adya elly ekhtaroha.
2'oolohom 3an afkar: law la2eet enno ebnak aw bentak bey2a2'lo 3ala 2'adya, 2'oolohom ezay homa sha'yfeen ennohom momken yes3'do.
masalan, law 2'al2an men el teshred, 2'oolohom "eh elly momken ta3'melo 3ashan tes3'do el meshredyn?" hatetfa2'a be ega'bat'hom we elly homa mosta3'deen yet2ademoh lel nas.

3ala 7'alas men enno el teta3'aw3 mkafa2'to fe 7add ze'ato, t2akad ennohom kaman bey5'odoo taqdeer 3ala e7'temamhom we ta3'bohom.

anwa3 el-adhd: adhd, inqesa el-entebah; adhd, far6 el-nashat w el-endefaa3; adhd, el-naw3 el-morakkab.
el-semma el-asasia: daraja gheir monasba men inqesa el-entebah w/aw far6 el-nashat w el-endefaa3 men el-nahaia el-tanwoya.

khasayis el-adhd (1 men 3): inqesa el-entebah, el-mawaqe3 elly bet5tfee feha el-2a3rad: gedida, mosh 2adida, mosh 7elwa, w shakhseya; el-moshatatat el-besaria w el-sem3ia; el-moshatatat el-khayalia; el-moshatatat el-gasedia.
khasayis el-adhd (2 men 3): el-endefaa3, so3oba t2geel el-eshba3, far6 el-nashat, el-ethara el-3atfeia, el-mooj el-mofrit, el-mar7 el-mofrit.
khasayis el-adhd (3 men 3): 3adam el-tanzim, el-moshkilat el-ejtema3ia: motasallat, 3agwani, 2anfod el-7elm; 3adam el-emthal; el-3odwaneya: el-tahadi, el-salbeya: 3adam el-tanzim, el-nesyan.
eih howa el-3eib el-7a2e2i fel-tifl elly 3ando adhd?
d3f el-t7'am el-zaty, 3'az neurology fel-2a2dra 3ala tathbit el-sokouk, elly bey2ady le: so3oba t7'am el-nabsat w tanzim el-sokouk, so3oba keb7 el-nabsat w el-2iltizam be-khatwa aw ta3leemat.

ta'thir d3f el-t7'am el-zaty 3al-tifl elly 3ando adhd: el-ensya2 ma3 el-tayar, el-7adath homa elly byeset7'admo, el-t7'am men 3'eer tanzim, 3adam etsag el-2ad2, tafawot kbeer, el-7adath el-7adara bet7'asmo.
tatar el-2a2diat el-3a2lia el-merta6eta be-tathbit el-sokouk: el-mogaddam men el-demagh, beyadi 2owat el-t7'am el-zaty w el-2a2dra 3ala tawjeeh sokokna lel-mosta2bal.

el-t7'am el-zaty: 5 masarat 3a2lia bet7'sol fel-mogaddam men el-demagh: 1) estibsar - el-tafkeer el-mosbiq; 2) el-kalam el-mawgahed lel-zate: sawt 3'olona w t7'amna el-zaty; 3) el-sokouk el-7'ad3 lel-2a7'ar; 4) 7'alas el-moshkilat; 5) fasl el-7a2ye2 3an el-mash3or; 6) el-dawaf3 el-dakhely, el-mothabara, 2awet el-2era2a; 7) tahleel el-ma3lomat w e3ada tarkebha.

asbab el-adhd (el-2adela el-7adara): 3adam kefaya men el-mawad el-kemya fel-demagh elly betet3araf bel-neurotransmitters (dopamine w norepinephrine); enkhfad el-nashat fel-manate2 el-mo3ayana men el-demagh; enkhfad el-nashat el-karebawy fel-eeg; enkhfad tadafok el-dam lel-manate2 el-mo3ayana men el-demagh.

el-entshar w el-masar: san bedaya el-2a3rad: 3ada ben 3'eer 7 snin; 3ada ben 4 snin fe 7'amsa el-7alat, laken 3ada mayet3rafsh 3aleh 7'ales lamma el-tifl byed5ol el-madrasa; el-entshar: 5% men el-atfal (2 million tifl amreky, 1-2 fe-fesl men 30 tifl).

el-entshar w el-masar: nsebt el-jens fel-mogtama3: el-naw3 far6 el-nashat w el-endefaa3: 3-4 dkor le-ontha; el-naw3 inqesa el-entebah: 2 dkor le-ontha; fel-3yada: 9 dkor le-ontha; masar el-2a3rad: 70-80% men el-7alat betesta7'em fel-moraha2a; 30-70% men el-7alat betesta7'em fel-bologh.

el-moshkilat el-asasia: el-adhd bey2asar 3ala kol jawaneb 7ayat el-tifl: el-3atfeia, el-ejtema3ia, w el-2akadeya; so3oba t7'am el-nabsat fel-sokouk el-ejtema3i w el-mahar el-ma3refia; so3oba fel-ta3amol ma3 el-ghayerin (d3f el-tanshe2a el-ejtema3ia); el-ta7'asol el-madrasi el-monkhafad; d3f taqdeer el-zate, thanawy.
el-mash3or el-sha2e3 3and el-atfal elly 3andohom adhd: enz3aj, 3adam el-sabr, el-ghadab; el-e7'raj men el-sh3oor bel-3adam fa3alya; el-ertibak w el-2al2an 3an el-adwia w el-3ilaj el-ghairha.

el-moshkilat el-moratbita: 80% 3andohom moshkilat fel-ta7'asol el-madrasi; 25% mosharraf 3alihom enohom 3andohom moshkilat fel-ta3alom; mofatah 3ali men etkarar el-sana; 3adam el-emthal w el-3odwaneya: shurut moratbita - odd (oppositional defiant disorder) w cd (conduct disorder); moshkilat fel-3ala2at ma3 el-2aban.

ta'thir el-2a3rad 3al-madrasa: 3adam el-2a2dra 3ala el-2a3tidal aw el-tarkez; beyla2y aktar el-a3mal mel'a; beyla2y so3oba fel-enteqal men nashat le-nashat, khososan men a2al hekeima (el-2astra7a) le-akthar hekeima; bey2ol mola7'at gheir lay2a keteer; el-natiga: ta7'asol madrasi monkhafad.

el ta'thir el iqtisady el mo2akhar lel anwa3 el ghazeya beywsel lel 143 melyar dollar fel sana game3 el welaayat el mot7eda.
w fe welaayat oregon, el ta'thir el mertabet be 21 no3 men el 3ashab el ghazeya beyeklef sokkan oregon 125 melyon dollar fel sana fe 5sara el entag el zera3y w adar el 7ara2' w masareef el mokafaha.

el ta'thire de betwa7'od bo2dor el fawayed el iqtisadeya el mertabeta be mokafaha el 3ashab el ghazeya.
lamma te7'od fe el e3tebar el 7ayawanat el 3'areeba w el ghazawat el mayya ma3 el nabat w el taghyeer el ghayr asly lel maw6en, beyeb2a leeh 3ewakeb 3alena kolena.
3ashan teb2a el nezam el zera3'ya marna 3ala el daghat wel taghyirat de, lazma el mazare3en yetwaro estejabat we estrategeyat edarya fa3ala.
el war2a deh betestakshof teqneyat el edara de, we bet7addad ba3d el 7olol elly betefaker feha we betebnneha mazare3 el 2aghanam wel 2abqar fe new zealand.
be2estekhlaf estetla3een 3ala mostawa el mazare3, wa7ed 3amlo verfizer fe 1986 wel tany 3amlo argus fe 2010, tem tahadad ba3d jawaneb el nezam el zera3'ya el marna.

besebab ekhtelaf el fatarat el zamaneya lel estetla3een we ekhtelaf el aswaq wel nezam el 3alamiya elly bet2aser 3ala el nezam el zera3'ya el mahleya, kan fe ekhtelafat malhoza fe el estejabat we el estrategeyat el edarya.

el nateeg deh betban eno 3ala ragm el sa3obat el zahra, el mazare3een 7aliyan bayen 3aleehom est3dad akbar lel mokhatra, ma3 3edad akbar menhom bey5od 2oloob 3ashan yestethmar fe tatawor el mazare3 behdes wosool le manateq entag we aswaq gededa.

dah kan wa7'ed ma3 el 3edid men el mazare3een elly beyta2alemo 3ashan yestafedo men el 2a2a el 7alya le 3awayed el alban 3ashan yekmelo el 3awayed el a2al elly bey7asloha men montagat el 2aghanam wel 2abqar.

el est3dad dah le 2akhd el 2oloob kan mokhtalef gedan 3an el 3a2leya elly kan el mazare3een beybanooha fe 1987, fe3lan kan 3edad 2alel gedan men el mazare3een bey5odo 2oloob, we kan e3adet tamweel el deyooon el mawgoda howa el sabab el ra2e2y le 2akhd el 2oloob.

el manateq el tanya elly el mazare3een beyzhar 3aleehom est3dadhom lel mokhatra kan men 2orel el ebda3 wel tojarob teqneyat gededa, we toroq edara gededa, we tatawor montagat motakhasesa, wel tanw3' we el ba7'3 3an el wosool le aswaq gededa.
el tashaboh el ra2e2y beyn el fatarat el zamaneya kan eno akbar estejaba lel taghyirat el egtema3'ya kan tabni syasa monkhafada el mad5oolat.

el nateega deh kan mohma gedan, 3ashan el mazare3een elly beyest5odmo nezam edara taqlidya, welly kan beyshaklo aglbeeya estetla3 1986, bey3te2ed be3am eno beyest5odmo estrategeyat aw estejabat tanya.

el mawdoo3 kolo 3an tafa3ol el mostahlekeen ma3 el aghezeya elly bey5ale el computer mo7adesy mesh tare2a el ed5al, laken ezay bet3'amel ma3 el application w te3mel mo3amela.

ma3 en 2akser el nas elnaharda beyrab6o el computer el mo7adesy bel ma3lomat el mawga7a lel mostahlek, zy lama yes2alo telephonat-hom 3an el etegahat aw yetfa3lo ma3 khadmet el 3omala, laken dah beda yetghayar.
el 7alat el mo32ada lest5damat el a3mal betban wa3d 7a2e2y.

fe makan 3aml mashterek fe palo alto, california, el zabain yegdar-o ye7'ozo amaken 3aml b resala neseya maktooba b tare2a 3afweya le robot dardasha byrad 3aleehom b resala neseya 3ashan ye5od ay ma3lomat tanya me7tagha - zy 3adad el dyoof - 3ashan yekmel el 7'ozoz.

fel mosta2bel, application le gedwela el mawared el basharya yegdar y2ool lel mowazeen kam yom e7'aza fadel leehom, w ysa3'edhom ye7'alo ta3arood el mawa3'ed 3ashan yel2o2o anasab el tawareekh, w yewaf2 3ala talabathom lel e7'aza tele2'y.
laken ma3 tahsen el al'at fe fahm tare2et kalamna, heb2o azka; badal ma yegboroona nete3'alem ezay nest5demhom, het2alemo ma3 tare2et tefkeerna w kalamna w she3'lena.
el anezma el mo7adesya fe3lan gaderat tet3alem men el estefsarate el sab2a w el bayanat el gededa 3ashan tred be shakel mofeed aktar 3ala el estefsarate el mosta2belya.
technology ma3alaga el lougha el tab3eya betsa3'ed el mos3deen el ra2meeen fe agheztek enohom yefhamo el kalam aw el nosoos el 3afweya.

ba3d keda el mos3deen el ra2meeen yegdar-o yetfa3lo ma3 anezma tanya, zy magherk ba7'os aw taqweem aw application zekaa a3mal, 3ashan yehallo el as2ela el mofto7a w yedo 2agaba aw ye3melo 7aga b el tare2a elly bany 2adm ye3mela.
kol ma application mo7adesy yest5'adam aktar, kol ma yegdar yos2al rododo aktar.
how bet3'alem b estemrar men bayanat el mo3amalat w soklok el mosta5dem zy ma bany 2adm bet3'alem lougha gededa.
dah magarad wagha gededa lel anezma el 7adya.
akter men magarad wagha gededa, el computer el mo7adesy mosta3ed enno yeghayyar tamaman tare2et tafa3olna ma3 el computers elly betshagel a3malna.
hen2dar nedabt el aghezeya, w nestaksher el wa23 el efterady, w netwasal ma3 anezma el tash'eel, w aktar men keda men 3'eer ma ne7'tage nef7'at applications menfesla.
badal keda, hen2dar netkalem aw ne3mel 2'emazat aw yemken ne3mel saot e7'bat 3ashan no7'od enna me7'tageen 7aga, w el anezma el zekya fel khalfeeya hatred 3alena 3ala 7'sb.
el computers beta3etna hatest5'adam el ta3alem el 2'aly 3ashan te7'add eh elly 3ayzeenoh, w tes2al as2ela 3ashan to7'od w tedded syag, w te7'add ezay tenfed talabtna, w tede el natayej.

mesalan, momken ne2ool enna me7'tageen lawazem, w nezam el meshterayat beta3etna yegdar yesma3 el talab, w yerbetoh bel meshterayat el sab2a, w yela2y amr shera2 monaseb, w ye7'od talbya tele2'y ma3 mawred ma3tamed yegdar yewsel fel 2'et el zamaney w el se3r el monaseb.

el anezma el mo7adesya momken kaman tebda heya el etsal badal ma testena el talabat: nezam sayana yegdar yeb3at resala neseya b shakel 2estebaky le fanny ma3 tareekh el taselem el mo7'asad w ta3leemat el targe3 le 2esma ghayar.

eltas7'7: ยปmfesh mawade3 fo2 elmostawa dahยซelbyanat eldakhema welta7leel elgeo-meqaniyemken yekon mawdoo3 "nezam elmalomat elgeo-meqasiah welbyanat eldakhema" men aktar elmawade3 elly etnaqeshet be shakel sa7en fe elseneen el'a5eera.

'akthar elnaqash kan 3an elbyanat: kemeyat dakhema men elbyanat elmeqasiah thnayeia wethalathia el'ab3ad welbyanat elmeqasiah-elzamania (reba3eya el'ab3ad) betetgama3 wetetkhazen delwa2ty; fa ezzay ne2dar nwassel leha?
we ezzay ne2dar narsem wenafser magmo3at elbyanat eldakhema deh be f3aleya?
2alel men el'ehtemam etwageh lel'as2ela elmet3aleqa be ta7leel elbyanat eldakhema, 3ala ra2m en dah erta3a fel'agenda fel'awna el'a5eera.

belnesba lelbyanat felwa2t el7'aly, et7'ata elta7leel eltaselsely benaga7' 2aslan; fe halet elbyanat betetestaqbal kteer we betetesta5dem le ben2a khareeta dynamekeya aw le taweled 2a9'am 'e7saeeya tarakomeya yemken tetsawer w/aw testekhdama le tashgeel 'a7'bar aw 'andalat.

ela had el7ad, elta7leel meshabe7 lelta7leel elly betetm 'e7'radoh 3ala magmo3at byanat 'a9'gar, laken ma3 bany byanat weme3alja meshbatat khasosan lelta3amol ma3 '7'am elbyanat elmet3aleqa, ma3 eltarkez 3ala 'estekshaf elbyanat k'aleqameya r2eeseya lel'ektechaaf.
et5at3at bany beramgeya khasa lelta3amol ma3 magmo3at elbyanat eldakhema gedan deh, bema feha mrafe2 lelta7leel el'e7saeey.
men ben hadol elmasharo3 abatshy hadoob wstwrm we akomolo, welbarameg elmet3aleqa zay spark wscala wprez, w'adwat eltasweer wel'ektechaaf zay tableau wgiffy wquick.

gadal miller wgoodchild (2014) enno matloob 3aneia kebeera 3and el3amal ma3 elbyanat eldakhema - betzaher 2as2ela mhmma betet3ale2 belbyanat (el'arba3a v): 7'am elbyanat el'a7'bar; sor3a wosool elbyanat wel2atamat elzamaneya elmet3aleqa beha; tanawo3 elbyanat elmetawafra wel tare2a elly betet7'ata beha (zay el'ekhtyar elthata); wmada 2as7eya had elbyanat.

etqadem 3ard taqdeemy men elprofesor mike goodchild le ba3d el3anaser elra2eeseya le monaqasha elbyanat eldakhema 3ala saf7a elmwared felmawqe3 wye2dar yetwaseel leha mabashara 3ala: www.spatialanalysisonline.com/ppts/bigdata.pdf - lazem teshouf el3ard da ganb ma3 ma9'al miller wgoodchild, fe3lan byewafy shar7 'akthar 2akmal lel'afkar elra2eeseya elly etghatet.
elfesl 17 men ketab longley w'akheron (2015) kaman 2a2ra2a mawso bih fe3lan, be3'ata2 el'as2ela el'aws3 elmet3aleqa be jam3 elmalomat wettekhaz elqararat.

fe ma9'al beta3on "elbyanat eldakhema: hal nerta7eb 5ata2 kebeer?" felfinancial times, mars 2014, betata3amol tim harford ma3 had el2as2ela w'akthar, wesal7 'al ba3d el2as2ela el'a9al wodo7'a elly betet7'ata biha elbyanat eldakhema.
momken yekon elta7'eez elly bew'ood fe keteer men magmo3at elbyanat deh howa el'awal menhom.
had elta7'eezat momken tekon da22a wsa3ba elta7'eed wmosta7el el'edara.
3ala sebyl elmathal, kol elbyanat eldakhema elmet3aleqa bel'enternet met7'eeza asasan lelly 3andoh 'emkaneya elwosool lel'enternet weste5damoh, ma3 wogood ta7'eez demoghrafy wgeo-meqany madmoj.

elbyanat eldakhema mesh be3'at en elbyanat mosh 7elwa aw met7'eeza; 3'alat men keda, elbyanat eldakhema bete2dem moshkela tanya - sahel gedan eltarkez 3ala 'estekshaf elbyanat waktechaaf el'anmat, wta7'eed elerta6at elly momken tekon za2efa nateja le 7'am elbyanat wel'a7'bar welmotaghyirat elly betet2as.
ma3 wogood byanat wmoqarana kafa2a, elnatayej el'e7saeeya elmohemma 7atmeeya, laken da mesh be2'addar belzarora ay ro2ya 7a2e2eya aw fahm aw ta7'eed lel3alaqat elsebabeya.

tab3an fe keteer men magmo3at elbyanat elmohemma welmothera lel'ehtemam feha, elly beyekon eljam3 weltekhzeen 'akthar menhadeya, 'a9'al 3'arada lelta7'eez, wbetesajjel elmotaghyirat be tare2a mabashara, ma3 sijlat "ka2mela" w"nadeefa".
elbyanat deh betetkhazen we betet'adar be7'eer wbetemeyl enaha elly betetjam3oha elwaga2at elly betekamel elbyanat belbyanat elwa9'eya wme3lomat da2man eljodda.

voyager 1 w voyager 2 6al3ou men 16 yom men ba3d fe 1977, w voyager 1 delwa2ty 3ala ba3d 7awaly 11 billion mile (18 billion kilometer) men el shams.

"ehna ben3t2ed en dee akher mar7ala fe re7lena lelfada2 bayn el nogoum", dah kan kalam 3odw el mo7'tasar edward stone men ma3had california liltaknologia.

el teb el tajanse howa nezaam rayaaya se7eya tabee3ya mostakheema fe el 3alam mn aktar mn 200 sana.
el teb el tajanse et3araf lawl mara 3an terik doctor almani, samuel hahnemann, elly etwald fe 1755.
delwa2ty, monezmeyet el se7a el 3alameya bet3teref beih kakber nezaam 3elaaji tany mostakhem fe el 3alam.
3la rigm mn enno mashhoor aktar fe el hend we amreeka el ganobeya, aktar mn 30 malyoon shakhs fe ooropa, we malyeen tanya 7awal el 3alam, beyestafedou mn estekhmalo.
el teb el tajanse momken yet2asem le thalatha mokonan ra2eeseya.
el teb el tajanse bey3aleg kol shakhs kafard fareed behdef tahfeez qodreto 3al el shefaa.
doctor el teb el tajanse beyekhtar el 3elaaj el ansab ben2an 3al el a3rad el mohadada lelfard we mostawa se7to el shakhsya.
el adweya betetketeb ben2an 3al kol mostaweyat keyanek - el ro7anya we el 3atafeya we el 3a2leya we el gesdya.
elly shebho beyshfeehkalema el teb el tajanse gaya mn el kalema el yonanya "ma3anaya mosheba" welly betsheer lemabda2 "elly shebho beyshfeeh" fe el 3elaaj.
gesm el ensan 3aref howa bey3mel eh we 3ando estejaba shefaa tal2eya.
estekhmal el daw2 le zeyada qowet el a3rad hayesmah be 3elaaj el marad men jawwa 3an terik daf3 el a3rad el 7aleya we el madeya lel kharej 3al tol el tora2 el mohadada.
el adweya betet5add 3al nas as7a2 3ashan nekeshf el natayej el 3atafeya we el 3a2leya we el gesdya.
el a3rad elly betbaan fe shakhs sa7ee7 betedel 3al qowet el 3elaag elly haykoon leeh 3al marad be a3rad mosheba.
el daw2 el tajanse beyet5add be akal jor3a 3ashan yebda 3ameleya el shefaa el da5elya lal gesm.
dah mohim gedan 3ashan el daw2 mesh haysebb a3rad ganebyya wadha7a we mesh haykoon edmani.
akal jor3a betet7asal 3an terik 3ameleya el takhfeef.
kol mara el mokonan el nashet be tet5all, el daw2 beyeb2a aktar fa3alya.
dah bey5ally el daw2 el tajanse lateef we da2e2 bas lesa gawy.
fe law7et mokonan el daw2, el mokon el nashet hayetketb 3ado raqm, we ba3deen 7arf "c" (nesba takhfeef 1:100) aw 7arf "x" (nesba takhfeef 1:10).
el raqm dah ("12x") bemesel 3edad el marat elly el mokon etkhallef we et7asan feha.

ta7'od 7'alef 5ales mn el-2esaba 2abel ma te3mel ryada shita2eyael-7ad, 5 yanayer 2014 (2ekhabar el-se7'a) - el-tazaloj wel-taza7'lef 3al g'elid wel-taza7'lef 3al tholj wer-rokob el-zala'at heya tarakeb ra2e3a lel-b2a2 nateef 2abel ma tet7'ata el-7'ata2et el-lazema lel-salaama.
el-ryada di betet7'at el-ta5teet wel-7'odra le-tajneeb el-2esabat el-5atira el-mo7'tamela, we-da w'fa2an lel-2akadimeya el-amrekeya le-jora7'y el-3'azameem.

herbert alexander, jara7' el-3'azameem fe ketchum, idaho, fe beyan sa7'afi sa'ed men el-2akadimeya: "el-2esabat el-shay2'a fel-ryada el-shita2eya men el-tazaloj wel-taza7'lef 3al tholj beteshmel el-kada'7'at wel-elto2'at wel-5al3 wel-kosor".

et3'alag aktar men 310,000 shakhs fel-mostashfayat we-3eyadat el-taba2 wel-tarakeb el-tawary2 fel-3am 2012 be-sebb 2esabat met3'aleka bel-ryada el-shita2eya, w-da w'fa2an lel-lajna salaama el-montagat el-2estehlakeya el-amrekeya.
men ben el-2esabat di, kan aktar men 40,000 be-sebb rokob el-zala'at, we-9areb 98,000 be-sebb el-taza7'lef 3al tholj, we-7'ales 120,000 be-sebb el-tazaloj, we-53,000 be-sebb el-taza7'lef 3al g'elid.

we-2asha'r alexander en "el-2esabat di bet7'sol g'alban fe nehayet el-nahar, lama bey7'alos el-sh5as 2esheya 2a5eera lel-tazaloj aw rokob el-zala'at aw el-taza7'lef 3al tholj, 3'eer ma7'zool eno ta3'eb aw mesh merta7'.

de kolha betet2adem lilmosahmeen wel gomhor wel heya el 3ama lel rakaba el maleya fel teqareer el rob3eya wel sanaweya lel shareka.

2a2ema el markez el maley bet3ared el wad3 el maley lel shareka fe la7'et mo3ayna, zy el sora aw el la2'et el sorya.

2a2ema 7o2o2 el mosahmeen betban el taghyyarat elly 7asalet fe el ghoz2 el khass be 7o2o2 el mosahmeen fe 2a2ema el markez el maley zy el 2ashem el gededa elly etsadrat aw el 2ashem elly et3ad shera2ha.

2a2ema el tadafokat el nadya betwazen ben saafi el dakhl (ra2m w2efan le m3ayeer el mohasaba el mot3arafa 3aleha) ma3a el tadafokat el nadya el fa3'elya el dakhela we el kharja men el shareka men nahyet el sana el maleya el 2a5eera le7ad nahyet fe'rat el teqreer el 7ali.

el mela7'zat betwadd7 aktar el byanat elly fo2 we betkoon ghoz2 asasy men el byanat el maleya, we betdi tafaseel aktar 3an 7agat zy:- ezay el eyradat betet3raf (ya3ny betjaweb 3ala el so2al, "emta momken el shareka te2ol en 7aga etba3et fe3lan?")- tos3eed masroofat el ta3weed 3ala asass el 2ashem (abl keda kant el masroofat de betet7at fe 2a2ema el dakhl, wel mela7'zat kant el makan el wa7eed elly momken tshof feh el band dah, we meen aslan bey2ra el mela7'zat?)- me3lomat 3an el qeta3at zy el feghat el ferdeya lel montagat (zy mbay3at ipod beta3et apple mqabel mbay3at el computer) wel mbay3at m2asema ghorafyan- tafaseel mws3a 3an benod mokhtalefa fe 2a2ema el markez el maley, zy keyfeya taweze3 el makhzoon ben el mawad el khama wel montagat ta7t el tasne3 wel montagat el neha2eya- we 7agat tanya keteeer.

3ala 2rghm mn 2ahmeyet deraset el ba7'ethyn lltshabeh w el 2ekhtelaf been el etelhab el sha3'by el mozmn w el entefakh el rewy, mn waghet nazar el mryd, momken mtkounsh el moqarana dih mhmah.

el etelhab el sha3'by el mozmn mertabet bel ta3'rod el motawal le mokhtalef el mohayegat, w akthrha she3'a de5an el segayyer, 3la 2rgm mn 2n el etelhab el sha3'by el mozmn yemken yentej 2ayda 3n el ta3'rod le mosabbat el 7asaseya.

ye3any el ash5as el msabyn bel etelhab el sha3'by el mozmn men s3al mozmn mshhwd be blghm.
w le2n el 3adawy momken tet2awwel lel entefakh el rewy, yeb2a dah mofrod 2amr kbeer llmd5neen.
el entefakh el rewy, mn n7ya tanya, betmaye2 bet2awwel w tadmear asghar el w7dat fel r2atyn, elly btet2asem el 7wyselat el hway'ya.
el 7wyselat el soghyara el shbeha bel balonat deh bten2l el 2oksjyn elly bnestnsh2oh le magra el dam w bt2awwel 2oksjd el karbon lel 5arej.
fel ash5as el msabyn bel entefakh el rewy, el 7wyselat el hway'ya betn7'ar 3nd el zfyr, bma ye2'3l tabadel el hwa sa3b.
le2n el nas momken te3any men mzeej mn el etelhab el sha3'by el mozmn w el entefakh el rewy, momken yeb2a sa3b el tamyeez been el 7alatyn.
3shan keda, ghanan betetgm3 ma3a ba3d fel term "mard el ensdad el rewy el mozmn" aw copd.
elly bey3'a5ed el sora aktar howa el etelhab el sha3'by el mozmn elly byegy mshhwd bel asthma, elly byesabab ensdad t2awwel el hwa 3la 2rgm mn el 3elaj el m3'ayed lel asthma.
mard el ensdad el rewy el mozmn sha3'y, w by7sal momken fel 10% mn el ash5as byn 55 w 85 sana.
7waly 3% mn skan el welaayat el met7eda 3ndhom el etelhab el sha3'by el mozmn, fe 7en en 1% 3ndhom entefakh rewy.
aktar el 3'alamat el sha3'ya le mard el ensdad el rewy el mozmn howa el s3al, entag el blghm, d2eqet el nefes, w el safyr.
