laken el marada elly se7athom kwayesa be shakel gheir motawakaf dol, beyfadl yenta' el heemoglobin el gineni, w dah bey3awed el sha2l el 3ayeb lel broteen 3and el kebar.
el ba7'aseen fe shareka novartis w entellia therapeutics 3ayzeen yeraga3o yewala3o el jeen el mas2ool 3an el heemoglobin el gineni tani 3and el marada elly 3andohom fa2r el dam el mangoli.

el fereeq 3ayez yakhod koraat el dam el 7amra men el marada, w y3addelo el dna betaa3hom - b estekhana esma crispr - 3ashan yeghlab el miftah, w ba3deen y7'anohom el khalaya el modifya di tani fel gamee3.
fel wa2t el 7ali, el mochro3 lesa fe bdayeto.

"el bayanaat el basharya heya elly betwagheh estrateegyetna el 3elajeya lel amrad el motaleta bel dam", bey2ool lloyd klickstein, rayes el teb el tarkemy fel wahda el ketsha2 el modasherat el gededa fe me3ahed novartis lel ab7ath el tebya el 7yaweeya.

"e7na 3areen en el sha2l el gineni lel heemoglobin bey3'ayyer masar fa2r el dam el mangoli, fa e7na motafayeleen bel 3elaj el geny dah."el fereeq kamen beybos le ab3ed men fa2r el dam el mangoli le tatbeeqat tanya motaleta bel dam le t3deel el gene.

fe ba3d el 7alat, haykoon sa3b ennak te7'od 3adad kafi men koraat el dam men marid be tareeka amena 3ashan te3addelaha, khososan law howa me7tag le n2l dam motakerrar 3ashan ye3eesh.

w-te7'eel airbus en "fe el-wa2t el-7ali, el-waseela el-wa7eda el-momken est3ada el-beeyanat men (el-sandook el-aswad) howa mo3alagetha 3al-ard be-adwat ardyya mawso3a gedan".
w-ma-bette2asem el-sandookat ben2el el-beeyanat fe el-wa2t el-f3'aly lel-sharika el-masna3a lel-6ayara, 3ashan "el-mas2oleyya btet2adam we-betet7'atham men soltat el-ta7'6ee2", kema bet2ool airbus.
el-sandook el-aswad mabyet3amelha boeing wala airbus - 3ala raghm en el-masna3een bey7tajo yedamo el-teknologia ma3a b2eyet el-6ayara.
wa-2alet el-mot7adetha be-esm boeing, sandy angers youm el-e7ad "boeing betda3em el-teknologia w-el-7'osoos elly betsa3ed 3ala ta7'seen salaama nezam el-no2l el-jawwy el-3alami b3'ad".
"w-da beyshmel derasa el-ta7'seenat el-momken 3ala qoboleya beqa' el-sandook el-aswad w-el-2amkaneya lel-wosool leeh.
el-7'osoosa en kol as7ab el-masla7a fe magal el-6eyaran - el-mushagheleen, el-monazemeen, w-el-masna3een - lazem yeshaghlaw ma3a ba3d le-t7'adeed jedaweya w-3amaliyet el-7alol di".
w-bet2ool airbus en derasetha hatefham shuraka' sena3yeen w-mosasasaat el-b7'6eya w-soltat el-dawleya el-mo3neya be-sala7eya el-6eyaran w-el-ta7'6ee2at.
w-hateb2a el-derasa ta7t 2'era2at patrick gavin ra2ees handasa airbus w-charles champion ra2ees khadamat el-3omala.
w-2al tom enders el-ra2ees el-tanfeethy le-airbus fe beyan "en jama3 el-beeyanat mn el-7awadeth 7aga mohema gedan le-zayada ta7'seen salaama el-6eyaran".
"fey 7'eyarat teknologeya mokhtalefa le-ta7'seen est3ada beyaanat el-re7la w-naql el-beeyanat le-markaz ardyya asasan.

hanshof delwa2ty khayarat mokhtalefa le-7alol el-tejarreya el-momken tatbeeqha, mn 3'eer elly momken feha en khabretna fe naql el-beeyanat fe el-wa2t el-f3'aly mn 6ayarat el-e7'tebar bet3atna ted3am te7'seen 7alol zay di".
el-sandook el-aswad le-re7la el-6eyaran el-faransaweya 447, elly betet2asem mn mosajel beyaanat el-re7la el-raqamy w-mosajelat sawt gomaret el-qodma, mawgoodesh le-delwa2ty.

lama 2'alaf el-soltat el-faransaweya taqreer mo2aqt el-osboo3 el-ly fat 3an el-7a2ye2 el-ma3roofa mn el-7adess elly 2'atal feeh 228 sha7's fe yunyo, 7azaro men eno mosh sahel na3raf eh elly 7asal be-7aqiqy mn 3'eer el-sandook el-aswad.

el-eftarady, law ketbt bas ret fel mini baafr, howa byems7 elbaafr el7ali.

6 roo7 "modmoona" l meraaga3a 3'orof elpowerpoint:dayman abda2 b meraaga3a el emla2 b estekhdam 5asayyet tadqeek el emla2.
lel asaf, nas keteer bey3tamed 3aleha k tareeqa el meraaga3a elwa7eeda beta3hom, bas heya mesh se7reeya.

5asayyet tadqeek el emla2 momken te5ta2 lama te2abel:- kalemat metshabehah fel nout2 bas mokhtalefa fel ma3na, zy "to" w "too" w "two" aw "your" w "youโre".

- asmaa2 w 3anawyen mesh mawgooda fe qamoos elcomputer.

de momken tewafar wa2t keteer law enta 3aref eljomal elly feha mo3'zala.

ellygena el3alya lelente5abat asdaret karar gedeed bet3deel elgawwal elzamaney lelente5abat di.
elkarar dah raqm 85 lesana 2015, w nushir elnaharda felgarida elrasmeyya.
bey2ool elkarar en elente5abat hetet3mel 7sb elgawwal elgedeed elly mawgood felgarida.
y3ny hift7o bab eltorsh7 lemoda 12 yom bs, men youm 1 7add 12 september.

ellygena ghayart elmawa3ed di, w khalet ayyam 16 w 17 w 18 september homa elly hyt2adem feehom el63oon.
w ba3deen men youm 19 7add 27 september hykono byfeslo fel63oon di, ma3 en fe wast7om youmeen agaza 3eed el27a.
w ba3deen youm 28 september htel3an ellygena elkoshouf elnahayeya lilmar7ala el2wla w htbda2 elday3a elente5abeya.
amma youmey 29 w 30 september, fhykono m5asseen lltanazel w elt3deel, w ba3deen men youm 1 7add 3 october hyt2adem el63oon tany, w men 4 7add 8 october hykon elfasl fel63oon di.
w youm elgom3a 16 september hykon youm elsamt elente5aby.

ana shayef en elt3deel dah mohim 3ashan yb2a fe wa2t kafi lilmorshe7een 3ashan y2ademo awra2hom, w kaman 3ashan yb2a fe wa2t lelfasl fel63oon.

tab2an lmotatalibat 2l kanoun ta7seen elmas2oulia elbaridia w ta3zeezha (paea) lesanat 2006, lagnat tanzim elbarid (prc) betrag3 tar2ia tahdid hay2it elbarid elamrikia (usps) les3ar eltawaabe3.
tab2an lkanoun paea, hay2it elbarid elamrikia mesh hat2dar terfa3 as3ar eltawaabe3 lmontagat elmasitra 3al souq faw2 moddel eltad5om elly bey7addedoh mou2sher as3ar elmostahlek (cpi).
el7ad el2aqsa les3ar kan fekra we7sha fe 2006, w fadal fekra we7sha fe 2017, w lazem lagnat tanzim elbarid ten7'eeha.
elmontagat elmasitra 3al souq hyya anwa3 elmontagat elly akter elnas betfakar feha lama ben2oul kelmet "barid".

elfekra di betetmen elbarid men eldarja el2oula, barid eltasweeq eltab3 le hay2it elbarid elamrikia (sab2an elbarid el3adi), elbarid eldawry, khidmat eltara7od, welkhidmat elkhassa zy elbarid elmas'oul, elbarid elmadmon, etc.
di montagat mahmia belkanounin eltwam elly byedou hay2it elbarid e7tikar 3al sandou2 elbarid, ma3 motatalibat taqdeem khidma shamla lel3anaween kolha.
wa7ed men el2asbab elma3lna lel7ad el2aqsa les3ar howa en elmorseleen ma3andhomsh ekhtiar lelmontagat di.
fe 7een en sherekat zy fedex w ups bettanas2 3al tawseel khilal elleil w eltara7od elsaghyra, bas hay2it elbarid elamrikia hyya elly te2dar twasel elmontagat elmasitra 3al souq.
kan lazma 7ad aqsa les3ar 3ashan y7ami elmorseleen.
mou2sher as3ar elmostahlek ekhtiar mesh kwayes lelmo2sher elkhass be as3ar eltawaabe3.

awalan, mou2sher as3ar elmostahlek byesta'ned 3al salla men elsol3 elmostakhdama men elmostahlekeen - akl, wagoud, w kareba, w 3arabiat (gadedda w mosta3mala), w malabes, w re3aia tebia, w ma'wa, w khidmat nigl.
khilal el12 shahr elly entahaw fe febrayer 2017, elziada el7asouba fel s3ar lel3anaser kanet 2.7% (elmasdar - maktab e7saeat el3amal - bls.gov).
ma3a keda, khilal nafs elfatra di, mou2sher s3ar elbanzin zad be nesia 30.7%.
hay2it elbarid elamrikia 3andaha aktar men 200,000 3arabia bet7arak elbarid kol youm.
s3ar elbanzin leeh ta'thir akbar bekteer 3al takaleef elta3milia le hay2it elbarid elamrikia men el s3ar elthabet lel'akl.
kaman, akter as3ar eltawaabe3 mesh betetdafa3 men elmostahlekeen, elsherekat hyya elly betdafa3ha.
akal men 28% men da5l hay2it elbarid elamrikia elly beywsel le 68 meleya dollar beygi men 3amaliathom eltegaria, w akal men 21% men aktar men 200 meleya ket3a barid kanet ket3a wa7da.
akter elbarid bet3amloh elsherekat w bet6ar7oh le3amalaha welmotaba3een.
elmo3aradeen le rafa3 el7ad el2aqsa les3ar bierdodo nafs elkalam elmelal beta3 "eldawama elmamita" elly etsem3 keter fe elmadhi.
"law el2as3ar zadet, elsherekat hatab3at barid akal aw hatet7awal lel'iimail." kalam faragh.
fe elmadhi, 3omr ma kan fe enkhfad kbeer fe 7ajm elbarid ba3d zeyada el2as3ar.
elenkhad fi 7ajm elbarid ema besabab 2esueiat iqtisadia akbar aw ta7awolat teknologia.
ta7weel elbarid elmady lelta5atool el'iilktrooni 7a2iqi - bas mesh mertabet be as3ar eltawaabe3.
aghlabia elmostahlekeen - men kol el2a3mar - lessa beyfaddalou esti2bal ket3a barid madia.
elsherekat ghalban betshof tawfeer kbeer lama bet6ar7ou khtar 'iilktrooni, bas ba3d awel mawga men elestikhdam, sora eltaghyeer bet2al be shakel kbeer.
khilal el5ams sneen el2akhera, 7ajm elbarid eltegare, welbarid men eldarja el2oula elmortab mesbanan enkhfad akal men 1% fel sana.
rafa3 el7ad el2aqsa les3ar mesh byedi hay2it elbarid elamrikia 7oria tahdid el2as3ar.
ay zeyada mo2tara7a lazma tet7at lelmo2af2a men lagnat tanzim elbarid - w di mesh khatam mat3i.
kaman, keyada hay2it elbarid elamrikia, bema feehom elmodir el3am brennan, 3ayzeen yekabrou shogh'l elbarid.
elziyadat elkebeera mesh hat3a2demhom ywaslou lelhadaf da.
hay2it elbarid elamrikia etshaghlat kteer 3ashan tezood elkefaa, w lessa fe shogh'l aktar me7tag yet3'amal.
ma3a keda, besabab elcongress elly mesh gader yemarrar esla7 baridi 7a2iqi, hatta elgo'hod di me7doda.
fe nafs elwa2t, el3arabiat el2adima w kol elmodat eltanya me7taga tetghar.
khale2 hay2it barid amrikia a2wa lelmostaqbal y3ni it3'eetha 2asasa malia a2wa.
en7'eyat 7ad mou2sher as3ar elmostahlek howa awel khatawa fel eteja7 elsah.

nashrt magmo3a dawlyia mn elba7'ethen el-murtabeteen b-monaazamet elsa7a el3alamiya teqreerha el-nahayee 3an tajreba lq7 el-ebola fe ghinya, w-waghedt en el-lq7a ta6reqa amena w-fa3'ala l-mna3 el-2esaba be-fayroos el-ebola.
w-afad el-teqreer en el-lq7 fa3'al b-nesba 100% fe mna3 el-ebola 3nd e3'ta2'eh qbl 10 ayam aw akthr mn el-ta3'roos l-lfayroos el-qatel.

ye2ol era longini, ostaz el-2e7sa2 el-7yewy fe gam3et florida w-7ad mn el-sh5syaat el-ra2eesya fe t5teem tajreba lq7 el-ebola w-t7leel byanataha el-2e7sa2eya: "kan el-hddaf howa taqdeer fa3'alya el-lq7 mn tajreba lq7 3'yr mqsauda mn el-mar7la el-thaletha".
kan tfa5y fayroos el-ebola 3am 2014 howa el-akbr w-el-akthr ftka 3la el-2tl2.
7adth el-3doa bshkl asasy fe thlatha belad fe gharb afre'ya: lebyerya w-seeralyon w-ghinya.
w-wf2an l-mrkazat mkafa7a el-2amrad w-lwqaya minha, 2asab el-fayroos ma yqrb mn 29,000 sha5s fe el-manta2a, m3 akthr mn 11,000 7alaat wafa.
2otlaq 3la el-tajreba esm "kfa ebola!" w-kan awl tajreba na7'esa mn el-mar7la el-thaletha l-lq7 el-ebola.
w-yshir aktmal el-mar7la el-thaletha b-nja7 ela enoh tm 2khtebaroh 3la ma2at el-msharkeen w-2thbat enoh amn w-fa3'al.
2idha 7adth tfa5y akhrtm tanzeem el-msharkeen fe el-tajreba ela 117 magmo3a, tl2at 70 magmo3a el-lq7 3la el-fw2 w-tl2at 47 magmo3a el-lq7 ba3d 21 ywm.
yst7'od el-mrad 3'da ayam - 7tta asabe3 - l-lt7'leel ba3d el-2esaba bel-ebola, w-m3 zalek lm tkwn hnak ay 7alat byn el-lq7at ba3d akthr mn 10 ayam mn tl2y ay magmo3a l-lt63eem.
tl2a 2ola2k el-lzeen lm ytm t63eemhm fe el-magmo3at el-lzeen tm t63eemha 3la el-fw2 el-7maya, b-fdl t5teem el-tajreba - el-ma3roof b-esm tajreba el-t63eem el-dayry.

haza el-naw3 mn el-tajareb y5le2 magmo3at 7wl jhet etsael el-ash5as el-lzeen 2asabohm el-mrad, kma jhet etsael jhet etsael jhet etsael, nzeeran l-2anah haza el-ash5as m3'rozon l-khtr 23'la l-l2esaba bel-mrad.
w-bma en el-msharkeen el-lzeen tm t63eemhm 3la el-fw2 2qaleloo 3dd el-2esabat, f-stfad el-ash5as ghyr el-mo2hlleen l-lt63eem da5l el-magmo3at el-fw2ya mn mna3a el-qta3.
wf2an l-teqreer, kan t63eem 52.1% faqat mn el-msharkeen la yzal fa3'al b-nesba 70.1% fe mna3 nshor el-ebola.
el-lq7 ghyr met7'lel l-lby3.
qamet monaazamet el-sa7a el-3alameya b-tkzeen kmeeya e7tyateya k-2ejra2 27tyaty, t7sebana l-7doth tfa5y akhr l-ebola.

ye2ol longini: "nsa3d alaan monaazamet el-sa7a el-3alameya 3la tkrar haza el-tajreba l-jam3 el-tehdydat el-tara2'a l-l2amrad el-m3deya mn 5lal m5ta6 el-b7'w w-lt6weer l-3ml 3la mna3 el-awbe2a fe monaazamet el-sa7a el-3alameya".
w-yshmel zalek khtot t5teem w-t7leel l-tajareb lq7 zika".
nshr haza el-nsa hna bmwjeb tr5'ee5 el-msha3 el-2ebda3y.
el-mo2alef: efan barton - gam3et floridat7qq mn el-msdr el-2asly l-lmqal m3 shro6 el-tr5'ee5 el-da2'a l-tstm3 enha 3alaa 2e3ada nshroh 3la mwk3k el-5as
ya g3daan, ana 3ayez a7keelkom 3an 2eset 2adees 3azeem esmoh el-anba antonios, elly by3tbr wa7ed men el-arba3a elly etle2bo be-mshyryn allah fe raynland.
el-2eset de betfekerny ezay el-eman w el-taqwa momken yeghyroo 7ayah el-wa7ed w ywesloh le-a3la daragat el-ro7anyah.
el-2adees antonios dah kan ragel masry aseel, etwald 7waly sana 251 milady fe 2aryet gareeba men madenet menf fe masr.
men soghoreh w howa kan mo2men w mo7eb lel-rab, w karar yekrras 7ayato le-5demet rabena.

fe yom men el-ayam w howa 2a3ed fe el-kanesa, seme2 aya men el-engil bet2ool: "en ordet en tekon kamel, fazheb w ba3 amlakak w a36 el-fo2ara2, fykoon lak kanz fe el-sama2 w ta3al etba3ny" (mata 19:21).
el-kalam dah athar feeh gamd, f karar ybe3 kol elly yemlekoh w yetber3 be-flosoh lel-fo2ara2 w el-mo7tageen.
ba3d keda, karar el-anba antonios ennoh yeseb kol 7aga w yed5ol el-baraya 3ashan ye3eesh 7ayah el-zahd w el-taqshef.
3ash fe mnte2a mon3azla fe el-sahara, fe maghara 3ala gabal el-qulzum shamal gharb el-bahr el-ahmar.
7ad, wagheh tahadeyat keteer men el-shayateen elly kant betzaharlo fe ashkal mokhtalefa, bas emanoh el-gawy kan a2wa men ay 7aga.
elly shaddeny fe 2eset el-anba antonios ennoh 3ala ragmn ennoh kan 3ayesh fe 3ozla, ella ennoh sabha lama 7es en fe nas mo7tageenlo.
7waly sana 305 milady, edtor ennoh yekser 5alwtoh 3ashan yegabel talameez gayenloh 3ashan yet3allemo mennoh w yedrebehom 3ala 7ayah el-rahbana.
kan bysa3edhom w yereshdem, bas ba3d keda rag3 tany le-7ayato el-mon3azla.
el-ragel dah by3tbr moses netham el-rahbana, w bey3tbero 2adees 3azeem fe el-kanesa el-koftya el-orthodoksya.
2esetoh bet3kes mafhoom el-rahbana el-mas7eya, w khososan netham el-wahda elly bey3temed 3ala el-3ozla w el-taqshef.
ana shakhsyan, ba7taram gedan el-nas elly bys3o wara 7ayah el-taqwa w el-zahd, w b3teberhom 2odwa leena kolna.
yemken mesh kolna n2dar ne3eesh zy el-anba antonios, bas 3ala el-2a2al n2dar nete3allem meno 2eema el-eman w el-tawado3 w el-zahd fe el-donia.
de 2eyam mohma gedan fe 7ayatenna k-masreyeen mo2meneen, w betsa3edna ne3eesh 7ayah afdal w nb2a a2rab le-rabena.
allahomma sally 3ala sayedna mohamed w 3ala 2aleh w 7abbeh ajma3een.
qamar za7l taytan mesh byebtal yebharna w yefage2na.

men kam osboo3, ketbna 3an ezay 3olamaa nasa aktshofo b7eyrat kbeera men el-methan 3ala 5at estwa2 el-qamar โ balzat fel makan elly tawq3atna 3n el-qamar bet2ol enha mesh el-mafrood tekon mawgooda feeh.
delwa2ty, el-t7leel el-gded lel-bayanat men masbar cassini bey2tar7 en fe 7agat aktar bt7sal ta7t sa7 el-qamar: me7eet 3alami men el-maya el-sayla.
el-5abar 3n el-me7eet el-mo7tamel ta7t sa7 taytan moshe2, laken elly moshe2 lel-dhawsha aktar howa ezay el-3olamaa estanjo wagoodeh.
lama taytan byedawwar 7awaly za7l, gazba el-kawkab el-da5em deh betsabbo be2owa kbeera โ le darja en taytan beyghyer shaklo shwaya w howa beyet7arak ne7yet za7l w beyb3ad 3anho.
el-tashwoh dah fel-qamar howa 3ala shakl entfakhat aw "mad w gezr" fel-maya el-metjameda elly betkoon aktar sa7 taytan.
law kan el-qamar sokhry le2lbo, 3olamaa nasa kanu motawake3een entfakhat 7awaly 3 feet.
ma3a enhom la7ezu el-entfakhat de, laken kanet akbar bektir โ 7awaly 30 feet.

bayan sa7afy le nasa bey2tesh kalam luciano iess, el-mo2alef el-ra2eesi lewara2a ba7thya 3n el-me7eet el-khafy le-taytan:"aktshaaf cassini lel-mad w el-gezr el-kbeer 3ala taytan bey5aleena nestanjo be shakl aked en fe me7eet khafy fel-3omk", [...] "el-ba7th 3n el-maya hadef mohem fe estekshaaf el-nezam el-shamsy, w delwa2ty aktshafna makan tany feeh el-maya wafeera."akter 7aga moshe2a lel-2a5tar el-dahsha howa ezay momken yetnaseb ma3 b7eyrat el-methan elly etkalamna 3anha abl keda.
el-moshkela ma3 el-b7eyrat deh heya en 3ala 5at estwa2 taytan, el-methan el-mafrood yetbakhbar be-sora kbeera le darja eno my2darsh yetgama be-kamyat kbeera.
fel-7aqee2a, ma3 en el-methan wafeer gedan 3ala el-kawkab, laken el-mafrood yekoon khalas.
le7ad e3lan embare7, el-3olamaa kanu mofte7deen en el-b7eyrat deh betet3'adha men khazanaat joweya men el-methan.
el-daleel el-gded dah bey2adem bedeel.

tany, men nasa:"wogood taba2a men el-maya el-sayla fe taytan mohem le2enna 3ayzeen nefham ezay el-methan betekhzan jawwa taytan w ezay momken yetla3 3ala el-sa7", gal jonathan lunine, 3odw fareeq cassini fel-game3a el-kornelya.

"dah mohem le2enno kol 7aga momayza 3n taytan betegi men wogood el-methan el-wafeer, laken el-methan fel-ghlaf el-gawy ghyr mostaqr w momken yetdamar 3ala mqayees zamaneya jologya 9'ayra."me7eet men el-maya el-sayla, "mel7" bel-nashadr, momken yenteg so2el nashadr-maya khafeefa betertafe3 men el-qeshrat w tetla3 el-methan men el-geles.
el-me7eet dah momken yekhod kaman kkhazan 3ameeq le-takhzeen el-methan.
febenma el-methan momken yekoon byeshakl aktar nashat taytan fo2 el-ard, dawra el-methan lel-qamar momken tekoon madfo3a be-me7eetat joweya men el-maya.
belnesba lesoo2al wogood 7aya 3ala taytan, el-maya moshe2a lel-2a5tar, laken mesh bel-darora bet2adem el-7ojja fe ay etejaah.
el-maya, tab3an, asaseya lel-7aya 3ala el-ard w bet3tbr na2men men el-m3yar lel-7aya 3ala 3awalem tanya.
laken 3olamaa nasa bey3te2du en el-7aya aktar e7temaal enha tekoon mawgooda fel makan elly el-maya bet2abel feeh el-sokhr.
law, masalan, el-me7eet el-jowey le-taytan ma7sor ben tabakat men el-geles, el-7aya betkoon akal e7temaal.
elly mo2akad howa en ta3qeedat taytan lsa betektshaf.
el-3olamaa akheera bed2o yefhamu el-3amaleat el-asaseya 3ala el-qamar laken bayen en taytan dayman 3ando 7aga zyada yegoolha leena.
de fatra moshe2a.

madokor fel quran elkarim, ketir men eladyan welsh3oub 3ashu 3ala aradha men sh3oub el7adarat elly marat 3abr eltar5.
manta2a madayen saleh bet2atawi 7waly 60 hektar, welly ma3roof 3ala elset7 howa bas ghoz2 sagheer men elkanouz elmadfona ta7t elard.

elmalame7 elkhalda de elly 3amaloha elanbat el2adma elly estakru 7waly elmant2a de ma bayn elqarn elawal 2abl elmeelad welawal ba3d elmeelad, heya bas mogarad lam7a 3an el7adara elly 7akemt elard felwa2t dah.

elmadafen elly et7afrat bishakl mertab fel madayen saleh lessa bet7aky 7ekayat elmolook welshakhseyat elmohema weltegar elly kanu le2oron homa 7okam le3bet elsyasa weltegara fel mant2a beta3t tareeq elbakhour wel mawke3 kan bey3mel k 7al2a wasl ma bayn asia wganoub shb eljazira el3arabeya wesh-sham, kaman masr elfar3onya wel2empratoreya elromanya felba7r elmotawasit.
mshroo3 eltkeyef ma3 eltghyr elmanakhiiekhtarit gomhoryet gezr marshal eltrakiz fe mshroo3'ha liltkeyef 3la ta3zeez 7ameyet elsw2al.

3la elmada eltwil, yehded elta2kol welghamr elsa7'ly el3'ayed men elgezr elmonkhafeda felbalad, we 7adadat gomhoryet gezr marshal el7aga le ta3zeez 2adrtha 3la tasmem we tanfeeth tedabeer monaseba we mostadama le 7ameyet elsw2al.
yerkez mshroo3 eltkeyef fe 2etar mshroo3 gcca: psis 3la gezret ailinglaplap el5aregeya, we ben2a6 tareeq marfo3 le7'fath elwosool ben gezretein fe manti2et elta2kol elsa7'ly.
yehdem elmshroo3 kaman eno ykoon namoothaj le mabade2 eftare9'ya le a7'san elmamareis le msharee3 7ameyet elsw2al felmosta2bel.

bel2afada lelly, hayed3am elmshroo3 el7ewar welta6'eet ben as7'ab elmasla7a elwataneeyeen le wade3 code ben2a' we ma shabeh dah elly momken ysa3ed fe targeeh gazarat eltakhteet elmosta2bely, le7'd men elmakhater elnatgeya 3n eltghyer elmanakhii wel27'das elmanakhya elshadeda.

- mothakera mafhomeya- wathi2et tasmem elmshroo3- worshop takhteet elmshroo3- war2et ma3lomat mowazna- el2fteta7 elrasmy lelmshroo3- melf eltghyer elmanakhiielmosh3ada eltqneya fe domoj eltghyer elmanakhii we tahseen elwosool leltamweel elmanakhiife gomhoryet gezr marshall, da3am mshroo3 gcca psis:- taqyeem tamweel eltghyer elmanakhii le gezr marshall.

et3'amet elderaasa elmot3am2a di fe 2014, wetaf7'as mad'a wosool gomhoryet gezr marshall bel'f3l lelmo5'as men el2amwal men 2agil 2ah'daf eltghyer elmanakhii, we ezay momken ta3deel anzimat'ha elmahleya - bel2afada lelseyasat weltertebat elmo2seyat welanzimat el2edara elmaleyya el3amma - 3ashan yetesta5'adam eltameweel elmotawafr be shakl akter fa3aleya we zeiadet elwosool leltamweel elmanakhii felmosta2bel.
sahem mshroo3 gcca: psis belmowazfeen wel2amwal fe elmshroo3 dah, be2e9adet pifs belshiraka ma3 monazmat 2eqlemyet 2okhra (shoof eltareeq elnahayee le taqyeem eltameweel).
- taqyeem mad'a domoj eltghyer elmanakhii felseyasat wel5atat elwatanyet welqeta3'ya (shoof molakhas eltqyeem).
- tatweer mos'7ar gezr marshall leltghyer elmanakhii elly hayesa3ed fe taqdeer 2aws3 lel7'edeth 7awel eltghyer elmanakhii we gezr marshall.

eltadreeb we ben2a' elqodratkaz'a men mshroo3 gcca: psis, et2adem 3'ded men anwa3 eltadreeb fe gomhoryet gezr marshall:- e3'dad elmoqtar7'at we t7'leel el'2etar elmanteqy - yoolyo 2013 (shoof tareeq elworshop, taqyeem el'2athar, we dalel elmot3alem)- eltadreeb 3la eltghyer elmanakhii wel2e3lam fe manti2et shamal elmohit elpacyfy - october 2012 (shoof tareeq elworshop)- eltadreeb 3la estekhlaal bawaba eltghyer elmanakhii fe manti2et shamal elmohit elpacyfy - february 2013 (shoof tareeq elworshop)- el7'edwa elwatany el2awl 7awel eltghyer elmanakhii - september 2014 (shoof tareeq el7'edwa)- worshop eldoros elwatanyet elmostafada - november 2015 (shoof tareeq elworshop)- shof video eldoros elmostafada elly etnafa' k'az'a men sereyes men tesa3'a mofate7'at 5aseta bekol balad 7awel eltkeyef ma3 eltghyer elmanakhii fe 2015:

7alet el 7efz 3ala samak el babagh2a w 3ey el magtama3 fe el sha3ab el marjaneya el mahmeyya el kolombeyyabet3'am el asmak el 3ashaba door ra2e2y fe anzema el sha3ab el marjaneya, 3ashan bet7'atem fe zeyada nmo el 7'ad'af 3ala el sha3ab el marjaneya.
w 3amleya el tagh'eya 3ala el nabatat betkoon 7'eyweya lesha7et el sha3ab el marjaneya, khososan fe el anzema el be2eyya elly bet3any men 2asar el talooth w el sayed el gayer.
hadef el mashro3 dah le taqyeem 7alet el 7efz 3ala samak el babagh2a, elly howa 3ayela men el asmak el 3ashaba.

el mashro3 dah kaman kan leeh janeb egtema3y mowajah le zeyada el 3ey be 2ehmeyet samak el babagh2a fe el magtama3at el mahleya elly 3aysha gowa menta2a corales del rosario w san bernardo el bahreya el mahmeyya.

el derasat taht el mayya 2azheret en samak el babagh2a howa el naw3 el sa2ed men el asmak fe el sha3ab el marjaneya, bas kan fe dalel wa7'ed 3ala esteghal el kebar menhom 3an tareeq el sayed el enteqa2y.

beshakel mafage2, la2ena en samak el babagh2a beyetba3 lel say7'a3 3ala enno "samak a7mar", 3ashan yelbe el talab el 3aly 3ala el ma2koolat el bahreya, 3ashan el asmak el tajareya el gameya delwa2ty be2et nadra.

3amalna 7amla mekthafa le zeyada el 3ey shamelet: worsh 3amal ma3 el sayadeyn, mohadathat gayr rasmeyya fe el madares, masra7yat, mosabakat rasam, mohadathat fe el marakeb el say7'eya, adella w worsh 3amal le ta3reef samak el babagh2a, a7'bar ryaadeya, 7aflat moseqeya, w atlaqna "aghneya samak el babagh2a" elly ghanaha el fanane el sha3by charles king.

ba3d el anf'al de, el magtama3 beda yet3araf 3ala el door el be2ey le samak el babagh2a fe el sha3ab el marjaneya, w bey2etrah 3'eyr el tashre3at el khassat bel sayed men 2abl el solat el be2eyya, 3ashan yet3aref 3ala 7'ow2hom el taqledyya fe el sayed w yendmeg feha.

el daght le 7ameya samak el babagh2a w eshrak el magtama3at el mahleya fe sana el qarar howa5od wa2t, bas el mashro3 dah bemasal el khotwat el 2awela el 7eyaweya na7w el mamaresat el mostadama w el t7alofat el ta3awonya fe el karyeby el kolomby.

el ba7'os dah makanash momken men 3'eer da3m barnamaj el qeyada lel 7efz 3ala el be2a, w mashro3 eidey wild w mo2assa air, w wa7'det el karyeby el tabe3a le 7adaye2 colombia el wataneya, w kol mowazefe 7adeyet corales del rosario w san bernardo el wataneya.
ehna ben3terf bel mosharaka el was3a w el ehtemam men el magtama3at el mahleya fe geza2et grande w mokora w eslot fe el mashro3.

etfarag 3ala madwna el mashro3 hena:mashro3 ekologyya asha3et el lsa3 fe sha3ab glover el marjaneyael mashro3 dah kan hadofoh tahseen fahmena le ekologyya asha3et el lsa3 el genooby - naw3 modraj 3ala el 2a2ema el 7'adra lel etehad el dowly le 7efz el 7'eya 3ala enno "beyanat ghyr kafa2a".
asha3et el lsa3 zy el 2arsh, betnmo bebot' w 3omrha tawel w bgdan betkoon mot3'ara gedan lel sayed el gayer.
2aqareb asha3et el lsa3 elly hom asmak el wernak bey2edmona ders mo2sef fe el 2asar el darra lel sayed el gayer, ma3 samak el wernak el 3ady elly be2a ay 7aga ghyr 3ady fe nategoh.

derasetna entaget 3elm geded 3an soklok w 7araket asha3et el lsa3: tah'eddan estekhalhom le mawa2el bot3 el sha3ab el marjaneya lel e7temay w el tawjeh; w ehna 7asabna 7'am w kathafa sakaneen asha3et el lsa3 el kellyeen lel geza2et el marjaneya (el taqdeer el awel w el wa7ed le sakaneen asha3et el lsa3 el genooby); w entajna awel fahm le mawteen asha3et el lsa3 el gheda2y (eh elly betet3'aza 3aleh w madey tano3oh) moqarana be asmak el shark el moredda w shark el sha3ab elly byeskeno nafs el natem.
el derasa de zodet fahmena le asha3et el lsa3 be shakel kbeer, w sam7et be edara akter edrakan w doqat lel 7efz 3ala el naw3 dah fe el menta2 le bykoon feeh hadaf lel sayed.

et2'st5dam test ma7'3 kye lemoqarna el'5tlafat 2d'3el w ba3d eltadakhul.
et2'st5dam t7'leel el'an7'6ar ellogestei elghayr elmosht'6 fe t7'deed el3'wa'mel elly bet2'5er 3ala ma3'rifa feeros n2s elmon3a elbasharya/el'aids.
elnatay'6: sa'dat elmafah'6em el'5at2'6a 7'las elma3'rifa el6'6bya el'2sasy'6a w tarek men3 entshar feeros n2s elmon3a elbasharya/el'aids ben kol eltalab.
7'waly 10% le 40% mn eltalab kan 3'nd'hom mo'6afe salbya 3an feeros n2s elmon3a elbasharya/el'aids 2d'3el eltadakhul.

ba3d eltadakhul, kol eltalab '3'zar'6o ta7'6een mla7'6a felma3'rifa w elmo'6afe bta3t feeros n2s elmon3a elbasharya/el'aids (p<.05), elly by'5aly en eltadakhul eltaw3awi z'5ad ma3'rifa eltalab bsh'6a mla7'6a w 3'ayar mo'6af'hom bsh'6a '2y'je.

'2sharat t7'leelat el'an7'6ar ellogestei en mesta'6a ma3'rifa eltalab 3an feeros n2s elmon3a elbasharya/el'aids 2d'3el eltadakhul kan mertab'6 bsh'6a mla7'6a belsaf eld'rasy, welw'd'3 el'2kte'sady lel'2sra, w elmo'6afe t'7'6 elmoshar'ka fel7amlat elme3'lomat else7ya bta3t feeros n2s elmon3a elbasharya/el'aids.

el'2stn'6a5at: barnamg eltaw3ya befeeros n2s elmon3a elbasharya/el'aids la2at t'7'6eeb men talab elmar7'la elthanawya w '2'5tar 3ala elma3'rifa w elmo'6afe bta3t feeros n2s elmon3a elbasharya/el'aids.
lazm yet3'amad tada5ol m'6'6amed w tawel el'2med ben talab elmadares elthanawya lemen3 entshar feeros n2s elmon3a elbasharya.

ma3 estemrar mawsoom el takather, 2010 howa belf3l sana qyasyya lelsal7'at elbahreya elnadra wteyor elma2 wally betfar5 3al shawat2 fe cape hatteras national seashore, 7sb el'arqam el'awelya mn national park service.

7sb byan national seashore btare5 23 august 2020, tm tesgeel 147 3esh lelsal7'at elbahreya 7tta alan, howa akbar 3adad a3shash bytseg'l 3ala el'etlaq fe elshore line wjuz2 mn 835 3esh tm el'eblag 3nhom fe elwela2a hatha el3am (7tta elyoum) mn qbl ljnya mawader el7aya elbaraya fe north carolina.
elraqam elqyasy fe elshore line kan 111 3esh fe 2008.
el'arqam de momken tezid ma3 estemrar mawsoom takather elsal7'at le3'da 'osbo3 tany.
b'el'afada lelly 7asal, nja 15 far5 mn teyor elbalshoon el'abyad mn asl 15 far5, howa a3'la raqam bytseg'l 3ala el'etlaq mn2 balash el7efz 3al sejar fe 1992.

9bl tanfeed elma'marat el7alya le'edarat elmarakeeb 5arg eltare2 fe april 2008, en7'fdt 'adad teyor elbalshoon el'abyad fe cape hatteras national seashore le adna mostawa 3ala el'etlaq, fe3'eer ay far5 ynja fe 2002 w2004.
tm 'edraj teyor elbalshoon el'abyad elly betfar5 fe cape hatteras 3la enha "muhdada bel'enqrad" bmwjeb elqanoon elfedral lelnaw3 elmohdada bel'enqrad.
keda, 6ar 25 far5 mn teyor elnors el'amreky mn shawat2 elshore line fe 2010, ma3 b2a far5 wa7ed ghyr qader 3al tayaran.
kman 6ar 'arba3 far5 'edafya 3la gezret green elghyr ma2hola fe elshore line.
hatha howa a3'la 3adad mn elfar5 elly 6ar mn hatha elnaw3 el7ases elly tm el'eblag 3nh fe elshore line mn2 el7efz 3al sejar.
b'mwgeb morsom mwaqfa fe april 2008, tm tegeeh est5dam elmarakeeb 5arg eltare2 (orv) fe mnte2at teyor welsal7'at elmokhasa lelta3sheesh 3al elshore line 7'lal mawaseem ta3sheeshom.

elmarsom bywfr tdebeer 7'maya mabny 3al 3elm btowfer el7ad el'adna mn masafat el3ezl ellazma le7'maya elteyor welfar5 mn elmarakeeb wela7'terat elbasharya, b'el'afada le tgeehat elqeyada ellyleya elly btkon 7'yewya le7'maya elsal7'at elbahreya 7'lal ta3sheeshom.

3la rgm mn wgood 3'awamel mokhtalafa bma feha elta2 welhayawanat elmftrsa elly momken te2'ethr 3la naja7 elta3sheesh, el'ab7'at el3elmya, bma feha khatet el'est3ada lesal7'at elba7r elloggerhead mn qbl khdemet el'asmak welhaya elbaraya el'amreky, bet2'ked 3la 'ahmyet el7'd mn qeyada elmarakeeb 5arg eltare2 fe mnte2at ta3sheesh elsal7'at.

3adad a3shash elsal7'at elbahreya fe cape hatteras bymthel 17.6% mn kol el3eshash elly tm wdo3'ha fe north carolina fe 2010 7tta alan, moqabl 11.5% bss fe elfatra mn 2000 le 2007, hya elsenoon elthaman elly sab2at mba5'os 7'maya elqeyada 3al elshawat2.
wdo3'at khdemet el'asmak welhaya elbaraya el'amreky hadaf est3ada 200 sal7'a bahrya loggerhead fe cape hatteras national seashore.
"arqam elta3sheesh de btboshrna wbtshg3na," 2al walker golder, na2eb mdeer audubon north carolina.
"teyor elma2 elfarida welsal7'at elbahreya elly bet3'tmed 3al cape hatteras hya juz2 7'yewy mma by5ly elshore line kanz watany.

arqam elta3sheesh de btowda7 en elmarakeeb welhaya elbaraya momken ytsharako elshat2 tma2 mn2 en tdebeer el7'maya elmabny 3al 3elm mawgooda.""naja7 mawsoom elta3sheesh da by'2'ed 3la el7'aga lekhatet edara tawela el'amdl lmarakeeb 5arg eltare2 fe elshore line," 2al jason rylander, m7amey mowazfeen defenders of wildlife.

"7'day2na lazm tkon amaken amena lelhaya elbaraya b'el'afada le tawfeer foras tarfeya llezwar.""ela7'terat elbasharya hya 3'awel 3'awel fe naja7 elta3sheesh 3al elshat2 welly btkon ta7t seytra khdemet el7adyeqa bshkl kbeer," 2alet julie youngman, m7amya kbeera fe center for southern environmental law.

"n3te2ed en el'edara elfa3'ala llkayada 3al elshat2 sahemat fe elnaja7 elha2el hatha el3am."khdemet el7adyeqa elwatany bt6awwer 5atet edara nheya lmarakeeb 5arg eltare2 fe cape hatteras national seashore elly lazm ttnfed b7'las april 2011.

fe may 2010, 2adem center for southern environmental law wdefenders of wildlife waudubon north carolina ta3leeqat le khdemet el7adyeqa elwatany elly 7adadat 3'dat tdebeer darorya le khdemet el7adyeqa lelwfe2 be wala7'atha elqanonyya le 7'fth w7'maya elmawader eltab3eya lshore line, wterk'ha don 5'atar llejyal elga'ya, wtwfeer tawazon mnesab byn el'est5dam elmostamr lmarakeeb 5arg eltare2 wel'est5damat el3amya eltanya lshore line, bma feha el'est5damat elmashy wela3'elya w7'fth el7aya elbaraya.
hatha elmnazmat mjtema btmthel 1.5 mlyoon 3'eed wmo2yd.

how lsa fe nas betdm 7okoma bashaga de?!

w bsara7a ana msh shyf en amreka lha dwr kways fe el mawdoo3 dah, ya3ny el mb3wth bt3'oh tdkhl 3shan moratbat el gesh el watany, tb maytd5loosh 3shan y5lsow el balad mn el melyshyat w el gam3at el msalha elly 5arbt lebya!

"3ashan khater gomsha ya khoya?"ana shaifa en el3aseely dah fanano mawhoob w dammo khafeef, w b7eb aghanyo besara7a.

w ba3deen howa gal enno etgar7 abl keda, w en 2albo etkasar, bas brdo mesh ma3na keda enno yetgawez talat marrat!

w akheeran, ana ba2ol l el3aseely, khaleek motawade3 w 3aref ennak mahma kebart, lisa fe nas akbar mennak, w e7tarm elsahafyeen w shoof shoghlhom, w blash tetgawez kteer keda, khaleek fe gawaza wa7da w khalas!

w bey2olek la2o ma3ahom 2adat 7afr w kaman ma3sara zeytoon 2adema toelha 110 sm w 3aradha 40 sm taqreeban.

w lama 3aradooha 3ala moftesh 2athar mnte2a elfashn, akad enha athreya w terga3 ll3asr elromany.
w elakhoein dol et2arfoo enhom kano nawyeen yebee3o elgatta de w yeksboo menha, bs el7amdella elshor6a qabdat 3alehomm w et7absso.
w elgatta de htett7at fe makanha elsa7 ma3 el2athar eltanya.

dah mesh awel mara ye7sal keda, elosboo3 elly fat kaman elshor6a qabdat 3ala 9 mosajaleen 5atar mn sohag w asyoot kano bey7faro w yedawwaro 3ala 2athar, w la2o ma3ahom 7waly 100 gatta athreya mn el3osoor elfar3ony w elromany w elyounany.
besara7a, ana mesh fahem ezay elnas de betfakar!
ya3ny el2athar de mesh bas tar5ena, de kaman masdar da5l mhm llbalad.
elsyaha bet3tmed 3aleh, w bey3 el2athar de byedmar tar5ena w bey2ather 3ala eqtesadna.
ana yhmny awe enna ne7afez 3ala 2atharna w ne7meehom, mesh nebee3ha w nestafad menha btre2ya ghalat.
dah mirathna elly lazzem n3tez bih w ne7afez 3aleh ll2egyal elly gaya.

w law shoftoo 7aga mesh mazboot, blgho 3anha.
de baladna kolna, w lazzem ne7afez 3aleh.
bte3mel eh delwa2ty lw shoft 7ad bey7fer aw bysawar fe 2athar?
hl teskot wla ht2ol?
ana rayye enna lazzem n2ol 3ashan ne7my tar5ena w baladna.
derasah bte2ol en 3ashrat el 2alaf men el 2atnan men el mawad el kemaewya el sama men mntagat esthlakya bntst5demha kol yom fe el byot w amaken el shogh'l.
el ba7'ethen fe gam3et kalifornia fe berkly la2o en el make-up w ma3'6em el ed w el shampo w krayemat el gsem w kwayat el naftalin men doman el mntagat elly feha a3la mesta7'at men el samom.
el mawad de leha aktar men gared fe el mntagat, zy el formaldehyde elly byste5dem 3shan ymn3 el tga3eed fe el hdom, w el dethanolamine elly byste5dem kmezlak fe el sabon w el shampo.
el morakabat el 3'azeya el mot6ayra el sama, aw el vocs, hya mawad kemaewya mertabeta bel sar7an w el 3'yob el khalqya w fashl el a3'dha w mada3'fat tanya.
momken el wa7ed yet3'ar leha 3an tare2 el lams aw 3an tare2 el tanfes lama el mawad de tentasher fe el hawa.
3ala r2m eno mfeesh 7alat men el 7alat el madmra de etrbtet beshkal mbashr bel mntagat el manzelya, laken el adella bet2ol en el t3'ar el mtkrr leha byzood el m5at'er.
derasah fe gam3et kalifornia fe berkly la2et en el mawad el kemaewya el 5at'era el mertabeta bel sar7an w fashl el a3'dha w el 3'yob el khalqya mawgoda fe 3ashrat el mntagat el manzelya.

de mawgoda fe mawad el bena2 elly btmsak agza2 el beet beba3daha zy el ghera2 w el selikon, w el mnzefat zy el sabon w msh'6o6 el gseel, w most7'6arat el tgmyl zy el make-up w el manicure, w da 7sb tahzer el ba7'ethen.

el doctora kristen nox, el mo2lfa el ra2esya lel derasah w 3alema fe mnzmet ab7'ath el be2a "ma3'6em silent spring", 2alet: "el derasah de hya el awla elly betkshf mda est5dam el morakabat el 3'azeya el mot6ayra el sama fe el mntagat el yomya men kol el anwa3', w da momken y2ody le masha'kl se7ya khtyrah."el ba7'ethen by2dro en 5000 ton men el mawad el kemaewya el sama betntsher kol sana fe kalifornia lw7'dha.
w 3ala mostwa el dawla kolha, el ra2'm da momken ywsel le 3ashrat el 2alaf.
fere2 el ba7'eth fe berkly, elly nshro natayejhom youm el tlet 3ala maglet el 3lom w el taknya el be2ya, est5demo byanat be2ya 3shan yla2o mda entshar el mawad de fe el sl3 el 3ady.

ta7t kanoun kalifornia el ma3'roof be "prop 65", elly el nakhbeen waf2o 3aleh 3an tare2 estftaa' fe 1986, el mntagat el esthlakya elly bet7tawy 3ala mawad kemaewya sama lazma t7'6er el 3omala2 men wgodha.
el m5t5'een byste5demoha bekyamyt sghayra 3shan y7'6eno qwam w bnya ba3d el mntagat.
3ala r2m en kteer men el mawad de khad3a le r2abt edaret el gheda2 w wka2et 7maya el be2a, laken msh mamno3a beshkal sary7.
bra kalifornia, entsharha fe el mntagat el manzelya msh bytmtb3 beshkal mostmr kman.
laken momken tnt'3el men el mntagat de lel mayat el gwfya, w kman momken tnt'3el lel hwa.
lama el mawad de ted5'l el glaf el jwy, tfa3'olha ma3' ash3et el shams hye2ody le tkwyn el awzon.
el gaz el nat'6em mdar lel bny 2ademen, w bysbb elte7ab w e7tekan fe el r2a - w da by5'ly el nas elly bett3'ar leeh bet3'any men nwbat se3al w so3oba fe el tanfes.
el mas2oleen 3n el be2a fe kalifornia by3'mlo e5tebarat 3ala el mntagat elly bettba3 fe el wlayya 3shan yla2o el mawad de.
fere2 berkly est5dem el byanat elly gm3'aha el mas2oleen fe el wlayya fe ab7'athom.
el byanat de bett7'tamy 172 mntg et5tbr'o 3shan el mawad el dara el de.
w men doman'hom, 105 mntg kan'o by7tawy 3ala mada sama wa7da 3ala el a2al.

akter mada kemaewya sha23'a kant el methanol, elly betste5dem kmozel w 3amel mdayed lel tga'fyd fe el mntagat el manzelya zy el boyat w mawad el bena2.

w kman men doman el mawad el sha23'a kan el dethanolamine, w el ethyl benzene - elly byste5dem fe t5'6ee6 el plastk, w el ethylene glycol - elly byste5dem kmdayed lel tga'fyd, w el toluene - elly byste5dem kmozel fe el boyat w mawad tanya.
aswa2 el mntagat kant mntagat el bena2 w el tanzef.

el ghera2 el sena3'y, elly byste5dem fe mba7'6 kteer fe amerka, by7tawy 3ala 7 mawad kemaewya 5at'era.

kol el t3'ar'6at de bett2'3'3 w momken tseb dar 5at'er.""3ala el mostwa el asasy, el 3'amal yesta7'o y3'rafo eh elly byt3'ar'6olo.

1- el hadaf elra2eesi mn elderasa dee kan estekshaf elkafa2at elmatloba mn modareeseen eltalaab elmawahbeen fe elmadares elibteda2eya.
elta7leel kan mabny 3ala taqyeemaat le ahmeyya w tataweer elkafa2at de 3ashan n3raf elawlaweyat fe kol kafa2a mehniya matloob tataweerha fe tadreeb elmodareeseen elmostaqbaleen.
2- elbayanat etgama3et mn estebyan 226 modares le talaab mawahbeen fe elmadares elibteda2eya w men moqaabalat ferdeya ma3 5 modareeseen khabra le talaab mawahbeen.
3- nateeje elderasa dee heya kal2aty:1.

kan fee 7 magalat lelkafa2a et2ayemet mn modareeseen eltalaab elmawahbeen fe elmadares elibteda2eya w kan tarteeb elahmeya kal2ataly: selookeyat w khasa2es el3amal, eleste7'ara w edara elselook, tataweer elmanahg, elestrategiyat w elan7'6a elta3leemeya, meharat eltawasol, w elmar3efa elmarte6eta belmawheba.

a3'leb modareeseen eltalaab elmawahbeen fe elmadares elibteda2eya kan 3andohom mostawa22 a2al fe elkafa2a elme7niya bshakl 3aam, lakenhom kanu shayfeen en 3andohom kafa2a a7san fe selookeyat w khasa2es shoghlhom 3an elmodareeseen eltaneen.

magalat elkafa2a elme7niya eltanya zy eleste7'ara w edara elselook, tataweer elmanahg, elestrategiyat w elan7'6a elta3leemeya, eltaqyeem elnafsy elta3leemy, meharat eltawasol, w elmar3efa elmarte6eta belmawheba, kant a2al wa3y 3andohom.

modareeseen eltalaab elmawahbeen eldkoor, w elmodareeseen ally 3andohom darja 3elmiya fe magal elmawheba, w elmodareeseen elmotakhasseen fe magal elmawheba kan 3andohom mostawa2 a3la fe elkafa2a elme7niya.

modareeseen eltalaab elmawahbeen shayfeen en elmar3efa elmarte6eta belmawheba, meharat eltawasol, eltaqyeem elnafsy elta3leemy, w elmanahg elzawateya heya elawlaweyat fe el tataweer elme7ny elmostamr le modareeseen eltalaab elmawahbeen.
modareeseen eltalaab elmawahbeen elmafrood ykoon 3andohom shakhsyyet bets3a llmar3efa elgedeeda, mot7amesen lltdrees, w bey7eboo elttawwor elme7ny.
4- bena2an 3ala nateeje elderasa, et3melt tawseeyat le edaret elta3leem, elmo2assasat ally betedreb elmodareeseen, w elderaasat elmostaqbelya.
etneen ta3beeraat englizi kamen lo saaf el kararate homa "no brainer" w "tough call".
law karar kan "no brainer", yeb2a ma3nah enno sahel w waade7 ledarag ennak mesh me7tag tefakar feeh.
masalan, ta5ayal ennak 3ayez teshtery gazma mo3ayna bas sa3rha 100 dollar - ya3ny ghalyah shwaya.
law el gazma fag2a b2et fe ta5feed w b2et b 20 dollar, yeb2a shareeha no brainer - el karar sahel; waade7 ennak hatakhar tesharryha.
el 3aks men "no brainer" howa "tough call" - da karar sa3b te5odoh la2enno el ekhteyarat metshabehah gedan aw el mawdoo3 m3aked.
masalan, law betetfarrag 3ala lo7'ateen lenafs el fanen benafs el asloob, w 7ad sa2lak bet7eb ay lo7'a aktar, te2dar te2ol "di tough call.
ana ba7ebbohom homa el etneen beged".
te2dar testakhdem el ta3beeraat el englizi "no brainer" w "tough call" lo saaf karar sahel/waade7 w karar sa3b/m3aked 3ala el tawalee.
derasah gededa betetfarag 3ala ta'therat zera3et el-malie 3ala el-anzema el-zera3eya el-taqlidya hatdi el-mazare3een ma3lomat a7san 3an el-taghyirat tawela el-maddie fe estekhdam el-ard.

el-bahth be3'enwan "mada we taklefet tanafseya el-malie wel-mahasoel fe anzema zera3et el-malie ghyr el-mahsoda le takzeen el-karbon we anzema zera3et el-malie el-7yaweia el-mahsoda" bey7a22e2 fe el-taklefa elly nezam zera3et el-malie beysebabha 3ala el-mahasoel el-m7eeta.

el-doktor robert sowdmayr, el-ba7eth el-kbeer fe wazaret el-zera3a wel-ghaza, bey2ool en el-bahth beybeen en zera3et el-malie momken yekon leha ta'therat kebeera 3ala el-mazare3een we enhom hay7tago yakhdo fe e3tebarhom el-taklefa de lama yegarrou iza kanou hayzare3o el-malie wala la2.
el-derasa et3amlet 3ala madar set senin fe 15 mazra3a mokhtalefa le zera3a el-2aswad we betbas 3ala talat anwa3 sha2e3a men el-malie.
el-derasa betbeen en fe enkhfad kebeer fe entaj el-mahasoel fe el-manate2 el-m7eeta bel-ashjar be2asar mon6a2a "tanafseya" beted5ol 7ayez el-tanfeez.

mon6a2a el-tanafseya heya el-mon6a2a gamb zera3et el-ashjar elly el-mahasoel feha betkaf7 3ashan te7sal 3ala maya we kamyat kefaya men el-3anaser el-ghaza2eya men el-torba be2asar el-ashjar el-m7eeta.

fe el-mo3'tal, el-5asayr be2asar el-tanafseya kant mo3adela le tajanob el-entaj el-zera3y le masafa 14 meter 3ala kol ganb men el-7azamat ghyr el-mahsoda we 9-10 meter 3ala kol ganb men el-7azamat el-mahsoda.
ashjar el-malie bettz3 3ala aktar men 12,000 hektar men el-ard el-zera3ya fe ganoub gharb el-welaya, we dah be2asar zeeda taht tashre3at el-taqa el-motajadeda we tegarat el-karbon.
ta3deel tarak zera3a 3ashan te5od fe el-e3tebar mon6a2a el-tanafseya beteklef el-mazare3een we momken tekon 3amel mohem fe kararhom be-edafat zera3et el-malie le nezamhom el-zera3y.
3ashan teb2a zera3et el-malie ekhtyar ka2eb lel-tatbeeq lel-mazare3een, el-taklefa 3ala entajhom lazema tet3awad bel-3awayed men el-ashjar.

el-doktor sowdmayr bey2ool eno 3ala raghem men en momken yekon fe sena3at 7yaweia ka2eba lel-tatbeeq fe el-mostaqbal, bas sa3b el-tanab2 beha, we bey2amel en el-bahth dah yebeen lel-mazare3een el-ta'therat elly no3 el-taghyir dah fe estekhdam el-ard tawel el-maddie haysabbo, we dah haysa7elhom enohom yakhdo karar akter mostanir.

"lama tebda tetkalem 3an el-wakood el-7yawy we 7agat zy keda, betbda tebas fe el-kora el-boloraya le2enno el-magal dah beyet3awwar be-sora kebeera.""el-haddaf kollo men el-wara2a de lel-mazare3een howa enaha tebeen el-bayanaat el-5asa bel-tanafseya.

"ba3d keda el-mazra3 lazmo yefakar 'dah ma3na eh lely?'el-bahth kan ta3awon ben wazaret el-be2a wel-7efz 3ala el-tabe3a we markaz ab7'as sen3'at el-mazare3 el-mostaqbelya, wel-wara2a el-kamila momken tel2aha hena.
fe 5 october 1983, le7'et nobel adet gaezet nobel llsalam lel-leesh valysa te2deeran l-nashato men agl l-7oreya wldemokratya fe bolanda.
fe l-7afla lly kanet fe oslo yom 10 december, estelmet l-gaeza danota, mrat za3eem l-tadamon, w-ebnom bogdan.
fe tebreerhom le-qararhom, le7'et nobel ketbet en 7amlet valysa le- "7o2o2 l-3omala kanat mn l-bdaya mosa7'a fe l-7amlet l-3amma le-7o2o2 l-ensan fe l-3alam".
kaman tam l-ta'keed 3ala en za3eem l-tadamon kan mokhl2s lel-mathal l-a3la l-l-tadabeer l-gheir 3anefa fe 7al l-mashakel.
wasalet l-akhbar le-valysa eno estelam gaezet nobel llsalam fe lelet 5 october - zamelo mn et7ad l-tegaret l-7orra kristof feeshkowsky 2alo keda fel-telefon.
bas valysa ma3amlesh l-m3loma de be-jedeeya.
sade2ha a7'eran lama tany yom ba3d l-qarar, l-sahafyeen l-gharbyeen etgama3o 2odam 3amarto w-l-radio l-almani 2a3'an l-5abar l-rasmy eno estelam l-gaeza.
l-radio l-bolandy 2a3'an l-5abar ba3d l-dohor.
le7'et nobel shafet valysa 3ala eno ta3beer 3an l-shawk lel-7oreya wlsalam.
"fe l-3alam lly e7na 3ayshen feh wade7 gedan en tafyeef l-tawter w-7al l-salmy lel-naza3at darory aktar mn ay wa2t fat.
(...) fe kol l-7alat, mn l-mo2akad en maghoodat l-leesh valysa leha ressaalet mohema le-zmanna.
ra2y le7'et nobel eno bymthel masdar elham w-mesal moner lel-ly by7arbo mn agl l-7oreya w-l-ensanya taht thoroof mokhtalefa", de kant taree2et le7'et nobel fe tebreer e5tyarhom.
twal l-yom, 3edad kebeer mn l-nas etgama3o 2odam 3amara valysa w-da khalah yekhatabhom mn shabako.

"de l-gaeza beta3etna kolna, taqdeer lel-ly 3ayzeen ywaslo ll-7a2e2a bel-tadabeer l-salamiya, men 2'eer tafawod", 2al valysa w-2'af eno 2akhd l-tekreem 3ala eno lefta mesh bas mawgahet lel-tab2a l-3amala l-bolandy lly howa bymthelha, bas kaman lel-mogtama3 l-bolandy kollo, l2anno "l-3omala mesh byshtaghlo fe faragh".
l-nezam l-shy3'y fe bolanda kan 2al2an fe3lan lama seme3 5abar gaezet l-salam.

l-soltat kanet motawaka2a l-tekreem da mn sana, bas sa3etha kan zaro wathay2, zy lly etsalemet lel-safara l-norwegeya fe warsaw w-lly kan mafrood enaha tethbet l-ta3awon l-maz3oom le-za3eem l-tadamon ma3a l-mokhabarat l-bolandy.

"magred lefta w'eza mn reagan, l-mara de be-3alama oslo l-tejarreya", "7al2a soghayara fe l-7amla 2add bolanda w-l-shy3'eya", de l-jomal lly estekhtemaha jerzy urban, l-motakallem l-rasmy lel-7okoma l-bolandy lel-ta3leeq 3ala l-gaeza.
fe 11 october, l-soltat l-bolandy ba3'at e7tejaaj rasmy lel-norweg le-qarar le7'et nobel.

men sana 1956 le7ad sana 1963, britainia agrat tajareb nowweya fe maralinga fe ganoub ostralya, we 3amlat me2at el-tajareb el-mokhtalafa.
el-tajareb di adet le-marad w mawt el-sakaneen el-asleeyeen el-mahalyeen, ma3a keda, lesaneen ketira, 7a2e2a egeraa el-tajareb di kanat sereya w mesh ma3roofa lel-gamhor el-ostraly.
maralinga mawgoda fe ganoub ostralya, 3ala ba3d 7awaly 800 kilometer shamal gharb adelaide, w kanat mawteen gabelta maralinga tjartutja.
3ala madar temn sneen, el-7okoma el-britaneya agrat tajareb nowweya fe el-manta2a 3ashan tefham ta2theer el-asle7a el-nowweya bshakl a7san.
bas ma3a el-este7'9am el-mothera lel-gadel lil-asle7a di elly kan ma3roof be-shakl sare7 men nehayet el-7arb el-3alamya el-tanya, el-tajareb di kanat sereya gedan.

le7ad sana 1970, lama avon hudson, 7ad afraad el-ko7'9 el-gawya el-melkeya el-ostralya, kashef 3an maday el-tajareb el-britaneya w el-go7ood el-da3eefa elly ba3daha le-tanzeef el-manta2a, el-tajareb di bagat ma3roofa 3ala nitaq wase3.

elta7leel 7adad mawak3 estrategyya mohemma feha foso7 kwayesa lelshabka elkhadra 3ashan te7'a2 fo2ed ma3tref beha lelshabka elkhadra:- ta7senat fe else7a eljasadyya welrafaha el3a2leya- e'7'ra2at leltakayef ma3a eltaghyer elmanakh- ta7seen elwosool lelmasahat elmafto7a- ta7seen etsalal mawa6en

el epa 2alet yom el talata en mawad el bisphenol a (bpa), elly betestakhdem fel tasne3 gam3a wase3a mn el montagat el estelakeya wel sena3eya, bema feehom batanaat 3eleb el ta3am, wel plastik el saded men el polycarbonate, wel danat wel taleyat el epoxy, etbayen enha betesabab fe athar 3al el takather wel tatawor fel derasat elly et3amlet 3al el hayawanat.
wel epa zadet en akter men million pound men mawad el bisphenol a (bpa) betetla3 fe el byea kol sana.

steve owens, el moshrf 3al mekteb el kemya wel men3 el talooth fel epa, 2al "et3arad adad men el magham elly betet3ale2 bel athar el momken en el bisphenol a (bpa) ye2a3od 3al se7et el ensan wel byea".
owens zad en el "el beyanat elly etgama3et men khilal el e7'tebarat elly betenshorha el epa hatse3ed el wazara fel fahm wel 3elaj lel athar el momken en el bisphenol a (bpa) ye2a3od 3al el byea".

fel yanayer 2010, el fda 2alet enha hat3mel fesh 7'asoos lel athar el momken 3al se7et el ensan wel taqleel mn el ta3arod lel bisphenol a (bpa) fel emdadat el ghaza'eya, elly betemathal akbar masdar lel ta3arod 3and el nas.

bayan sa7afy - 8 october 2018 - as7ab el-ardel-farye2 el-7okomy el-dawly el-m3ni be-taghyer el-manakh sa7ar teqryroh el-5as elly kan kol el-3alam mestanyeh.

el-taqreer bey2aked en ta7'eer el-manakh bey2eser 3ala el-mogtama3at fe kol 7eta fe el-3alam men 3'eer ma yekon fe 7aja le-ejra2at jathreya le-7ad el-7arara el-3alameya le-2a2al men 1.5 daraja mo2weya.

as7ab el-ard fe ostralya bey2olo en el-taqreer da da3wa sa5ena lel-esteyqa men 7'ater ta7'eer el-manakh, we bey2aked 3ala darora en kol el-7okom el-3alameya tet5ath el-ejra2at el-lazema we te7'od 5awater jadda le-7ad el-7arara el-3alameya aw el-mokhatara be-2athar katastrofeya.
fashl el-etelaaf el-fedraly fe mo3alaja ta7'eer el-manakh bey5ale el-mogtama3at mo3arada lel-2athar.

lee ew bank, el-motakallem be-esm as7ab el-ard le-taghyer el-manakh, bey2ol "en no7'et el-etelaaf fe dafen rasoh fe el-ramal 3an ta7'eer el-manakh bey3arred el-mogtama3at le-2athar sha7'ela zay el-mawjat el-7ara we el-gawaf we 7are2at el-gaba we el-ta6ares el-mot6araf."we zayad "el-wa2t el-7ali deh howa el-wa2t el-monaseb lel-7okom el-3alameya te3'ayer 7'osoosha we teltezem be-7ad el-enba3at.

ma3andenaesh wa2t ne7'soroh fe el-3amal el-manakhy."as7ab el-ard bey2olo en el-wa2t et7'ala lel-7okom el-3alameya be-koll el-mostawa7at tebny 3ala 7'osoos el-mogtama3at lama yet3ale2 el-2am be-taghyer el-manakh:pat simmons, el-motakallem be-esm as7ab el-ard lel-taqa el-motajadeda, bey2ol "el-mogtama3at fe ostralya bet5od 5awater 3ala ta7'eer el-manakh.

melayyeen el-2osar 2abto tawle3at shamsy, we el-mogtama3at betebny mshari3ha el-5asa lel-taqa el-motajadeda we bet5atet le-2athar el-manakh."we zayad simmons "kol mostawa7at el-7okom lazem teb2a akeed men el-mogtama3at lama yet3ale2 el-2am be-taghyer el-manakh."fashl el-etelaaf el-fedraly fe mo3alaja ta7'eer el-manakh bey7'tage le-qeyada syasya akbar men bill shorten we mo3arada 7ezb el-3omala.

lee ew bank bey2ol "ma3a fashl el-etelaaf el-fedraly fe mo3alaja ta7'eer el-manakh, el-wa2t et7'ala lel-bill shorten we mo3arada 7ezb el-3omala yewde7o el-qeyada el-syasya we yekono ta7'eer el-manakh awlaweya."we zayad "7okom 7ezb el-3omala kanet el-7okom elly bedat mshro3 hydro snowy el-ro2ya, zeyadat 7ad el-taqa el-motajadeda, we khalet el-molwethin yedfa3o 3ala mosahmetohom fe ta7'eer el-manakh."we zayad "el-7okom el-fedraly el-gay lel-3omala lazem yekon 3endoh ta6mo7 akbar le-kabh el-enba3at law 3ayzen netgannab el-2athar elly el-farye2 el-7okomy el-dawly el-m3ni be-taghyer el-manakh 7azar enoh gay 3ala tool."as7ab el-ard bey2olo en 7okom el-welaeyat we el-2eqalym kanet la3eb mohem gedan fe syasa ta7'eer el-manakh, lama el-7okom el-fedraly 7at 7ad lel-7araka.

lee ew bank bey2ol "7okom el-welaeyat hayefdal yela3ab dawr ra2eisy fe en ostralya tekbeh el-enba3at, we yesta7'eq da3m el-7okom el-fedraly."law el-etelaaf el-fedraly gad fe ta7'eer el-manakh, haye3mel el-7agat deh:zeyada ta6mo7 ahdaaf ostralya el-wataneeya le-7ad el-enba3at 3ala el-foor be-7asab a7'er el-3elm.
wad3 plan lel-takhally el-sare3 men 7'osoos ostralya el-2adeem men ma7atat el-taqa elly betesh3al bel-f7m we el-gaz elly betolweth el-be2a.

bed' el-estekhana el-sare3 fe estekhana el-taqa el-shamsy we el-reyah we el-ta5zeen le-wasol le-100% men el-taqa el-motajadeda 3ala 2030 3al el-2a2al le-khal2 2alaf el-wazaef we kebh el-enba3at fe ketar el-khebra.

etowledt alice holmes fe norfolk, england sana 1821, w kanet wa7da mn keteeer mn elnas ally hajaroo le amreeka ba3d 7arb 1812.

etista3mel el-masdar el-3alami "geodiversity" 3ashan yelbe 7agahet el-bahethin fe el-geology fel-esharah lel-manazer el-tabi3eya lel-mogama3, bema yshmel el-3anaser el-la7yaweeya zy el-sokhor wel-ashkal el-ardeya wel-tura wel-anhar, 3ala sebyl el-meethal, we da by3tbr meshabe7 le-masdar el-tano3 el-biyologee.
el-3anaser el-mokhtalafa lel-geodiversity wel-tano3 el-biyologee, metgama3a, betshakel bey2at fezy2eya mokhtalafa, welly betsam7 bel-tahlil el-kamy lel-makan wel-thara wel-wofra.

el-maqal da beyhdem le-t7deed el-gawaneb el-ra2eesya lel-taqareb been el-geodiversity wel-tano3 el-biyologee, ma3a el-ehtemam be-3eynat el-3ala2at fe kol 7ala, wel-tawzee3 el-makany, we ghanah el-tano3, wel-3ala2a been mag3 el-geodiversity wel-tharw el-geology.
men 7'lal wade3 mabade2 e-tawgeehy 3amma 7awal el-tafsir el-kamy lel-geodiversity wel-tano3 el-biyologee, wad7 en el-etneen byesta5dmou minta2a makanya mo7adada msa2ban.
el-tano3 el-biyologee 3omoman by3tmed 3ala wahdat 3eynat be-a7'yam mokhtalafa besabab est7ala el-ta7deed el-kamy el-mubasher lel-tano3 fe kol el-minta2a.

fe 7ala el-geodiversity, men el-darory ta7deed magh'as a2sa we adna lel-taqyeem, we ben2a 3ala magh'as el-marja3 da, ta7deed tawze3 makany lel-3anaser men 7'lal rasem el-khara2et (el-geology wel-geomorphology wel-tura) we adaat qyas.

el-taqyeem el-kamy lel-geodiversity, welly lesa bettm taqyeem tarekoh, momken yed3em fahm a7san lel-by2a el-fezy2eya, we kaman momken yewafr nateeg le-ta7deed we taqyeem el-tharw el-geology wel-geomorphology wel-paleontology.

wma3a keda, men el-darory ma3refa en tano3 el-7aya we el-3anaser el-la7yaweeya fe by2a mo7adada bymthel sayak mo3aked gedan wel-lazem yetfhm be3meq a3'az men maghr mo2asher raqamy by7addad makan tano3 el-2es'ha el-mokonah lel-kol.

tawlekeen etshaghil kam7arr fe 2agamoos oxford el inglizi le snin ba3d reg3oh mn el 7arb el 3alamiya el oula, wel 5amas el awelaneen mn ketab "7al2a el kalemat" beyetkallem 3an shaglooh feek, we bey7'alli tafaseel 3an el mad5al elly etshaghil 3aleehom, mn "wajel" le7ad "weld".
we kamaan beyetkallem 3an 3ala2toh el mostamera bel gaamoos, we shaghl mertabit beeh 3ala gaamoos lel kalemat el ingliziya el wosta.
el ghez2 el tani mn "7al2a el kalemat" beyetkallem 3an tawlekeen kasana3 kalemat.
e3ada el tabe3 el eshti2aqi mesh bas me7tag fahm lel taghyirat el sawtiya wel sarafeya, laken kamaan el 2a2dra 3ala t5ayel el saye2at el egtema3eya wel ma3nawiya elly el kalemat etesta5demet feehom.
fa 5al2 tawlekeen lel lughat gededa ady le2khtera3 tari5 we mitholoyia yerafe2ohom, 3ala 2'eram mn 2en ehtemamoh el asasy fadl fe 3elm faqah el lughat.
nahj tawlekeen fe ekhtyar we takween el kalemat beyban ta2seer aslafoh zay walter skott we william morris, we momken yetasawey be nahj mo3asareeh zay e.

fe ta7awol fe ketabatooh mn asloob morris el 2adeem elly kan teyel shwaya le asloob "sayed el khawatem" elly kan aktar rakka, welly beyb3ed 3an el athariya el wa27a le sa7b estekhdame gheer mo2akhar lel khalfeya el tari5eya le entaag lughat ra2ya.
el talat akhmass el akhera mn "7al2a el kalemat" betetkonew mn meeya derasa le kalemat mo3ayana, we beybosso le tare5hom we ezay estekhdemhom tawlekeen - aw fe ba3d el 7alat khala2hom.
dol beyetraw7o fe el tool mn fagra 3an "bakarabr" le 3ashara saf7at 3an "hobbit".

we beybosso le kalemat gededa zay "yoqatasatrof" we "stagarmint", we e3ada2 e7ya2 kalemat 2adima zay "ma7om" we "heem", we e3ada2 tabe3 ba3d kalemat el ingliziya el 2adima momken yeb2a sha5laha eh fe el ingliziya el haditha law kanet faddalet mawgoda, we eshte2a2at el asma2 zay marish we kwakebem.
mol5as sagheer fe el khatema beysharah ta2seer tawlekeen 3ala el lughat el ingliziya.
"7al2a el kalemat" momken tekon farssa lel estefada mn shohret tawlekeen, lakenha mesh hat3geb gomhoor wase3, bas hat3geb elly beysharekoh tawlekeen fe shagfooh bel kalemat we tare5hom.
el ketab mesh bey2adem khalfeya 3amma, fa el 2ora2 elly may3arfosh ay 7aga 3an gaamoos oxford el inglizi, aw el 3ala2a bein el ingliziya el 2adima wel wosta, we hekka, momken yel2oh shwaya me7'yar.

el-esem da mn el-asami el-momayza gedan w men asl anglo-saxon, w howa esem englizy byowsef makan 3ayesh feeh 7ad gamb bo2'a, 3adaan betkoon bo2'a 3ala madkhal gaba wala ket3a ard maswra, w ahyanan betb2a bo2'a lelta7'em fel-maya aw bo2'a tasreef.
el-esem da gay mn kelma "hatcher" fel englizy el-2adim abl el-qarn el-sabe3, w ma3nah bo2'a, w el-la7qa "-er" bet3ni "sakn fe", w bettidad lalesem elly byowsef makan.

el-asami elly betowsef makan kant mn aw2al el-asami elly et3amlet, 3ashan el-mazaher el-tabi3eya w el-sena3eya fel-manazer el-tabi3eya betdi asma momayza w sahl el-ta3raf 3aleha fel-mogtama3at el-saghyra fel-3osoor el-wosta.
awel tasgeel lalesem kan fe awakhir el-qarn el-talet 3ashr (zy ma htshof taht), w fe nafs el-wa2t etzaker esem andrew hatcher fe sijlat el-wasaya fe sussex fe sana 1560.
thomas hatcher (1589 - 1677) kan captain parlamenti w mofawed le-scotland fe 1643, w kan mawgood fe ma3raka marston moor (1644) w 7esaar york (1644).
etman7 sh3ar nabaala le 3aylet hatcher fe carby w betham fe lincolnshire, w el-sh3ar byowda7 shakl 7arf v ben setet 2awake2 fedyya 3ala der3 fedy.

awel tasgeel maktoob le esm el-3ayle kan le john hatcher, w elly kan tareekhoh 1296, fe "sijlat el-dara2eb fe sussex" emda' 7okm el-malek edward el-awal, el-ma3roof besm "matra7a el-eskotlandeen", men 1272 le 7ad 1307.
el-al2ab kanet darorya lama el-7okomat bedat tetfarad dara2eb 3ala el-afrad.
fe england, kan esem el-dara2eb di "dara2eb el-ras".
3ala madar el-qorooon, el-al2ab fe kol el-belaad estamret fe "el-ta7awwor" w da adaa le zohoor ashkal mokhtalefa w ghareeba 3an el-ketaba el-asleya lalesem.

el-6a2ra el-shar2eya beirlan 2 waslat la23'la 2rta3 lehadd delwa2ty!

tarat el-6ayara el-shar2eya beirlan 2 beta3et shareka airbus 3la 2rta3 a3la mn ay wa2t abl keda el-osboo3 da, we heya betest3ed le-m7aweltha le-ta7teem el-ra2m el-2aseasy le-23'la 2rta3 le-6ayara shar2eya fe wa2t la7eg mn el-sanna de.

ma3 el-6ayarin el-tagrebeeyeen jim payne, morgan sandercock, tim gardner, we miguel iturmendi 3la m6naha, el-6ayara el-shar2eya el-madgoota di elly betese3 le-shakhseen 3mlet silsela mn el-re7lat el-7orra fawk madina el calafate fe argentina, feen ma waslat le-23'la 2rta3 w howa 32,500 22'em (9,900 meter).

el-6ayara beirlan 2 heya 6ayara shar2eya mn 3'eer m7arak, m2asama le-ta7teem el-ra2m el-2aseasy el-sabeq le-23'la 2rta3 w howa 50,727 22'em (15,416 meter) elly 7a22ah einar enevoldsen we steve fossett fe el-6ayara beirlan 1 sana 2006.
el-haddaf el-2a7'eery howa enaha tekoon awel 6ayara thabeta el-gena7en mn 3'eer m7arak tewasel le-7odoood el-fada2 3la 2rta3 62 meyl (100 kilometer).

3ashan te7'a2 el-2ahdaaf di, el-6ayara beirlan 2 m2asama be-tasmeem khafeef gedan be-wazen 1,100 ra2l (500 kilo) bas lama tekoon fa2eya, be-gen7ayn to23hom 84 22'em (27 meter), we kaman mzawada be-netham tanafos bel-oksajeen we mazla 2n9'adha lel-tawa22o2.
ba3d ma 3mlet re7lat tagrebeeya 2awleya fawk welaayat oregon we nevada, enta2al el-mshro3 lel-argentina fe 2016.

mawseem el-e5tebarat el-gdeed haystafeed mn el-tala2 el-rey7 el-andezyya we el-dawama el-qotbeyya el-ganobeya fe ganob patagonia elly betwaled a3la "mawjat gebleya fe taba2a el-estrateesfeer" fe el-3alam, ma3 teyaraat howa2eya sa3eda mnmken tewasel el-6ayara beirlan 2 le-7odoood el-fada2.

7sb shareka airbus, el-shahrin el-gayeen hayshofou fareeq beirlan bey7awel yet5atta el-ra2m el-2aseasy le-2rta3 2006, we fe nafs el-wa2t yegma3 beyanaat 3elmeya 3an el-ghlaf el-gawy we el-ta3'or lel-2es3a2 3la 2rta3at 3alya.

la2n el-6ayara beirlan 2 malhash m7arak, we ma3a keda heya 2adra 3ala el-6eyaran el-m7'atam feh, feya 3andha meza 3an el-6ayarat wel-baloonat fe enaha momken te25od 3eyanat mn el-hawa2 ma3 forsa 2a2al lel-talooth beyn ma heya betesta7'em fe mkanha el-matloob.

"ma3 zyada el-talab 3ala el-safar el-gawy, we e7na benwa7'oh as2ela 3an ezay nen2el 3adad sokkan metzayed bshakl aman we be-kefa2a a3'la, el-baseera elly hatgeema3ha m7awla airbus beirlan 2 hatkoon la te2dar be-thaman," dah elly bey2olo alan macartur, ra2ees airbus americas.
"2ktshafat beirlan hatse3dna nshakel mosta2bal el-fada2 el-gawy be-ebtekaarat motal2a bel-tasmeem wel-handasa, safar gawy a3'la kefa2a, we 7atta 3elm el-6eyaran el-mot3ale2 bel-safar 3ala el-mreekh."

nasa 2atghalt ma3 13 wakaalah fada2 3alamyeh 3ashan ttawwer estrateegia estekshaf 3alamyeh, ben2a2 3ala rdoohom.

elestrateegia betwadd7 leeh elmagtm3 el3alami ma3teqed enna lazmm nstakshaaf el-fada2, ezay estekshaf el-fada2 momken yefeed el7ayah 3ala el2ard, we ezay el2amar momken yela3eb door 7yawy fe estekshafna llnezam elshamsy.

wa7ed mn aham el-an7'6eh elly elmagtm3 el-fada2y el3alami etgeha leeh fe 2006 kan el-ejaabah 3ala el-as2'leh "leeh elmafrood nerga3 ll2amar?" we "eh elly ehna 3ayzeen n7a22oh men 3'eer estekshaf el2amar?"mawdo3at estekshaf el2amarseteh mawdo3at lestekshaf el2amar zahart mn elmn2ashat el-2'a7'erah lestrateegia el-estekshaf el3alamyeh.

nasa 2atghalt ma3 elmagtm3 el-fada2y el3alami 3ashan ttawwer elmawdo3at de 3an teery2 so2al "leeh elmafrood nerga3 ll2amar?"men el-ejaabat zahart seteh magalat ehtemam moshtarakah - seteh magalat llba7'th elly, mn man6or el3alam, bet7addad 2e'meyet elro7'oh ll2amar.
nasa 2a5dat el-afkar de we 2atghalt ma3 wakaalat fada2 tanyah 3ashan ttawwer mawdo3at estekshaf el2amar elly gaya.
+ el7adarah elensanyah+ mad elwjoood elbashary ll2amar 3ashan yesma7 beleste6an fe elnahaayah.
+ elma3'rafah el3elmeyah+ motaba3ah el-an7'6eh el3elmeyah elly betta3amel ma3 el-as2'leh el-asasyah 3an tar5 el2ard, elnezam elshamsy, welkoon - we 3an mkanna feehom.

+ el2est3dad llestekshaf+ e5tebar eltechnologiat, el-an6'6mah, 3amaliat el-tayar, we taqneat el-estekshaf 3ashan taqleel el-makhater we zeiadet entajeyet el-mhemat elmosta2beleah llmareekh we ma ba3doh.
+ tawfeer nashat tahady, moshtaraka, wsalmy byw7d el-dwal fe el-sey 2ela tahqe2 ahdaaf moshtarakeh.
+ eltwse3 el-eqtesady+ twsye3 elmagal el-eqtesady llard, we e9raar an7'6eh 2amaryeh befa2ed ll7ayah 3ala elkoob el-2am.
+ est5dam barnamg estekshaf fada2y nash6 3ashan eshraak eljomhoor, tshge3 eltalab, wels3adah fe ttwfeer el-koowa el3amelah 3alya elteqneya elly hatkon matloobah l-mwa7'7ah t7adeyat elmosta2bel.
ahdaaf estekshaf el2amartaqreeban 200 hadaf lestekshaf el2amar nategu mn 3amleyet estrateegia el-estekshaf el3alamyeh.

nasa 2atghalt ma3 elmagtm3 el-fada2y el3alami 3ashan ttawwer el-ahdaaf de 3an teery2 so2al "eh elly ehna 3ayzeen n7a22oh men 3'eer estekshaf el2amar?"nasa 2a5dat el-ejaabat el-kteera llso2al dah wagem3'om fe 2a5tbaseyt shamelah laktr mn 200 7aga mokhtalefa n2dar na3melha 3ala el2amar!
ahdaaf estekshaf el2amar el-ma2sood beehom enhom yemsak kol magmo3at el-an7'6eh elly ay 7ad motawar6 fe estekshaf el2amar momken ykoon 3ayz y6aredha.
el-an7'6eh de momken tetanfez 3an teery2 nasa, wakaalah fada2 tanyah, sherkah 5a9ah, gam3ah, aw ay 7ad tany byesta7'6er fe estekshaf el-fada2.
el-a7'6m mn kda, kol hadaf lestekshaf el2amar momken ysa3'ed fe ta7'6eeq el-ahdaaf el-wase3ah elly bet3arefha 3ala el-2'al el-mawdo3at lestekshaf el2amar.
msalan, el-hadf "deraasat el-fw7at 3ala el2amar" mertabet ma3 mawdo3 "elma3'rafah el3elmeyah", 3ashan derasat el-fw7at hat5aleena nta3alem aktar 3an el2amar welnezam elshamsy.
3an teery2 rabt el-ahdaaf belmawdo3at, mnzmat zay nasa momken t2afham a7'san el-an7'6eh el-m7adada l-ta7'6eeq el-ahdaaf.
nasa hat5od afkar mn mawdo3at we ahdaaf estekshaf el2amar we tbd2 fe tahdeed jadwal zamaney llly nasa bet5a66 t3melo 3ala el2amar.

el-mawdo3at wel-ahdaaf el-ma2sood beehom enhom yemsak kol magmo3at el-an7'6eh elly ay 7ad motawar6 fe estekshaf el2amar (wakaalah fada2, sherkah 5a9ah, gam3ah, aw ghyroh) momken ykoon 3ayz y6aredha, zay ma ttm tawweerha fe el3amleyet el-wsfeyah el-saba2'ah.
el-mawdo3at wel-ahdaaf mesh by3'rad syaset el7okoma el-amrekeyah aw nasa.
hom mesh by7adddo magmo3at mn el-an7'6eh elly nasa aw ay 3'eed fe elmagtm3 el-fada2y el3alami by3tzem enno y6aredha.
el-mawdo3at wel-ahdaaf mesh by3'arad 2edha kan el-tshree3 elmadany, el-etefaqyat el-dwaleyah, aw el-etneen hkoon matloobeen l-tanfeezhom.

nasa bas sahalt tawweer el-mawdo3at wel-ahdaaf de, elly hy merat magmo3at beyanat wahda l-e3tbar bel-7'6 el-welayat el-mte7'edah we shareka2ha el-dwaleyeen el-mo7'taleneen bybda2o fe tahdeed handaset estekshaf el2amar.

el gam3eya di et2aset fe el asas men 7'lal magles 7'maya el teba3a fe new south wales fe 2007, w betmawwel mobtedey men wazaret el be2a w taghyer el manakh w el mayya elly kanet mawgooda abl keda fe new south wales.

w fe yunyo 2014, 2eshtaret magmo3a 3amal el ard el ratba fe murray-darling el gam3eya di, w fe 2015, shareket the nature conservancy ltd ma3a magmo3a 3amal el ard el ratba fe murray-darling let7'weer el gam3eya di aktar.
el gam3eya di monezza 5eyreya wa6anya mosta2ella gheir 7'olmyya betsa3ed 3ala el estethmar fe se7et el be2a tawela el mada lel nahr w ard australia el ratba.
w hatkoon el gam3eya di waseela mohemma gheir 7'olmyya le 7'maya el nahr w el ard el ratba, zy ma 3amlet gam3eyat el ard fe el mamtelekat el berya.
"el azma elly fe el mayya m7taga kol maghood n2eder na3melo 3ashan n7afez 3ala an7'arna w ardna el ratba.
el shajar el 7'mar 3ala dafat el nahr betmoot 3ashan mab2etsh tet3ared lel feyadanat zy zaman, w nebatat tanya ketir ma3tmeda 3ala el an7'ar mot2athra benafs el tare2a.
a3dad el asmak el mahleya 3andena 7'ales men 10% men el mostawaat el 6ab3eya, w da besebab ta2seerena 3ala el an7'ar.
a3dad el toyor el mayya bet2al fe ard ketir besebab nfs el sabab, w mostamarat kebeera men el toyor el mayya mab2etsh betetakather zy zaman besebab 2'olat el feyadanat.

fe door mohem le gam3eya 5eyreya wa6anya lel mayya 3ashan testafed men 5al2 el nas el montasher w te7'osh fe 7'maya el be2a, w da yshmel el t7'amem fe el tadaf2at el be2eya."richard kingsford, ostaz 3oloum el be2aahdaaf el gam3eya di betda3em el aghrad el be2eya bel t7'deed:(a) 7'maya w t7'seen el mawared el mayya el 6ab3eya fe australia, w da yshmel 7'maya w t7'seen w est3ada masader el mayya, w el an7'ema el be2eya el mertabeta beya, w el 3amelyat el be2eya w el tana2ow3 el be2ey lel be2a fe kol australia.
(b) tawfeer el ma3lomat aw el ta3leem, aw e7'ra2 el ab7'ath, 3an el mawared el mayya el 6ab3eya fe australia.
(j) el ta2dem be6alabat lel 7'sool 3ala tre5'es el wosool lel mayya, aw 7'solha, aw edaretaha, aw el 7'edaha, aw el t5ales menha, zy ma y7added el wesee 3ala el gam3eya di lel aghrad di.
(d) ensha2 w sa7'ya 5'asab 3am yetsama 5'asab el mayya el be2eya, haye7'tamel zy ma howa m7addad fe wase7et el gam3eya di 3ashan el ghered el m7addad beta3 da3m el aghrad el be2eya lel gam3eya.
(e) da3m aw ensha2 ay mo'assa 5eyreya aw ghered 5eyrey fe ay makan fe australia, zy ma y7added el wesee 3ala el gam3eya di 7'sb taqdeero el motla2, w da bykoon motawafe2 ma3a el aghrad di.
(w) da3wa el nas lel tabor3 bel floos, aw tre5'es el wosool lel mayya, aw ay 7'o2oo2 aw mamtelekat le 5'asab el mayya el be2eya lel aghrad di.
(z) 3amal ay 7aga tanya mertabeta aw betsa3ed fe el mawade3 di.
dawr el lagnat el estesharya howa:- taqdeem el nasa7a 3an el me3'yarat elly betesta5'emha el gam3eya di 3ashan tet5'ed kararate 3an el mayya elly hatshtereeha.
- taqdeem el nasa7a 3an 2'awa3ed et5'az el kararate le edarat ay mayya hatshtereeha el gam3eya.
- taqdeem el nasa7a 3an kararate el syasat el 3asasa elly hatda3em 3amal el gam3eya di beshkel fa3al, w edarat el mayya el be2eya beshkel fa3al.
- taqdeem el nasa7a 3an ay ab7'ath lazma 3ashan ted3em el est5'dam el fa3al lel mayya el be2eya elly el gam3eya di ma7'tezaha w medaretha.
el dam w nkha3 el 3adammesh banshouf meshakel ketir fi el dam aw nkha3 el 3adam 3and el settat.
w bimarahl ketir, aktar etnein manshareen homa luekimia el settat w anemia el settat el ma3dya.
di betkoon besabab feirus beenteisher men khilal el sawael el gesdya, w bey7taj talaames mubasher 3ashan yitna2al.
di aktar 7aga betseeb el settat el saghyrah l2anha betkoon 7assa gedan, w ahyanan el settat el kbeyrah fi el sen.
aktar el settat el kbeyrah fi el sen, 7ata law metel2etsh tta3eem, law gihazha el mna3i sa7eem, 3andha forsa 5% bas enaha tet2a7 luekimia el settat law et3radet lel feirus mubasheran.

luekimia el settat bet2ather 3ala nkha3 el 3adam bishakel asasy, w fi el marahl el akhirah momken tesab anemia 3an tareeq wagf entag khaleeyat el dam el 7amra, aw ertefa3 aw enkhfad shadeed fi khaleeyat el dam el beyda 3an tareeq elta2ther 3ala entag khaleeyat el dam el beyda fi nkha3 el 3adam.
mafeesh 3elaag lel marad dah, w e7na bas hena7awel ne7afez 3ala gawda 7ayaat settak le 2awwal fatra momkenah.
aktar el settat hate3eesh men sana le khams sneen ba3d ma yegeelha el marad dah.
nadran gedan, momken settat tetkhallas men el feirus dah w te7'las menno, bas di estethna2, mesh 2a3dah.
anemia el settat el ma3dya, aw fia.
el marad dah kan leeh asma2 ketir 3ala mar el sneen, w beda yet3araf 3aleeh delwa2ty kesabab sha3'eel lel amrad 3and el settat.
fia kan betesmaw hemobartonella felis, w ba3deen men kam sana etghayar esmo le mycoplasma haemofelis.
bighad el nas, dah 3adoa baktereeya fi el dam betenteisher 3an tareeq akl el bera3'eet el msabah.
el settat momken ykoon 3andha el 3adoa di fi magra el dam beta3'ha lesneen men geer ma tezaher 3aleha ay 3arad, le7ad ma tet3arad lel marad.
tareeqet el 3adoa el baktereeya di enaha betsabeb anemia 3an tareeq eltasak el baktereeya bekhaleeyat el dam el 7amra.
lama khaleeyat el dam el 7amra betmar 3ala el t7al, el t7al beyakhodha 3ala enaha khaleeyat ghayr tabi3ya besabab wogood el baktereeya, w beyshilaha men el dawra el damaweya.
nkha3 el 3adam mesh bey2dar yet3amel ma3 tadmeer khaleeyat el dam el 7amra men el t7al, w bey7sal anemia metzayadah.
fi tlet salalat mokhtalafa men fia, etnein menhom aktar e7temal enohm yesabbo marad le settak, w wa7dah menhom momken tefadl mawgoda men geer ma tesab marad.
el tleta momken yet3amelhom e5tebar 3an tareeq pcr.

el 3arad momken teshmel ertefa3 fi daraghet el 7arat, momken yetgaweb ma3 aktar el madadat el 7aweya, anemia, aw ertefa3 fi el bilirubin fi t7leel el dam, safar men el marad el shadeed, w mesh 7ases enak kways 3omoman.
ba3d el settat momken metzahrosh 3aleha ay 3arad, bas betektashef el marad bel sodfah.
fia me7tag madad 7awy mo7addad gedan esmoh doxycycline.
bas 7ata doxycycline momken ykoon 3ando mochkila fi el kada 3ala fia, fa e7na momken n3aleg be madadat 7aweya tanya 3ashan nzed fa3leya doxycycline.

fi el 7alat el shadeedah men el marad, momken n3aleg le fatrah qaseerah be muthbit lel mna3a 3ashan n5ally el t7al yewaf tadmear khaleeyat el dam el 7amra, w ba3d el settat hate7tag na2l dam 3ashan te3eesh fatra kefaya 3ashan testageb lel 3elaag.
fe elyoum elly et7tfel feeh be zekra meelad ibraheem lincoln el 200, wezeer el zera3a tom vilsack "fakk el asfalt" fe 7adeyet el sha3b el efteta7eya fe 7afal fe ard wezeerat el zera3a el amrekeya.
leeh fe 3eed meelad lincoln?
fe 1862, el rayes lincoln asas wezeerat el zera3a we semaha "wezeerat el sha3b".
7adeyet el sha3b hetetbany fe makan kan marsoof abl keda.
7awaly 1250 feet mrabba3 men el asfalt fe ard meqarr wezeerat el zera3a heytghayar lekhadra, we 612 feet menhom heytzra3o โ wel ba2y heekon 3ashab.
el makan dah gamb sewwaq el mazare3een beta3 wezeerat el zera3a.
heitzra3 eh fe 7adeyet el sha3b?
el 7adeyet he3ared masarefat el 7efez 3ala el be2a elly kol el amrekeyeen yegdarou yenfedouha fe 7adaye2hom w masahatohom el khadra.

kazaa men el 7adeyet, el zera3at el sadeeka lel mel2ahat mesh bas hetofer mawteen mohem lel ne7l wel farashat, bas hetekoun farsea ta3leemeya 3ashan tes3ad el nas tefham el dawr el 7ayawy elly betel3eboh el mel2ahat fe aklna wel 3alef 7ayawanatna wel zera3a kolha.

gaal vilsack: "men el daroury lel 7okooma el fedaralya enaha te2od el tareeq fe tahseen w 7ameya mawared ardna w mayyetna." "el rayes obama 3abar 3an el eltzaamo bet3o bel wesaya el mas2oola 3ala ardna w mayyetna w mawaredna el tabee3ya el tanya, w wa7da men tarak est3ada el ard le7aletaha el tabee3ya heya elly ben3amloha elnaharda โ fakk el asfalt le 7adeyet el sha3b."el 7adaye2 hettesamm 3ashan terawej lemafahim "el loon el akhdar", w dah yshmel tasmeem el manazer el tabee3eya w tasmeem el mabany 3ashan te7tfef bel mayya w te2allal men el gareyan el sa7'afy; w 7adaye2 3ala el sostoh 3ashan el kefaa fel estekhalak el taqa; w estekhlaas el zera3at el mahleya w masarefat el 7efez 3ala el be2a.
eldoktora bey2olol en soholat elwosool lel ma3lomat 3al enternet bet5aleel elmarza yeshakhsou nafsy, wedah bey5ale shoghloom as3ab.
eldoctora 3amra shah men mostashfa elamreeky beduby 2alet: "elnas betketb 3'awatha 3al google wel natega bet5aleehom ye2la2o".
"el3'awath momken tewodi le tashkhees baset aw khateer geddan, bas le ay sabab, homa mesh bey5odo balhom men el7agat elbaseta, bas bey5odo balhom men el7agat elkhateera aw elly momken tesab elwafah".

"homma 3ayzeen ye3mlo kol el t7aleel wel ash3a el momken.
wba3deen lazmt ta23od ma3 el marze2 wte2ne3o eno mesh m7tag kol el e7'ra2at de".

2al william seltzer, ba7eth kbeer fe 2gsm el 3elm el egtema3y wel anthropolowgia be game3a fordham, w margo anderson, ostazet el tare5 wel derasat el 7adarya be game3a wisconsin-milwaukee, en maktab el e7sa2 el amreeky 2ada ma3lomat le waghat el morakaba el amreeky khlal el 7arb el 3alameya el thaneya le tahdeed el ash5as men asl yabany, welly kan da mawgood fe ba7thom elly bey2akad af3al el maktab 3la 2ard men 3oqod men el 2nkear el rasmy.

we 2athar seltzer w anderson en maktab el e7sa2 emtal le talab wazeerat el khazana el amreeky fe 1943 le 7osol 3la 2esma be kol el ash5as men asl yabany fe menta2a washington dc zay ma kan mesajel fe t3dad 1940.

wetmes el ma3lomat de, elly etgama3et ta7t ta3hed bel sereya, fe ghodon sab3a ayam bas, wda7sn el ba7ethyn elly 2alaw en el maktab kashaf kaman 3n ma3lomat 3n ash5as tanyeen et7asoo fe t3dad 1940 le fbi, bel 2af bel ma3lomat 3n el sharekat w el mone5at el tanyet le waghat el takhteet lel 7arb, zay maktab edarat el tawary2.

we bey2ol seltzer w anderson en mawdoo2 2e5tia5 maktab el e7sa2 le ma3lomat momken men 2araha t7adad el amrekeen men asl yabany bshakl fardi khlal el 7arb el 3alameya el thaneya kan mawdoo3 mo5talef 3aleh 3oqod, w et3ad el 2nkear fe 2004 lma et2al en maktab el e7sa2 2ada beyanat 3la mostawa el code el beridy men t3dad 2000 3n el ash5as men asl 3araby amreeky le wazeerat el amn el watany.

we bey2ol el ba7ethyn en el maktab mesh 2an2a2 ay 2an2a, l2n kan fe 2an el qanun el thany le sel7yat el 7arb elly bey2a7 fe 2afdal el e5barat de, laken el mawdoo3 lelo 2athar mohem 3la el t3dad el gay 2010 l2n maktab el e7sa2 bey3temed 3la tha2et el gamhoor lel naja7 fe moshret.
w bey2ol seltzer w anderson en el maktab yetber2a men 2nkaro lel e5barat w y2a5od el saytara 3la el sijel el tare5y lel maktab.

w hay2adem el ba7ethyn, elly ketbo awel mara 3n dawr el maktab fe 7abs el amrekeen men asl yabany khlal el 7arb el 3alameya el thaneya fe 2000, nateg el derasa bet3tom 3n "sereyet el t3dad el sokan bmojob qanun sel7yat el 7arb el thany (1942-1947)" fe el egtema3 el sana7y le jam3eyet el sokkan el amreky fe madena new york.
w momken tshof nse7a men el paper el ba7ethy beta3hom 3la saf7et el web beta3 el mo2alefeen elly esmaha "el e7sa2 el rasmy w sereyet el e7sa2".

fe bdayel gededa motawfera le-mokaf7a el-anfloenza, bas 5ally balk: hatkalfak ketirb-2osbou3 el-anfloenza el-gasy el-sana el-ly fatet besabab salalat el-anfloenza el-shaddeda w-nags el-tat3eemat, el-5obara by2tar7o7 e7tyat6at gededa le-2osbou3 el-anfloenza dah, w-7atta bdayel gededa le-mokaf7a el-anfloenza.
el-gam3eya el-amrekeya le-2oteba2 el-atfal (aap) e7tara7et en kol el-atfal el-s7a el-ly ben 6 shohour w-23 shahr yakhdo tate3eem el-anfloenza.

bel-2afada le-keda, el-gam3eya el-amrekeya le-2oteba2 el-atfal (aap) nasa7et en el-afrad el-ly beykono 3ala etsalal mabashar ma3 el-atfal ma ben 6 shohour w-23 shahr zy el-ly beyshaghlo fe el-7adanaat yakhdo tate3eem el-anfloenza.
soda chandrasikar, tebyba atfal men chandler, 2alet en el-tawsyat el-gededa betestahdaf el-atfal "el-m3areddeen lel-5atar".
"el-atfal fe el-f2eya el-3omreya de aktar 3arada le-lesba be-mard shadd men el-anfloenza w-aktar 3arada lel-da5ool lel-mostashfa besabab el-mard" 2alet chandrasikar.

(jta) - tool 3omro, kol el ma3lomat elly kan 3arefha igor kolakov 3an gaddooh men na7yet abooh kanat soorathom, asma2hom, w 7a2e2a enohom et2ateloh fel holocaust.

el efterad fel 3ayletoh kan dayman en shindl w mordkhai sofa et2ateloh bel rassaas fel babyn yar (elly bettente2a ghalban "babi yar"), w howa wadi 3al 2atraf men kyiv feen el 2olta el 2almanya dhaba7oh 3al 2a2al 33,000 yahoody fel september 1941, fe wa7da men akbar madab7 el holocaust.

"kent bate3b geddan kol ma a7taj amr men ganb babyn yar", dah elly 2aloh le wakaalat el anba2 el yahoodya.

laken fel shohoor el 2akhera, kolakov, w howa loghayaaty 3omro 45 sana w 3ayesh gareeb men kyiv ma3 mrato w telata men wladoh, 2adar yemla keteer men el faraghat de be fadl meshro3 bahthy gedeed be qeyada markez babyn yar el tazkary lel holocaust, w howa moneza 2asasat fel 2016 le benaa mota7af lel holocaust fel kyiv.

meshro3 el asma2 betaa3 el markez - elly bada el sana elly fatet w nataj 3an tahdeed howya 800 dahya men dahya babyn yar elly kanet masayerhom maghoola abl keda - w farrag le kolakov 3anwan gaddooh el 2ady, sanaohm, makan dafnohm, w kaman el tafaaseel el mor3eba 3an sa3athom el 2a5era.
kelab dalela betetgawwel fel naseb el tazkary lel babyn yar fel 14 march 2016 fel kyiv, feen el naziin w el mot3awween el mahalyen 2ateloh 30,000 yahoody fel 1941.

(kenaan lefshiz)3adam wogood tafaaseel ta3reefya zy de mesh 7aga ghariba 3an dahya el holocaust men 2okranya el 7aleya, feen 7awaly 1.5 malyoon yahoody et2ateloh bel rassaas ben 1941 w 1943, ghalban ma3 awraq rasmyya 2alela.
ma yosamma bel "holocaust el rassaas" fel 2okranya 7asal be shakel motafare2 w asra3 w be 7a2a2a2a akter men ma3askar el mawt.

el ma3lomat 3an elly 7asal fel babyn yar 2alela geddan le daraja en egtema3y el 2akthar - beinohom el yahood, marad el amrad el nafsya, asra el 7arb, el meshteba fehom men el kawmeeyeen el 2okranyeen w el shyo3yeen - beyetrawa7 ben 70,000 w 100,000 dahya.

el ma3lomat 3an keteer men el ba2een motataqa, w 2ahyanan m7dod le magrod asma2hom, 7asb alexander belikov, bahes kbeer fel markez.

2allet el ma3lomat de bet3od le mazeeg men el 3awamel, beinohom na2s el watha2eq el 2almanya, el darar el 2a7el elly 7asal lel arsheef men madina kyiv fel zaman el 7arb, 3oqood men el ta3teem 2a2an ma 2okranya kanet goz2 men el 2ette7ad el sowfyety, w men7egya arshefa 2adima bet2alel men 2ahmeyyet el 2a7adeyya el ferdya.

"fel fatrah el sowfyetya, w 2ahyanan ba3d keda kaman, el menhegya el tare5eya fel 2okranya kanet bet2alel geddan men 2ahmeyyet el afraad, 3ala 2argam men el gozo2 el mabkera le ba3d el ba7ethen le 2e3ta2 el dahya wogoh", dah elly 2aloh belikov.

lama kolakov raga3 lel arsheef 3ashan yedor 3ala ay athar le gaddooh, kol elly la2ah kan sajal men el 3asr el sowfyety le dahya el 7arb el madaneyeen elly kan feeh esm 3ayletoh, 2a5er 3anwan ma3roof lehohom, sana melaadhom, w etneen arqaam taslelyya: 1868 w 1869.
"makansh feeh 7atta asma2hom el 2awela", dah elly eftakro.
